1.プルプルとした水色の身体と\nまんまるの ひとみが\nかわいらしいモンスター。\:
A cute monster with a
plump light blue body
and round eyes.
Everyone knows him.

73.あざやかな身体が自慢の\n色違いのスライム。\nスライムより ちょっぴり強く\n:
A different color slime.
A little stronger than
a slime and a bit
warmer to the touch.

144.とても経験値が高いので\nよく旅人に狙われる。\nそのため 旅人の顔を見ると\n:
Gives a lot of EXP pts,
and is frequently
targeted by people.
Tends to run away.

216.コウモリに よく似ている\n空飛ぶモンスター。\n攻撃すると ひらひらと\n身を:
A flying monster that
looks a lot like a bat.
If you attack it, it
may flutter and dodge.

281.森の中で暮らすうちに\n緑の身体になったドラキー。\nひらりひらりと攻撃をかわし:
Dracky, who has turned
green from living in
the forest. It likes
to apply Kasap.

354.いろんな呪文を身につけ\nひとまわり成長して\n魔界から舞い戻ってきた\nピンク:
Pink Drackies return
from a demon world
after having grown and
learned various spells.

418.ラリホーで眠りへいざない\nイオラで攻撃をしかける。\nたよれる親分として\nド:
Uses Snooze to put you
to sleep and Boom to
attack you. Loved and
trusted by Dracky.

488.スキルマスターの秘蔵っ子。\n修行で ぷるぷるを克服した\n鋼鉄の突起から繰り出:
The secret child of the
Skill Master. Don't
let its appearance
fool you.

568.旅人に 自慢の踊りを\n見せるために現れる\nナスの形のモンスター。\n愛らしい:
An eggplant-shaped
monster that show
travelers their dance.
Pay mind to its moves.

629.投げキッスで魅力を振りまく\nナスビ界のダテ男。\nさそうおどりで相手を惑わし\:
A resident of eggplant
world. Deceives people
by dancing and
blowing kisses.

699.さそうおどりで近づいてきて\nたまに仲間を呼び集める\nうっとうしい 果実の魔物:
A fruit-demon who
approaches with sassy
dances and calls
out for help.

773.品種改良を重ねられた\nジャンボナスビナーラ。\n格段に大きくなったものの\n性:
A jumbo eggplant where
a series of improvements
were made via breeding.

844.春風のフルートの魔力で\n巨大化してしまったナス。\nフルートを自分の親と思い込:
The Herald of Spring
has created this giant
eggplant, who's taken
the flute and ran.

915.ドロドロに溶けた身体は\n触れた者を毒に冒す。\nキアリーや どくけしそうの\n:
The sludge-melted body
will poison anyone who
touches it. You must
be prepared to face it.

984.高い守備力と すばやさは\n魔物たちの中でもピカイチ。\n逃がさずに 見事倒せば:
High defense and speed.
If you don't let them
get away, you'll gain
a lot of experience.

1056.メタルスライムにあこがれ\n肉体改造を重ねたスライム。\n電子回路をショートさせ:
A slime thats undergone
a series of physical
modifications, longing
to be a metal slime.

1132.イワノフ博士の研究室で\nひそかに 生み出された\n改造野菜モンスター１号。\n:
The first of three
vegetable muskateers,
secretly grown in
Dr. Stoneberg's laboratory

1206.のんびり屋の猫魔族。\nシマ模様と長いベロは\n一部に人気があるらしい。\n毛は:
A laid-back cat demon.
The striped pattern and
long tongue are said to
be popular among some.

1276.囚人服のようなシマ模様が\n特徴の猫魔族。\nかわいい外見に油断してると\n氷の:
A laid-back cat demon
with a striped pattern
that looks like a
prisoner's uniform.

1344.眠り攻撃やラリホーマを\nしかけてくる猫魔族。\n人を眠らせるのが\nなによりも:
A cat demon who uses
sleep attacks & Snooze.
Seems happier the more
people are put to sleep.

1406.キャット・リベリオの旦那の\nイチの子分を名乗る猫魔族。\nラリホーマで旦那を支:
Purrgatroyd's second in
command. Supports him
with Kasnooze, and
sometimes washes its
face.

1481.カラフルなシマ模様が自慢の\nすごく めずらしい猫魔族。\n気まぐれにメラを唱え:
A very rare cat demon with a 
colorful stripe pattern. 
Switches between licking and
Frizz on a whim.

1560.たまねぎマンが 健康のために\nニンニクを食べまくっていたら\n突然変異した。尋:
A transformed Onion man
brought on by eating
too much garlic.
Blocks the path
with a far
from usual smell.

1644.真っ赤なトマトに魔が宿って\n手足が生えたモンスター。\nこちらのＭＰを吸いとっ:
A bright red tomato
possessed by a demon who
sucks up MP and attacks with Zammle.

1721.大きなタマネギに\n手足が生えたモンスター。\n見た目によらず かしこく\nやく:
An onion monster that sprouted
arms and legs.
Contrary to its looks,
it heals injuries with herbs.

1787.目にしみるマヌーサエキスや\nメダパニエキスを まきちらし\n混乱や幻惑をしかけ:
An unpleasant onion who
blinds and confuses foes
by spraying out different juices.

1862.魔物の手で育てられた\nまがまがしいタマネギ。\nあまいいきや 暗黒のきりで\n:
An ominous onion
raised by monsters.
Weakens its foes with
sweet breath and black fog.

1931.巨大ナスビナーラの\n後ガマとして現れた\n正体不明の巨大たまねぎ。\nその実力:
A giant unidentified onion
who has taken the place of
Giant Aubergina.
Even stronger than the
previous purple plant.

1997.悪の心と鋭いツノを持った\nウサギのモンスター。\nチカラをため その額のツノで:
A rabbit monster with a cruel heart
and even crueler sharp horns.
Builds up strength and attacks
with its horns.

2063.チカラをためて\n攻撃してくるだけではなく\nラリホーも唱えて戦う\nずるがしこ:
A wicked monster that
can not only attack but
can also cast snooze.

2122.金色に輝く 毛並みとツノが\nひときわ目立つ ウサギの魔物。\nかわいい見た目と:
Despite its cute
appearance, the rabbit
monster is a
bloodthirsty seeker of
prey.

2203.黒き毛皮をまとった\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nＢＢＱスティンガーで\n獲物を串:
A black-furred monster
guarding the gates of
the trial, he skewers
his prey with his BBQ
stinger.

2265.イワノフ博士の研究室で\nひそかに 生み出された\n改造野菜モンスター２号。\n:
Modified Vegetable
Monster No. 2 was
secretly created in Dr.
Stoneberg's laboratory.
He is the chief
strategist of the Three
Musketeers of
Vegetables.

2334.かたいカラをかぶって\nぷるぷるボディを守りぬく\nはずかしがり屋のスライム。\:
Slime is a shy girl who
wears a tight collar to
protect her plump body,
and Crack is sprouting
from under the collar.

2410.貝がらを棲みかにした\n海生まれのスライム。\n世間の荒波に もまれて\nカラに:
Slime, born in the sea
and living in a shell,
tends to be confined to
her cellar in the rough
and tumble of the world.

2476.雪国でしか見られない\n巨大なつららを背負った\n真っ白なスライム。\n旅人を眠:
True-white slimes with
huge icicles on their
backs, which can only be
seen in the snow
country, put travelers
to sleep and attack
them.

2541.のんびり屋で おおらかな\nスライムつむりの お母さん。\nただし びっくりさせ:
She is the mother of
Shell Slime, a laid-back
and easy-going girl.
However, if you startle
her, she will drop a
thunderbolt!

2612.氷の精神を身に着けた\n恐るべき冷酷非情のドラキー。\nとはいえドラキーなので\:
He is a ruthless and
ruthless Dracky who has
acquired the spirit of
ice, but he is a Dracky,
so there is only so much
he can do.

2696.この世で最も清浄な身体を持つ\n聖なるタマネギ。\n分身と呪文で敵を打ち倒す\n:
The holy onion with the
purest body in the
world. It is also the
most powerful onion that
defeats its enemies with
its alter ego and SPELL.

2770.全身 緑色の毛が生えた\n小型のモンスター。\n丸い身体を回転させながら\n攻撃:
A small monster with
green hair all over its
body. It attacks by
spinning its round body.

2834.モコモコとして かわいらしい\n真っ白なケモノ。\n仲間を呼んで おうえんする\:
A fuzzy, adorable, true-
white animal that calls
on its companion to Egg
On it.

2905.あざやかなオレンジ色の\nぬいぐるみのようなケモノ。\n怒らせると 仲間を呼んで:
A plush animal of vivid
orange color. When
angered, it calls for a
companion and can get
out of hand.

2978.ハッスルダンスや おうえんで\n仲間をサポートする\nなかなか やっかいな\nモ:
He is an idol of the
monster world that is
quite troublesome to
play with Hustle Dance
and Egg On.

3046.ブオーンの胃の中で誕生した\n悪玉菌が元気に育った姿。\nおうえんで仲間をはげま:
A malevolent bacteria
born in Bjorn's stomach
and growing vigorously,
Egg On flares up the
companion and spreads a
poisonous paralysis
curse.

3122.ケダモンの変異種と思われたが\nどうやら未知の世界から来た\nまったく別種の生物:
It was thought to be a
mutant of Feralbeast,
but it seems to be a
completely different
species from the unknown
world. Be careful, as it
emits suspicious rays of
light.

3205.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な マリンスライム。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Seaslime has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

3269.身体中に ぶち模様のある\nスライムの仲間。\n過酷な環境にさらされて\n見た目:
A Slime companion with a
patterned mbuha all over
its body, it has been
exposed to a harsh
environment and has
grown up stronger than
it looks.

3336.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な スライム。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
The evil Slime has an
unparalleled strength,
and its red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

3396.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ドラキー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
The evil Dracky has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

3456.炎の呪文メラから生まれた\nたよりない下級霊。\nゆらりゆらりと ゆらめいて\n:
A helpless lowly spirit
born from a flame
spellFrizz. It dodges
attacks by swaying and
shimmering.

3523.死してなお 未練が消えず\nこの世をさまよいつづける\n悲しい たましい。\n悩:
Even after death, the
sad tamashii wanders
around this world,
unable to shake off his
regrets. After worrying
about it for a long
time, they self-
destruct.

3590.闇の呪文 ドルマドンから\n生まれた邪悪な幽鬼体。\n最も得意とする呪文は\n当:
Evil ghostly body born
from the dark spell
Kazammle. Its strongest
spell is naturally
Kazammle.

3659.マゴマゴしているだけと\n敵を油断させておいて\nじばくや イオグランデで\n大:
They catch the enemy
off-guard by thinking
that they are just
playing with their mago
mago, and then they
inflict heavy damage
with Jibaku and
Kaboomle.

3728.死の呪文にこだわりのある\nなんともタチの悪い亡霊。\nいわく ザラキはさっぱり:
A very nasty ghost with
a penchant for death
spells. Zaraki tastes
light, Kathwack tastes
strong.

3804.何者かに命じられるまま\n人々に とりついている怨霊。\n殺意のままに のろいを:
A vengeful spirit that
haunts people at the
behest of someone. They
attack by wielding a
curse with the intent to
kill.

3877.五声のひとつ『呼』の声を\n体現する声霊と呼ばれる存在。\n天奏士ピパップの呼ぶ:
A being called a "voice
spirit" that embodies
one of the five voices,
"ko", and appears at the
Meeting Place in
response to Messenger
Pipap's call.

3959.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ファーラット。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Feralball has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce intent to
kill.

4022.スコップを持った\nいたずら好きのモンスター。\nチカラをためてきたら\n気をつ:
A mischievous monster
with a shovel. Watch out
for it when it gathers
its strength!

4081.チカラをためて襲いかかる\nパワフルなモンスター。\n愛用のスコップは\n毎晩:
A powerful monster that
gathers its strength and
attacks. He polishes his
favorite shovel every
night.

4147.血と汗がにじんだピッケルを\n握りしめ 地下を見守る魔獣。\n工事のジャマをする:
Clutching a pikkele
covered in blood and
sweat, the hexenbiest
watches over the
basement. It gathers its
strength to strike down
travelers who interfere
with the construction
work.

4228.ためにためたテンションを\n一気に解放して\nスーパーハイテンション状態で\nお:
They release all the
tension they have stored
up and come at you in a
state of super-high
tension.

4295.ドン・モグーラといっしょに\n魔法の迷宮に封じられた子分。\nとばっちりとしか思:
A henchman who was
trapped in Magic Maze
with Don Mole. Although
he seems to be a bit of
a jerk, he is supporting
his boss.

4378.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な いたずらもぐら。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Mischievous Mole
with extraordinary
strength and a red,
piercing gaze with a
fierce intent to kill.

4442.まぶしい光で視力をうばい\nやけつくいきを吹きかけて\n獲物が苦しんでいる姿を\:
Dazzling light blinds
them, and they enjoy
watching their prey
suffer as they spray
burning smoke.

4516.戦士の儀礼場にて\n白灰の試練に挑む英雄を\n待ち受ける最後の関門として\n審判:
A spirit deployed by the
angel of judgment as the
last barrier that awaits
the heroes who challenge
the white ash trial in
the Court of Warriors.

4586.浜辺で ぼんやりしたり\nらくがきしたりと\n無邪気に遊ぶイカベビー。\nあたた:
Let's watch over the
squid baby with warm
eyes as it plays
innocently on the beach,
dawdling and scribbling.

4652.育ちざかりのイカキッズ。\n思わず つられる\nさそうおどりを踊って\n元気いっ:
Squid Fry, a growing
squid, spins
energetically, dancing
the unintentionally
biting Sultry Dance.

4716.メットを装着したタコ兵士。\n我が身を犠牲にして\nメガザルダンスを踊る\n厚い:
An octopus soldier
wearing a met. He is a
man of deep humanity who
sacrifices himself to
dance the Kerplunk
dance.

4780.悪魔の触手と恐れられる\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nハッスルダンスを踊って\n海:
The monster who guards
the gates of the trial,
feared as the tentacles
of the demons, dances
the Hustle Dance to
quench the companion of
the sea.

4846.武器を振るうことよりも\nおうえんしたり 踊ったりして\n仲間を援護することに\:
He says that he feels
more alive Egg Oning and
dancing to support his
companions than wielding
weapons.

4921.世界中のあらゆる場所で\nイカつい魔物の影に\nそっと現れる謎のイカベビー。\n:
Mysterious squid baby
appears quietly in the
shadows of squidgy
monsters everywhere in
the world, dropping
Zelmea Crest.

4992.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な プチアーノン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Khalamari Kid
is a man of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a deadly intent.

5055.ブーメランのように飛んで\n人を襲う 巨大なヒトデ。\n覚えたての ふしぎなおど:
A giant Starfish flies
like a boomerang and
attacks people, stealing
their MP with the Weird
Dance.

5129.さまざまなダンスで\n混乱させたり 回復したり。\nダンスに命をかける\n星形の:
Confuse or heal with
various dances. A star-
shaped monster that puts
its life into dancing.

5190.華麗なハッスルダンスと\nブレイクダンスさながらの\n激しい回転攻撃を あわせ持:
Demon World's Dan
Suchanpu combines a
spectacular Hustle Dance
with a fierce spinning
attack that resembles
the Break Dance.

5263.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な おばけヒトデ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Scarfish has an
unparalleled strength,
and its red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

5326.ひょうきんな踊りを見せつけて\n旅人にまとわりつく魔物。\n油断すると次々に仲間:
The monster, which shows
off its funny dance
moves and clings to the
travelers, calls up
companions one after
another if they are not
careful, and the
travelers are completely
surrounded.

5405.がむしゃらな修行時代を経て\nただのテンツクを卒業し\nメガザルダンスを会得した:
He is an even more
annoying Slugger who has
mastered Kerplunk
dancing after graduating
from being a mere
Slugger through a period
of strenuous training.

5482.さそうおどりで攻撃を封じ\n仲間よびで 魔物を集めて\nふくろだたきを もくろむ:
He's been practicing
Sultry Dance to block
attacks, and companion
yell to gather monsters
to hit the backpacks.
Everything went
according to his plan!

5557.頭上から獲物に狙いを定め\n呪いのきり まぶしいひかりで\n自分のペースに巻き込:
Aiming at his prey from
overhead, the dreaded
sky assassin rolls into
his pace with his cursed
Kiri Dazzling Hikari.

5629.いきなり現れて\n旅人をおどろかせるが\n戦闘に入ると逃げだす\nおくびょうな幽:
A timid ghost who
appears out of the blue
to frighten travelers,
but flees when they
enter a battle.

5685.瞬間移動で近づいて\n闇の呪文をはなつ ゴースト。\n失敗することも あるので\:
A Ghost that approaches
at a moment's notice to
emit a dark spell,
sometimes failing to do
so and sticking out its
tongue.

5756.地獄で 闇のチカラを蓄えて\n舞い戻ってきたゴースト。\n相手にラリホーマをかけ:
A Ghost that has
returned to Hell after
accumulating the power
of darkness, it attacks
after putting the
opponent to sleep with
Kasnooze.

5831.なんの取り柄もないゴーストが\n奇妙な術をほどこされて\n呪文を使うのが得意な\:
A Ghost with no special
qualities has been
reborn as a cool Ghost
who is good at using
spells after a strange
technique is performed
on him.

5907.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ゴースト。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
An evil Ghost with
extraordinary strength,
his red, piercing eyes
are filled with a fierce
intent to kill.

5967.言うことを聞かない子供たちを\nさらってしまうというオバケ。\n月明かりの家の子:
A ghost that kidnaps
children who don't
listen, trapped in a pot
by the children of the
moonlit house.

6052.世界中の芸人たちから先生と\nあがめられるお笑い界の巨匠。\n特にぱふぱふ芸には:
He is a master of the
comedy world and is
praised as a teacher by
comedians from all over
the world. He is
particularly passionate
about the art of Puff-
puff.

6132.仲間がピンチになると\nすかさずホイミで助ける\n心優しい スライムの仲間。\n:
He is a kind-hearted
Slime companion who is
popular in the monster
world.

6201.海を のんきにただよう\nのんびりした性格のクラゲ。\n油断してるとマヒ攻撃を受:
The Jellyfish is a
carefree, easy-going
fish that can be
paralyzed by a paralysis
attack if it is not
careful.

6273.ベホマを覚えた\nホイミスライムのエリート。\nいやしの雨も使いこなす\n回復の:
Healslime's Ellieto, who
learned to use Behoma
and is an expert in
recovery, also using
Right as Rain.

6338.ベホイムを覚えた\n頼もしいホイミスライム。\n触手を回してアタックする\n意外:
A reliable healslime who
has learned Moreheal, he
also has a surprisingly
martial side, turning
his tentacles to attack.

6405.ベホイミを覚えた\nかしこいホイミスライム。\n回復のタイミングが うまく\n長:
A smart healslime who
has learned midheal, and
whose recovery timing is
good enough to make it a
long fight.

6471.全身がメタルボディに変化した\n奇跡のホイミスライム。\n仲間たちを いやしなが:
Healslime, a miracle
whose entire body has
been transformed into a
metal body, escapes in a
spectacular fashion,
fending off the
companions.

6541.宇宙のあちこちに生息する\nスライムに似た宇宙生命体。\n仲間とテレパシーで通信:
A Slime-like space life
form that inhabits many
places in the universe,
it communicates
telepathically with
companions and
cooperates with them to
fight each other.

6617.いつもニヤニヤ笑っている\n袋の形のモンスター。\nいやらしい呪文で\nこちらを:
A monster in the shape
of a sack, always
grinning. It weakens you
with its nasty spells.

6681.さそうおどりを踊る\n宝石ジャラジャラのお金持ち。\n相手を弱らせる呪文を\nい:
A rich man with a
jeweled jalousie who
dances the Sultry Dance.
He knows various spells
to weaken his opponents.

6748.お菓子好きの魔女が\n作りだした 袋の魔物。\nピンチに おちいると\nハッスル:
A bag monster created by
a candy-loving witch,
who dances the Hustle
Dance whenever she gets
into a pinch.

6810.いつも ニヤニヤしている\n宝石ジャラジャラのお金持ち。\n相手を弱らせる呪文を:
Always grinning, jewel-
jeweled, rich. He knows
various spells to weaken
his opponents.

6880.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な おどるほうせき。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Goodybag with
extraordinary strength
and a red, piercing gaze
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

7026.好敵手を求めて さまよい\n出会いし者に戦いを挑む。\n資格なき者とみなしたなら:
Seek out favored rivals,
and fight those you meet
wandering. If you deem
them unqualified, you
will be judged by death.

7098.ドラゴンのような角と羽根が\n特徴のスライム。炎を自在に\n操り 火球バズーカや:
Slime, with its dragon-
like horns and wings, is
a fireball bazooka and
spell that can be used
to inflict pain on
adventurers.

7175.翼をはやし空を飛びまわる\n突然変異したスライムの一種。\nこごえるふぶきやしゃ:
A kind of spin-mutated
Slime with wings and
flying in the sky. He is
a tricky fellow who can
use his powerful
blizzard and
shakunetsuzu.

7258.強力な息攻撃に回復呪文まで\nあわせもった優秀な戦士。\nおまけに経験値も高いと:
A charismatic figure in
the Slime world, he is
an excellent warrior
with powerful breath
attacks and recovery
spells, as well as a
high level of
experience.

7338.うち捨てられたランタンに\n住みついた火の悪魔。\nランタンに化けて油断した\n:
A fire demon that lives
in an abandoned lantern,
it disguises itself as a
lantern and sprays fire
sparks at unwary
adventurers.

7411.地獄の業火を身の内に抱え\nナワバリに侵入した冒険者を\nことごとく消し炭にする:
He carries the fires of
hell in his body and
extinguishes every
adventurer who invades
his Naval base. He is a
specialist of the fire
attribute.

7487.固いカラに秘められし\n炎のチカラで相手の強さを\n試すため襲いかかってくる。\:
It attacks to test the
strength of the opponent
with the power of fire
hidden in its solid
body. Be careful of Pyre
o' Fire.

7562.じめじめした場所に群生する\n巨大な人面キノコ。ひと吸いで\n深い眠りに落とされ:
Huge humanoid mushrooms
grow in clusters in damp
places. Beware of its
sweet taste, which can
put you into a deep
sleep with a single
suck.

7644.地獄のキノコ三兄弟の次兄。\n巨体を活かしたパワー系……\nと思いきや毒や眠りを:
The second brother of
the three brothers of
the Mushrooms of Hell.
He is a dangerous guy
who can use his huge
body to create power,
poison, and sleep.

7720.エモノを眠らせることに\n強烈な欲求を燃やしており\n攻撃した相手が眠らないと\:
It is said that he has
an intense desire to put
monsters to sleep and
secretly becomes grumpy
when his attackers do
not sleep.

7794.ルカニで守備力を下げてから\n鋭いクチバシで襲ってくる。\n相手が強いと逃げてし:
After lowering its
defenses with Sap, it
attacks with a sharp
Kuchiba shi. If the
opponent is strong, the
bird monster is timid
and runs away.

7868.鋭いクチバシにマヒ毒を持ち\n突かれると しびれることも。\nマホトーンやマヌー:
They have a paralyzing
venom that can numb you
if poked with their
sharp Kuchiba shi, so be
careful of spells such
as Fizzle and Dazzle.

7944.あざやかな色の羽と\n凶暴な性格を持つ鳥魔物。\nドルマやルカナンを\n使いこな:
A bird monster with
brightly colored
feathers and a ferocious
personality, this clever
bird is adept at using
Zam and Kasap.

8010.フカフカした羽毛をはやし\n極寒の世界に適応した鳥魔物。\n戦闘時はドルマドンを:
A bird monster with
fluffy feathers that has
adapted to the extreme
cold of the world, it
shows a not-so-warm
appearance by releasing
Kazammle during battle.

8093.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ピッキー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
An evil Bludgerigar of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce intent to
kill.

8153.不気味なカサを揺らして現れ\nどくどくキノコの時限爆弾と\nマヒャドで敵を翻弄す:
Fan-tajista of the
mushroom world who
appears shaking his
eerie crust and toying
with his enemies with
his poisonous mushroom
timed bomb and Kacrack.

8230.メガザルロックで玉乗りする\n身の安全を重視した道化師。\nさまざまな妙技で敵を:
A clown who values his
own safety as he rides a
ball in a bomboulder. He
uses a variety of
amazing tricks to
fluster his enemies and
create a nightmarish
stage performance.

8313.小柄な見た目にそぐわず\nばくれつ棍やイオナズンと\n強烈な技をくり出してくる\:
Despite his petite
appearance, he is a
tricky juggler who can
pull off some powerful
moves such as Baketsurod
and Kaboom.

8383.うまみ成分を豊富に含んだ\nおばけキノコ界の人気者。\n投げつけてくるキノコすら:
A favorite in the
Funghoul world, rich in
umami ingredients. Even
the mushrooms they throw
at you are reputed to
taste delicious.

8459.姿を見た者に死を招くと\n言われる恐ろしいさそり。\nするどい針のひと刺しで\n:
The dreaded scorpion,
said to bring death to
those who see it. A
killer who chokes you
out with a single sharp
prick of a needle.

8529.風船のように フワフワと\n空中をただようモンスター。\n戦闘中に 仲間を呼んだ:
A monster that floats in
the air like a balloon.
It calls its companion
or uses Woosh during
battle.

8600.おなかのマトが印象的な\nぷよぷよしたモンスター。\nメガザルダンスを踊って\n:
A pudgy monster with an
impressive tummy mat, it
turns the tables on the
battlefield by
performing the Kerplunk
dance.

8673.フワフワ浮遊している\n爆弾型の魔物。\nピンチになると 自分の身を\n犠牲にし:
A floating bomb-shaped
monster that sacrifices
itself to save the
companion in a pinch.

8737.仲間を呼び集め 爆弾を落とす\nおそろしいモンスター。\n緑一色のボディが なん:
A terrifying monster
that calls up companions
and drops bombs. The
green body has an
oriental atmosphere.

8811.写真機の光で姿を現す\n影のような魔物。\nいたずら好きな性格で\n呪いをかけ:
A shadowy monster who
appears by the light of
a photo machine, he is
mischievous and puts
curses on people to get
them into trouble.

8874.フードの男が白色の呪符により\n召喚した 異界の獣鬼。\n所構わず呪いと爆弾をバ:
A beast demon of the
other world summoned by
Hooded Man with a white
spell. He is a nuisance,
spreading curses and
bombs wherever he goes.

8952.代々 陰衆の頭領にのみ\n召喚できる試練のための物の怪\n倒すことで天地雷鳴士の:
The power of the druid's
yin will be greatly
enhanced by defeating
the monster for trial,
which can only be
summoned by the
chieftain of the yin-shu
from generation to
generation.

9027.お金持ちの間で大流行中の\n珍しい金色のバブリン。\n飼い主のお金を景気よく\n:
A rare golden Zepling
that is all the rage
among the rich; it
attacks by spreading its
owner's money around
economically.

9095.ふよふよと宙に浮く\n真っ赤な風船型のモンスター。\nまんまるな見た目とは裏腹に:
A true red balloon-
shaped monster that
floats in midair.
Despite its rounded
appearance, it performs
a sharp dance.

9172.巨大化したカラスの魔物。\n止まり木代わりのがいこつは\nお気に入りの逸品だが\:
A gigantic crow monster,
the Skeleton is his
favorite perch, but he
will throw it at you if
the need arises.

9248.死を招く巨大カラス。\n足元のがいこつを投げる上に\nしゃくねつの炎で敵を\n火:
A deadly giant crow. Its
specialty is to throw
Skeletons at your feet
and cremate your enemies
with the flames of its
sakune-shitsu.

9318.優れた思考力と記憶力を持ち\n手下のおおがらすを使って\n方々のうわさ話を集めて:
A master of information
in the monster world, he
has an excellent mind
and memory, and uses his
minion Stark Raven to
gather rumors from all
over the place.

9394.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ぐんたいガニ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Crabid with
extraordinary strength,
its red, piercing eyes
are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

9457.じょうぶなハサミと\nこうらを持つ カニの魔物。\n次から次へと仲間を呼び\n群:
A crab monster with a
pair of scissors and a
spatula, it attacks one
company after another in
packs.

9526.スクルト 大ぼうぎょと\nガードのかたい カニの魔物。\nしかも 痛恨の一撃をし:
Kabuff Defending
Champion and the guarded
crab monster, who can
also deliver The Painful
Strike.

9599.青いこうらに身を包む\n凶悪なカニの魔物。\nトゲだらけの大きなハサミで\n痛恨:
The vicious crab
monster, clad in a blue
hare, delivers The
Painful Strike with a
pair of large, spiky
scissors.

9666.ラリホーを唱えてくる\nやっかいなカニの魔物。\nブ厚いこうらで おおわれた\n:
A troublesome crab
monster that chants
"Snooze," it boasts a
thick coat of fur that
covers its body.

9736.もともとはウェナ諸島に棲む\nじごくのハサミなのだが\n魔物商人ザルギスにより\:
Originally a Crabber
Dabber Doo living in the
Wena Islands, it was
trained for combat by
the monster trader
Zargis.

9809.美しい毛並みを誇る\n気高き ネコの魔道士。\nみがきあげた熟練の技で\nイオナ:
A noble feline mage with
beautiful fur. He can
even manipulate Kaboom
with his finely honed
skills.

9873.黄色のローブに身を包み\nメラを唱える化けネコ。\n相手が強いと しっぽを巻いて:
A yellow-robed monster
cat that chants Frizz.
If the opponent is
strong, it may run away
with its tail between
its legs.

9946.厳しい修行を積んだ\nジャガーの魔道士。\n得意げに マヌーサや\nイオを唱えて:
A jaguar mage with
rigorous training. He is
a jaguar mage who has
undergone rigorous
training. He proudly
chants Dazzle and Bang.

10003.多彩な呪文を扱う猫魔族。\nドルクマやメラミで攻撃し\nマホトーンで こちらの呪:
A cat demon with a
variety of spells, it
attacks with Zammle and
Frizzle and uses Fizzle
to block your spells.

10078.羽が生えた 切り株の魔物。\nメダパニを唱えて\nこちらを混乱させてくる\nいや:
A stumpy monster with
wings, he is a nasty
fellow who chants Fuddle
to confuse you.

10139.大きな目玉が特徴的な\n切り株姿のモンスター。\nラリホーマ ボミオスなど\nど:
A stump-shaped monster
with large eyeballs, it
uses a thumping spell
such as Kasnooze
Deceleratle.

10208.殺された母鳥の怨念が\n切り株に宿り 魔物と化した。\n巣にいるヒナをかばって\:
The stumps are filled
with the resentment of
the mother bird that was
killed and turned into a
monster. It uses Kabuff
and recovery spells to
protect the chicks in
its nest.

10281.人食い草に寄生されて\n強力になった ふゆうじゅ。\nかみついてくるだけでなく\:
Monolog, parasitized by
man-eating weeds, has
become powerful; not
only does it bite, but
it also uses recovery
spells.

10351.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ねこまどう。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Meowgician with
extraordinary strength,
his red, piercing eyes
are filled with a
murderous intent.

10412.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な バブルスライム。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Bubble Slime is
a powerful, powerful man
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

10476.背中に紫水晶を背負った\nカニ魔物界のセレブリティ。\nゴージャスレインで盛大に:
A celebrity in the
crabmonster world with a
purple crystal on his
back. He doesn't mind if
you give him a big toss
with Gorja Slaine.

10550.にくきゅうの杖のチカラで\nねこまどうがミケ猫チェンジ！\n愛と勇気のメラミで:
Pawmaturge Staff's power
has changed Meowgician
into a Mikecat! With the
power of Pawmaturge
Staff, Meowgician will
change into a Mikecat!

10630.６００年前にコルレーン王国に\n現れた魔物。\nその歌声はどんな作物も\n枯らし:
A monster that appeared
in the kingdom of
Colrain 600 years ago,
whose singing voice is
said to wither any
crops.

10695.人の手の形をしたモンスター。\n手まねきをして\nつぎつぎと仲間を呼んでは\n戦:
A monster in the shape
of a human hand. It will
prolong the battle by
mimicking hands and
calling companions one
after another.

10763.処刑場の血だまりから\n生まれたモンスター。\nおどろおどろしい動きで\nいろん:
A monster born from a
pool of blood at an
execution site. It
attracts various
monsters with its
horrifying movements.

10831.辺境のほら穴の土から\n突然生まれたモンスター。\nまさにマジック並みの速さで\:
A monster suddenly born
from the soil of
Frontier Den. It is a
monster that calls forth
more and more companions
and multiplies at the
same speed as magic.

10907.罪人を探し 飛び回る\n翼のはえた木の魔物。\nその巨大な目玉は\nいかなる罪も:
A winged wooden monster
that flies around
looking for sinner, its
huge eyeballs never miss
any sin.

10968.竜を模して造られた戦闘機械。\n鋼鉄のツメと伸縮するしっぽが\n主な武器だが内燃:
A fighting machine
modeled after a dragon.
Its main weapons are its
steel claws and its
telescoping tail, but it
also uses an internal
combustion engine to
spew out high-heat
flames.

11053.内燃機関を冷やすための\n高度な冷却装置を備えており\nそれを最大限活用して\n:
It is equipped with a
sophisticated cooling
system to cool the
internal combustion
engine, and makes
maximum use of it to
release a sparkling
fire.

11126.修理いらずで数千年もの間\n稼働できる驚異の耐久性。\n魔界技術の粋をつめ込んだ:
The Demon World is a
robust and unmatched
fighting machine that
incorporates the best of
Demon World's
technology.

11199.人間の監視用に魔物が作った\n小型の鳥のマシン。\nピオラで すばやさを上げては:
A small bird machine
created by monster to
monitor humans, it will
attack first by
increasing its agility
with Accelerate.

11274.魔物たちが人間を襲うために\n作った 白い殺人マシン。\n刃物のように鋭い羽で\:
A white killing machine
created by monsters to
attack HUMANS. It
slashes at you with its
sharp wings like blades.

11341.くろがねのボディを持つ\n鳥型の暗殺マシン。\nＨＰが低くなってくると\n自爆す:
A bird-shaped
assassination machine
with a black gold body,
it is a scary thing that
self-destructs when its
HP gets low.

11410.火の玉のように空を翔ける\n赤き鳥型の殺人マシン。\n翼からメラストームを放ち\:
A red bird-shaped
killing machine that
flies through the air
like a fireball. It
releases Frizz storms
from its wings and
explodes in a self-
destructive dance!

11480.カグヤ＝ムーンを見張るため\n侵略者の王が王宮に仕掛けた\n監視装置。命令された:
A surveillance device
set up in the royal
palace by the invader
king to keep an eye on
Kaguya Moon. It carries
out its mission as
ordered.

11557.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な メタッピー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Mecha-Mynah,
with an unparalleled
strength, has red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce intent to kill.

11699.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n一の災壇を守護するのは\n魔:
The incarnation of
disaster stands in the
way of the challenger of
Banma Tower. Protection
of the first disaster is
a mechanical dragon
driven by magical power.

11766.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ヘルカッチャ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Masqueraider
with extraordinary
strength, his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

11829.長い首を たくみに動かして\n敵の姿をとらえ スキあらば\nばくれつ棍やギラグレ:
He is a master rod
player who moves his
long neck deftly to
catch sight of his
enemies, and if he has
the opportunity, he will
unleash a "Sizzle Rod"
or "Sizzle Lade" on
them.

11907.きびしい修行の果てに首がのび\n崇められるに至った行者魔物。\nおどるように華麗:
Severe Training
CompletedThe head of
this ascetic monster has
grown so long that it
has become revered.

11993.座右の銘は 強さとは美しさ！\n棍の道を極めし者の動きは\n魅了の舞となって 敵:
The motto of his motto
is "Strength is beauty!"
It is said that the
movements of those who
have mastered the art of
rod become a dance of
fascination that even
their enemies cannot
help but admire.

12067.幼い頃から将来を期待された\nジラフ族の天才児だったが\n長ずるにつれ闇に惹かれ:
He was a child prodigy
of the Giraffe tribe
with a promising future
from an early age, but
as he grew older, he was
drawn to the darkness
and lost his way.

12143.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な いっかくウサギ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Bunicorn with
extraordinary strength,
its red, piercing eyes
are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

12207.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な プリズニャン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Jailcat with
extraordinary strength
and a fierce, murderous
intent in his red,
piercing eyes.

12270.美しき調べで人をあやつる\nおそろしき吟遊詩人。\n翼が生えてはいるが\n天使で:
A bard with a beautiful
voice. Although she has
wings, she is not an
angel.

12334.華麗なタップを踏む\nファンキーなペンギン。\n仲間のタップで大集合し\nメダパ:
Fan-key penguins with
brilliant taps, they
gather in large numbers
at the tap of the
companion and wreak
havoc with Fuddle.

12402.岩場を跳ねまわる\n凶悪な形相のペンギン。\n黒い群れが いっせいに\n飛びかか:
Penguins with a vicious
look leaping on the
rocky ground. The black
flock of penguins
jumping on each other in
unison is truly a demon.

12468.ド派手な毛皮に身を包んだ\nタップ界のエンペラー。\nラリホーマやマホトーンで\:
Dressed in flashy fur,
this emperor of the tap
world will dazzle you
with his Kasnooze and
Fizzle.

12539.大きな羽で闇夜を飛びまわる\n美しく華麗なモンスター。\nその魅力で相手を骨抜き:
A beautiful and gorgeous
monster that spins and
flies in the dark night
with its large wings. It
is a beautiful and
gorgeous monster that
flies in the dark night
with its big wings and
spins, and it cuts its
opponents to the bone
with its sharp claws.

12613.魔物らしからぬ魅惑的な姿で\n冒険者を油断させ 愛きょうを\nふりまき メロメロ:
With his charming
appearance, he catches
adventurers off guard
and makes them fall in
love with him. He is a
monster with a great
deal of cunning.

12691.滴りおちる血のように\n赤い翼を持つ美しき妖魔。\n桃色の嵐を巻き起こし\n相手:
A beautiful demon with
wings as red as dripping
blood. She creates a
peach-colored storm that
knocks her opponents to
the bone.

12756.神々の時代 天星郷に仇なし\n封じられた存在。光の河から\n現れ 飛び去る姿を少:
A being who appeared
from the River of Light
and was mistaken for an
angel by a young girl as
she flew away.

12830.獲物を求めて飛びまわる\n巨大なハチのモンスター。\nさそりを思わせる\nしっぽ:
A giant bee monster that
spins and flies in
search of prey. It
attacks with a stinging
tail reminiscent of a
scorpion.

12897.野生のハチが 魔物の手により\n殺人バチに進化した。\n大きな針には マヒ毒が\:
Wild bees have evolved
into killer bees at the
hands of a monster. The
large stingers are
paralyzing venom, so be
careful.

12969.知能の高いハチ型の魔物。\nバギやピオリムを使いこなし\nマヒ攻撃も しかけてく:
A highly intelligent
bee-shaped monster, this
Waspion is a paralysis
attacker who uses Woosh
and Acceleratle to
attack with paralysis.

13044.業炎の聖塔で試練に挑む者に\n立ちはだかる魔物の１体。\n女王につき従う兵隊を呼:
One of the monsters that
confront those who
challenge a trial in the
Fire Tower. It summons
soldiers to follow the
queen and attacks them
in groups.

13124.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な さそりばち。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Waspion of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce intent to
kill.

13185.特別な栄養食を食べて育った\n選ばれし さそりばち。\n身体的に屈強なだけでなく:
A chosen Waspion raised
on a special nutritional
diet, he is not only
physically strong, but
also intelligent and
mentally strong.

13260.ヒスイで作られた\n巨大な顔面の彫刻の魔物。\nその輝きはすべてを\n凍りつかせ:
A huge face sculpture
monster made of jade,
its brilliance is so
majestic that it chills
everything.

13325.大空を華麗に舞う猫魔族。\nマホトラで奪った魔力で\nマホカンタをとなえる。\n:
Cat demon, dancing in
the sky, uttering Bounce
with the magic power he
stole with his Drain
Magic. Does he like
magic or not?

13399.空を飛ぶ猫魔族。\nさまざまな手段で\n呪文を無力化してくる\n魔法使いの天敵。:
A flying cat demon, a
natural enemy of mage
that uses various means
to neutralize spells.

13452.こちらのＭＰを下げてきたり\n呪文を封じてきたり\nとにかく 呪文が大嫌いな\n:
It is a cat-like bat
that lowers our MP and
blocks spells, and it
hates spells anyway.

13519.闇夜にまぎれて飛びまわり\n敵に奇襲をしかける\n羽を持った ネコの魔物。\nバ:
A feline monster with
wings that flies around
in the dark and attacks
enemies by surprise, it
excels at Woosh-type
spells.

13589.魅惑のおどりで魅了して\nねこだましで意外性を\n演出することも忘れない\n自称:
The cat demon, a self-
proclaimed small Demon-
type cat, does not
forget to charm with his
enchanting dance moves
and create surprise with
his cat tricks.

13656.ハッスルダンスで回復して\nつるぎの舞の攻撃力で\n頼りになるところも見せつける:
A self-proclaimed
"healing" cat demon that
heals with Hustle Dance
and shows off its
clothes when it can be
relied on for its Sword
Dance attack power.

13729.とぼけたカオをしているが\nさそうおどりにつられて\n踊っていると 両手のツメで:
They have a silly face,
but when they dance
along with the Sultry
Dance, they are clawed
mercilessly with both
claws.

13801.クチバシとモコモコな尻尾が\nキュートな万能ファイター。\n鋭いツメで敵を切り刻:
A cute all-around
fighter with a kuchiba
shi and a fuzzy tail.
She cuts up her enemies
with her sharp claws and
burns them with her
Kaboom.

13875.ももんじゃ界の飲んだくれ。\n各地の宴会に顔を出しては\n歌うわ踊るわバギムーチ:
The drunkards of the
Platypunk world. He
shows up at banquets all
over the place, singing,
dancing, and throwing
out Kaswooshle.

13955.伝説の魔鳥 百怨邪として\n魔界のすべてを手に入れるため\nツボの中での長き眠り:
Platypunk awoke from a
long sleep in the pot to
take possession of all
of Demon World as the
legendary demon bird
Hyakonjaku.

14029.魔法が得意な ももんじゃ。\n大きなクチバシでとなえる\n強烈な呪文の威力は\n:
Platypunk excels at
magic, and his powerful
spells, delivered with
his large Kuchiba shi,
are not to be
underestimated.

14096.高い守備力に定評がある\n巨大なイモムシの魔物。\nネバネバした糸をはき\nこち:
A giant caterpillar
monster with a
reputation for its high
defensive capabilities,
this creature will shed
its sticky threads to
block your movement.

14166.深い緑の体色を持ち\n毒の息をはきだすイモムシ。\n動きは のろいが\n高いＨＰ:
This caterpillar has a
deep green body color
and emits poisonous
breath. It is slow-
moving, but its high HP
will be a challenge.

14232.火山の中から生まれた\n真っ赤なムカデのモンスター。\n炎をはきちらす攻撃には\:
The true red Centipede
monster was born out of
a volcano. Its flame-
spewing attacks will
literally burn your
hands.

14305.動きを封じるネバネバした糸や\n毒の息をはいてくるイモムシ。\n丸めた身体を高速:
The caterpillar breathes
sticky threads and
poisonous breaths that
block movement. They
spin their rounded
bodies at high speed and
attack you.

14384.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な キャタピラー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Killerpillar
has an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce intent to
kill.

14447.黄金の大樹を 背に生やす竜。\nバイキルトで攻撃力を高めて\n巨体で たたきつぶ:
This dragon grows a
large golden tree on its
back, and its attack
power is increased by
Oomphle, and it will
crush you with its huge
body. Be careful of its
burning breath.

14528.毒をぬった矢を撃って\n獲物を射止める狩人。\n仲間を呼ぶこともあるので\nすば:
A hunter shoots poisoned
arrows at his prey,
sometimes calling for
companions, so be quick
to kill them.

14590.森林の植物を愛する\n弓を持った 小柄な魔物。\nスカラを唱えて向かってくる\n:
A small monster with a
bow that loves forest
plants, and a cautious
personality that chants
Buff and comes at you.

14659.弓矢を使う 邪悪な妖精。\n狙った獲物を眠らせて\n仲間を呼んで取り囲む\n冷酷:
An evil fairy who uses
bow arrows. A ruthless
and excellent hunter who
puts his target prey to
sleep and surrounds it
by calling companion.

14722.血に染まった 赤いフードを\nまぶかにかぶる 邪悪な射手。\nただひたすら 一心:
An evil archer wearing a
blood stained red hood.
He shoots Rain of Pain
single-mindedly.

14799.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な リリパット。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Bodkin Archer,
with an unparalleled
strength, and red,
piercing eyes with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

14860.大森林のごとき深緑の体毛を\n持つ魔獣。ラリホーマで眠らせ\n痛恨の一撃を放つ凶:
This dark green-haired
beast, which looks like
a large forest, betrays
its lovely appearance by
using Kasnooze to put it
to sleep and then
unleashing The Painful
Strike in a vicious
battle strategy.

14943.暗闇の中で進化した\n大きな ひとつ目を持つ魔物。\nぼうぎょ中に手を出すと\n:
A large, one-eyed
monster that evolved in
the dark, it will snap
at you if you touch it
while it's defending
itself.

15011.闇のチカラで攻撃する\nメーダ界の親玉。\nこちらを感電させて\n動きを封じてく:
The master of the
Lunatick world that
attacks with the power
of darkness. It
electrocutes you and
blocks your movement.

15067.雷のチカラを身にまとう\nメーダ界の女王。\n大きな目でにらみつけて\n目が合っ:
Queen of the Lunatick
world, she wears the
power of lightning. She
glares with her large
eyes, paralyzing anyone
who meets her gaze.

15134.大きな王冠を頭に載せた\nメーダ界の王子さま。\nサラブレッドらしく\n多彩な技:
A prince of the Lunatick
world with a large crown
on his head. He has a
variety of skills like a
Sarabred.

15201.自在に宇宙空間を遊泳する\n宇宙生命体。巨大な目玉から\n発せられる怪光線で\n:
A space life form that
swims freely in space.
They choke their prey
with a monstrous beam of
light emitted from their
huge eyeballs.

15274.宇宙船アルウェーン号に\n侵入していた宇宙生命体。\n電磁波をあやつり ビームや:
An alien life form that
has invaded the
Spacecraft Alweyn. It
manipulates
electromagnetic waves
and uses beams and
cannons to destroy its
enemies.

15349.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な メーダ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
The evil Lunatick has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

15407.神話時代から闇の眷属として\nジャゴヌバに仕える古代魔族\n魔祖スコルが外法を用:
Ancient demonDemon
Ancestor Scor, who has
served Jagonuba as a
servant of darkness
since the mythical age,
has transformed into a
deformed form with a
shell using an external
method.

15486.神話時代から闇の眷属として\nジャゴヌバに仕える古代魔族\n魔祖ザークが外法を用:
Ancient demonDemon
Ancestor Zark, which has
served Jagonuba as a
servant of darkness
since the mythical age,
has transformed into a
deformed form that
possesses burning heat
through the use of
external methods.

15565.神話時代から闇の眷属として\nジャゴヌバに仕える古代魔族\n魔祖ガルドが外法を用:
Ancient demonDemon
Ancestor Gardo, who has
served Jagonuba as a
servant of darkness
since mythical times,
has transformed into a
formidable and valiant
deformity using external
methods.

15642.神話時代から闇の眷属として\nジャゴヌバに仕える古代魔族\n魔祖メゼが外法を用い:
Ancient demonDemon
Ancestor Mez, who has
served Jagonuba as a
servant of darkness
since mythical times,
has transformed into a
form that possesses
lightning using external
methods.

15719.身体と同じくらいの\n大きな木づちに振り回され\nミスばかりのモンスター。\nだ:
A monster who is
constantly making
mistakes being swung
around by a wooden
hammer as big as his
body. But if you're not
careful?

15789.テンションを上げて戦う\n小型の魔物ファイター。\n小さな身体を使った\n回転技:
A small monster fighter
who fights with a lot of
tension. He also uses
his small body to
perform spinning moves.

15856.旅人を 地獄に突きおとす\nおそろしい処刑人。\n特製の トゲつき棍棒で\n痛恨:
A terrifying executioner
who sends travelers to
hell. He delivers The
Painful Strike with his
special spiked rod.

15924.巨大かつ凶悪なこんぼうを\nテンションを上げながら\nブンブン振り回す\n陽気で:
A cheerful and wicked
fairy, she is a giant,
evil Oaken Club,
swinging it around with
great enthusiasm.

15992.うっかり光の河に落ちたあげく\nうっかり創世の樹の実を食べて\n番人を押しつけら:
The result of a poor ex-
Hammerhood who
inadvertently fell into
the River of Light,
inadvertently ate the
fruit of the Tree of
Creation, and was forced
to become a watchdog.

16077.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な おおきづち。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Hammerhood has
an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

16138.さんぞくに身をやつした\nおおかみ男のモンスター。\n大きなサーベルには\n毒が:
A werewolf monster in
the form of a three-
legged monster. His
large saber is said to
be poisoned.

16208.いくつもの海を またにかけて\n暴れまわってきた狂犬。\n落とし穴を掘っては\n:
A mad dog that has
roamed the seas, digging
pitfalls, dropping
people, and laughing at
them.

16279.夏らしい あざやかな服に\n身を包んだ おおかみ男。\n見た目通りの軽い性格で\:
A wolf man dressed in
summery, mauve clothes.
He is as lighthearted as
he looks, and runs away
in a pinch.

16352.ヒポポ・サードンに仕える\n忠実な部下で元海賊。\n落とし穴を使うなど\nひきょ:
A loyal subordinate and
ex-pirate of Hippo
Sardon, he prefers to
use Pitfall and other
crude fighting
techniques.

16420.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な さんぞくウルフ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Ruff Ruffian of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce intent to
kill.

16484.疾風のごとき速さを誇る\n妖怪。疾風突撃や\nバギクロスなど風にまつわる\n強力:
A demon that is as fast
as a gale. It excels in
powerful wind-related
attacks such as gale
assault and kaswoosh.

16552.マヌーサで こちらを惑わせ\n熱いブレスを吹いたり\n挑発してきたりする\n血の:
Dazzle, a bloodthirsty
little demon that tries
to mislead you, blow hot
breaths, and provoke
you.

16618.ピオリムを唱えたり\n仲間を呼んだりする\nずるがしこい妖精。\n怒ると こおり:
A cunning fairy who
chants acceleratle and
calls companions; she
breathes angrily and
gingerly.

16679.緑色の羽を持っている\nおそろしい 悪魔の子。\nかえんの息をはいて\n旅人に襲:
A frightening demon
child with green wings.
It attacks travelers
with its breath of Kaen.

16739.オーガの子供が魔瘴を浴びて\n魔物化した成れの果ての姿。\n犯した罪への後悔の念:
A child of Ogre was
exposed to demon miasma
and turned into a
monster. The soul is
cursed with remorse for
the sins it has
committed.

16813.天使でありながら神に背き\n地上に降りた堕天使の子供。\n堕天したものの仲間と群:
A child of fallen angels
who disobeyed God and
descended to earth. They
have a habit of flocking
together with their
fallen companions and
acting in groups.

16893.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な おにこぞう。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Pickayune has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

16954.試練場のグリゴリぼうずが\n英雄たちにリベンジしようと\n天啓の霊玉のチカラで\:
The Watcher Boy of the
trial field, who has
been empowered by the
power of the spirit ball
of revelation to take
revenge on the heroes.

17024.ふわふわなボディから\n甘い香りが漂う\nおいしそうな魔物。しかし\n甘く見ると:
The fluffy body of this
tasty-looking monster is
filled with a sweet
aroma, but
underestimating it can
be a painful experience.

17088.モコモコとした雲の魔物。\n手を出すと さぁっと広がり\nこちらの攻撃をかわす。:
A fuzzy cloud monster
that quickly spreads out
and dodges your attacks
when you put out your
hand. It also controls
lightning, so be
careful.

17160.熱くたぎった火山の煙に\n心が宿って 魔物と化した。\nこちらが消しズミになるま:
The smoke from the hot
volcano has become a
monster with a mind of
its own. They hurl
intense flames at you
until you are
extinguished.

17237.こごえるふぶきや\nヒャダルコを操る 雲の魔物。\n寒い地域に生息するので\n氷:
A cloud monster that can
manipulate a cloudburst
or crackle, it is
resistant to icy attacks
because it lives in cold
regions.

17301.やみのブレス のろいのきりを\n辺りに まきちらす\nおぞましい魔瘴のかたまり。:
A horrifying mass of
demon miasma that
sprinkles the area with
the breath of darkness
and the kiri of death,
it uses angry and death
spells.

17374.多彩なブレスと高度な呪文で\n旅人をおびやかす雲の魔物。\n気配を消して 耳元に:
A cloud monster that
frightens the traveler
with its variety of
breaths and high level
spells, it will
disappear and come close
to your ear, whispering
the words of death.

17452.刈られた羊毛が風に飛ばされ\n寄り集まり 丸裸にされた\n羊の怨念を宿すことで\:
The sheared wool is
blown away by the wind
and gathers together to
form a monster that
bears the grudge of the
sheep that were stripped
naked.

17521.真っ青な巨体が異彩を放つ\n凶暴な曲刀使い。\nその巨体から くり出される\nば:
A ferocious curved sword
user with a huge, blue
body that is truly
unique. The Baketsu-zan,
which he unleashes from
his huge body, is full
of destructive power.

17591.気に入った骨を持ち歩く\n邪悪なカンガルー。\nどくろに宿る魔力を使って\n呪い:
An evil kangaroo that
carries around a
favorite bone. It
attacks with a curse
using the magical power
that resides in the
skull.

17659.ホイミやメダパニなどの\n呪文を くりだす\n意外に かしこい魔物。\n怪しい笑:
Beware of the suspicious
smile of this
surprisingly clever
monster, who can deliver
spells like Heal and
Fuddle.

17720.とてもかたい貝がらを\n巧みに使いこなす\nマリンブルーのモンスター。\nホタテ:
Marinblue's monster is a
very hard shell, and
loves to eat Scallop.

17781.聖銀のメタルボディに変化した\nとても希少な どくろあらい。\n珠玉の逃げ足と豪:
A very rare Haardvark
transformed into a
sacred silver metal
body, it is the talk of
the town among
adventurers for its gem
of escape and luxurious
experience.

17865.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な どくろあらい。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Haardvark is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

17928.狙った獲物は必ず殺す\nエリート殺りくマシン。\n大地の衝撃で相手を転ばせ\nこ:
Ellie's Killing Machine
is a machine that always
kills the prey it is
aiming for. The impact
of the earth will cause
your opponent to fall
and block your movement.

17999.マッドな科学者に改造を\n施されてしまったスライム。\n最大出力の電圧で放つ\n:
Slime has been modified
by a mad scientist;
watch out for
Kazapstrophe, which
unleashes at maximum
output voltage.

18070.まんじゅしゃげの花のような\nあざやかな真紅の身体が自慢。\n妖しげな踊りで人を:
She boasts of a body as
vivid and true red as
the flower of the mange
shagae. She also has a
horrifying side that
invites people to death
with her bewitching
dance.

18150.一人前の魔族を目指し\n人間を襲う小悪魔。\n覚えたてのホイミは\n自分にしか使:
A small demon that
attacks humans in order
to become a full-fledged
demon, it uses its
newly-learned Heal only
on itself.

18209.魔界で生まれた 悪の申し子。\nはげしいほのおを はきちらし\nベホイムやイオナ:
Born in Demon World, he
is the poster child for
evil. He slaps on a
flurry of fire and uses
powerful spells such as
Moreheal and Kaboom.

18287.人の魂を刈り 魔王に捧げる\nおそろしい 魔界の天才児。\nかなしばりで自由をう:
A child prodigy of the
terrible Demon World who
reaps the souls of
people and dedicates
them to the Demon King.
He is a genius of the
Demon World, and he is a
genius of the Demon
World, and he is a
genius of the Demon
World.

18364.闇芸人 ルルルリーチに従う\n残虐非道のグレムリン。\n旅芸人を抹殺することを\:
Dark Geisha A cruel and
inhumane Gremlin that
follows Lulu Leach,
whose mission is to
eliminate minstrels.

18430.闇芸人 ルルルリーチに従う\n冷酷無比のグレムリン。\n旅芸人を抹殺することを\:
The ruthless and
ruthless Gremlin who
follows the dark arts
master Lulu Leach on a
mission to eliminate
minstrels.

18496.闇芸人 ルルルリーチに従う\n悪逆無道のグレムリン。\n旅芸人を抹殺することを\:
Dark Geisha A
treacherous Gremlin who
follows Lulu Leach on a
mission to eliminate
minstrels.

18562.高度な呪文をとなえる使い魔。\nベホイムで形勢を立て直して\n大火力呪文で攻め立:
Famililar, with its
advanced spells, uses
Moreheal to regain its
position and then
attacks with its large
firepower spells. The
final stages of the
battle are especially
tricky.

18644.顔がついた盾に かくれながら\n攻撃してくるモンスター。\nひとたび怒ると その:
The monster attacks
while hiding behind a
shield with a face on
it. Once it angries, its
shield sprays fire
breath.

18716.大ぼうぎょをしたかと思えば\n２回攻撃を くりだしたりと\n攻防ともに すぐれた:
He is a very good
offensive and defensive
player. When he shows
his face, it's a good
chance.

18793.守りをガチガチに\nかためている 邪悪な精霊。\nたまに 盾のクチから\nこごえ:
An evil spirit with a
tight defense.
Sometimes, it emits a
choking puff of smoke
from the mouth of its
shield.

18859.立派なちょんまげのはえた\nこぞうたちの頼れる あにき。\nその堅い守りにかけて:
A reliable Aniki of the
boys with a fine short
hairpiece. He is a
reliable Aniki of the
boys with a fine short-
cropped headdress, and
is a great defender of
the area!

18934.冥界の海を泳ぐ魚の魔物。\n闇のチカラに満ちたブレスや\n強烈ないなずまで襲いか:
A fish monster swimming
in the underworld, it
attacks with its dark
breath and powerful
lightning, sending its
enemies to the brink of
death.

19011.地獄の首なし騎士。\nバイキルトをとなえ\nチカラをためて鉄球を振り回し\n敵対:
A headless knight of
hell, he wields an iron
ball and makes his
opponents bleed to death
as he raises his oomph
and gathers his power.

19082.廃棄されたズッキーニに\n邪悪な魂が宿った魔物。\n手にしたヤリで狙った獲物を\:
A discarded zucchini is
the evil spirit of a
monster, who likes to
use its spear to poke
its prey with a machete.

19156.呪文で攻撃力を上げて\nヤリで突きまくってくる\n見かけによらずクレバーな\n野:
He is a hitman of the
vegetable monster world,
clever despite his
appearance, who boosts
his attack power with
spells and pokes around
with spears.

19226.身体の一部のごときヤリで\n敵を さみだれ突きにする。\n何気に強力な呪文をあや:
He makes enemies
multithrust with his
spear as if it were a
part of his body. A dark
vegetable that can't be
trusted, with a powerful
spell.

19301.イワノフ博士の研究室で\nひそかに 生み出された\n最後の 改造野菜モンスター。:
The last modified
vegetable monster
secretly created in Dr.
Stoneberg's laboratory.
The most kind-hearted
Three Musketeers.

19374.植物系のズッキーニャが\nどういうわけか物質系に転生。\n出自の縁から用心棒とし:
A Plant-type Cruelcumber
is somehow reincarnated
as a Material-type.
Because of his origin,
he seems to be employed
as a bouncer.

19447.黄金の粒がびっしり詰まった\n豊満ボディが自慢のマダム。\nくり出すゴージャスレ:
The madam boasts a
voluptuous body filled
with golden grains. The
gorja Slaine that she
delivers is so sweet, it
hurts so much.

19526.ずっと使われなかった\nろうそくが 魔物と化した。\nメラを使ってくるので\nヤ:
The candle that has been
unused for a long time
has turned into a
monster, and it uses
Frizz, so try not to get
burned.

19596.怨念の炎を燃やし続ける\nろうそく形のモンスター。\nさまざまなフォースをまとい:
A candle-shaped monster
that keeps a flame of
resentment burning. It
slashes at you, clad in
various kinds of Force.

19666.多くの返り血を浴びてきて\n紅く染まった 殺人ろうそく。\n秘められた魔力を解放:
A murderous candle that
has been bathed in so
much blood that it has
turned red. It releases
its hidden magic power
and fires a series of
spells.

19741.魔力の源である 頭上の炎から\n強烈な呪文を 生み出す。\n闇と炎の魔力を兼ねそ:
The flame above its
head, the source of its
magic, produces a
powerful spell. A hybrid
candle that combines the
magic of darkness and
fire.

19818.おばけきゃんせる強:
being obsessed with the
power of ghosts and
mischievous spirits

19832.高熱の蒼い炎を灯す魔物。\nクールに見えるが闘争心が強く\n魔力を高めたメラゾー:
A monster with a high-
heat blue flame, he
appears cool but has a
strong fighting spirit
and burns down his
enemies to ashes with
his magical Kafrizz.

19912.溶岩の爆発的なパワーを宿した\nおばけキャンドルの変異種。\n頑強な身体にたくわ:
A mutant of the Wax
Murderer that possesses
the explosive power of
lava. It burns its
enemies to the ground
with the infernal flames
of its robust body.

19992.だらしなく伸びた舌が特徴。\nホイミスライムや同族に\n助けを求めながら戦う\n:
A cunning monster with a
slovenly tongue, it
fights to get help from
Healslime and its own
kind.

20063.鋭いツメで攻撃して\n敵をマヒさせたり\n幻惑させたりする\nうす気味悪いモンス:
A ghastly monster that
attacks with its sharp
claws, paralyzing and
disorienting its
enemies.

20121.自分の身体を分裂させて\n襲いかかってくる子鬼。\n倒すのに時間がかかる\nやっ:
A child demon that
attacks by splitting its
own body. A troublesome
one that takes time to
defeat.

20183.とうに絶滅したと思われていた\nつちわらしの原生種。\n忘却のほら穴の地中から復:
A native species of
Lickspittle, long
thought to be extinct,
has been resurrected
from the depths of
Forgotten Cave and has
stepped onto modern
soil.

20263.月世界の民を油断させるため\n人に近い姿に作られた\n人造宇宙生命体。鋭いツメに:
An artificial space life
form created to look
almost human in order to
catch the people of the
moon off guard. Their
sharp claws are filled
with a variety of
poisons.

20340.いやがらせが大好きで\nそのための攻撃ばかり得意な\n根性曲りの下級悪魔。\n小:
He is a low grade demon
who loves to harass
people and is good at
attacking them for that
purpose.

20413.毒草を食べて育った小鬼。\nツメの先に体液をしたたらせ\n引っかいた敵をマヒや猛:
These kobolds are said
to feed on poisonous
herbs and prey on their
prey by dripping their
bodily fluids onto the
tips of their claws,
paralyzing and crippling
their clawed enemies
with deadly poison.

20493.はるか昔 ほのおのせんしと\nたもとを分かった戦闘部族。\nドルマドンや やみの:
A warrior tribe that
long ago shared the same
footing as the
Flamethrower, they are
the very children of
darkness, wielding the
Kazammle and the Breath
of Darkness.

20573.炎を飛ばし 灼熱の息をはく\nまさに炎の申し子。\n短気そうに見えるが ためるを:
He is the very
embodiment of fire. He
seems to be short-
tempered, but he has the
patience to use Psyche
Up.

20644.いてつく吹雪をあやつり\n命の灯火を根こそぎ消し去る\n氷雪の魔人。その姿を見た:
The Ice and Snow Fiend
is a wizard of the snow
and ice, who can
manipulate a blinding
snowstorm to extinguish
all lights of life.
Those who see him die in
their sleep.

20718.この世を焼き尽くさんとする\nはた迷惑な魔炎の戦士。\nアシッドブレスと火炎弾を:
A warrior of vicious
flames that seeks to
burn the world to the
ground, it attacks using
acid breath and flaming
bullets.

20791.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な シャイニング。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Spitnik is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce intent to kill.

20854.密命を帯びた仮面の騎士。\n夜明け前の闇に紛れ\nコウモリを従えて現れる。\n痛:
A masked knight with a
secret mission. They
appear with bats in the
pre-dawn darkness.
Beware of The Painful
Strike.

20922.黄金の体毛を風になびかせ\nせっせっと光り物を集める\n本能に忠実なトリ。目的の:
A bird that is faithful
to its instincts, its
golden fur fluttering in
the wind as it
diligently collects
shiny objects. It
sometimes turns
ferocious in pursuit of
its goal.

20999.カゴと一体化した虹色の怪鳥。\n嵐を呼び しゃくねつを放って\n縄張りを侵す敵が:
A rainbow-colored
monstrous bird that is
one with its cage. It
calls up a storm,
releases an inchworm,
and persistently chases
enemies who invade its
territory until they die
out.

21232.呪文を覚えはじめたばかりの\nまだまだ青い ビギナー悪魔。\n呪文を使えるのが:
A beginner demon who has
just started to learn
how to use spells, he is
so happy to be able to
use spells that he
starts to play Frizz all
the time.

21312.魔法使いの修行をした\n邪悪な ひとつ目の道化師。\nイオラやメラミなど\n強い:
An evil one-eyed clown
trained as a mage, he
can deliver strong
spells such as Boom and
Frizzle.

21379.子供と思って油断していると\nＭＰを吸いとっては\n多彩な呪文をしかけてくる。\:
If you think they are
children and let your
guard down, they will
suck your MP and cast a
variety of spells on
you. He is a prodigy of
the monster world.

21449.片想いに悩んだサラシナの中に\n生まれた心の闇。３体に分裂し\n連携して 攻撃し:
Dark Mind was born in
Sarashina, who was
troubled by her
unrequited love, and it
splits into three
separate entities that
attack in tandem, so is
she lonely or not?

21533.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n多くの者に死を振り:
The evil god of war has
created a being known as
the "household of the
war wreak". They
reproduce the
overwhelming threat of
death that has been
sprinkled over so many
people.

21615.見た目と名前のせいで軽く\n見られがちだが鳥魔物の中でも\nにじくじゃく種と並ん:
Although often
underestimated because
of its appearance and
name, it is a flame
demon bird that is
considered as high as
the Prism Peacock
species among bird
monsters.

21689.突然現れた冒険者に敗北した後\nその悔しさをムネに猛特訓。\n新たな技の会得に成:
After being defeated by
an adventurer who
suddenly appeared, he
used his frustration to
train hard. He was
waiting for an
opportunity to take
revenge by learning new
skills.

21771.メラをたくさんはいて\n原っぱをコゲだらけにする\nいたずら好きのトカゲ。\n小:
A mischievous lizard
that wears a lot of
Frizz and makes the
field full of burrs. Its
trademark is its small
wings.

21842.まだ生まれたばかりの\n無垢な赤ちゃんドラゴン。\n本能に従い さまざまな息を\:
A newborn baby dragon is
still an innocent baby.
It follows its instincts
and tries to draw
various breaths.

21912.やんちゃな子供ドラゴン。\n背伸びしたい お年頃なのか\nはりきって はげしいほ:
A naughty child dragon.
He is a naughty little
boy who wants to be
taller than his peers,
and is determined to use
his bold fire to do so.

21986.ドラゴンキッズのタマゴに\nまぎれて生まれてきた\nいにしえの翼竜の子供。\nち:
A child of an ancient
pterosaur, born among
the eggs of Small Fry.
He is a little bit lost.

22053.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ドラゴンキッズ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Small Fry has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

22117.ある強大なドラゴンの面影を\n宿した 漆黒の幼竜。\nしゃくねつ かがやくいきで:
A jet-black juvenile
dragon that bears the
image of a powerful
dragon. It torments the
entire party with its
incandescent, dazzling
energy.

22189.いにしえより生き続けてきた\n青いウロコを持つドラゴン。\n炎と氷のブレスを使い:
A dragon with blue
scales that has lived
since time immemorial.
It uses its breath of
fire and ice to crush to
pieces those who defy
it.

22269.燃える炎の色のウロコを持つ\n灼熱のドラゴン。クチから\n放たれる業火に焼かれた:
A scorching dragon with
scales the color of
burning embers, not a
single Chiri remains
after being consumed by
the fire emitted from
MOUTH.

22412.悪魔でありながら\nその性格は きわめて明るい。\n楽しそうな踊りに\nつられな:
Although she is a demon,
her personality is quite
cheerful. Don't be
attracted by the joyful
dance!

22472.陽気で軽やかに近づいてくる\nダンスが大好きな悪魔。\nレパートリー豊富な踊りで:
A cheerful,
lighthearted, dance-
loving demon who
approaches you with a
wealth of repetitive
dance moves.

22542.冥界から現れたダンサー。\n動きは こっけいだが\n呪いを招く あやしいダンスで:
A dancer from the
underworld. Her
movements are comical,
but her dance is so
dubious that it invites
curses. She leads those
who see her to death.

22614.数々のダンスを習得している\n踊り好きの悪魔。\nスーパースターは修行する際\n:
A dancing demon who has
mastered numerous
dances, superstar fights
this monster in his
training.

22679.多くのダンスを覚えた悪魔。\nスーパースターが高みに\nたどり着くには この魔物:
A demon that has learned
many dances. superstar
must defeat this monster
to reach the heights.

22752.悪魔ダンス界の奇跡として\n語られる伝説の舞踏家。\nその つるぎの舞の切れ味は:
A legendary butoh dancer
who is considered a
miracle of the demon
dance world. Rumor has
it that the sharpness of
his Sword Dance can cut
even a large rock in
two.

22828.敵対する相手をも\n魅了してしまう魔性の人形。\nもてあそぶのに飽きると\n死の:
A magical doll that
charms even its
opponents. When it gets
tired of being played
with, it takes life with
a death spell.

22893.五声のひとつ『言』の声を\n体現する声霊と呼ばれる存在。\n天奏士コトノハの呼ぶ:
A being called a "voice
spirit" that embodies
the voice of "Words,"
one of the Five Voices,
he appeared in the
Garden of Words in
response to Messenger
Kotono's call.

22973.全身にマヒ毒がぬってある\nおそろしい 大太刀の悪魔。\nみがきをかけた身体で\:
A demon with a terrible
large sword covered with
paralytic poison, it
slashes at travelers it
encounters with its
polished body.

23048.旅人に捨てられた剣に\n悪の心が宿ったモンスター。\nとぎすました痛恨の一撃で\:
A monster with an evil
spirit that resides in a
sword abandoned by a
traveler. It aims at you
with The Painful Strike!

23119.人の血を求めて さまよう\nおぞましい呪われた魔剣。\nブレードガードを駆使し\:
A cursed sword that
wanders about in search
of human blood, it uses
the Greatsword Guard to
repel attacks from the
enemy.

23192.しびれ薬を浴びた剣の魔物。\nぞっとするような金切り声で\n仲間を呼び集め 四方:
A sword monster bathed
in numbing potion, it
calls out to its
companion with a
gruesome screeching
voice, tearing through
travelers from all
sides.

23271.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な しびれだんびら。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil paralyslicer of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

23335.大いなる闇の根源と呼ばれる\n全ての魔瘴を生みだせし存在。\nアストルティアに降:
He is the originator of
all demon miasmas, the
root of the great
darkness, and the cause
of the many tragedies
that have befallen
Astoltia.

23417.女神の光さえ飲みくだし\nあまねくものを支配することで\n絶対の存在となった滅び:
God of Destruction, who
has become an absolute
being by swallowing even
the light of the Goddess
of Destruction and
dominating all things,
has an unfathomable
depths of darkness.

23497.ジャゴヌバのどん欲な想念が\n具現化した求め欲するもの。\n大いなる闇の根源の象:
Jagonuba's greedy
thoughts are embodied in
this object of desire.
As a symbol of the
source of the great
darkness, it has run
amok on various
occasions.

23579.チョウの羽を生やした\nドラゴンの変種。\nラリホーを唱えたり\n火の玉を はい:
A variant of the dragon
with butterfly wings, it
casts Snooze and spits
fireballs.

23642.目のような模様の羽を持つ\nちょっと変わったドラゴン。\nメダパニで混乱させては:
A rather unusual dragon
with eye-patterned
wings, it confuses the
dragon with Fuddle and
then Booms all over it.

23718.毒々しいチョウの羽を持つ\n呪文に長けたドラゴン。\nルカナンで守備力を下げては:
A dragon skilled in
spells with venomous
butterfly wings, it uses
Kasap to lower its
defenses and then sends
balls of flame flying at
you.

23791.フードの男が桜色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\n桜を舞い散らせ眠りにいざ:
A beast demon from
another world summoned
by Hooded Man with a
cherry blossom-colored
spell. He is a master of
beautiful yet terrifying
techniques that make the
cherry blossoms dance
and lull you to sleep.

23871.マグマを食べて育つという\n邪悪な妖精の一種。\n火炎球を打ち出せるのも\nマグ:
A kind of evil fairy
that grows up eating
Magma Blast. It is a
product of Magma Blast's
power that it can launch
a flaming ball.

23938.白いチョウの羽を生やした\n死を招く不吉な妖精。\n仲間たちのすばやさを上げて\:
A deadly and sinister
fairy with white
butterfly wings, she
raises the agility of
her companions and
strikes with Kaboom.

24012.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な マジックフライ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Splutterfly has
an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

24076.巨大な体躯を誇るドラキー。\nマホトーンで呪文を封じ\n得意のポヨロンプレスで\:
Dracky boasts an
enormous physique, and
he uses his Fizzle to
block spells and his
signature Poyolon press
to overwhelm and kill
all enemies.

24147.呪われた戦士の亡きがら。\n頭に入ったヒビは\n死んだときに受けたキズ。\n仇の:
The dead body of a
cursed WARRIOR. The
crack in his head is a
scar he received when he
died. He wanders around
looking for his revenge.

24216.無念の死を遂げた騎士が\n死霊となって よみがえった。\n斬りつけた相手を呪いに:
A knight who died a
horrible death has come
back to life as a spirit
of death. He can also
use Midheal to curse the
opponent he has slain.

24291.人の魂を刈り取るために\n地上をさまよう 邪悪な亡霊。\n怒ると こちらの攻撃力:
An evil wraith that
roams the earth to reap
souls, it attacks while
lowering your attack
power.

24363.略奪をくりかえしてきた\n凶暴な海賊の亡霊。\n仲間をバイキルトで強化し\nどと:
The ghost of a ferocious
pirate who has
repeatedly plundered and
pillaged, it strengthens
its companion with an
oomphle and launches an
attack.

24431.ラグアス王子が見た\n予知夢の中にも現れた\nフォステイルに恨みを持つ\n亡霊た:
General soldiers of
ghosts with a grudge
against Fostail who also
appeared in the
prophetic dream Prince
Raguas had.

24493.遠き黄金郷の支配を目論み\n旅立った冒険家のなれの果て。\n死して骨だけの身体に:
The end of an adventurer
who sets out to rule a
faraway land of gold.
Even after his death,
when his body is nothing
but bones, he continues
to seek an object to
conquer.

24576.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な がいこつ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
An evil Skeleton of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

24636.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n挑戦者がかつて対面:
The existence called the
"household of the war
wreaks" created by the
thoughts of the evil god
of the war wreaks. They
reproduce the memories
of powerful enemies the
challenger once faced.

24715.あやしい胞子で旅人を\n幻惑させた上にマヒと毒で\nさらなる苦しみを与える\n見:
Slime is a strange and
outrageous creature that
uses suspicious spores
to disorient travelers
and then inflicts
further suffering with
its paralysis and
poison.

24788.凶暴な犬の魔物。\n人の血に飢えていて\nテンションを上げては\n襲いかかってく:
A ferocious dog, MONSTER
is hungry for human
blood and will attack
when the tension is
high.

24844.はく息が竜巻になるという\nおそろしい 地獄の魔犬。\n怒るとテンションを上げて:
The demon dog of hell,
whose breath becomes a
tornado, attacks
mercilessly with angry
and excited.

24917.溶岩から生まれ 火炎を食べて\n育ったといわれる 紅の魔犬。\n辺りに炎をはきち:
The red devil dog is
said to have been born
from lava and grew up
eating fire and flames.
It is a frightening
beast that spins wildly,
spreading flames around
the area.

24997.悪霊を追い払うはずの聖獣が\n闇にとらわれ 魔獣に堕ちた。\nテンションを高めな:
The holy beast that was
supposed to drive away
evil spirits has been
captured by darkness and
turned into a
hexenbiest. Wreaths of
destruction are
sprinkled about while
raising the tension.

25069.学会では 魔獣ヘルシーサーの\n変異種として 知られているが\n目撃者の 死亡事:
It is known in academic
circles as a mutant of
the King Foo Dog, but
its exact biology is
unknown due to many
fatal accidents
involving witnesses.

25148.様々な願いをかなえた代償に\n悪霊に呪われたシシカバブ。\nユシュカのためにみが:
Cursed Shish Kebab, the
evil spirit that grants
various wishes, attacks
Yushka with a variety of
techniques he has
developed for her.

25228.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ミミック。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
The evil Mimic has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce intent to kill.

25288.宝箱のフリをして旅人を待ち\n開けた者に奇襲をしかける。\n逃げることさえ許さず:
The treasure pretends to
be a chest, waits for
the traveler, and then
attacks the one who
opens the chest. They do
not even allow them to
escape, but persistently
lead them to their
deaths.

25363.すべての災いの元といわれる\nまがまがしい 災厄の箱。\n何度もザラキーマを唱え:
A box of evil, said to
be the source of all
evil. It chants Kathwack
over and over, bringing
despair to the traveler.

25435.ふしぎなおどりでＭＰを吸い\n死の呪文を投げかけてくる\nおぞましい 魔の宝箱。:
Weird Dance is a
horrifying evil treasure
chest that sucks MP and
casts death spells.

25510.大きな２本のツノを持つ\n馬ヅラの悪魔。\n世界樹の葉を使ってくるので\n最初に:
A horse wig demon with
two large horns, it uses
Yggdrasil leaves, so be
the first to kill it.

25575.地獄よりつかわされた\n恐怖の象徴たる 青き悪魔。\nイオナズンを使い 辺りに\:
The blue demon, a symbol
of fear sent from hell,
is said to use Kaboom to
spread destruction
around the area.

25646.闇の中から悠然と現れた\n魔王の信頼厚い 赤き悪魔。\nすべてが消しズミになるま:
A red demon, trusted by
the Demon King, emerges
from the darkness and
casts Kafrizz until all
is extinguished.

25721.魔王に 絶対の忠誠を誓う\n高貴な血筋の大悪魔。\nぶきみなひかりで敵を弱らせ\:
A great demon of noble
blood who swears
absolute loyalty to the
Demon King, he uses his
Spooky Aura to weaken
his enemies and release
vicious spells.

25790.ポルファンの兄弟子で\n天性の芸の才能を持つが\n芸に 強い憎しみを抱き\n旅芸:
He is the brother's son
of Polfan and has a
natural talent for the
arts, but he has a
strong hatred for them
and tries to eliminate
minstrels.

25859.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ホースデビル。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Gamigin with
extraordinary strength
and a fierce, murderous
intent in its red,
piercing eyes.

25922.豪華な見た目の宝箱に\n擬態する魔物。欲に駆られて\n箱を開けようとする旅人を\:
A monster that mimics a
luxurious looking
treasure chest, it uses
deadly attacks to finish
off travelers who try to
open the box out of
greed.

25995.４つの目玉がギラギラ光る\nみにくき魔界の怪物。\n仲間を呼び集めて\n獲物を囲:
The monster of the ugly
Demon World, with its
four SizzSizz eyes,
calls together
companions to surround
its prey and attack it.

26059.数匹で群れをなして\nいっせいに獲物を襲い\n骨まで食らいつくすという。\n通称:
They are said to swarm
in groups of several and
attack their prey at
once, devouring it down
to the bone. Commonly
known as the blue
Nazuma.

26123.幸運を呼ぶ聖獣に化けて\n旅人を待ちぶせる\nおぞましい赤眼の怪物。\nツメにか:
A horrifying red-eyed
monster awaits the
traveler. The claws are
deadly.

26189.ラーディス王の命により\n王の遺した石版を守護する。\n似たような姿の相棒がおり:
He is in charge of
protecting the tablets
left by King Ladis. He
has a partner who looks
like him and they work
well together.

26263.隕石から生まれたという\n戦闘に特化した宇宙生命体。\n動くものすべてを敵とみな:
A space life form
specialized in combat
that was born from a
meteorite. It attacks
everything that moves as
if it were an enemy.

26334.砂漠のキャラバンを襲うことを\n生きがいとしている無法者。\n大勢の仲間を呼んで:
He is an outlaw who
makes it his life's
mission to raid desert
cabrals. His specialty
is to call in a large
number of companions and
surround the emono.

26416.少女ソノラの心の闇が\n生み出した ちいさな怪物。\n子供のように駄々をこねなが:
A little monster created
by Sonora's Dark Mind.
It attacks like a child,
making noisy noises.

26486.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ガルバ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
The evil Sootbonce has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

26544.３つの目玉をギョロつかせた\n気味の悪い魔界の怪物。\nもうどくのきりや あまい:
A creepy monster of the
Demon World with three
gleaming eyeballs. They
are the ones that
slobber and slobber with
their guttural, vicious
breath.

26622.猛毒攻撃や眠り攻撃をしかけ\n獲物が もがき苦しむのを\nニタニタと眺めるという:
It is said that it will
attack with deadly
poison or sleep attacks,
and watch with a grin as
its prey squirms and
struggles. Commonly
known as the red
tsukumaki.

26693.幸運を呼ぶ聖獣に化けて\n旅人を付け狙う\nまがまがしい赤眼の怪物。\n毒 マヒ:
A wicked red-eyed
monster that disguises
itself as a lucky holy
beast and stalks
travelers. Beware of
poison, paralysis, and
confusion.

26757.ラーディス王の命により\n王の遺した石版を守護する。\nあまい息 もうどくのきり:
He protects the tablets
left by King Ladis by
order of King Ladis. He
uses such nasty tricks
as "Amai Breath" and
"Gutto no Kiri".

26830.隕石から生まれたという\n戦闘に特化した宇宙生命体。\n呼吸器官から生成した毒素:
A space life form
specialized for combat
that was born from a
meteorite. It slowly
torments its prey with
toxins produced by its
respiratory system.

26906.砂漠のオアシスを発見しては\nやけつくいきで干上がらせる。\nそうやって旅人を困:
He discovers oases in
the desert and dries
them up with his burnt-
out breath. It is his
life's work to annoy
travelers in this way.

26988.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ゴルバ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
The evil Smogbonnet has
an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

27046.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な じんめんじゅ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Treeface is a
powerful, powerful man,
with red, piercing eyes
and a deadly intent to
kill.

27109.いかつい顔をしているが\n頭に生えた 魔界樹の葉で\n死んだ仲間を復活させる\n:
It may have a stern
face, but it is actually
a gentle monster that
revives dead companions
with the leaves of the
Demon World tree that
grows on its head.

27180.木々の間に ひそんでいて\n通りかかった旅人に\n襲いかかる 樹木の化け物。\n:
A tree monster that
lurks among the trees
and attacks travelers
who pass by,
specializing in Weird
Dance.

27248.何千年も生き 邪悪な知識を\n身につけた 魔界の霊木。\n高度な呪文を使いこなし:
A spirit tree of the
Demon World that has
lived for thousands of
years and has acquired
an evil knowledge. It
uses advanced spells to
spread chaos and ruin.

27320.モリナラ大森林の樹々に宿る\n精霊たちの ヒトへの憎悪が\nひとつに集まり\n邪:
The hatred of the
spirits that inhabit the
trees of the Molinara
Forest toward humans has
gathered into one evil
tree monster.

27389.魅惑のおどりで惑わせて\n闇の魔法や眠りの魔法で\n敵を苦しめる\n意外と器用な:
A surprisingly dexterous
tree-monster that
dazzles with its
enchanting dance and
torments its enemies
with dark magic and
sleep magic.

27451.いにしえより 大空を羽ばたく\n恐竜のモンスター。\n空中からクチバシでつつき\:
From time immemorial, a
dinosaur monster
flapping its wings in
the sky. It chants
Tsutsuki Bang with
Kuchiba shi from the
air.

27518.太古の氷壁から よみがえった\n邪悪な青い翼竜。\n姿を見た者は こおりの息で\:
An evil blue pterosaur
that rose from an
ancient ice wall. It is
said that anyone who
sees it will be chilled
to the bone by its cold
breath.

27591.死の世界から よみがえった\nおぞましい翼竜。\n悠然と空を舞い 頭上から\nや:
A horrifying pterosaur
resurrected from the
world of the dead. It
soars majestically in
the sky and hurls its
breath of darkness
overhead.

27660.かつて 神とあがめられた\n金色の身体を持つ翼竜の王。\n炎を激しく はきちらし:
The king of pterodactyls
with a golden body, once
revered as a god. He
slings fire fiercely and
wields the Kaboom.

27732.キリカ草原の森を根城にする\nスゴうでのハンター。\n光りモノが大好きで\n狙い:
He is a hunter with a
great hunter's eye who
makes the forests of
Kirika Steppe his home.
She loves shiny things
and will always steal
them when she has her
sights set on them.

27802.回転攻撃に火炎放射と\nとにかく回転するのが得意だが\n残念なことにおつむの回転:
It is good at spinning,
but unfortunately, the
spinning of the diaper
does not seem to be that
fast.

27878.マホカンタを得意とする\nガメゴンたちの王様。\nガメゴン界で呪文を使えるのは\:
He is the king of Wyrtle
who is good at Bounce,
and being able to use
spells is quite a status
in the Wyrtle world.

27951.ガメゴンロードの中に\nまれに生まれる突然変異種。\n強烈な いなずまをあやつり:
A mutant species that is
rarely born among
Wyrtoise. It uses its
powerful Lightning to
defeat enemies that
stand in its way.

28026.ヨンゲ所長が錬金で生みだした\n魔法生物。巨体を利用した\n地面揺らしや 回転攻:
A magical creature
created by Director Yong
through alchemy. It
destroys everything with
its ground shaking and
spinning attacks.

28102.太古のドワチャッカ大陸で\n暴虐の限りを尽くした魔物。\n当時 大地の三闘士が\:
A monster who committed
tyranny in the ancient
Dwachakka Continent,
sealed by the Earthen
Triad in mortal combat
at the time.

28171.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な キングリザード。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Liege Lizard
with extraordinary
strength, his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

28235.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な プテラノドン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Pteranodon has
an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce intent to
kill.

28298.その名の通りドラゴンを駆り\n大空を翔ける戦士。\n剣による攻撃だけでなく\n竜:
As the name implies, the
dragon-driven warrior
soars through the sky,
and must be careful not
only with sword attacks
but also with dragon
breath.

28371.華麗にドラゴンを駆る\n冥府より遣わされし戦士。\n生者を暗黒のきりで包み\nあ:
A warrior sent by Hell,
the magnificent dragon-
driver, to wrap the
living in a shroud of
darkness and take them
to the other side.

28441.純白の体毛が美しいが\nとてつもなく凶暴な獣。\n痛恨の一撃をくり出し\n葬った:
The beautiful, pure
white fur of this
ferocious beast has
killed countless prey
with The Painful Strike.

28506.悪魔のささやきに耳を貸した\nおろかな神官の なれの果て。\nザオリクやイオラな:
The end result of a
foolish priest who
listened to the whispers
of the demons, he is a
master of powerful
spells such as Kazing
and Boom.

28581.地獄から つかわされた\nおそろしく強い魔界の参謀。\n魔王の軍団 ベホイミでい:
Kafrizz, a fearsome and
powerful Demon World
strategist brought back
from Hell, heals the
enemies he faces with
his Demon King's army,
Midheal!

28656.刻印を刻まれた者を\n供物として 主に捧げようと\n襲いかかってくる 謎の神官。:
A mysterious priest who
attacks those who have
been engraved to offer
them as offerings to the
Lord. true The red cape
is striking.

28729.この世を呪い 破滅を振りまく\n邪神をあがめる神官。\nそのくせ回復呪文が得意な:
A priest who praises an
evil god that curses the
world and spreads
destruction, but is good
at recovery spells,
perhaps because of his
good upbringing?

28808.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な あくま神官。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Wrecktor of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

28869.神化の儀に臨み 神のチカラを\n手に入れたラダ・ガート。\nしかし その人格は悪:
Lada Gart, who received
the power of God at the
deification ceremony,
but her personality was
tainted with evil and
completely warped.

28949.何者かにより脈動する鉱石を\n埋め込まれケタ違いの強さを\n持つに至ったドロヌー:
Mudraker was implanted
with Pulsating Ore by
someone, which gave him
extraordinary strength,
and his body color
changed as well.

29028.紺碧の試練の守り人をつとめる\n天星郷でも指折りの実力者。\n英雄たちの強さを試:
He is the guardian of
the azure trial and is
one of the most powerful
men in Heaven. He
challenges the heroes to
a fair and honest
contest to test their
strength.

29105.人を襲うために生まれてきた\n凶悪な 魔物界の暗殺者。\n鋭いツメでキズつけられ:
A vicious monster
assassin born to attack
people, it can kill
instantly if it is
wounded by its sharp
claws.

29180.長いツメを振り回し\nマヒや毒の攻撃で\nこちらを弱らせてくる\nおそろしい 海:
A terrifying sea monster
that wields long claws
and weakens you with
paralysis and poison
attacks.

29238.鍛えぬいた肉体と\n鋭いツメを持つ 青き殺人鬼。\nすばやく２回 切りかかっては:
A blue killer with a
well-trained body and
sharp claws. He is a
formidable opponent.

29308.ヒメアの恋人コハクが\n不老の禁術をほどこされ\nそのチカラに たえきれず\n変:
Himea's lover Kohaku has
been subjected to the
forbidden art of
immortality, and has
become a figure unable
to withstand its power.

29371.長いウデから くりだす\nダブルクローやブレス攻撃での\n中距離戦を得意とする\:
This experienced monster
excels in medium-range
combat with double claws
and breath attacks
launched from its long
udder.

29444.紺碧の試練場に生息する\n獰猛な魔物。常に腹ペコで\nナワバリに立ち入った者には:
A ferocious monster that
lives in the Azure
Trial, it is always
hungry and will attack
anyone who enters its
territory.

29515.深翠の試練のタマゴから\n生まれた神獣だが何者かの\n企てにより悪しきチカラが\:
A divine beast born from
the egg of a deep green
trial, but someone's
plan caused its evil
power to run amok and it
lost its self.

29589.命脈の神殿の最奥にある祭壇で\n深翠の試練に挑むタマゴの\n資質を試す二体の神獣:
One of the two divine
beasts that test the
qualities of the egg
that challenges the deep
green trial at the
deepest altars of
Threads of Life. When
fighting, the two always
work together.

29672.地獄のキノコ三兄弟の長兄。\n魔術と策謀に秀でており\n兄弟を時に厳しく 時に優:
He is the eldest brother
of the three Hell
Mushroom Brothers. He is
a reliable leader who
excels in magic and
scheming and guides the
brothers sometimes
strictly and sometimes
gently.

29751.敵が呪文を使うのを 許さず\nマホトーンやメダパニーマで\n戦いのペースを握ろう:
A troublesome old
sorcerer who does not
allow his enemies to use
spells and tries to
control the pace of the
battle with Fizzle and
Kafuddle.

29826.攻撃 回復 状態異常と\n多彩な呪文を使いこなす\n魔法の達人だが なぜか\n自:
He is a master of magic
with a variety of
spells, including
attack, recovery, and
abnormalities, but for
some reason, he seems to
lack confidence in
himself.

29896.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\nかなわぬ帰郷に 世:
The Spacetime Gap is a
bundle of countless
possibilities, an
impossible homecoming, a
curse on the world, a
tyrannical demon, a form
that will never end.

29977.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\n不死の魔王ネロドス:
The Immortal Demon King
Nerodos, created by
uniting the countless
possibilities that exist
in the Spacetime Gap,
was defeated and
resurrected as a
servant.

30060.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\n迷える勇者に殉じ:
The Lost Hero, created
by uniting the countless
possibilities that exist
in the Spacetime Gap,
has become a martyr and
a servant of the Demon
King.

30139.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\n戦禍の邪神に魅入ら:
The figure of the evil
god of war, created by
uniting countless
possibilities that exist
in the Spacetime Gap,
has lost its soul and
become a beast.

30217.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\nウルベア地下帝国へ:
The figure that became a
revenge demon, trapped
by hatred for Urbea
Underground City, which
was created by uniting
the countless
possibilities that exist
in Spacetime Gap.

30298.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\n怒れる老匠にすべて:
The Angry Master is a
weapon of destruction
created from the
countless possibilities
that exist in the
Spacetime Gap.

30379.時空の狭間に存在する 無数の\n可能性を束ねて生み出された\n時見の箱の傀儡と成:
The puppet of the
Timeseer Box, created by
binding the countless
possibilities that exist
in the Spacetime Gap,
has turned its sword
against its former
master.

30459.ラウラリエの丘に広がる花園を\nナワバリにする乱暴者。\n強烈なブレスで 花園を:
He is a violent man who
makes the flower garden
spreading in Lauralie
Hill his territory. He
uses his powerful breath
to destroy enemies who
have no manners and
destroy the flower
garden.

30540.全身が 毛におおわれた\n寒い地方に棲む魔物。\n敵をなめまわして\nゆさぶりを:
A hairy monster that
lives in cold regions,
it lashes out at its
enemies with a tongue
lashing.

30601.チカラをためて攻撃する\n毛むくじゃらの怪物。\nスクルトで守りをかためる\n用:
A hairy monster that
attacks by pooling its
strength, it also has a
cautious side, using
Kabuff to defend itself
or Psyche Up to protect
itself.

30665.砂漠に出没する チカラ自慢。\n炎天下の中 わざわざ\n熱い息を吹きかけてくる\:
The boast of power that
haunts the desert. He is
a strange guy who
deliberately blows hot
breath on you under the
scorching sun.

30731.賢者ブロッゲンが用意した\n破邪の秘技会得のための試練。\n現れた幻影を見抜かな:
A trial for acquiring
Sacred Skill prepared by
Sage Broggen; it is
difficult to defeat the
main body unless you can
recognize the illusion
that appears.

30812.トロピカルな雰囲気ただよう\nイケてるデザートゴースト。\nにぶそうに見せかけて:
Sweaty Yeti has a
tropical vibe, and while
he may appear timid, his
footwork is light.

30885.長いヤリをかまえた\nイノシシのモンスター。\nときどき くりだしてくる\nさみ:
A wild boar monster with
a long spear. Beware of
the Multithrust that it
sometimes raises.

30951.得意のヤリを振り回し\nベホイミ ザオラルなど\n回復呪文も使ってくる。\nまさ:
He wields his signature
spear and uses recovery
spells such as Midheal
Zing. He is truly the
king of the Orc world.

31017.見事な黄金の毛に包まれた\nイノシシのモンスター。\nさみだれ突き ベホマラーと:
A wild boar monster
covered in magnificent
golden fur, it excels in
both offense and defense
with its Multithrust
Multiheal.

31089.やさしき心を紅の毛皮に隠し\n多くのオークを統率する\n華麗なるオークの女王。\:
She is a brilliant queen
of Orc, who hides her
gentle heart in her red
fur and leads many Orcs.
She helps companion with
recovery spells.

31165.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な オーク。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
An evil Orc with
extraordinary strength,
his red, piercing eyes
are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

31223.覚醒したジャゴヌバの命令で\nザハディガル岩峰の魔瘴塚に\nとりついて魔瘴を放出:
Evil Soul in the form of
a dragon releasing demon
miasma by attaching
itself to the miasmound
of Zahadigal Rock Peak
at the behest of the
awakened Jagonuba.

31305.世の金持ちという金持ちに\nはげしい恨みを抱く悪魔。\n憎悪の風を巻き起こし\n:
Demon, who harbors a
vicious grudge against
the rich and wealthy of
the world, creates a
wind of hatred and
uproots their
possessions.

31378.首をハネられて絶命した騎士が\n悪霊となってよみがえった。\nヘルサークルで相手:
A knight who was hanged
by the neck and died has
come back to life as an
evil spirit. He likes to
weaken his opponents
with hell circles and
smash them with iron
balls.

31458.巨大なクチバシを持った\n不気味な鳥の魔物。\n怒ると 自慢の脚力を活かし\n飛:
A creepy bird monster
with a huge kuchiba
sheath, it attacks by
leaping up using its
angry and powerful legs.

31528.ルカナンやマヌーサを唱える\n意外にかしこい鳥の魔物。\n遠くからでも 一瞬で\:
A surprisingly clever
bird monster that casts
Kasap and Dazzle, it can
leap at you in an
instant and attack from
a distance.

31600.バギ系呪文の使い手。\n攻撃力も そこそこあるので\n集団で現れると やっかい。:
A user of Woosh spells.
They have a good amount
of attack power, so they
can be troublesome when
they appear in groups.
Let's get rid of them
quickly.

31669.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な おおくちばし。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Beakon has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce intent to kill.

31732.華麗な羽根飾りを身にまとう\n魔物界のファッションリーダー\n……と思ってるのは:
Wearing a gorgeous
feather ornament, only
he thinks he is the
fashion leader in the
monster world, but
everyone around him is
taken back by his
flamboyance.

31817.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ヘルビースト。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Sculptrice is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

31880.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な たてまじん。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Peekabogre with
extraordinary strength
and a red, piercing gaze
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

31941.業炎の聖塔で試練に挑む者に\n立ちはだかる魔物の１体。\nライノス族の戦士の中で:
One of the monsters that
stand in the way of
those who challenge
trials in the Fire
Tower. He is the most
fashionable of the
Rhinos warriors.

32015.かつて ネクロデア王国で\n名を馳せていた武器鍛冶職人。\n大魔王になるべき者の:
Weaponsmith, once a
prominent figure in the
kingdom of Necrodea, who
kept technical books for
the would-be Great Demon
King.

32091.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な キメラ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
An evil Chimaera of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

32149.おなかに 溜め込んだ\n火の息をはくモンスター。\nノリにノっているときは\nか:
This monster breathes
fire breath that it has
stored in its belly.
When it is in the mood,
it even breathes Kaen's
breath.

32220.さまざまな呪文を習得して\n少し進化したキメラ。\nラリホーやメダパニに\n注意:
Chimaera has evolved a
bit by learning various
spells, so watch out for
Snooze and Fuddle.

32287.すさまじい炎の息をはきだす\nキメラ界のスター。\nベホマラーを使えるので\n戦:
A star of the Chimaera
world, he can breathe
fire, and his use of
Multiheal may prolong
the fight.

32352.月が 満ち欠けするように\n光と闇の魔力を 増減させて\nブレス攻撃をしかけてく:
Like the waxing and
waning of the moon, this
vicious bird monster
increases and decreases
its magical power of
light and darkness to
launch a breath attack.

32423.おなかに 溜め込んだ\n火の息をはくモンスター。\nバサバサと飛びまわっては\n:
A monster that breathes
fire in its belly. It
flies around and pecks
travelers.

32490.くさりかけの死体に\n魂が宿ったモンスター。\nあまりに不気味な攻撃で\nテンシ:
A monster whose soul
resides in a corpsed
corpse. The attack is so
eerie that the tension
can be lowered.

32558.毒の沼地で息絶えた旅人が\n怨念によって よみがえった。\n身体にためた猛毒をは:
A traveler who died in a
poisonous swamp is
revived by a grudge. The
traveler's body is
filled with a deadly
poison that poisons the
victim.

32636.死んでも 死にきれず\n世を恨み続けるアンデッド。\nあまい息や呪い攻撃など\n:
Even if they die, the
undead cannot die and
continue to hold a
grudge against the
world. They are good at
nasty attacks such as
sweet breath and cursed
attacks.

32705.ドロドロの液体を はきちらし\n呪いをもたらすゾンビ。\nやけつく息や もうどく:
Zombies slathering
liquid slop and bringing
curses. They also spray
a series of burning
breaths and other toxic
breaths.

32779.腐りただれた身体をひきずり\nガスをはきちらすゾンビ。\n毒 マヒ 呪いをもたら:
A zombie that drags its
rotting, sore body
around and flurries gas.
A terrifying messenger
of the underworld that
brings poison,
paralysis, and curses.

32852.くさりかけの死体に\n魂が宿ったモンスター。\nこいつの攻撃を受けると\n呪いや:
