A monster whose soul
resides in a corpsed
corpse. If you are
attacked by this
monster, you will be
cursed or poisoned.

32921.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な くさった死体。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Walking Corpse
has an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

32984.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な アームライオン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Hellion of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

33048.マホトラおどりで ＭＰを奪い\n呪文で 敵を弱体化させて\n戦いを有利に進めよう:
Drain MagicDancing to
steal MP and use spells
to weaken the enemy in
order to gain the upper
hand in a fight.
Mysterious stone doll.

33122.あやしいひとみを使う以外\n戦い方に特徴はないのだが\n逆にそこが不気味に感じる:
There is no
characteristic in the
way he fights except for
his use of a mysterious
pupil, but this is what
makes him eerie. The
most distinctive feature
of the game is its
elusiveness.

33201.よこしまな悪霊を宿す人形。\nあやしいひとみを光らせながら\n混乱や眠りで敵を無:
A puppet that harbors a
treacherous evil spirit.
It is an expert in
disabling the enemy with
confusion and sleep
while glowing a
suspicious pupil.

33283.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な いしにんぎょう。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Dirty Dogu is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce intent to kill.

33347.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な サイおとこ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Rhinothrope has
an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce intent to
kill.

33408.うっかり魔瘴石に触れた影響で\n凶暴化した さんぞくウルフ。\nはげしい頭痛が理:
Ruff Ruffian has gone
berserk after
inadvertently touching a
demon miasma stone, and
his raging headache is
ripping apart his
enemies as he lusts.

33492.バルディスタの陰の実力者？\n小さな身体に秘めたチカラで\nカモをバタバタなぎ倒:
The man behind the
scenes at Valdista? He
is a very wicked Slime,
who slams down ducks
with the power hidden in
his small body!

33570.バルディスタ札付きのワル。\nオノを振り回し カモを\nおびえさせる とってもわ:
Valdista is a badass
with a badge, a very bad
Hippo King who wields an
axe and scares the
ducks!

33639.バルディスタ札付きのワル。\n右手の剣と左手の盾で カモを\nビビらせる とって:
Valdista is a badass
with a badge. A very bad
Mandrake Militant with a
sword in his right hand
and a shield in his left
to scare the ducks!

33714.ヨロイで身をかためた\n二足歩行の獣人。\n手にした巨大なオノから\n強烈な一撃:
A bipedal beast, clad in
armor. A powerful blow
is delivered from the
huge axe in its hand.

33780.戦士として修行を積んだ\nサイおとこのエリート。\n呪文は使ってこないが\n痛恨:
Ellie, a Rhinothrope
trained as a warrior,
does not use spells but
is wary of The Painful
Strike.

33845.並みいる敵を なぎ倒しながら\n自慢のオノを振り回す。\n怒るとチカラをためて攻:
He is the Champ of the
Rhinothrope world,
wielding his axe with
pride while knocking
down enemies in a row,
and attacking by saving
his strength and angry.

33923.かぶと割りを得意とする\n勇ましいカバの戦士。\n怒ると テンションバーンを\n:
A brave hippopotamus
warrior who specializes
in Helm Splitter, he is
a nuisance who uses
angry and Feel the Burn.

33995.テンションバーンを使って\nしきりにチカラをみなぎらせる\n豪快なカバ族の騎士。:
A dynamic hippopotamus
knight who uses "Feel
the Burn" to energize
his body, he is also
looked up to by his
companions.

34073.自慢のオノで 敵をなぎたおし\nダメージを ものともしない。\nヒポせんしたちを:
The leader of the Hippo
Soldiers, he is the
chief of the Hippo
Tribe.

34145.猫島の乗っ取りをたくらむ\nリベリオのライバル。\n得意のオノを振り回し\nチカ:
Purrgatroyd's rival who
wants to take over Cat
Island. He wields an
axe, which is his
specialty, and prefers
to attack only with his
strength.

34215.『皇帝』の名を冠する\nサイおとこ族の王の中の王。\nそのチカラはサイ強といわれ:
The king among the kings
of the Rhinothrope
tribe, who bears the
name of "emperor. He is
said to be the strongest
rhinoceros in the world
and has a great deal of
knowledge about
rhinoceroses.

34292.奴隷のまま死んでしまい\nその怨念で ゾンビと化した。\n足の鉄球で攻撃したり\:
They died as slaves and
their grudge turned them
into zombies. They
attack with iron balls
on their feet and curse.

34364.死してなお 服従の呪いが\n解けない 兵士のゾンビ。\nやいばくだきを くりだし:
A soldier zombie whose
curse of obedience
remains unbroken even in
death, the Attack Attack
Attacker is used to
discourage the
opponent's attack.

34434.しかばねとなった今でも\n血のにおいに飢えている\n元死刑囚の なれの果て。\n:
The end result of a
former death-row inmate
who is still hungry for
the smell of blood. For
some reason, he uses
Fizzle.

34504.囚人たちを束ねていたボスが\n魔物として よみがえった。\n旅人たちを死に追いや:
The boss who held the
prisoners together has
come back to life as a
monster. He wants to
send the travelers to
their deaths and
increase the number of
his minions.

34580.メギストリス流の剣術を\n使いこなす エリート亡霊兵。\nメギストリス城の精鋭部:
A master of the
Megistris style of
swordsmanship, Ellieto's
ghost soldier is capable
of annihilating the
elite forces of the
Megistris Castle.

34658.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バズズ。\n何者かの妖術により 強化さ:
Pazuzu, sealed away as
an immortal in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

34725.銀色の体毛を持つ悪魔。\nギガデインをはなち\nあまい息で眠りをもたらす\nずる:
A silver-haired demon
with a cunning charm
that brings Kazap to
sleep with its sweet
breath.

34789.メラガイアーや しゃくねつで\n辺り一面を焼け野原にし\nさらにメガンテまで唱え:
The nightmarish pink
demon that burns down
the whole area with its
Kafrizzle and Textile
Nets, and even chants
Megante.

34868.魔軍十二将の中核をなす魔物。\n音もなく忍び寄り\n気取られぬまま 敵を倒す彼は:
The core of the Twelve
Generals of the Demon
Army, he is feared as
the "Assassin of
Darkness" for his
ability to sneak up on
his enemies without
making a sound and
defeat them without
being noticed.

34944.凶悪なツメと死の呪文を操り\n狙いをつけた獲物に\n逃れられない死をもたらす。\:
A cunning demon who
follows the Netherlord,
he uses his vicious
claws and death spells
to bring inescapable
death to his prey.

35019.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バズズ。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\n:
Pazuzu, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery but must be on
his guard.

35081.弱き者には ホイミのいやしを\n仇なす者には かぶと割りを。\n大きなスライムに:
Heal the weak and Helm
Splitter the avenger. A
kind-hearted little
knight astride a big
Slime.

35158.無口なメタルスライム乗り。\n華麗な宙返りを披露して\n痛恨の一撃をくりだす\n:
A quiet Metal Slime
rider. He also has a
daring side when he
performs a spectacular
somersault and The
Painful Strike.

35226.ピンクのスライムに またがり\n華麗な剣技を披露して\n女子のハートを わしづか:
He is a small, but very
handsome man with a
great body. He is a
small, but handsome man.

35298.ベギラゴンさえもあやつる\n強大な魔力を持つ悪魔。\n死の呪文も会得しているので:
A powerful demon that
can even manipulate
Kasizz, it also knows
death spells, making it
a tricky opponent.

35375.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な スライムナイト。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Slime Knight
with extraordinary
strength, his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

35439.鋭いトゲだらけの身体で\n守りを固めつつ\n激しく攻撃してくる\n攻防一体の い:
A bulky monster with a
combination of offense
and defense, it attacks
fiercely while
protecting itself with
its sharp, spiked body.

35500.いかめしい こうらを背負った\n怪獣たちのドン。\nやけつく息をはきながら\n勇:
The Don of the monsters
with a hideous hulk on
their backs. He attacks
with courage and
bravery, breathing with
a burning breath.

35567.赤いトゲにおおわれた\n砂漠生まれのモンスター。\nどっしり かまえながら\n強:
A desert-born monster
covered in red spikes.
It stands firm and
sprays intense flames.

35634.はるか いにしえの時代より\n地上にいた 紅き魔獣。\n岩石のように身を重くして:
A red, demonic beast
that has existed on
earth since ancient
times. It is as heavy as
a rock and unmoved by
anything.

35702.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な バザックス。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Tyrannoceratops
is a powerful,
unbelievably strong
creature with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

35763.カルサドラ火山の女神の祠にて\n光の神装を守護する番人。\nイルーシャの女神の依:
He is the protector of
the divine light at the
shrine of the Goddess of
Calsadora Volcano, where
he fought to test
Irusha's qualifications
to be a goddess'
dependent.

35842.泥に宿った死者の魂が\n旅人たちの足に すがりつく。\n戦闘中 スクルトを唱えて:
The souls of the dead in
the mud cling to the
feet of travelers.
During battle, the mud's
body can be strengthened
by chanting Kabuff.

35916.ゼリー状の身体を持つ\nネトネトしたモンスター。\nヘナトスで攻撃力を下げ\nゆ:
A gooey monster with a
jelly-like body, it
attacks while lowering
its attack power with
Blunt.

35987.煮えたぎる溶岩から\nドロリと現れる無形の魔物。\nメラゾーマをはなって\n旅人:
An intangible monster
that slithers out of the
boiling lava, Kafrizz
sparks and turns
travelers black.

36052.沈没船から わきでてくる\n水死した人々の怨霊。\n突然 目の前に現れる\nトリ:
The ghosts of the
drowned people who
emerge from the sunken
ship. It suddenly
appears in front of you,
and is good at tricky
moves.

36118.ドロドロに溶けている\nチョコレートの魔物。\nジバリカを唱えて罠をはり\nかか:
A chocolate monster is
melting into mush, and a
traveler who casts
Boulderbringer and sets
up a trap is attacked
with fury!

36189.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし 暗黒の魔人。\n妖術で弱くなっているが:
Ruin, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

36254.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ばくだん岩。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Rockbomb has an
unparalleled strength,
and its red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce intent to kill.

36315.奇妙な異空間で出会った\nナゾの巨大ばくだん岩。\nその爆発の威力は\nビッグバ:
In a strange, alien
space, he encounters a
mysterious giant
Rockbomb, whose
explosions are said to
be of Big Banga
proportions.

36379.笑いながら ようすを\nうかがっていると思いきや\n突然 攻撃してくる\n不気味:
The creepy rock monster
attacks suddenly, just
when you think it's
laughing at you.

36441.ほとんど なにもせず\nしばらく攻撃を受けると\n突然 メガンテを唱える。\n一:
If you do almost nothing
and are attacked for a
while, they will
suddenly cast Megante.
Let's defeat them all at
once.

36507.ふだんは おとなしいが\nいざとなると自らを犠牲にして\n仲間をよみがえらせる\:
He is usually quiet, but
when push comes to
shove, he sacrifices
himself to revive the
companion, the leader of
the rock monsters.

36576.普段は のろのろ転がるだけの\n怠惰な生活を送っているが\n一度 獲物をロックオ:
Usually, he leads a lazy
life, rolling along at a
leisurely pace, but once
he locks onto his prey,
he will use all of his
strength to defeat it.

36656.凍てつく空にたゆたう\nオーロラの輝きを宿す岩魔物。\nうっかり見とれていると\:
A rock monster with the
radiance of an aurora
fluttering in the frozen
sky; be careful not to
gaze at it carelessly,
as it will release a
megante.

36732.激しい怒りにより\n人間の魂が 烈火のごとく\n燃えさかって 生まれた魔物。\n:
A monster, born from the
fiery rage of a human's
soul, attacks with fire.

36801.深い悲しみにより\n人間の魂が 吹雪のように\n冷たくなって 生まれた魔物。\n:
A monster, born with a
soul as cold as a
blizzard due to deep
sorrow, is brought to
death by Zaraki.

36870.ドワーフたちの欲望につけ込み\n利用する 邪悪な炎の化身。\n中央の核を取り除か:
An incarnation of evil
fire that takes
advantage of Dwarfs'
desires, it will not be
extinguished unless the
core of the center is
removed.

36946.ブレスで敵を痛めつけ\n死の呪文を 使ってくる\n邪悪なる鬼火。\n大車輪にも:
Evil demon fire that
uses breath to hurt the
enemy and uses death
spells. Be careful of
the big wheel.

37006.エレメンツのドジっ子担当で\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nひかりのブレスをくり出す:
He is the monster who
guards the gates of
TRIAL and is in charge
of the Elements' screw-
ups, and he often falls
down and makes mistakes
with his light breath.

37082.エレメンツのイケメン担当で\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n甘いマスクに見とれたら最:
He is the handsome guy
in charge of Elements,
the monster who guards
the gates of TRIAL, and
if you fall for his
sweet mask, he will
finish you off
ruthlessly.

37159.エレメンツの草食系担当で\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n普段はおだやかな性格だが\:
A herbivorous monster of
the Elements who guards
the gates of the TRIAL,
he is usually a gentle
soul, but changes when
his companion is in
trouble.

37235.エレメンツの熱血担当で\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n自慢の炎で 敵を倒すことに\:
He is the hot-blooded
monster of the Elements,
defending the gates of
the Trial, and feels
more pleasure than
anything else in
defeating his enemies
with the flames of his
pride.

37305.エレメンツのセクシー担当で\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n攻撃されてメイクが崩れる:
A sexy monster of the
elements, he guards the
gates of the trial, and
is an angry man when his
make-up is destroyed by
an attack.

37378.毒の沼地で生まれた\nトカゲのモンスター。\n毒の息をはきだしたり\nボディプレ:
A lizard monster born in
a poisonous swamp. It
spews poisonous breath
and does body presses.

37442.火をつかさどるといわれる\n邪悪なドラゴンの子供。\nまるで 息をするように\n:
The child of an evil
dragon, said to be a
fire-creator. It sprays
flames everywhere as if
it were breathing.

37514.吸い込んだ砂をはきちらし\n大きな腹で のしかかってくる\nピンクの両生類モンス:
This pink amphibian
monster flings sand from
its lungs and swarms on
you with its large
belly. Be careful of its
confusion attack.

37592.邪神をあがめる集団が 儀式に\n使っていた炎に命が宿った。\nのろいのきりを放ち:
The flame used in the
rituals of a group that
worships an evil god has
come to life. The evil
entity that curses and
kills all living things
by releasing the toroshi
no kiri.

37675.儀式に使うトーチに\n炎のチカラを宿らせるほど\nこの魔物のまとう炎は\n美しい:
The torch used in the
ritual is said to have
the power of flame, and
the flame that this
monster wears is said to
radiate a beautiful
glow.

37742.かなわぬ未練に とらわれ\n荒野をさまよう剣士の亡霊。\nダークフォースをまとっ:
The ghost of a swordsman
wandering in the
wilderness, clad in
Funereal Fource and
wielding a cursed sword.

37815.魔性の剣に憑かれた\nおろかな狂戦士の亡霊。\n巧みな剣さばきで\nすばやく２回:
The ghost of a mad
warrior possessed by a
demonic sword. He
slashes twice quickly
with his skillful
swordsmanship.

37878.闇夜をさまよい歩いて\n死をもたらすという魔剣士。\n激しい いなずまを呼びよせ:
A demon swordsman who
wanders the dark night
and brings death, he
tears apart the silence
of the night with his
violent Lightning calls.

37950.かつて栄華を誇った\nとある王族の呪われし姿。\n剣のウデは一流であり\n刀身で:
The cursed form of a
once prosperous royal
family. His skill with
the sword is first-rate,
and he uses the blade to
defend against all
attacks.

38019.とある滅びた王国の王が\n身につけていたマントに\n魂が乗りうつった。\n亡き王:
The soul of the king of
a ruined kingdom was
transferred to the cloak
he was wearing. The
deceased king quietly
Raise the sword.

38089.ダークドレアムの 忠実なる\nしもべ。呪いで 身動きを封じ\n敵を 滅びの悪夢へ:
A faithful servant of
Nokturnus. He is a
faithful servant of
Nokturnus, who uses
curses to block movement
and send his enemies
into a doomed dream,
where they will die.

38168.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な マッドルーパー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Axolotl has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

38232.シエラ巡礼地の女神の祠にて\n光の神装を守護する番人。\nイルーシャの女神の依代:
He is the protector of
the Shrine of the
Goddess of Light at the
Sierra Shrinelands
where he fought to test
Irusha's qualifications
to be a goddess.

38309.ゲルヘナ幻野の界隈を\nなわばりとする ならず者。\n弱そうな者を見つけると\n:
A ruffian who calls the
Gerhena Field area his
home. Whenever he finds
someone who looks weak,
he always puts a bad
taste in his mouth.

38382.勇猛果敢な魔獣の戦士。\nはげしいおたけびを上げ\nひるんだ相手に剣を振りかざし:
A valiant and daring
Hexenbiest warrior, he
raises a furious war cry
and swings his sword at
a flinching opponent,
delivering a powerful
slash.

38455.いざないの間の番人に従い\n門を通らんと欲する者の前に\n立ちはだかる試練の魔物:
A trial monster who
stands in front of those
who wish to pass through
the gate according to
the guardians of the
Hall of Invitation,
beware of its powerful
series of attacks.

38534.みぞうの大災害である千夜嵐の\n核となる荒ぶる双神の片割れ。\n風を自在にあやつ:
He is one half of the
raging twin deities that
form the core of the
Thousand Night Storm, a
catastrophe in Mizo. He
is a master of the wind,
and his joy is to blow
people away.

38611.ボンドルという少年に化け\nＰ８９０の命を狙った暗殺者。\nある組織にやとわれて:
Assassin, disguised as a
boy named Bondor,
attempts to take the
life of P890, who is
wanted by a certain
organization, but the
details are still under
wraps.

38691.我こそは 海の覇者たらんと\n海底の征服に乗り出した\n大王の中の大王。\nすみ:
I am the greatest of the
great kings who set out
to conquer the ocean
floor, determined to be
the master of the sea. I
am the king of the great
kings who has set out to
conquer the seafloor,
and I will steal your
vision.

38761.多足を活かして連続こうげきや\n回転アタックを仕掛けてくる\nおそるべき海の悪魔:
A fearsome sea demon
that uses its multiple
legs to launch a series
of attacks and spinning
Attacks.

38837.イカに似た巨体の持ち主で\nおそるべき海の怪物として\n伝承に語りつがれる。\n:
The giant squid-like
creature has a legendary
reputation as a fearsome
sea monster, and its
nine tentacles are its
most powerful weapon.

38908.浮遊大陸ナドラガンドの内海に\n巣食ったという神話的怪物。\n常闇の竜レグナード:
A mythical monster that
lurked in the inland
waters of the floating
continent of Nadragand,
it fought with the
Everdark Dragon Regnad
and wreaked havoc on the
world.

38987.二足歩行のトカゲの魔物。\nみがきあげた しんくう斬りや\nいなずま斬りをくりだ:
A bipedal lizard
monster, a master of
swordsmanship that
attacks with polished
Shinku slashes and
Lightning slashes.

39061.攻防一体の戦闘をする\nドラゴンの兵士。\n仲間を呼ぶこともあるので\n早めに倒:
Dragon soldiers who
fight offensively and
defensively; they may
call for companionship,
so take them out as soon
as possible.

39125.ドラゴンの魔法戦士。\n５種類すべてのフォースを\nあざやかに使いこなし\n剣の:
A dragon armamentalist,
he is able to use all
five Force types with
aplomb, and his
swordsmanship is top-
notch.

39190.まばゆいほどに純白の\n神秘的なシュプリンガー。\n縁起のいい魔物として\nまつ:
The dazzlingly pure
white and mysterious
Mandrake Marshal is
worshipped as a good-
luck monster in some
regions.

39260.バイキルトからジャンプ斬りの\nコンボに自信を持っているが\n仲間を呼ぶことも忘:
He is confident in his
Oomphle to Janp slash
combo, but his cautious
nature, not forgetting
to call companion, makes
him more formidable than
anything else.

39342.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な リザードマン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Mandrake Major
with extraordinary
strength and a red,
piercing gaze with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

39405.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な しにがみきぞく。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Bone Baron is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

39469.溶岩を食べて生きている\n体内に高熱を秘めた魔鳥。\nはげしいほのおをはいて\n:
A demon bird that lives
on lava and has a high
fever inside its body.
It burns everything up
with its fiery fire.

39537.極寒の地で産声をあげた\n死の呪文を操る魔鳥。\nこごえるふぶきをはいて\nすべ:
A demon bird that
controls death spells,
born in a land of
extreme cold. It is a
demon bird that controls
the spell of death, born
in a place of extreme
cold, and turns
everything into ice with
a puff of cold air.

39604.煉獄を飛ぶといわれる\n極彩色の美しい魔鳥。\nしゃくねつやドルマドンを\n容赦:
A beautiful demon bird
of extreme colors said
to fly in purgatory. It
beats Shakuneetsu and
Kazammle wildly and
mercilessly.

39668.魔物商人たちが商品として\n邪法により生み出した\n真っ黒い ひくいどり。\n人:
The true black Firebird,
created by the evil ways
of the monster merchants
as a commodity.

39738.けがれの谷底で生まれた\n凶兆をふりまく呪われし鳥。\n人間の子供が大好物で\n:
A cursed bird born in
the Defiled Depths that
sprinkles evil omens, it
loves human children and
will take them away if
it sees them.

39812.フードの男が緑色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\n群れでの戦いに長けており:
The beast demons of the
other world summoned by
Hooded Man by means of a
green spell. They are
skilled at fighting in
groups and follow each
other closely.

39889.はるか古代に生まれたという\n死をまき散らす漆黒の鳥。\n暗黒のきりやドルマドン:
A jet-black bird that
spews death, said to
have been born in
ancient times. It
sprinkles death on all
life with its dark kiri
or kazammle.

39966.かつて その翼に希望を乗せて\n大空を駆けまわったという\n幻のトリの試練のケモ:
The fantastic TORI TRIAL
KEMONO, which once flew
across the sky with hope
on its wings. With hope
in your heart, put a
prayer in your heart!

40043.ひづめの音をひびかせて\n迫りくる地獄の騎士。\n自らにベホイミをかけ\n折れた:
A knight of hell
approaches with the
sound of hoofbeats. He
applies Midheal to
himself and repairs his
broken bones.

40110.血で血を洗い のしあがった\n呪われし貴族の亡霊。\n闇の呪文 ドルクマを唱え\:
The ghost of a cursed
nobleman who washed in
blood and rose from the
ashes. He casts the
spell Zammle of
Darkness, and reaps the
souls of travelers.

40179.地獄の馬に またがり\n死を予言する亡霊騎兵。\nさみだれ突きや呪い攻撃で\n生:
A ghost cavalryman who
rides a horse from hell
and predicts death, he
brings the living to the
yellow fountain with his
Multithrust and Curse
attacks.

40247.闇の奥底で生まれた\n影をまとう高貴なる黒騎士。\n得意のさみだれ突きで 周囲を:
A noble black knight
clad in shadows born in
the depths of darkness.
His specialty is
Multithrust, which
instantly transforms his
surroundings into a
world of death.

40334.黄金の釜で処刑されたはずの\nバディンドが秘術により\n黄金の身体を得て復活。心:
Badindo, who was
supposed to be executed
in the golden cauldron,
was resurrected with a
golden body by a secret
technique. Even his
heart has been dyed by
the monster.

40411.魔軍十二将 特選軍隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n１０００年前の ダ:
He served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as the
leader of his specially
selected army and
inflicted extensive
damage on Alltrades
Abbey 1,000 years ago.

40487.野ざらしの死者のヨロイに\n怨念が取り憑き 動きだした。\n多様な剣技を使いこな:
The dead armors of the
dead, left out in the
open, are haunted by a
grudge. He uses a
variety of sword
techniques to deliver
The Painful Strike.

40562.禁じられた黒魔術によって\n命を与えられた魔のヨロイ。\n多彩なフォースを駆使し:
A demon armor brought to
life by forbidden black
magic, he uses a variety
of Force powers to
strike down his enemies
in spectacular fashion.

40635.魔王の息吹が込められた\n邪悪な意志を持つ死のヨロイ。\n高い戦闘能力を誇り\n:
A death armor with an
evil will, filled with
the breath of the Demon
King, he boasts a high
level of combat ability
and is a tireless
offensive and defensive
player.

40705.全身を黒い甲冑で包み\n魔界をうろつく死の魔人。\n捨て身の もろば斬りをはなち:
Wrapped in black armor,
the Death Fiend stalks
the Demon World. He is a
deadly double-edged
slash, taking the living
with him.

40778.なんと スピンドル兵士長が\n魔物と入れ替わった！\n本人とは比較にならないほど:
Captain Spindle has been
replaced by a monster!
He moves much faster and
is much stronger than he
is.

40853.ガズバランの牙の策略により\nガートラントの兵士と\n入れ替わった魔物たち。\n:
Monsters replaced by
Gartlant's soldiers due
to Gazbalan's Fang's
trickery. Their true
identity is a stuffed
animal.

40923.かつて コゼットの命を奪った\n追っ手に対する ロディアの\n恐怖が具現化して生:
A chaser from a
nightmare, born of
Rhodia's fear of the
pursuer who once took
Cosette's life.

40995.聖なる攻撃を受けるうちに\n邪悪な怨念が打ち消され\n代わりに聖なるチカラが宿っ:
The evil grudge is
vanquished as it is
attacked by a holy
attack, and a holy power
takes its place.

41074.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n巨大なムチを振るって\n恐ろしい魔物を従える姿か:
A monster who was one of
the twelve generals of
the Demon Army, he was
called the trainer of
the Demon World because
of the way he wielded
his huge whip and
followed the fearsome
monsters.

41150.神の怒りを買い怪物にされた\n哀れな英雄の末路。\n痛恨の一撃やジゴデインで\n:
The end of a poor hero
who was turned into a
monster by the wrath of
God, kicking the crap
out of anyone who stands
in his way with The
Painful Strike or
Kazapstrophe.

41221.超天道士の弟子 ヤーンの従者\nガウラドの正体。\n超天道士と戦い そのチカラを:
The true identity of
Gaurad, a follower of
Yarn, a disciple of the
Chotendoji. He came from
Demon World to fight
against Chotendoji and
steal his power.

41294.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バリクナジャ。\n何者かの妖術により:
Togrus Maximus, immortal
and sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

41365.魔物へと変身をとげた兵士。\nテンションを上げることを\n得意としており その怪:
A soldier who has
transformed into a
monster. He is good at
raising tension, and he
can knock out everything
with his monstrous
strength.

41438.地獄の門を守るという\n冷徹な おそろしい悪魔。\nもうどくのきりで敵を弱らせ\:
A cold-hearted and
terrifying demon that
protects the Gate of
Hell, it uses its deadly
kiri to weaken its
enemies and its scythe
to reap life.

41511.邪悪な魔物たちを従える\n血も凍るような大悪魔。\n切れ味鋭い 痛恨の一撃で\n:
A blood-curdling demon
who follows evil
monsters, he inflicts
bloodshed on his
opponents with his sharp
The Painful Strike.

41580.地獄の深淵から生まれた\n冷酷無比な魔界の王子。\n闇の魔力によってザラキや\n:
A ruthless and ruthless
prince of the Demon
World, born from the
depths of Hell. He
begets Zaraki and
Kazammle by his dark
magic.

41648.守護者ラズバーンに仕える\n闇より生じた悪魔。\n巨大なカマを振りまわし\n生気:
A demon from the
darkness that serves the
Guardian Razburn, it
wields a giant sickle
and drains the lifeblood
from the body.

41715.刻印を刻まれし者を\n主のもとへ届ける役目を持つ。\n荷物がおとなしく運ばれるよ:
It is responsible for
delivering those who
have been engraved with
the mark to the Lord.
The movement is stopped
by a burnt-out iki to
ensure that the cargo is
carried in a docile
manner.

41794.荒野の死刑執行人として\n恐れられる獣人。その剛腕から\n放たれる痛恨の一撃に加:
He is feared as the
executioner of the
wilderness. In addition
to The Painful Strike,
which he unleashes from
his powerful arms, he
can also use lightning
spells.

41870.聖守護者の槍を盗みだし\nその護りのチカラを破ることを\n企む魔族の先兵。使い魔:
A demon's advance guard
who plans to steal the
Holy Protector's spear
and break its protective
power.

41948.立ちふさがるものすべてを\n粉砕する 地獄の破壊者。\nやけつく息で動きを止め\:
A destroyer of hell who
crushes everything that
stands in his way. With
a burning breath, he
stops movement and
delivers a violent
slash.

42018.あらゆる武器を使いこなす\n魔王の忠実なるしもべ。\nしゃくねつとマヒャドで\n:
A faithful servant of
the Demon King, he is
skilled with all kinds
of weapons. The whole
area is turned into hell
by the heat of the fire
and Kacrack.

42088.破壊のよろこびに目覚めた\n邪悪な戦士が魔物と化した。\n多彩な斬撃で なにもか:
An evil warrior awakened
by the joy of
destruction has turned
into a monster. He tries
to destroy everything
and anything with a
variety of slashes.

42161.世告げの姫を亡き者とするため\n何者かが つかわした刺客。\n手にした４つの凶器:
An assassin arranged by
someone to take out the
Oracle Princess. With
four deadly weapons in
his hands, he spreads
mischief on earth.

42236.正義を愛した太古の王の像に\n邪悪な魂が乗りうつった。\nゆがんだ正義はただ争い:
The image of an ancient
king who loved justice
was possessed by an evil
spirit. The warped
justice only seeks for
conflict and has become
the incarnation of
killing.

42316.４本の武器をはげしく振るい\nバルディスタに害なす敵を\n冷酷に切り裂く武人。\:
A warrior who wields
four weapons with
fierceness and
ruthlessly cuts through
enemies who would harm
Valdista. He boasts a
matte-textured dark
skin.

42392.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な まおうのつかい。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil demon-at-arms
has an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

42456.悪魔に魂を売り\n闇のチカラを得た騎士。\nベホマスライムを呼ぶなど\nしたたか:
A knight who sold his
soul to a demon and
gained the power of
darkness, he also has
the cunning to call upon
Cureslime.

42523.血に染まったヨロイをまとい\n死の香りを漂わせる騎士。\nガードマスターを駆使し:
A knight with a blood-
red armor and the scent
of death. He makes full
use of his guard mastery
to block enemy attacks.

42599.ブ厚いヨロイを着込んだ\n悪のパワーファイター。\n鍛えぬかれた肉体で\nタック:
Evil power fighter
wearing thick armor. He
is a well-trained
fighter with a strong
tackle.

42666.咲き誇る白バラのごとく\n高潔な志を持った謎の騎士。\nテンションバーンを使い\:
A mysterious knight with
aspirations as noble as
a blooming white rose,
he uses Feel the Burn
and grows stronger with
each attack.

42740.朽ちた霊廟を訪れし者のうち\n知恵とチカラを兼ね備え\n志ある魔族にのみ 秘術の:
It is said that only
those demons who have
the will to combine
wisdom and power among
those who visit the
Decaying Tomb will be
given the Talsman, in
which the mystic arts
reside.

42818.故郷エクゼリアを焼かれ\n生きる希望を失った\nシスター・ライラの弱き心に\n怨:
A grudge haunts the weak
heart of Sister Lyra,
who has lost hope for
life after her hometown,
Exelia, is burned to the
ground.

42883.なげきは ついに憎しみとなり\n命ある者を呪い続ける。\n魔力を覚醒させて はな:
Nemesis finally becomes
hatred and continues to
curse those who have
life. Kazammle is a
great threat.

42958.欲望にまみれ 信仰を失った\n高名な司祭の亡霊。\n的確にザオリクを唱えて\n死:
The ghost of a renowned
priest who lost his
faith due to lust. He
resurrects dead monsters
by casting Kazing with
precision.

43027.死霊たちを統率する\n身の毛もよだつ亡霊王。\nディバインスペルや\nマホトーン:
A hair-raising ghost
king who leads the
spirits of the dead and
interferes with them
with Anathematise and
Fizzle.

43092.５００年前 パルカラス王国を\n支配していた王。\nフォステイルに恨みを持ち\n:
A king who ruled the
Kingdom of Parkaras 500
years ago, he was
resurrected in the
present day because of a
grudge against Fostail.

43160.ダークドレアムの 忠実なる\nしもべ。暗黒の魔法を 操り\n己の魔力を 最大に高:
A faithful servant of
Nokturnus. He
manipulates dark magic
to maximize his own
magical power before
sending his enemies into
a Dead Dream.

43239.いにしえの暴君が 生前の\n栄光に執着し よみがえった\nなれの果ての姿。闇と混:
The end result of an
ancient tyrant, clinging
to the glory of his
former life. An annoying
king who spreads
darkness, confusion, and
death.

43315.アヴィーロ遺跡に住みついて\n周囲の人を困らせた凶暴な獣。\nはげしいおたけびを:
A ferocious beast that
has taken up residence
in Aviro Ruins and
annoyed the people
around it. They attack
in packs with a furious
war cry.

43395.魔獣イーギュアよりも巨大で\n残忍さと狡猾さを備えている。\n白霜の流氷野をうろ:
More massive, more
brutal, and more cunning
than the Rapscallion, it
stalks the Frosty Floes
and viciously slashes
its prey.

43477.４本の腕と４本の足を持つ\nどうもうな魔界獅子。\nチカラをためて 鋭いツメで\:
A lion of the demon
world with four arms and
four legs. It gathers up
its strength and slashes
at you violently with
its sharp claws.

43547.獲物を八つ裂きにすることを\n至上のよろこびとする魔獣。\n四方にとどろく おた:
A beast that takes great
pleasure in ripping its
prey to pieces. Its war
cry, which roars in all
directions, can make
even the strongest man
stumble.

43625.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n十二将のまとめ役として\n後方で指揮をとったが\:
He was one of the Twelve
Generals of the Demon
Army, and although he
commanded in the rear as
the leader of the Twelve
Generals, his own
fighting ability is also
considerable.

43699.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし キングレオ。\n何者かの妖術により 強:
Marquis de Leon,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
enhanced by someone's
sorcery and reappears in
the labyrinth.

43769.盗掘団『砂漠の土竜』の\nモルバ団長が使役する魔物。\n４本のウデを使った\nは:
A monster commanded by
Captain Morva of the
thieving gang "Desert
Earthen Dragon," watch
out for its fierce
attacks using its four
udes.

43842.地獄から現世へと飛来し\n災厄をもたらす大悪魔。\nラリホーマを唱えて\n永遠の:
A great demon that flies
from hell to this world,
bringing misfortune, and
inviting eternal sleep
by chanting Kasnooze.

43909.数百年もの間 呪いに姿を変え\n賢者たちに取り憑いていた\n狡猾で残忍な 魔界の:
Sage of the Demon World,
cunning and cruel, who
has possessed Sages in
the form of a curse for
hundreds of years,
harboring ambitions to
conquer the world.

43989.叡智の冠の手によって\n迷宮に封じられた伝説の魔物。\n世界中に絶望を振りまく\:
A legendary monster
sealed in a labyrinth by
the Crown of Wisdom, the
Demon King is an evil
force of death and
destruction that spreads
despair throughout the
world.

44057.恐怖の悪魔軍団を指揮する\n血も涙もない優秀な軍団長。\nしゃくねつ メラガイア:
A brilliant, bloodless
army leader who commands
an army of fearful
DEMONS. He scours the
earth's surface with his
Kafrizzle.

44130.バスラー隊長が凶悪な魔物へと\n変身をとげた姿。ラリホーマで\nエモノを眠らせマ:
Commander Bassler has
transformed into a
vicious monster, and his
main tactic is to put
monsters to sleep with
Kasnooze and feed them
Kacrackle.

44216.巨大な身体と強大な魔力で\n名高い いにしえの大悪魔。\n大いなる存在の命を受け:
An ancient great demon
renowned for its
enormous body and
powerful magic, it lends
its power to the demon
army at the behest of a
great being.

44293.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし アクバー。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Blackmar, sealed away as
an immortal in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

44361.魔軍十二将 獣魔軍隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n１０００年前の ア:
As the leader of the 12
generals of the Beast
Demon Army, he served
Immortal Demon King
Nerodos and attacked the
Al-Ahagiro Kingdom 1,000
years ago, engulfing the
city in flames.

44442.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な デビルアーマー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Harmour has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

44506.巨大な石像に怨念が宿り\n邪悪な意志の下 動きだした。\n巨体をゆすり 振り上げ:
The giant stone statue
is filled with
resentment and moves
with an evil will. It
shakes its huge body and
tramples its enemies
with its raised feet.

44577.民衆を救う巨大な神像が\n魔王に寝返り 暴れはじめた。\n飛び跳ねて じひびきを:
The giant idol who saves
the people has turned on
the Demon King and is on
the rampage. Jumping
around, he causes a
crackle that leads to a
terrible disaster.

44652.業炎の聖塔で試練に挑む者に\n立ちはだかる魔物の１体。\n巨体を活かした肉弾攻撃:
One of the monsters that
stand in the way of
those who challenge
trials in the Fire
Tower. It excels at
meatball attacks, taking
advantage of its huge
body.

44722.ツルツルもちもちボディに\nあふれんばかりの愛をもって\n立ちはだかる試練のケモ:
The trial animal stands
in the way of the smooth
and glutinous body with
overflowing love. Wrap
it up with the power of
love!

44800.闇の領界の毒が浄化されぬまま\n濃縮された結果出現した脅威。\n暗黒エネルギーの:
A threat that has
emerged as a result of
the concentration of the
Dark Realm's poison
without being purified.
It is an aggregation of
dark energy, a natural
disaster without a will.

44886.あまりの威圧感と凶暴さに\n同じドラゴンすら逃げだす\nおそるべき古代の巨竜。\:
The fearsome ancient
giant dragon is so
intimidating and
ferocious that even the
same dragon runs away
from it. Beware of the
tornado that it creates.

44960.叡智の冠の手によって\n迷宮に封じられた伝説の魔物。\n山脈をも粉砕する\nドラ:
A legendary monster
sealed in a labyrinth by
the Crown of Wisdom, he
is a master of dragon
kung-fu that can shatter
even mountain ranges.

45027.丘に見紛うほど大きく\n丸々と肥えたドラゴン。\n巨体で飛び跳ねて\nじひびきを:
A dragon so large and
round and fat that it
resembles a hill. It
jumps and generates ji-
hibiki with its huge
body.

45089.魔瘴が生みだした巨大な竜。\nやみわらし ましょううおとは\n比較にならない強さ:
A huge dragon created by
demon miasma, it is
incomparably stronger
than the Viper Spittle
Salamangler. Also known
as Dark Dragon.

45166.魔物へと変身をとげた兵士。\nバギムーチョの呪文をあやつり\nその暴走率も高い。:
A soldier who has
transformed into a
monster, he can use
Kaswooshle's spells and
has a high haywire rate.
He also excels at
attacks that take
advantage of his massive
size.

45242.おのれに敵対する者は\n何人たりとも見逃さず\nじひびきや れんごく火球で\n敵:
They attack the entire
enemy with jibiki and
brick fireballs, not
missing even those who
are hostile to them.

45309.古ガリアル洞をねぐらにする\n身体の大きなドラゴン。\n魔軍十二将にあこがれてお:
A large dragon that
roosts in Old Garial
Cave. He admires the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army and aspires
to become one of the
Thirteen Generals.

45385.タロットメダルで召喚され\nタロットパックを隠し持つ\n魔法の迷宮の変わり種。\:
A variant of Magic Maze
that is summoned by
Tarot Medal and has a
hidden TarotPack, the
battle is apparently a
test of luck.

45461.タロットメダルで召喚された\n魔法の迷宮の変わり種が\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
The variant of Magic
Maze summoned by Tarot
Medal is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

45531.数百年前に大罪を犯した\n金の亡者のなれの果て。\n死んだ後も金に執着し\n多く:
The end result of a
money man who committed
a great crime hundreds
of years ago. Even after
his death, he continued
to cling to his money
and take many lives.

45598.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ゴーレム。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
An evil golem with
extraordinary strength,
its red, piercing eyes
are filled with a fierce
intent to kill.

45658.いにしえよりテンオツ貴人に\n仕える美しく気高き獣。\n世界の陰と陽の均衡を保つ:
A beautiful and noble
beast that has served
Nobleman Tenotsu since
time immemorial. He is
always with Yang to
maintain the balance of
yin and yang in the
world.

45735.いにしえよりテンオツ貴人に\n仕える美しく気高き獣。\n世界の陰と陽の均衡を保つ:
A beautiful and noble
beast that has served
Nobleman Tenotsu since
time immemorial. It is
always with the Beast of
Yin to maintain the
balance of yin and yang
in the world.

45812.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な キラーマシン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Killing Machine
with extraordinary
strength, its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce intent to
kill.

45875.ゾンガロンの光を浴びて\n人の心を失い獣の姿になった\nドランド王国の兵士たち。:
Soldiers of the Drand
Kingdom who lost their
human hearts and took on
the form of beasts after
being exposed to the
light of Zongalon. They
attack as a swarm.

45952.でっかい王冠が ご自慢の\nスライム界に君臨する王様。\n大きく ふくれあがって:
The reigning king of the
Slime world boasts a
huge crown. It is a big,
bulging crown.

46020.温かな微笑みを浮かべる\nスライム界の美しき女王様。\n実態は氷のように冷酷で\:
A beautiful queen of the
Slime world with a warm
smile. In reality, she
is as ruthless as ice
and loves Kacrack.

46088.獲物を求め 永遠に動き続ける\n残虐な殺りくマシン。\n破壊に特化した設計によっ:
A brutal killing
machine, forever on the
move in search of prey.
Designed specifically
for destruction, it
attacks twice as
quickly.

46162.光沢のあるメタルボディに\n剣と弓をそなえた機械兵。\n４本足で機敏に動いては\:
A mechanical soldier
with a shiny metal body
and a sword and bow, he
moves agilely on four
legs and slashes
violently.

46233.キラーマシンに改良を重ね\n開発された 最新型マシン。\n弓や剣の攻撃だけではな:
The newest machine
developed by improving
on the Killing Machine,
it is not only powered
up with bow and sword
attacks, but also with
brutality!

46308.伐採同盟が森を切り開くため\n独自に調整をほどこした\n改造キラーマシン。\nす:
A modified Killing
Machine that the Logging
Alliance has modified to
cut through the forest,
quickly cutting down
trees twice.

46380.前回の敗北を糧にして\n強化された伐採マシン。\n大勢のレンジャーを相手に\n一:
The Choppin Machine,
strengthened by its
previous defeat, boasts
of a performance that
will not let it down
even a single step
against a large number
of rangers.

46450.ある戦い好きの大魔族が\n自らの練習相手とするため\n作らせたという機械兵士。\:
A mechanical soldier
created by a battle-
hungry great demon to
serve as a training
partner for himself. Its
high fighting ability is
well documented.

46524.ビーム攻撃を得意とする\n耐熱設計の施された\n高熱地帯用の戦闘マシン。\nマグ:
A combat machine for
high heat zones,
designed to withstand
the heat of Magma Blast.

46595.世界を愛で包み込む\n魔物界のトップセラピスト。\n心のこもったベホマズンで\n:
The top se Lapisto of
the MONSTER world, who
wraps the world in love.
He makes companionship
full of hearty beHomasn.

46662.その巨体に秘められた\nとんでもない経験値に魅せられ\n幾多の冒険者が追い求める:
The King of Metal, a
favorite of many
adventurers who pursue
him because of the
incredible experience
hidden in his huge body!

46737.悪魔のような翼の生えた\nトラに似た凶暴な魔獣。\n鋭い牙で かみつかれると\n:
A ferocious demon-like
winged beast similar to
a tiger. Its sharp fangs
paralyze the body when
it bites.

46806.闇にまぎれて襲いくる\n残忍なクロヒョウの魔物。\n獲物の不意をつき飛びかかり\:
A brutal black leopard
monster that attacks
under cover of darkness,
it pounces on its prey,
catching it off guard
and inflicting a fatal
wound.

46874.多くの英雄が その牙にかかり\n命を落としたとされる魔獣。\n翼を大きく広げて\:
A magical beast that is
said to have killed many
heroes by falling under
its fangs. It spreads
its wings wide and
creates a Kaswoosh.

46946.人食いと おそれられている\n血に飢えた野獣。\n捨て身のかまえをとって\n猛攻:
A bloodthirsty beast
feared as a cannibal.
They take a desperate
stance and attack
fiercely.

47012.クチからはなつ怪光線で\n人々の魂をうばいとる\n死神のような 黒い猛獣。\n全:
A black beast like a
reaper, which steals
people's souls with its
monstrous rays of light
emanating from its
mouth. There are three
of them in total.

47080.ワインレッドのボディに\n黄金のたてがみが生え\nニヒルな笑みから牙がのぞく\n:
He has a wine-red body
and a golden mane, and
his fangs peek out from
his grin.

47150.魔物たちの手によって\n土くれから作られた魔人。\n怒ると チカラをためまくって:
The demon is created
from clay by monsters,
and attacks with a
tremendous force.

47225.地底の氷塊から削りだされた\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n一気にハイテンションとな:
The monster that guards
the gates of the trial,
carved out of a block of
ice at the bottom of the
earth, becomes high-
strung at once and
crushes the challenger.

47300.魔物たちが 石を積みあげて\n作ったといわれる魔人。\nそのため 炎の呪文に強く:
It is said that monsters
piled up stones to
create this demon.
Therefore, they are not
afraid of being hit by
fire spells.

47374.全身が黄金でできている\nゴージャスな魔人。\nチカラをためた攻撃は強いが\n見:
A gorgeous demon whose
entire body is made of
gold. His attacks are
powerful, but if you
successfully defeat him,
you will be rewarded
with a large sum of
money.

47444.カルサドラ火山に降り立った\n魔鳥軍団の勇ましき長。\nかかげたスローガンは\n:
The brave chief of the
demon bird army descends
on Calsadora Volcano.
The slogan he bears is
"Fear Calsadora!

47514.人間の死肉を食らうという\n残忍で おそろしい魔鳥。\n鋭いツメで２回切り裂いて:
A brutal and horrifying
bird that feeds on the
dead flesh of humans. It
uses its sharp claws to
slice open the prey
twice to ensure its
capture.

47586.はるか上空から人間を狙う\n３つのタカの目を持った魔鳥。\nはげしいほのおをはい:
A demon bird with three
hawk eyes that targets
humans from far above.
It roasts its prey whole
with its fiery roar.

47659.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n知略に長ける彼だが\nいざ戦いとなれば そのツメ:
A former one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, Monster is a
man of great wisdom, but
when it comes time to
fight, he uses his claws
to cut through
everything in his path.

47734.魔法の迷宮に 封印された\n不死鳥ジャミラス。\n何者かの妖術により 強化され\:
Jamirus, a phoenix
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

47799.冥界より来たる凶悪な魔鳥。\nするどいツメも危険だが\nもっとも警戒すべきは\n:
A vicious evil bird from
the underworld. Its
sharp claws are
dangerous, but it is its
powerful dark magic that
we should be most wary
of.

47870.地獄の門が かたどられた\n大盾を手にしたモンスター。\n盾にほられた悪魔の顔が:
A monster holding a
large shield shaped like
the Gate of Hell; the
demon's face, pierced by
the shield, emits a
choking puff of smoke.

47945.旅人の前に立ちはだかる\nシールドオーガの王様。\nあやしいひとみで\n相手を深:
The king of Escudogre
stands before the
traveler. He puts his
opponents into a deep
sleep with his dubious
pupil.

48010.大きな盾を身がまえて\n鉄壁の守りを誇る魔人。\nシールドバッシュという技で\n:
A demon who boasts an
iron-clad defense with a
large shield on his
body. He uses a
technique called "Shield
Bash" to thrust at the
enemy.

48077.アガペイに導かれた世界で\n戦うことになった 謎の魔物。\n巨大な盾を駆使して\:
A mysterious monster who
fights in a world guided
by Agapei, he fights
valiantly using his huge
shield.

48143.地獄の門を開け閉めしてくれる\n礼儀正しい紳士な魔物。\n見かけによらぬ温厚な人:
A polite and gentlemanly
monster who opens and
closes the Gate of Hell,
he is as gentle as he
appears, but he will
barge in with his anger
and doors.

48222.攻防両面のバランスが優れた\n戦闘のプロフェッショナル。\n試練を与える存在とし:
A professional fighter
with an excellent
balance of both offense
and defense, he stands
in front of people as a
presence that gives them
a TRIAL.

48298.将来に悩んだシュリナの中に\n生まれた心の闇。やりきれない\n思いを ぐっとため:
The Dark Mind was born
in Shrina's troubled
future; beware of the
attacks that come out
after she has stored up
her unfulfilled
feelings.

48378.人間に強い恨みを抱く\n半獣半人の怪力王。\n巨大なオノを振り回し\n派手に暴れ:
A half-animal, half-
human monstrous king who
harbors a strong grudge
against human. He wields
a gigantic axe and is a
violent and flamboyant
figure.

48434.深い地底で生まれ育った\nチカラがすべての剛力王。\n怒って暴れはじめたら\n誰:
Born and raised in the
depths of the earth, he
is the king of all
power. When he gets
angry and starts to
rampage, no one can
handle him.

48502.チカラを求め 悪に魂を売った\nドワーフの変わり果てた姿。\n元が盗賊なので 見:
The transformed form of
Dwarf, who sold his soul
to evil in search of
power. As a former
"thief," he is even
lighter than he appears.

48577.もともとはウェナ諸島に棲む\nずしおうまるなのだが\n魔物商人ザルギスにより\n:
Originally a Sintaur
living in the Wena
Islands, it has been
enhanced for combat use
by the monster merchant
Zargis.

48648.暗黒の深海で生まれた\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nおおあばれで暴れまくり\nまわ:
A monster born in the
dark depths of the sea
who guards the gates of
the trial, he rampages
wildly and wipes out all
enemies in his path.

48715.おたけびで 敵をすくませ\n巨大なマサカリを振り回して\nおおあばれする。\nメ:
With a roar, it freezes
the enemy. Watch out for
Kafrizzle, too.

48784.氷のブレスを使いこなす\n俊足の青いドラゴン。\nときどき 敵を吹っ飛ばして\n:
An agile blue dragon
that uses ice breath.
Sometimes blows up
enemies and damages
them.

48850.クチから猛吹雪をはく\n二足歩行の恐竜。\n暴れまわって 周囲の敵に\n大打撃を:
A bipedal dinosaur that
blows a furious
snowstorm from its
mouth. It rampages
about, inflicting heavy
blows on surrounding
enemies.

48908.太古から 地獄に生息していた\n恐竜のモンスター。\nはげしいほのおをはいて\n:
A dinosaur monster that
has inhabited hell since
time immemorial. It
burns down its
surroundings with its
fiery fire.

48974.獲物を探して雪原をひた走る\n純白のドラゴン。\nかがやく息をはいて\nすべてを:
A pure white dragon runs
across the snowfield in
search of prey. It
freezes everything with
its glowing breath.

49038.ダークドレアムの 忠実なる\nしもべ。自在に 霧を操り\n終わりなき 殺りくの悪:
A faithful servant of
Nokturnus. Manipulating
the mists at will, he
brings his enemies to
the endless Decimating
Dream.

49107.白骨になったドラゴンが\n魔瘴のチカラで復活した。\nあの世で食らった魂を\n吹:
A white-boned dragon is
resurrected by the power
of demon miasma. The
souls of the dead are
transformed into a
blizzard and slathered
on the ground.

49177.骨になっても 怨念で動く\nドラゴンのしかばね。\n高い攻撃力と ＨＰを誇り\n:
Even when it becomes
bone, the dragon's
spring is powered by
resentment. It boasts of
high attack power and
HP, and can also
manipulate the breath of
a sparkling creature.

49243.かつてウェナ諸島に君臨した\n竜の魔物の なれの果て。\n自分を倒した戦士の血を:
He is the last of the
dragon monsters who once
reigned over the Wena
Islands. He is after the
life of Rubecca, who is
the blood descendant of
the warrior who defeated
him.

49319.おぞましき闇のチカラが\n勇者に敗れたバラモスに宿り\nしかばねが動きだした。\:
The horrifying power of
darkness has moved into
Baramos, where Hero has
been defeated. The
adventurer awaits in the
depths of the labyrinth.

49393.洞くつの奥深くに潜む\nヌーのような 巨大な魔獣。\n怒ると じひびきを起こし\:
A giant gnoll-like beast
that lurks in the depths
of the cave, it creates
an "angry" sound that
brings chaos to
travelers.

49465.魔界を根城としている\n超重量級の魔獣。\nその歩みを止めようとする者は\n彼の:
A super-heavy demonic
beast that has Demon
World as its stronghold.
Anyone who tries to stop
its progress will fall
prey to his War Cry.

49535.冥府から現れた大怪獣。\nおぞましい のろいのきりや\nやみのブレスをはいて\n:
A great monster that
appears from Hell. It's
wearing the horrifying
Kiriyami no Kiri Yami no
Breath and it's a
hellfire!

49603.人間が生まれる前から\n存在した いにしえの魔獣。\n不用意に近づいた相手を\n:
Ancient magical beast
that existed before
humans were born. It has
the habit of striking an
opponent who approaches
it unintentionally.

49672.もともとはウェナ諸島に棲む\nヌーデビルの生き残り。\n魔物商人ザルギスの新技術:
Originally a survivor of
the Gnucifer that
inhabited the Wena
Islands, it has been
modified for combat with
new technology from the
monster merchant Zargis.

49748.トガス岩道で幅を利かせる\n巨大な牛型の魔物。\nその大きな身体を活かし\nパワ:
A huge bull-shaped
monster that dominates
Togas Rock Road, it uses
its large body to launch
powerful attacks.

49818.猛吹雪に襲われ 凍え死んだ\n多種多様な獣たちの骨が集まり\n竜の姿をマネて動き:
The bones of a wide
variety of beasts,
frozen to death by the
blizzard, gathered
together and took on the
form of a dragon. The
breath freezes
everything in its path.

49900.魂を得て 魔物となった\nしかめっ面の石像。\nランドインパクトで\n大地を震わ:
A frowning stone statue
that has gained a soul
and become a monster,
shaking the earth with
its Crackerwhack.

49957.火山の岩を削りだし\n呪術師たちが作りあげた\nいかめしい岩石の魔物。\nその鼻:
A monster of ragged
rocks carved out of
volcanic rock and
created by sorcerers,
whose snarl becomes a
fire.

50022.奇妙なメイクをほどこした\n巨大な顔の魔物。\n道化師のような 多彩な技で\n敵:
A giant-faced monster
with a strange make-up,
it uses a variety of
clown-like techniques to
terrorize its enemies.

50086.賢者ホーローが用意した\n破邪の秘技会得のための試練。\nなげきのさけびによって:
A trial for acquiring
the Sacred Skill
prepared by Sage Hollow,
which nullifies the
player's attack with a
nageki no sakka (a cry
of a nageki).

50162.大きな武器を自在に振るい\nなにものをも恐れることなく\n立ちはだかる試練のケモ:
Wielding large weapons
at will, the animals of
TRIAL stand tall and
unafraid. Face them with
courage!

50240.鋭い武器をたくみにあやつり\n何度ヒザをついても 果敢に\n立ちはだかる試練のケ:
The trial beasts, which
skillfully wield sharp
weapons, boldly stand up
to you no matter how
many times you kneel
down. Face them with
courage!

50318.召喚符によって呼び出される\n獣鬼たちの王のひとり。\n大地の霊力をあやつり\n:
One of the kings of
beast demons summoned by
a summoner's charm. He
manipulates the
spiritual power of the
earth and crushes his
enemies who stand in his
way.

50391.悪魔を模した石像に\n魂が宿り 動きだした。\nマヒャドを唱えて\n敵の身体を粉:
A stone statue in the
likeness of a demon is
animated by its soul; it
chants Kacrack and
crushes the enemy's
body.

50449.大きな翼をひるがえし\n地上に降り立った悪魔。\n爆発の呪文を唱えて\n破滅をも:
A demon flaps its large
wings and lands on the
ground, looking forward
to bringing ruin by
casting an explosion
spell.

50516.邪悪な呪術師たちによって\n生を受けた彫像。\n心まで凍りつかせる\nすさまじい:
A statue brought to life
by evil sorcerers. It
breathes a tremendous
breath that chills even
the heart.

50577.この悪魔に にらまれたら\n身体がマヒして\n動けなくなってしまう。\n人の心に:
If this demon were to
attack you, your body
would be paralyzed and
you would not be able to
move. Dread Incarnate
lurks in the human mind.

50642.フードの男が赤色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\n血の色にも似た 赤き翼で:
A beast demon of the
other world summoned by
Hooded Man with a red
spell. It is said that
its red wings, similar
to the color of blood,
bring cruel death to its
enemies.

50717.魔軍十二将 参謀総長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n禁忌の秘術を 葬り去:
As Chief of Staff of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, he served
Immortal Demon King
Nerodos and infiltrated
the castle disguised as
a human in order to
destroy the forbidden
secret arts.

50793.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ドラゴンゾンビ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil dragon zombie
with extraordinary
strength and a fierce,
murderous intent in its
red, piercing eyes.

50857.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な しのどれい。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Dead Resident
with extraordinary
strength, his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

50918.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ギガンテス。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Gigantes with
extraordinary strength
and a fierce, murderous
intent in his red,
piercing eyes.

50979.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ベリアル。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Belial, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must be
on one's guard.

51042.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ベリアル。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Belial, sealed away as
an immortal in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

51110.クチから巨大な火の玉をはき\nすさまじい雷を巻き起こして\n人々に恐怖を植えつけ:
A brutal demon who
follows the Netherlord.

51189.姿を見た者は生きて帰れない\nそんな逸話を持つ大悪魔。\nイオナズンを唱えた後に:
It is said that not even
Chiri will remain after
the Kaboom is chanted.

51265.巨大なスプーンを手にした\nスイーツ好きの大悪魔。\n同族の悪魔の中では慈悲深く:
A large demon with a
giant spoon in his hand
and a love of sweets, he
is known as a benevolent
and personable person
among the demons of his
tribe.

51338.魔軍十二将 侍従長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n勇者と盟友を もてなす:
As the 12 generals of
the Demon Army, he
served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as his
chief of staff and
prepared for an
exceptional battle to
entertain Hero and his
allies.

51414.アタマは悪いがチカラは強い\nふとっちょで乱暴な巨人。\n攻撃を空振りしているす:
A big, brawny, violent
giant with a bad head
but strong strength.
Hurry up and defeat it
while it is swinging
away from your
attackers.

51490.トロルたちを束ねる\n凶悪かつ乱暴な 巨人の長。\n高い確率で痛恨の一撃を\nは:
A vicious and violent
giant chief who unites
the Trolls. Be careful
of the high probability
of The Painful Strike.

51559.太古より息づいてきた\nトロル王家の末裔。\n痛恨の一撃を食らったら\n死を覚悟:
Descendants of the Troll
royal family that has
lived since time
immemorial, be prepared
to die if you are hit by
The Painful Strike.

51618.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n見た目に反して紳士的で\n戦いは好まないらしい。:
A former one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, Monster is,
contrary to his
appearance, a gentleman
and does not like to
fight. However, his blow
is deadly.

51694.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし トロルバッコス。\n何者かの妖術により:
The Gladiator Troll,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
enhanced by someone's
sorcery and reappears in
the labyrinth.

51767.自称 乙女系トロル。\nだが怒らせた時のパワーは\nすさまじく 並のトロルなど\:
A self-proclaimed
"Maiden Troll," she is
an incarnation of
violence that is no
match for the average
Troll, and her power
when angered is
astonishing.

51839.魔軍十二将の中核をなす魔物。\nその戦闘力は すこぶる高く\nひとりで ある王国:
The core of the Twelve
Generals of the Demon
Army, the monster is so
powerful in battle that
he single-handedly drove
a kingdom's army to the
brink of destruction.

51916.鉄柱をへし折る怪力が自慢の\n凶悪な ひとつ目巨人。\n丸太の棍棒をブン回し\n:
This vicious one-eyed
giant boasts the
strength to snap steel
poles. It aims at The
Painful Strike by
swinging a log rod.

51986.つぶされた旅人は数知れず。\n情けを持たぬ悪魔の巨人。\nむやみに近づく旅人は\:
Countless travelers
crushed. A demon giant
with no mercy. Travelers
who approach him
recklessly are wiped out
with a Crackerwhack.

52062.魔軍十二将の中核をなす魔物。\nとにかくチカラ持ちで\nその棍棒は大地も砕く。\:
A monster who forms the
core of the Twelve
Generals of the Demon
Army, he is a powerful
man whose rod can
shatter the earth.
However, his nappy seems
to be weak.

52135.星のない夜のように\n真っ黒な ひとつ目の巨人。\nかつてのサテラの罪の意識が\:
A one-eyed giant as
black and true as a
starless night. A
MONSTER born of the
guilt of Satella's
former life.

52207.目に入るもの すべてを\nその棍棒で たたきつぶし\n笑みを浮かべるという。\n:
It is said that he
smiles as he crushes
everything in sight with
his club. An evil giant
who follows the
Netherlord.

52278.黄金で作られた人形が\n神秘の呪文により命を得た。\n巨大なオノを振りおろし\n:
A puppet made of gold
comes to life through a
mystical spell. He
swings his huge axe and
swats away anyone who
gets in his way.

52348.時空を超えて現れる\nおぞましい伝説の魔人。\nマヒャデドスを唱え\nすべてを凍:
A legendary and
terrifying figure that
transcends time and
space, he casts
Kacrackle to freeze
everything in place.

52415.あらゆる悪魔が足もとに\nひれ伏すとされる邪教の神。\nメラガイアーで獄炎に包み:
A pagan god to whom all
demons are said to bow
down at his feet, he
wraps them in flames
with his Kafrizzle and
exterminates all living
things.

52491.大オノを自在に振り回し\n烈風の呪文をたたきつけ\n近付く者を地獄送りにする\n:
A strange, emerald-
colored demi-god who
freely wields a large
axe and sends anyone who
gets close to him to
hell.

52565.武闘派に見せかけた姿とは\n裏腹に 呪文の奥義を極めた\n知勇兼備の試練のケモノ:
Despite the appearance
of a martial artist, he
is an intelligent and
courageous trial animal
who has mastered the
secrets of the spell.
Use your wisdom to see
through them and turn
them away!

52640.白銀の身体と金の髪を持つ\n美しき 戦いの魔人。\nまばゆく輝く金色のオノで\n:
A beautiful fighting
demon with a silvery-
white body and golden
hair. With her shining
golden axe, she cuts to
pieces anyone who
opposes her.

52713.かつて 研究者デルクロアを\nこき使った 巨人の魔物。\nその巨体から くりださ:
The giant monster that
once abused the
researcher Delcroix,
whose blows from his
huge body can shatter
even giant rocks.

52784.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし アトラス。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Sealed as an immortal in
the Magic Maze, Atlas is
weakened by sorcery, but
one must not let one's
guard down.

52847.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし アトラス。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Atlas, sealed away in
the Magic Maze as an
immortal, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

52915.巨大な身体をゆらしながら\n手にした棍棒で すべてを\nたたきつぶす凶悪な魔物。:
Also known as a "blue
monster," he is a
vicious monster who
crushes everything with
a rod in his hand while
shaking his huge body.

52987.巨大な棍棒を振り回し\n相手を地面に たたきつける\nどっしりした 凶暴な鬼神。:
A stout and ferocious
demigod who wields a
huge rod and self-honed
his opponents to the
ground. He is extremely
powerful.

53059.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n破壊の権化と言われ\n目に付くもの すべてを壊す:
Monster, one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, is said to
be a destroyer and
destroys everything in
sight. Sometimes even
his allies were
sacrificed.

53137.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ギーグハンマー。\n何者かの妖術により:
Giga Clubber, sealed
away as an immortal in
the Magic Maze, is
enhanced by someone's
sorcery and reigns once
again in the innermost
depths of the labyrinth.

53218.ある男の謀略で闘争本能が\n暴走したギーグハンマー。\n狂乱のままにハンマーを振:
Giga Clubber's fighting
instincts run wild as he
wields his hammer in a
frenzy, destroying
everything in sight.

53298.春 芽吹いたばかりの\n樹木から生まれた精霊。\nかわいらしい姿で現れて\n旅人:
Spring A spirit born
from a newly budding
tree. They appear in a
cute form and make
travelers feel at home.

53362.まるい身体が かわいらしい\n草原に暮らす木の精霊。\n頭に生えた 赤い葉っぱを:
A tree spirit living in
a meadow with a cute
round body. The red
leaves on her head are
very precious to her.

53433.フワフワと かわいらしく\nさそうおどりをしてきたり\nザオラルを唱えてくる。\:
They are cute and fluffy
and do Sultry Dance and
chant Zing. They say
they make you happy when
you see them.

53505.身体がモコモコした精霊。\n見た目によらず好戦的で\n爆発の呪文 イオを唱え\n:
A spirit with a fuzzy
body. Despite its
appearance, it is
belligerent and attacks
you by chanting "spell
bang," an explosion.

53574.おにこぞうが修行の末に成長し\n鬼神のごとき強さとなった。\n規格外の体格を活か:
Pickayune has grown up
through training to
become as strong as a
demigod. He uses his
out-of-this-world
physique to crush his
enemies with The Painful
Strike.

53653.雪がふるとたまに現れる妖精。\nピョンピョン跳ねて楽しげだが\n炎の呪文を使う魔:
A fairy that sometimes
appears when snow falls.
She is always jumping up
and down and looks
happy, but she is always
wary of mage, who uses
fire spells, because she
is not very good at it.

53736.魔軍十二将 滅殺隊長として\n不死の魔王に 仕え\n古グランゼドーラ城下町を\n:
As the leader of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, he served
the immortal Demon King
and raided the Old Gran
Zedora Castle with his
men.

53804.かわいいプクリポちゃんと\n仲良くなりたかっただけの\n心優しき巨人のひとり。\:
One of the kind-hearted
giants who just wanted
to be friends with cute
Puk Lipo-chan. He is the
oldest of the 3brothers.

53875.かわいいプクリポちゃんと\n仲良くなりたかっただけの\n心優しき巨人のひとり。\:
One of the kind-hearted
giants who just wanted
to be friends with the
cute Puku Lipo-chan. He
is one of the 3brothers
of the Titans.

53945.かわいいプクリポちゃんと\n仲良くなりたかっただけの\n心優しき巨人のひとり。\:
One of the kind-hearted
giants who just wanted
to be friends with the
cute Puk Lipo-chan. He
is the youngest of the
3brothers.

54015.まくらを抱えて現れる\nいやらしい目つきの魔獣。\n旅人を眠らせ\nその夢を食べ:
A nasty-looking monster
beast that appears with
a pillow in its arms. It
is said to put travelers
to sleep and eat their
dreams.

54076.まくらを投げつけ\n旅人を強制的に眠らせる。\n夢の世界から やってきた\nいか:
It throws a pillow at
the traveler and forces
him to sleep. A
disreputable specter
from the dream world.

54139.夢の世界から やってきた\n闇を操る 邪悪な夢魔。\nコイツが投げる まくらに\:
An evil dreamer who
manipulates the darkness
from the dream world. If
you are hit by a tail
that he throws, you will
be cursed.

54209.真紅のまくらを手にした\nおそろしい悪夢の化身。\n魅惑のおどりとラリホーマで\:
true A terrifying
nightmare incarnate with
a red pillow in its
hands. She creates a
whirlwind of chaos with
her enchanting dance and
kasnooze.

54280.グリーターデーモンのおともを\nしている上位種の夢魔。\nまくらは寝るためではな:
A higher level dreamer
who accompanies Greeter
Daemon. He has a pillow
not for sleeping, but as
a weapon.

54359.悪名高き錬金術師が\n冥府から よみがえった姿。\n進化の秘法のために\nある二:
The infamous alchemist
has risen from the Hell.
He is in pursuit of a
certain duo for the
secret of evolution.

54425.闇の法と秩序を守ることに\n誓いを立てた悪霊の騎士。\n手にした盾を守りだけでな:
A knight of evil spirits
sworn to uphold the law
and order of darkness.
He may use the SHIELD in
his hand not only for
defense but also for
offense.

54501.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の一角。\n魔族という種の根源:
An ancient demon sealed
in Galatea's God Spear
500 years ago, this
creature is close to the
root of the demon
species and possesses
overwhelming explosive
power.

54582.大きな帽子を深くかぶった\nイノシシ魔物のルーキー。\n戦いになると おびえてし:
A wild boar monster
rookie with a big hat on
his head. When he gets
into a fight, he gets
frightened and wraps
himself in his hat to
protect himself.

54660.死んだ魔法使いの魂が\nお気に入りの帽子に宿り\n野良イノシシを 操っている。\:
The soul of a dead mage
inhabits his favorite
hat and controls a stray
boar. Beware of his
specialty, Bang.

54729.禁忌の錬金術を身につけた\nいまわしい ブタの魔物。\nやみのブレスや呪いのきり:
A monster of a hideous
pig who wears forbidden
alchemy, he brings
misfortune to the world
with his magical
bracelets and cursed
kiris.

54801.お気に入りの帽子をかぶり\n世界をさすらう ブタの魔物。\n小さい身体に炎をため:
Wearing his favorite
hat, Monster the pig
wanders the world,
storing flames in his
tiny body and slinging
them about at every
opportunity.

54879.巨大なビッグハットの姿をした\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nイオナズンを使いこなす:
A monster guarding the
gates of TRIAL in the
form of a giant Sham
Hatwitch, he has evolved
into a big player in
attacking methods,
including mastery of the
Kaboom!

54956.もみじの葉のような妖怪。\n仲間を集めて襲いかかり\n攻撃しても ひらひら避けて:
A demon that looks like
a maple leaf, it gathers
companions and attacks
them, but they flutter
away and are hard to
hit.

55026.枯れ果てたイチョウの木から\n生まれた まだら模様の妖怪。\n下駄の音で仲間を呼:
A speckled yokai born
from a withered ginkgo
tree. It attacks by
calling companions with
the sound of its clogs,
and by gathering its
power.

55101.たくさんの雪の結晶が集まり\n邪悪な魔物と化した。\n氷の呪文 ヒャドを連発する:
Many snowflakes gathered
and turned into an evil
monster. A snowbound
ruffian who fires a
series of ice spell
cracks.

55168.アロエから生まれた子鬼。\nタップダンスで身を軽くし\n怒ると テンションを上げ:
A demon born from aloe,
it attacks with a high
tension when it is
lightened by Tap Dance
and angrily.

55238.舞い落ちた桜の花びらに\n美に魅せられた邪鬼が宿った。\n魅惑のおどりで旅人を魅:
The petals of the cherry
blossoms that fell down
in the air were
inhabited by an evil
spirit enchanted by
beauty. The evil demon,
enchanted by the beauty
of the fallen cherry
petals, enchants
travelers with its
enchanting dance, and
gathers up its power to
attack them.

55319.もうどくのきりで敵を弱らせ\nやいばのぼうぎょで時間を稼ぐ\nいやらしい戦法の使:
He is a master of the
nasty tactics of
weakening the enemy with
a deadly kiri and buying
time with a pincushion.
He is known for his bad
character.

55473.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な もみじこぞう。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Leafy Larrikin
is a man of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

55536.俊足自慢のメタルスライムが\n積み重なって 速さも３倍！\nメラストームをはなっ:
Metal Slime, which
boasts of its speed and
agility, piles up and
triples its speed!

55609.３匹の仲良しスライムが\nなんとなく積み重なった。\nチカラを合わせて\nスライ:
Three friendly Slime are
somehow piled up. They
joined forces to send
down a SlimeShower.

55679.セレブなスライムが結託し\n金ピカな記念タワーとなった。\n倒すと ちょっぴり\:
Celebrity Slime colluded
to create a gilded
memorial tower. When you
knock it down, you will
feel a little rich.

55751.桃色スライム３人娘が結成した\n魔物界のアイドルユニット。\n十八番の ももいろ:
The three girls of
Momoiro Slime formed
this idol unit in the
monster world. Their
performance of Momoiro
Shower is sure to bring
tears to the eyes of
fans!

55835.かつては祝い事をつかさどる\n神官だったが 道を踏み外し\n妖怪となってしまった:
Once a priest in charge
of celebrations, he has
gone astray and become a
monster. He is good at
recovery spells.

55907.愛用のさすまたをぶん回す\nこしゃくな妖怪小僧。\n時折くりだしてくる\n回転キ:
A shambling little
monster who twirls his
beloved wand. Watch out
for his occasional
spinning kicks!

55974.すべてを灰にするため\n地獄から送られた 大妖怪。\n天地のかまえを使って\n相:
A great demon sent from
hell to reduce
everything to ashes, it
uses Counter Wait to
wait for its opponent's
attack.

56044.派手なかっこうをして\n荒々しく立ち回る妖怪。\nザオラルやベホマラーで\n仲間:
A specter that wears
flashy clothes and
stands wildly, it fights
while helping its
companion with Zing and
Multiheal.

56111.あなうめ三兄弟の長男。\n好きな色は青。\n得意のグレイブホールで\n相手の動き:
He is the eldest son of
Anaume Sanbrothers. His
favorite color is blue.
His specialty is Grave
Hole, which stops the
opponent's movement.

56172.あなうめ三兄弟の次男。\n好きな色は緑。\nバトルが大好きで\nとにかくケンカっ:
He is the second son of
the three Anaume
brothers, and his
favorite color is green.
His favorite color is
green, and he loves
battles and is always
ready to fight.

56230.あなうめ三兄弟の末妹。\n好きな色は赤。\n得意のグレイブホールで\n相手の動き:
She is the youngest
sister of Anaume
Sanbrothers. Her
favorite color is red.
Her specialty is Grave
Hole, which stops the
opponent's movement.

56291.魔法の迷宮に住んでいる\nふくびきの精霊。\n倒すことができれば報酬の\nふくび:
Lottery spirits live in
Magic Maze. If you can
defeat it, you will be
rewarded with more
Lottery Tickets.

56359.人形のように結ばれた\nロープのモンスター。\n細い身体で しめあげては\n回転:
A rope monster tied like
a doll. It shime them
with its thin body, and
then attempts a spinning
bread punch.

56428.狭い隙間から スルッと現れる\nヒモ魔物のヒーロー。\nかたいロープを投げつけ\:
A pimp-monster hero
slips through a narrow
opening. He throws a
hard rope at you, making
you unable to move.

56501.かまってほしくて絡んでくる\nいたずらっこのモンスター。\nハンマーで攻撃してき:
A mischievous monster
that wants to be cared
for, it attacks with a
hammer or shackles you
with a rope.

56579.大魔王に反旗をひるがえす\n魔界解放軍のリーダー。\n特別な魔瘴石のチカラを使い:
Leader of the Demon
World Liberation Army,
who is rebelling against
the Great Demon King. He
uses the power of the
special demon miasma
stone to take the Great
Demon King's place.

56649.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な サイレス。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
The evil Gryphon has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

56709.幾多の罪なき命を奪い続け\n悪に染まりきったトロル。\n自らをバイキルトで強化し:
Troll, steeped in evil
after taking so many
innocent lives,
strengthens himself with
Oomphle and crushes his
opponents with The
Painful Strike.

56786.強力な用心棒の陰に隠れており\n本人はなかなか姿を見せない\n謎多き魔物界の仙人:
A mysterious hermit of
the monster world who
hides behind powerful
bouncers and is rarely
seen in person. He has a
reputation for his
excellent handwriting.

56865.竹やりをかまえた謎の兵士。\n仲間同士で おうえんしあい\n竹林を荒らそうとする:
A mysterious soldier
with a bamboo sledge, he
tries desperately to pin
down those who are
trying to destroy the
bamboo grove by egging
on each other's
companion.

56943.明かりを灯して 戦場を照らす\nたけやりへいの足軽隊長。\nガチャガチャと走り寄:
A Bambooligan foot
soldier captain who
lights up the
battlefield with his
lights. He can run up to
a mess and suddenly blow
himself up.

57019.ハイカラな旗印を背負った\nたけやり族のトリックスター。\nさみだれ突きや自爆な:
A trickster of the
Bamboo Spear tribe, he
is fond of flashy tricks
such as multithrust and
self-destruction.

57096.黄金に輝くヨロイは\nたけやりへいの将たる証。\n部下たちを鼓舞しては\n大合戦:
The golden armor is the
symbol of Bambooligan's
leadership. He inspires
his men and wages great
battles.

57161.たけやりへいの軍団を率いて\n竹林に割拠する大勢力の長。\n呼びだした大勢の仲間:
He is the head of a
large force of
Bambooligans that occupy
the bamboo forests with
their legions. He
defends himself by using
the many companions he
has summoned as a wall.

57237.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な キングスライム。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil King Slime has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

57301.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ポイズントリル。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Poison Trill
has an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a murderous intent.

57365.モコモコした泡の身体が\nかわいいゴースト。\nおとなしそうに見えて\n意外に攻:
A cute Ghost with a
fuzzy, foamy body, it
looks docile but is
surprisingly aggressive.

57427.紫色のボディに ため込んだ\n毒気をはいて攻撃してくる。\n姿かたちは愛らしいが:
It attacks with its
purple body, which is
filled with poisonous
air. It has a lovely
appearance, but inside
it is a poisonous evil
spirit.

57497.お菓子好きの魔女によって\n偶然 生みだされた魔物。\nたまに かえんの息をはく:
A monster created by
chance by a witch who
loves sweets, she
sometimes emits a faint
breath of air, but she
does so out of instinct
and not malice.

57573.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\nいたずらジャーミィの幻影。\n本物:
A phantom of Naughty
Jamii that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

57642.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\nいたずらバーティの幻影。\n本物よ:
A phantom of Naughty
Berti that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

57709.農作物を盗んで生活している\n道を外れた 野良ウサギ。\n修羅場をくぐって身につ:
A stray rabbit who makes
a living by stealing
farm products, his
specialty is drop-
kicking, which he
learned by going through
a carnage field.

57785.この世の酸いも甘いも\nかみ分けた ウサギの魔物。\n敵を倒すためならば\n捨て:
A rabbit monster who has
experienced both the
sweet and sour sides of
this world, he is
willing to take a lethal
strike to defeat his
enemies.

57854.元は ふくめんバニーだったが\n闇の修行を経て 黒い身体に。\n強烈な格闘ワザを:
Originally a Rottontail,
he has been trained in
the dark and now has a
black body. He is a
merciless Assassin of
the plains, who performs
powerful fisticuffs.

57931.決め技は ばくれつけん。\n……ということ以外 すべてが\n謎のベールに包まれた:
The masked man's
identity is shrouded in
mystery, except for the
fact that his signature
move is Multifists.

58002.ちょっぴり いたずら好きな\nウサギの女の子。\nバーティと すごく仲良しで\n:
A little mischievous
bunny girl who is very
good friends with Berti
and loves Jamu.

58068.ちょっぴり いたずら好きな\nウサギの女の子。\nジャーミィと すごく仲良しで\:
A little mischievous
bunny girl who gets
along great with Jammy
and loves butter.

58136.人間に倒された魔物の骨に\n魂が宿り よみがえった\nアンデッドのモンスター。\:
An undead monster whose
soul was resurrected
from the bones of a
monster killed by a
human. It attacks with a
curse.

58208.目の奥から はなたれる\n魅惑の視線に とりつかれると\n彼女の手足として操られ:
The alluring gaze that
flashes from the depths
of his eyes haunts him,
and he is manipulated
into becoming her pawn.
She is proud of her pink
body.

58285.邪悪な魔法使いが死んで\n空飛ぶ魔物と化した。\nメラミ ヘナトスなど\n呪文攻:
The evil mage is dead
and turned into a flying
monster, watch out for
Frizzle Blunt and other
spell attacks.

58349.冥界を飛びまわるといわれる\n邪悪なコウモリの魔物。\n呪い攻撃やボミオスで\n:
A monster of an evil bat
that is said to fly spin
the underworld, it
attacks by weakening you
with its curse attack
and declatle.

58422.ほねコウモリ戦隊を率いる\n赤きリーダーが帰還！\n魅惑のまなざしで魅了し\n必:
The red leader of the
Bat Skeleton squadron
returns! He charms you
with his enchanting gaze
and finishes you off
with his deadly Swoosh!

58495.獲物を混乱させて襲いかかる\n砂漠に棲む 鳥の魔物。\n相手が強いと自慢の俊足で:
A desert-dwelling bird
monster that confuses
its prey and then
attacks.

58564.すばやい動きが特徴の\nスミをはきだす 鳥モンスター。\nまれに くりだしてくる:
A swiftly moving,
smearing bird monster.
Beware of the rare
Assassin's Attack.

58638.クチバシに猛毒を持つ\n気性のあらい氷鳥。\n美しい羽毛に身体を包み\nおたけび:
A rough-tempered ice
bird with a deadly
poison for Kuchiba shi.
It wraps its body in
beautiful feathers and
frightens you with its
War Cry.

58705.森林の鳥魔物たちのドン。\nベホイミやザオリクで\n仲間をいやす その姿から\n:
Don of forest bird
monsters, also called
green angel because of
its appearance of
healing companion by
midheal and kazing.

58775.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ぬすっとウサギ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Robber Rabbit
is a powerful,
unbelievably strong
animal with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

58839.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ボーンバット。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Bone Bat has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce intent to kill.

58902.アズラン地方に住まう土着神。\n冷静沈着だが流されやすい\n温泉の神さまのひとり:
He is an indigenous god
living in Azlan Region.
He is one of the gods of
the warm fountain, calm
and collected but easily
influenced. He controls
the power of water.

58978.アズラン地方に住まう土着神。\n怒りっぽいが豪快で気のいい\n温泉の神さまのひと:
He is an indigenous god
living in Azlan Region.
He is one of the gods of
the warm fountain who is
angry, but dynamic and
good-natured. He is in
charge of the power of
fire.

59055.魔軍十二将 支援隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n魔王軍兵士の士気高揚:
He served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as a
support captain and
contributed greatly to
raising the morale of
the Demon King's
soldiers.

59123.竜神の世界へ侵入せし者を\n排除する ナドラガの守護者。\nテンションアップから:
Within Nadraga, the
protector of Nadraga,
who eliminates those who
invade Nadraga. A blow
from the tension up dyes
the blue void with the
color of blood.

59204.こうらのようなヨロイを\n身につけた異形の兵士。\n特殊なガード技によって\n物:
A soldier of unusual
shape wearing a kora-
like armor. They use a
special guard technique
to prevent physical
attacks to some extent.

59274.カラフルなツノをかかげた\n魔物のシャーマン。\n砂を巻き上げ 炎を起こし\n儀:
A monster shaman with a
colorful horn. He raises
sand, creates flames,
and engages in
ritualistic combat.

59341.闇に溶けるような迷彩を持ち\n音もなく襲いくる機械兵。\n暗黒のきりは深い闇を呼:
Machine soldiers attack
without a sound, with
camouflage that seems to
dissolve in the
darkness. Their dark
kiri call for deep
darkness to disorient
and weaken travelers.

59417.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n手にした巨大なマラカスは\n武器にも楽器にもなる:
A former one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, he carries a
huge maracas in his hand
that can be used as both
a weapon and an
instrument. He is good
at raising tension.

59500.王となる王家の男を試すため\n最後の男王ラーディスが\n石版と共に遺した からく:
A trick left by Ladis,
the last male king,
along with a tablet to
test the man of the
royal family who would
become king. He is good
at raising the tension.

59579.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されしバトルシェイカー。\n何者かの妖術により:
Maracaraider, sealed up
immortal in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

59653.地面から のそっと出てきて\n眠りや呪いの攻撃をする。\n紅玉の指輪をはめた そ:
It slithers out of the
ground and attacks with
sleep or curses. The
hand that wears the ring
of red jade seems to
belong to a dead witch.

59733.水晶のように透きとおった\n妖しくも美しい 腕の魔物。\n時折 コープスフライを:
A beautiful and
bewitching monster with
arms as transparent as
crystal, it occasionally
calls upon Flying Corpse
to transform the battle
situation.

59807.たまに しりょうのきしを呼び\nベホイミで回復させながら\n骨のずいまで利用する:
Sometimes he calls
Skeleton Soldier to heal
him with Midheal and use
him to the bone. A
monster with a high-
spirited personality.

59883.ディバインスペルを使いつつ\n仲間を呼びだす 悪魔の手。\n中指に はめられた指:
The hand of a demon that
invokes companion while
using anathematise.
Summoned by the magic of
the ring on the middle
finger.

59957.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な トンブレロ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Ham Shamwitch
has an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

60018.美しい姿で人間を魅了し\n意のままにあやつる人形。\nあやつるのに飽きると今度は:
A doll that charms
humans with its
beautiful appearance and
manipulates them at
will. When he gets tired
of manipulating the
doll, he will spray it
with a frightening
spray.

60094.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ギガントヒルズ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
An evil Drakularge of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce intent to
kill.

60158.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ドロヌーバ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
An evil Mudraker of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce intent to
kill.

60219.草木の中に身をひそめ\nヨロイで身を固めた昆虫。\n隠し持ったキャノン砲で\n大:
Insects hide in the
grass and trees and are
covered with armor. They
inflict heavy damage
with their hidden
cannons.

60289.攻撃力を下げたり 毒に冒す\nイヤな液体をはなってくる\nカマキリの殺し屋。\n:
Ka Makiri's assassins
spray an unpleasant
liquid that lowers
attack power and poisons
the body. He targets
travelers under the
cover of darkness.

60360.閃光弾やキャノン砲を装備した\n色あざやかな身体をした昆虫。\n怒りレーダーも搭:
Insects with colorful
bodies equipped with
flashbangs and cannons.
It is also equipped with
an angry radar, which
locks Kuon on enemies
who react to it.

60442.魔物によって殺人マシンに\n改造された 凶暴なカマキリ。\nいきなり閃光弾をはな:
Makiri is a ferocious
squid, converted into a
killing machine by
monster, who suddenly
fires a flashbang to
dazzle the viewer.

60514.ビビッドな白黒模様がまぶしい\nマシン化されたカマキリ。\nキャノン砲と そこか:
Ka Makiri is a Dazzling
machine with vivid
black-and-white
patterns; watch out for
the cannon cannon and
the flashbulbs it fires.

60590.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な グリーンシザー。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
Evil Green Scissors are
exceptionally strong,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

60654.巨大なサルのような姿だが\nドラゴンだという説もある。\n呪文も使うが腕力に\n:
It looks like a giant
ape, but some say it is
a dragon, and although
it uses spells, it seems
to prefer to use force.

60795.地獄の音楽を奏でたせいで\n魂が汚れてしまった指揮者。\n彼がくりだす呪文の数々:
A conductor whose soul
has been tainted by
playing the music of
hell. The numerous
spells he produces
create an abnormal
harmony.

60874.世間から認められず死んだ\n不遇な音楽家が魔物と化した。\nあやしげなサウンドを:
An unfortunate musician
who died without public
recognition has turned
into a monster. He tries
to manipulate his
listeners by playing
dubious sounds.

60951.血と音楽をこよなく愛する\n芸術家きどりの大悪魔。\nさまざまな技を自在に操り\:
A great demon who loves
blood and music, he
freely manipulates a
variety of techniques to
beautifully color the
scourge.

61022.魔王に忠誠を捧げ\n身の回りの世話をする悪魔。\nザオラルをたしなみ\n細やかな:
A demon who is loyal to
the Demon King and takes
care of his personal
belongings, he enjoys
playing Zing and shows
great attention to
detail.

61087.ミラクルゾーンを覚えるため\nリュナンを誘拐した\n強大にして残忍な魔術師。\n:
A powerful and brutal
magician who kidnapped
Lunan in order to learn
the 0 Zone, he has an
insatiable appetite to
become stronger.

61160.冥界の首なし騎士。\nバイキルトで強化してから\nふりまわされる鉄球は\n多くの:
A headless knight of the
underworld, the iron
ball that has been
pretended since its
reinforcement with
Oomphle has listed many
heads.

61227.愛くるしい笑顔を見せる\n愉快な個性派トカゲ。\nその笑顔に油断すると\n痛い目:
A delightful
individualistic lizard
with a lovable smile. If
you let your guard down
with that smile, it will
hurt you.

61286.かみなり雲に すむという\n水玉模様のカエルドラゴン。\nひかりのブレスをはいて:
The polka-dot Frog
Dragon is said to live
in the Kaminari Clouds.
It wears a brace of
light to show its
authority to travelers.

61361.ファンキーな外見に似合わない\nすさまじい強さを誇る竜。\n毒 マヒ 眠りをもた:
A dragon that boasts
tremendous strength that
does not match its funky
appearance. It brings
poison, paralysis, and
sleep, and destroys all
living things.

61436.体内に電気を宿した\nおっかないビリビリガエル。\n蓄えた電気を放電して\nいな:
An ominous chiribiri
toad with electricity in
its body. The stored
electricity is
discharged to generate
Lightning.

61503.ハッピーブレスと光のブレスを\n使い分ける気分屋のドラゴン。\nどちらにしても食:
A moody dragon who uses
both Happi Breath and
Light Breath. Either
way, it's not easy for
the victim.

61582.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ベレス。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿っ:
The evil Beleth has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce, murderous
intent.

61640.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ダッシュラン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Drag Racer with
extraordinary strength,
his red, piercing eyes
are filled with a fierce
intent to kill.

61703.人の踏み入らない遺跡などを\n棲みかとする おそろしい\nフンコロガシの化け物。:
A terrifying dung beetle
monster that lives in
inaccessible ruins. They
are fattened up due to
the absence of external
enemies.

61776.敵の血を吸って 戦いに挑む\n武装したモンスター。\nしっぽに爆弾を隠し持つ\n:
Armed monsters that suck
the blood of their
enemies and challenge
them to battle. Fearless
soldier ants with bombs
hidden in their tails.

61843.氷のかたまりを落としてくる\n虫型のモンスター。\nかみついた相手の魔力を\n吸:
An insect-shaped monster
that drops chunks of
ice. It sucks the magic
power of the opponent it
bites.

61913.甲虫型モンスター界に\n君臨する帝王。\n巨大な岩石を落として\n攻撃する 怪力:
The reigning emperor of
the beetle-type monster
world. He attacks by
dropping huge rocks.

61973.由緒ある名前を冠した\nかぶと虫型のモンスター。\nバリアで守りをかためて\n突:
A beetle-shaped monster
with a venerable name.
It is a combat weapon
that rushes at you,
protected by a barrier.

62043.偽りの黄なる砂塵の塔にいた\n正体不明の 草食系魔人。\n風の呪文と砂のブレスで:
An unidentified
herbivorous demon in the
false, angry Yellow Sand
Tower. He uses his wind
spells and sand breath
to dispatch enemies that
stand in his way.

62118.叡智の冠の手によって\n迷宮に封じられた伝説の魔物。\n煉獄の空を駆けるという\:
A legendary monster
sealed in a labyrinth by
the Crown of Wisdom, a
beautiful and majestic
looking Heavenly Horse
that rides the skies of
Purgatory.

62189.めったに 人前に姿を現さない\n伝説的モンスター。光り輝く\nブレスは息を飲むほ:
A legendary monster that
rarely appears in
public. Its glowing
breath is breathtakingly
beautiful, but its power
is extremely dangerous.

62270.出会うのが困難といわれる\n光をたずさえた 聖なる獣。\n自然の賢者と称され 自:
A sacred beast that
bears light and is said
to be difficult to find.
Known as the sage of
nature, it only speaks
with those who are
stronger than it.

62345.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\n流星のように空を駆け\n闇の技で あらゆる大地に:
Monster, one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, is a deadly
horse that rides through
the sky like a meteor,
sprinkling death on all
the land with its dark
arts.

62418.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし 黒竜丸。\n何者かの妖術により 強化さ:
Equinox, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is strengthened by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

62485.多くの災いをもたらすため\n６本のウデをそなえた魔物。\nめいそうで自らを回復す:
He is a monster with six
udes to bring about many
disasters, and also has
a stoic side that heals
itself through
meditation.

62561.もともとは 聖獣として\n崇拝されていた象の魔物。\nベホマラーを使えるのは\n:
Originally, the elephant
monster was worshipped
as a sacred beast, and
the ability to use
Multiheal is a remnant
from its days as a
sacred beast.

62630.大量の魔瘴を浴びてしまい\n魔神と化した象の神様。\n６本のウデに武器をかまえ\:
An elephant god
transformed into a demon
god after being exposed
to a large amount of
demon miasma, the
elephant god slashes
viciously with his six
arms.

62703.セレドの大人をたぶらかした\n教祖サダクが 祈願の魔像に\n集まった 祈りのチカ:
Sadak, the guru who
taunted the adults of
Celed, was reincarnated
as a monster with the
power of the prayers
gathered at the Prayer
Statue.

62777.魔軍十二将 遊撃隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n逃げまどう民を 空よ:
He served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as the
leader of his rangers
and attacked the fleeing
people from the sky,
killing even a baby.

62853.愛し子を失い 怒りに我を失う\nいにしえの竜。大地を震わせ\n灼熱の炎で集落を焼:
Ancient dragons that
lost their loved ones
and lost themselves in
anger. It is said that
it shook the earth and
burned villages with its
scorching flames,
turning the continent
into hell.

62929.魔軍十二将 竜軍隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n盟友カミルひきいる\:
He served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as the
leader of the Twelve
Generals of the Dragon
Army and dealt a
crushing blow to the
flying dragon army led
by Ally Kamil.

63001.見分けがつかないほど\nそっくりな 双子のドラゴン。\nこちらの攻撃を無効にする:
They are twin dragons
that look so much alike
that they are almost
indistinguishable. Be
careful, as they use
their dragon eyes to
nullify your attacks.

63073.竜に匹敵するチカラを持つ\n堂々たるトカゲたちの王。\n王の名に恥じぬ 豪快な炎:
The imposing king of
lizards whose power
rivals that of a dragon.
A mighty flame, which
lives up to its name,
flashes out from its
mouth.

63148.その圧倒的な カリスマ性で\nドラゴン界に君臨する皇帝。\n吐き出す炎は 宝石の:
Emperor reigns over the
dragon world with his
overwhelming charisma,
and the flames he spits
out shine like precious
gems, captivating
others.

63227.オーグリード大陸の地底に眠る\n天災級の破壊力を持つ古代竜。\n目覚めれば 大地:
An ancient dragon with
the destructive power of
a natural disaster that
lies beneath the surface
of the Ogreed Continent.
When it awakens, it is
said to cause great
earthquakes and submerge
the continent into the
sea.

63308.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\nその中でもトップの座にあり\nドラゴンの王たるチ:
Monster, one of the
twelve generals of the
Demon Army, was the
leader among them, and
he tried to destroy
everything with his
power as the King of
Dragons.

63387.絶滅寸前の超レア種\nゴールデンキングリザード。\nファーベルの相棒が\n変わり:
Golden Liege Lizard, an
extremely rare species
on the verge of
extinction; Fabel's
partner has changed for
the worse.

63448.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ドラゴンガイア。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Sealed in the Magic Maze
as an immortal, the Gaia
Dragon is weakened by
sorcery, but be on your
guard.

63516.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ドラゴンガイア。\n何者かの妖術により:
The Gaia Dragon,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
strengthened by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

63589.伝説の魔物たちを合成し\nおぞましい生物が誕生した。\nテンションバーンを使い\:
Legendary monsters are
synthesized to create a
horrifying creature that
uses Feel the Burn to
unleash a powerful
Kaboom.

63663.大商人ブランドンに飼われる\n魔物ペットの中の１匹。\nもっとも凶暴な性格ゆえに:
One of the monster pets
kept by the wealthy
merchant Brandon. He is
loved by Brandon because
of his ferocious nature.

63734.叡智の冠の手によって\n迷宮に封じられた伝説の魔物。\n死の災厄を振りまくとされ:
A legendary monster
sealed in a labyrinth by
the Crown of Wisdom, an
evil divine beast that
breathes in the darkness
of night and is said to
spread the scourge of
death.

63811.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\nあらゆる生物の長所をそなえ\n雷や光までも自在に:
A monster, one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, an evil
phantom beast born of
chaos that possesses the
advantages of all living
creatures and can even
manipulate lightning and
light at will.

63893.魔軍十二将の一角だった魔物。\nあらゆる生物の長所をそなえ\nいなずまや炎まで操:
A monster, one of the
Twelve Generals of the
Demon Army, an evil
phantom born of chaos
that possesses the
advantages of all living
creatures and can even
manipulate lightning and
fire.

63973.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ハヌマーン。\n何者かの妖術により 強:
Nemean, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

64043.人里離れた山林に生息する\nきわめて希少な魔法生物。\n人の姿を見ると凶暴化する:
An extremely rare
magical creature that
lives in remote mountain
forests. They go berserk
at the sight of humans,
so it is best to stay
away from them.

64122.人間を見ると 遊んでほしくて\nフワフワと ついてくる\nかわいらしいモンスター:
When it sees Human, it
flutters and follows
him, wanting to play
with him. It is
characterized by its
cow-like pattern.

64195.かわいい外見とは裏腹に\n人の血を好んで求める\nピンク色のモーモン。\nフワフ:
Despite its cute
appearance, Teeny
Sanguini is a pink-
colored Teeny Sanguini
that loves human blood,
fluffy, approachable,
and fearsome.

64264.あざやかな緑色の身体が\nトレードマークの妖精。\n我が身を捨てて 仲間を助ける:
Her trademark is her
vivid green body. She
has a kind and generous
nature, and is willing
to give up her own life
to help her companion.

64336.雪のような純白の毛を持つ\n血統書付きのモーモン。\n空を優雅に ただよいながら:
Teeny Sanguini, a
pedigree with snow-white
fur, gracefully soars
through the sky, waiting
for his chance at The
Painful Strike.

64411.伝説の楽園 モーモン王国から\n迷い込んだ フワフワ女王様。\nたたかいのうたを:
Queen Fluffy wandered in
from the legendary
Utopia Teeny Sanguini
Kingdom. She inspires
the Teeny Sanguini with
her dainty songs of
battle.

64494.巨大なモーモンの姿をした\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n魅惑のおどりを踊って\n冒:
A monster guarding the
gates of the trial in
the form of a gigantic
Teeny Sanguini, he
enchants the hearts of
adventurers with his
