enchanting dance moves!

64559.オレンジ色のマントを まとい\n刃物を持ち歩く怪人。\n軽やかな足取りで近づき\:
The monster wears an
orange cloak and carries
a blade. It approaches
with light steps and
quickly slashes twice.

64631.肉を切り裂くのが大好きな\n得体の知れない殺人ピエロ。\n多彩な斬撃をくりだし\:
An elusive murderous
clown who loves to slice
and dice flesh. He
delivers a variety of
slashes and laughs at
the sight of his prey's
weakness.

64704.ニタニタ笑いを絶やさない\n奇怪な血みどろピエロ。\nつるぎのまいを踊った後は\:
A bizarre bloodthirsty
clown who never stops
smiling. After dancing
the Tsurugi no Mai, the
whole area becomes a sea
of blood.

64776.旅芸人に 強い憎しみを抱く\nポルファンの元弟子。\n道化とは思えないほどの\n:
A former apprentice of
Polfan who has a strong
hatred for minstrels. He
has a strong attitude
and tone of voice, which
is not unlike a clown's.
He has a strong hatred
for minstrels.

64848.闇の呪法により 海中での\n活動が可能になった合成獣。\n海の中だろうと流星を降:
A synthetic beast that
is able to operate
underwater due to a dark
spell. It rains meteors
and spreads the flames
of the Shakunetsu,
whether in the sea or
not.

64927.命を落とした天地雷鳴士の魂が\n刀に宿り妖刀となった。\n闇の流星を空から落とし:
The soul of the lifeless
druid inhabits the sword
and becomes a demon
sword. A dark meteor
falls from the sky and
drags him into the abyss
of night.

65003.長い年月を経たものに\n邪気が宿り魔物の姿を成した。\nふわふわしながら油断させ:
The evil spirit inhabits
the long-aged thing and
takes on the form of a
monster. It is a fluffy
creature that catches
you off guard and sucks
out your life force.

65079.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n四の災壇を守護するのは\n流:
The incarnation of
disaster stands in the
way of the challenger of
Banma Tower. The four
banners of the Banma
Tower are protected by a
dragon that can even
manipulate meteors.

65148.水流をものともせずに\n海底を自在に駆けまわる海馬。\n暗黒のきりで弱らせた相手:
The spinning hippocampus
can run freely on the
seafloor without regard
to the currents of the
water. The Painful
Strike is delivered to a
weakened opponent with a
dark kiri.

65225.足の速さが自慢の魔獣。\n世界を駆け 荒しまわった。\n馬のような姿をしているが:
He was a beast that
boasted of his speed on
foot. It ran and roamed
the world. It looks like
a horse, but its true
form is said to be
different.

65300.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な きりさきピエロ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Prickly
Prankster has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
murderous intent.

65364.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な モーモン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が宿:
The evil Teeny Sanguini
is a man of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

65424.魔軍十二将 奇兵隊長として\n不死の魔王ネロドスに 仕え\n勇者アルヴァンひきい:
He served Immortal Demon
King Nerodos as the
leader of the 12
generals of the Demon
Army and defeated Gran
Zedora's army led by
Hero Alvan.

65499.五感を超える新たな感覚である\n超心覚を会得するために\n星辰武王によって召喚さ:
A sacred beast living in
the River of Light,
summoned by the Star
Warrior to acquire a new
sensation that
transcends the five
senses: psychokinesis.

65575.ザード遺跡で石の魔人に\n使役されるゴーレム。\n海運都市ザードの防衛は\n彼ら:
Golem is used by the
stone demons in Zard
Ruins; they were
responsible for the
defense of the shipping
city of Zard.

65639.魔瘴を操り プクランド大陸を\n滅ぼそうとたくらんだ魔物。\n人間に化け プーポ:
A monster who planned to
destroy Pukuland
Continent by
manipulating demon
miasma, he transformed
into a human and became
a close associate of
King Puupoppan.

65714.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n魔軍師イッドの幻影。\n本物よりも:
The illusion of
Tactician Id that
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
It is much stronger than
the real thing.

65778.魔元帥ゼルドラド配下の\n四魔将の一角を担う妖術士。\n幻影をあやつり 虚像の中:
A sorcerer who is one of
the four generals under
Marshal Zeldrad. He is
one of the four
sorcerers under Marshal
Zeldrad. He can
manipulate illusions and
make his enemies die in
his imaginary world.

65850.数百年もの間 かぶり続けた\n良き叔父という仮面を\nかなぐり捨て 邪悪なる本性:
Ojalos has shed the mask
of the good uncle he has
worn for hundreds of
years to reveal his evil
nature.

65927.ジャゴヌバの心から生まれた\nすべてを嘲弄する道化の邪神。\n無数の分身体が集合:
The evil god is a clown
who taunts everything
born from the heart of
Jagonuba. When countless
alter egos are
assembled, it can
exhibit the power of
true.

66007.神のチカラを使い異形の姿に\n変身したラダ・ガート。\n天使への反感が無限に増大:
Lada Gart, transformed
into a deformed form by
the power of God, is
driven to destroy Heaven
by an infinitely growing
antipathy toward the
angels.

66087.世界樹を守る役目を持つ\nおおらかな性格の精霊。\n枯れかけた世界樹を救うため\:
A spirit with a generous
nature who is
responsible for
protecting Yggdrasil.
She used up all her
power to save Yggdrasil
from dying out.

66163.暗黒大樹の周辺に出没する\n謎多き魔物の群れ。\n暗黒大樹に近づく者には\n容赦:
Mysterious monster
swarms that haunt the
area around the Dark
Tree and will attack
anyone who comes close
to the Dark Tree.

66233.王者の脚甲を守護する\n使命を与えられ\n荒城の隠し御殿に君臨する\n夢幻の森に:
A spirit born in the
Dream Forest that reigns
over the Hidden Palace
Ruins with the mission
to protect Champion's
Greaves.

66297.ジャイラ密林に出現する\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nバイキルトを唱えて\n攻撃力:
A monster who guards the
gates of the trials that
appear in the Jyra
Jungle, he chants
"Oomphle" to increase
his attack power and
hunt down intruders.

66366.ジャイラ密林に出現する\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n強力な攻撃呪文を駆使して\n:
A monster who guards the
gates of trials that
appear in the Jyra
Jungle, he defends the
forest from intruders by
using powerful attack
spells.

66434.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの魔王の一角。\n歯向かう者を惑わし\n夢幻の:
A member of the ancient
Demon Kings sealed in
the Magic Maze. He
bewitches those who defy
him and plunges them
into the abyss of dreamy
despair.

66501.ベコン渓谷の洞くつの奥で\nガイコツたちと眠る 妖剣士。\nレムルの聖杯に強く執:
A demon swordsman who
sleeps in a cave in the
Becon Valley with a
group of monsters, he is
deeply attached to
Lemur's Chalice and
continues to protect it
even after his death.

66579.ベコン渓谷の 洞くつの奥で\nガイコツたちと眠る 妖剣士。\nレムルの聖杯に 強:
A demon swordsman who
sleeps in the depths of
a cave in the Becon
Valley with a group of
monsters, he is deeply
attached to Lemur's
Chalice and continues to
protect it even after
his death.

66658.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n妖剣士オーレンの幻影。\n本物より:
A phantom of Swordmaster
Oren that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

66724.封印した相手が存在したという\n記憶さえ根こそぎ奪ってしまう\n封印のプロ。封魔:
He is a professional
sealer who can even take
away the memory of the
existence of the person
he has sealed. He is
also a master at sealing
spells using the evil
method of sealing.

66805.２本のオノを自在にあやつり\n敵を壊滅に追い込まんとする\n蒼怨の屍獄兵団の将の:
One of the generals of
the Navy Corpse Corps,
who wields two axes at
will to drive the enemy
to destruction. It
stands in front of the
defense forces.

66885.２本の杖で高めた魔力による\n高位魔法で敵陣を攻めんとする\n蒼怨の屍獄兵団の将:
One of the generals of
the Navy Corpse Corps,
he attacks the enemy
lines with high-level
magic enhanced by his
two wands. It stands in
front of the defenders.

66967.天地雷鳴士 陰衆が代々\n請け負ってきた闇が蓄積され\n次第に形を成していき\n:
druid A being that has
gradually taken shape
and become self-aware as
a result of the
accumulation of darkness
that has been undertaken
by the yinshu from
generation to
generation.

67040.ランドン山脈頂上の\n雲上湖に生息する 巨大な竜。\n凶暴な性格で これまで幾度:
A giant dragon that
inhabits Sky Lake atop
the Landon Mountains.
Its ferocious nature has
claimed the lives of
visitors to the lake on
numerous occasions.

67117.ランドン山脈 頂上の\n雲上湖に生息する 巨大な竜。\n凶暴な性格で これまで幾:
A giant dragon that
inhabits Sky Lake atop
the Landon Mountains.
Its ferocious nature has
claimed the lives of
visitors to the lake on
numerous occasions.

67194.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n水竜ギルギッシュの幻影。\n本物よ:
A phantom of Gilgish
that appeared in this
world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

67261.深海の支配者と恐れられる\nどう猛な海竜の王。\n凍てついた氷の精神を持ち\n冷:
A ferocious king of sea
dragons, feared as the
ruler of the deep sea.
He has a spirit of
frozen ice and
specializes in cold-air
attacks.

67334.霊木のしずくを守るという\n雄峰ランドン山頂の湖の主。\nそれは ある魂と同化す:
The Lord of the Lake at
Landon Peaksummit, who
protects the Sacred Tree
Drops. It was Gilgish
before he assimilated a
soul.

67412.その巨体を大地にすべらせ\nすべてを押しつぶさんとする\n灰塵の竜鱗兵団の将。\:
The general of the Ash
Dragon Corps slides his
huge body into the earth
and crushes everything
in his path. He stands
in front of the
defenders.

67486.異界滅神ジャゴヌバの\n虚無なる心から生まれた邪神。\n女神の魂を喰らい その存:
An evil goddess born
from Jagonuba's
nihilistic mind. He fed
on the soul of the
goddess and tried to
make the world forget
about her existence.

67565.怒りのあまりに我を忘れ\n悪鬼の手に落ちた チャンプ。\n手に入れた邪悪なチカラ:
Champ, in a fit of rage,
forgets his own self and
falls into the hands of
the evil demons, using
his received evil power
to perform superhuman
feats.

67639.王者のかぶとを守護する\n使命を与えられ\n万年雪の砦に君臨する\n精強無比の兵:
He is a strong soldier
who reigns over Untold
Snowfort with the
mission of protecting
the Champion's Helmet.

67695.メレアーデが チェス盤の上で\nあやつるキングのコマ。\nバギムーチョやマヒャデ:
Mereade's King Piece,
which he plays on the
chessboard, uses
Kaswooshle and Kacrackle
to ravage his opponent's
position and spin.

67774.メレアーデが チェス盤の上で\nあやつるナイトのコマ。\n対戦相手にボミオスをか:
Mereade's Knight Piece
on the chessboard, a
pariah who stomps his
opponents with
Deceleratle.

67852.メレアーデが チェス盤の上で\nあやつるポーンのコマ。\nキングを守るために 一:
Mereade's Pawn Piece on
the chessboard, a brave
little soldier who paces
the board in defense of
his king.

67929.かつてドランド王国を治めた\n轟雷王の成れの果て。\n気性の激しさは変わらず\n:
He is the descendant of
the Roaring Thunder King
who once ruled the
Kingdom of Drand. His
temper is as fierce as
ever, and he unleashes
roaring thunder waves
like a storm.

68000.黄金の鎧の騎士の姿で現れた\n大いなる闇の根源の末端。\n血の鎖で縛られた契約を:
The end of the great
dark root appears in the
form of a knight in
golden armor. Break the
contract bound by chains
of blood and save your
precious family with
your own hands!

68079.人々の心に毒を植えつけ\nその絶望を喰らうことを\n至上の喜びとする外道。\n好:
He is an outcast who
takes great pleasure in
poisoning people's
hearts and feeding on
their despair. His
favorite way of cooking
is on a skewer of
despair.

68152.しなやかな動きとスピードで\n相手を ほんろうする\nサディスティックな魔女。\:
She is a sadistic and
wand witch who can make
her opponents fall in
love with her with her
supple movements and
peid. There is no one
who is not impressed by
her eyes.

68226.１００年に ひとりの天才\nプレシアンナが 人の心を捨て\nモンスターゾーンに入:
In 100 years, one
genius, Prescianna,
abandoned her human
heart and entered the
Shocking Twist to become
a monster, the ultimate
form.

68298.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n妖魔ジュリアンテの幻影。\n本物よ:
An illusion of Mystical
Juliante that appeared
in this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

68365.天地の間を守るといわれる幻魔\nテンオツキジンが凶神として\n召喚された姿。悪霊:
Tenotsu Kijin, a phantom
demon said to protect
the Heavenly Land Room,
has been summoned as a
wicked god. He calls
forth a vortex of evil
spirits and spreads
misfortune throughout
the world.

68445.ジャゴヌバの心から生まれた\n禁忌を司る邪神。ルファ神殿の\n道を閉ざし妨害して:
An evil god of taboo
born from the heart of
Jagonuba. He has been
blocking and obstructing
the way to Rufa Temple.
He wears a mask of a
crow.

68525.ジャゴヌバの心から生まれた\n禁忌を司る邪神。ルファ神殿の\n道を閉ざし妨害して:
An evil god of taboo
born from the heart of
Jagonuba. He has been
blocking and obstructing
the way to Rufa Temple.
He wears the mask of a
snipe.

68604.ジャゴヌバの心から生まれた\n禁忌を司る邪神。ルファ神殿の\n道を閉ざし妨害して:
An evil god of taboo
born from the heart of
Jagonuba. He has been
blocking and obstructing
the way to Rufa Temple.
He wears the mask of a
Chicken.

68686.大地を揺るがす 巨大な肉体で\nこれまた巨大な棍棒を\n振り回す ごうかいな呪術:
A wondrous sorcerer who
wields a huge rod with a
huge body that shakes
the earth. His hobby is
collecting men.

68760.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n呪術師マリーンの幻影。\n本物より:
An illusion of Monstrous
Malynn that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

68826.魔元帥ゼルドラド配下の\n四魔将の一角を担う女怪。\n怪力無双で知られる\nウワ:
A female monster who is
one of the four demonic
generals under Marshal
Zeldrad. She is the
older sister of two
beautiful sisters who
are rumored to be
powerful and powerful.

68893.魔元帥ゼルドラド配下の\n四魔将の一角を担う女怪。\n怪力無双で知られる\nウワ:
A female monster who is
one of the four demonic
generals under Marshal
Zeldrad. She is the
younger sister of two
beautiful sisters who
are rumored to be
powerful and powerful.

68960.１５年前にアルウェと\n契約を結び プクリポの子供を\n殺すために現れたが\n団:
15 years ago he made a
deal with Alwe to show
up to kill Pukulipo's
children, but failed
because of the
Commander's success.

69030.ガズバランの牙の首領である\nぬいぐるみ屋 ザッケスが\nピュージュのチカラを借:
Zackes, the head of
Gazbalan's Fang, a
stuffed animal shop, has
turned into a vicious
monster with the help of
Pyuju.

69103.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に復活した\n悪魔ザイガス本人。\n以前より は:
Duke Sigras himself has
come back to this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
He is much stronger than
before.

69164.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n悪魔ザイガスの上司。\n部下よりも:
Duke Sigras' superior,
who appeared in this
world under the
influence of demon
miasma activated by the
demon miasma. He is much
stronger than his
subordinates.

69228.闇の領界に生きる人々に\n混沌と恐怖を もたらした\n魔物の首領。月をも破壊する:
The leader of the
monsters that brought
chaos and fear to the
people living in the
Dark Realm. He boasts a
terrifying magical power
that can destroy even
the moon.

69300.暗黒球を進もうとする者の前に\n立ちはだかる邪悪な巨人。\nチカラまかせに振るわ:
An evil giant stands
before those who seek to
advance through the Dark
Orb. The rod's blow,
wielded with all its
might, shatters the
earth.

69379.暗黒球を進もうとする者の前に\n立ちはだかる狡猾な魔獣。\n策略で相手を破滅させ:
A cunning hexenbiest
that stands in the way
of those who seek to
advance through the Dark
Orb. It takes great
pleasure in destroying
its opponents through
trickery.

69459.暗黒球を進もうとする者の前に\n立ちはだかる残忍な悪魔。\n持ち前の高い戦闘力は:
A brutal demon that
stands in the way of
anyone who tries to
advance through the Dark
Orb, his high fighting
prowess is feared to
rival that of a nation's
army.

69541.魔瘴から生まれる\n謎多き 魔物の群れ。\n聖なる光を嫌い\n邪悪な闇を欲する。:
A group of enigmatic
monsters born from demon
miasma. They hate the
holy light and desire
the evil darkness.

69593.王者のこてを守護する\n使命を与えられ\n始まりの塔に君臨する\n塔の魔力により:
A monster born from the
magical power of the
tower that reigns over
the Beginning Tower with
the mission of
protecting the
Champion's Gauntlets.

69657.メドナムにより 滅びの手の\n相方として生みだされた存在。\n魔勇者が抱いていた:
Mednam created this
being as a partner of
Hand of Doom. The core
of its existence is the
hatred for the world
that the demon Hero
harbored.

69739.メドナムにより滅びの手として\n生みだされた存在。作品への\n評価が厳しく 失敗:
A being created by
Mednam as the Hand of
Perdition. He is a
harsh judge of his work
and attempts to destroy
the failed false and
angry world.

69820.砂漠の宝石と呼ばれる高級果実\nくれないザクロを落とす。\n果実狙いの盗人を返り:
The desert's jewel, the
Deep Red Pomegranate, is
a high-end fruit. He has
caused countless
shudders when he has
returned the favor of
thieves who were after
the fruit.

69900.ぜくれすせいえいへい:
Jesuits and Jews (in
Japan in the 16th
century)

69924.イッドの手下である魔物。\n儀式の間を討伐隊の血で\n汚すという イッドの命令を:
Id's lackey monster,
acting to fulfill Id's
order to stain the
Ritual Hall with the
blood of the Strike
Force.

69999.イッドの手下である魔物。\n相棒のヒプノスと共に\nイッドの命令を果たすため\n:
A monster, a servant of
Id, disguised as a human
soldier with his partner
Hypnos to fulfill Id's
orders.

70070.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n魔兵ヒプノスの幻影。\n本物よりも:
The illusion of Hypnos
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
It is much stronger than
the real thing.

70134.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n魔兵タナトの幻影。\n本物よりも:
The illusion of Thanatos
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
Much stronger than the
real thing.

70197.数多の戦場を駆け抜け 国を\n興すまでに上りつめた魔王。\nその武力は魔界最強と:
The Demon King, who has
risen through numerous
battlefields to become
the founder of a nation,
is renowned as the most
powerful man in the
Demon World, and with a
single flash of his
sword, he can knock down
even the most mounted
hordes of horsemen.

70278.魔仙卿が召喚した\n魔瘴をまき散らす邪霊。\n余りに濃密なその瘴気は\n意思を持:
Evil spirits spread
demon miasma summoned by
The Oracle. The miasma
is so dense that it
moves with a will.

70342.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n太古の姿を留めしドラゴン。\n見かけによらず動きがすば:
A dragon that retains
its ancient form sealed
in the Magic Maze. It
moves quickly despite
its appearance, so be
careful of its
continuous attacks.

70416.未完のご神体の間を守護するが\n自身の名前すら記憶にない\n未完成の魔物。魔導鬼:
He is an unfinished
monster who protects the
Undone Hall of Worship
but does not even
remember his own name.

70493.創造主を絶対視するが\nその名前すら記憶にない。\n破戒王ベルムドに似せて\n創:
He is absolute about the
Creator, but he does not
even remember His name.
An unfinished monster
created in the image of
Sin King Bermud.

70561.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n闇の魔力をまとう黒き獣。\nかつてはある愛犬家に飼われ:
A black beast cloaked in
dark magic, sealed in
the Magic Maze. It was
once a pedigreed luxury
dog owned by a dog
lover.

70638.花嫁を失い 悲しみの果てに\n命を落とした若者 レグが\n黒いチカラに取り込まれ:
Reg, a young man who
lost his life in grief
over the loss of his
bride, has been
transformed into a
monster by a black
power.

70710.王者のマントを守護する\n使命を与えられ\n時の刻みし海溝に君臨する\n深海より:
He was given the mission
to protect the
Champion's Cloak and
reigns over the Trench
of Time, the one who
appears from the depths
of the ocean.

70771.遠き銀河の彼方より 飛来せし\n恐るべき 侵略者の王。\n母星の繁栄のため\n他:
From a galaxy far, far
away, flies a fearsome
invader king. He
destroys other star
systems and steals their
treasures for the
prosperity of his home
planet.

70841.異界より導いた魔力によって\nすべてを消去せんとする\n深碧の造魔兵団の将。\n:
A general of the Green
Demon Corps, he is a man
who wants to erase
everything with his
magical power that he
has guided from the
other world. He stands
in front of the defense
forces.

70914.古代の英雄プクラスと死闘を\nくり広げし 災厄の王の腹心。\nふたつ名の「赤き災:
He was the leader of the
King of Calamity who
fought to the death
against the ancient
Pukulas. As the name
"Red Plague of Two
Names" suggests, many
countries were engulfed
in a plume of blood.

70998.おそるべき怪力で\nすべてを破壊せんとする\n闇朱の獣牙兵団の将。\n防衛軍の前:
A general of the Red
Beast Corps, who wants
to destroy everything
with his fearsome
strength. He stands in
front of the defense
forces.

71063.数々の試練の果てに待ち受ける\nデモンマウンテンの門番。\n大魔王候補者の数だけ:
The gatekeeper of Demon
Mountain who waits at
the end of numerous
trials, and is said to
divide himself into as
many parts as the number
of Great Demon
KingCandidates and give
them equal trials.

71145.破魂の審判の裁定により\n滅ぼすべしと定められた世界に\n召喚される破壊の化身。:
An incarnation of
destruction summoned to
a world that Judge of
Souls has decreed must
be destroyed. There is
no way to stop its
destruction.

71222.魔物の中でも とても珍しく\n数の少ない巨猫族の剣士。\n猫島の主 マンマーに仕:
A swordsman of the Giant
Cat Tribe, a very rare
and scarce tribe among
the Monsters, he serves
the Lord of Cat Island,
Momma, but he plans to
rebel against her.

71297.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\nキャット・リベリオの幻影。\n本物:
An illusion of
Purrgatroyd that
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
It is much stronger than
the real one.

71366.ヒトの財産を根こそぎ奪う\n巨猫の悪霊。禍々しい熊手を\n振り回して攻撃してくる:
An evil spirit of a
giant cat that uproots
people's property. It
attacks wielding an
ominous rake.
Originally, it was a
good god who gave
wealth.

71443.ジャディンの園の地下より\n噴出した魔瘴が意思を持ち\nおそるべき魔物の姿となっ:
A demon miasma erupts
from the depths of
Jyadain Garden, takes on
the form of a monster
with a will, and stands
before the Great Demon
King.

71520.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの帝国の将軍。\n剣聖と呼ばれるほどの達人で\:
A general of an ancient
empire sealed in Magic
Maze. He is a master
swordsman and a highly
virtuous warrior who
values honor.

71594.ウェディ族に伝わる歌を\nはるか昔より 守り続ける者。\nその背に乗る石碑に\n:
He is the one who has
been preserving the
songs of the Weddie
tribe since long ago.
The songs are engraved
on the stone monument
that rides on his back.

71663.偽りの黒き濁流の塔にいた\n正体不明の 甲殻類魔人。\nしおまねきで大波をあやつ:
An unidentified
crustacean demon in the
false and angry Black
Stream Tower. He uses
his saltwater wand to
create large waves that
swallow everything in a
muddy stream.

71738.かつては石版を落としていた\nばカニできないモンスター。\n殻の硬さは背負った石:
A monster that cannot be
crabbed that once
dropped a tablet. The
hardness of the shell is
at the same level as the
tablet on its back.

71812.死霊の書に魅入られ 道を\n踏み外したデスマスター。\n死霊の王国を築くことを夢:
A death master who went
astray, fascinated by
the Book of Dead, and
sunk into the Sludge
Swamp, dreaming of
building a kingdom of
the dead.

71887.ギスマイヤーが死霊の書で\n召喚した凶悪な死霊。\n無数の戦死者の魂が結集し\n:
A vicious spirit of
death summoned by
Gismeyer in the Book of
Dead. The souls of
countless war dead are
gathered together to
spread death and murder.

71958.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの帝国の将軍。\n三度のメシより陰謀が好きで\:
He is a general of an
ancient empire sealed in
Magic Maze. He is an
intellectual general who
likes intrigue more than
meals and is a master of
magic.

72034.彫刻家モヒペンコが呼びだした\n大魔王ネロドスの幻影。\n不死のチカラこそないが:
A phantom of the great
Demon King Nerodos,
summoned by sculptor
Mohipenko. It has no
immortality, but its
strength rivals that of
the real thing.

72110.かつて ウェナ諸島全域を\n壊滅の危機にさらした魔物。\n封印の巫女 セーリアに:
The monster that once
threatened to destroy
the entire Wena Islands
was sealed in eternal
water by the sealing
priestess Celia.

72188.かつて 賢者ブロッゲンの手で\n葬られた 大いなる凶獣。\nその子らが 魂を呼び:
The great wesen once
buried by the hands of
Sage Broggen. Their
children have awakened
their souls and
reappeared in this
world.

72265.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n暴君バサグランデの幻影。\n歌の束:
A vision of Tyrant Bogan
that appeared in this
world under the
influence of demon
miasma's activation. It
is strong because it is
not bound by the song.

72331.紅衣の悪夢団の首領\nバズレッドが秘薬を飲んで\n狂える獣へと変身した姿。\nも:
Buzzred, the leader of
the red-robed nightmare
group, is transformed
into a crazed beast
after drinking a secret
potion. His rationality
has collapsed.

72402.世界宿屋協会のリンクスが\n実験で造りだした ペット。\n改造を重ねて 戦闘力を:
A pet created by Lynx of
the World Association of
Innkeepers as an
experiment. It has been
modified and its
fighting power has been
greatly strengthened.

72472.ベルヴァイン湖のほとりに\n住み着いた 荒れ狂った魔獣。\n魔瘴の影響で我を失っ:
A raging magical beast
that lives on the shores
of Belvain Lake, it has
lost its self under the
influence of demon
miasma and will attack
anyone without regard
for others.

72553.悩める人々を救いたいと願う\nマルグリットの心の闇から\n生まれた もうひとつの:
Another will born from
Margaret's Dark Mind to
save the afflicted has
become a fearsome
monster.

72632.アグシュナ王妃に化けていた\n邪悪な大グモの化け物。\n暗黒大樹の葉のチカラで\:
The evil giant spider
monster that used to
haunt Queen Agushuna has
been resurrected in the
modern age by the power
of Dark Tree Leaf.

72702.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n怪蟲アラグネの幻影。\n本物よりも:
An illusion of Araniad
that appeared in this
world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

72766.魔元帥ゼルドラド配下の\n四魔将の一角を担う大怪虫。\n糸をはいて マヒさせたり:
A large monstrous insect
that is one of the four
demonic generals under
Marshal Zeldrad. It
specializes in
paralyzing people with
its threads and
insidious attacks.

72839.巨体を活かして大地をゆるがし\n壊滅的な被害を与えんとする\n銀甲の凶蟲兵団の将:
A general of the Silver
Insect Corps who uses
his massive body to
loosen the earth and
inflict catastrophic
damage. He stands in
front of the defense
forces.

72916.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの帝国の将軍。\nパワフルかつワイルドで\n剛:
A general of an ancient
empire sealed in Magic
Maze. He is powerful and
wild, and is known as
the fierce general of
rigidity.

72987.魔瘴のチカラを得て\nおぞましい進化を遂げた\nポイズンリザードの変種。\n体内:
A variant of Killer Gila
that has evolved
horribly by gaining the
power of demon miasma.
It stores demon miasma
in its body.

73055.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バラモスゾンビ。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Bones of Baramos,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
weakened by sorcery, but
one must be on one's
guard.

73123.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バラモスブロス。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
The Soul of Baramos,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
weakened by sorcery, but
one must not let one's
guard down.

73191.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし デュラン。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Dhuran, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

73254.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし アクバー。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Blackmar, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

73317.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ジャミラス。\n妖術で弱くなっているが:
Jamirus, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must be
on one's guard.

73382.悪しき欲望に取り憑かれた\nドワーフたちの怨念の塊。\n魔瘴のチカラで封印が解け:
A mass of the grudges of
Dwarfs possessed by evil
desires, the demon
miasma has broken the
seal and brought them
back to life in the
modern age.

73454.死神の息吹と呼ばれる\nはやり病をバラまいた元凶。\n全身が呪いによって\nけが:
He is the source of the
disease called "Death
Spelly Breath". His
entire body is made of a
substance that has been
damaged by the curse.

73524.賢者エイドスが用意した\n破邪の秘技会得のための試練。\n身体にまとう毒の煙によ:
A trial for acquiring
the Sacred Skill
prepared by Sage Eidos,
in which the smoke of
poison that surrounds
the body is used to
catch up with enemies.

73600.王者の盾を守護する\n使命を与えられ\n三闘の神殿に君臨する\n三闘士の残留思念:
A collection of residual
thoughts of the Triad
that reigns over the
Triad Temple with the
mission to protect the
Sovereign's Shield.

73661.かつて海底の国を滅ぼした\nゲノミーたちの親玉。\n女王ゼルメアを捕らえて\n創:
The leader of the
Crankiids that once
destroyed the undersea
kingdom, he captured
Queen Zelmea and
attempted to steal her
power of creation.

73734.水と氷のチカラを振るい\nすべてを無に帰さんとする\n翠煙の海妖兵団の将。\n防:
A general of the Blue
Ocean Corps who wields
the power of water and
ice to bring everything
to nothing. He stands in
front of the defense
forces.

73805.太古の昔に製造された\nウルベア帝国の戦闘兵器。\n数千年の時を経た今でも\n使:
The battle weapons of
the Urbea Empire
manufactured in ancient
times. Even now,
thousands of years
later, they continue to
operate, never
forgetting their
mission.

73874.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\nウルベア魔神兵の幻影。\n本物より:
A phantom of Urbea
Aztech that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

73940.ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡を守る\n古代の戦闘兵器。侵入者の\n生体反応が完全消失す:
An ancient battle weapon
that protects the ruins
of Urbea Underground
City. It will continue
to fight ruthlessly
until the intruder's
bio-signs are completely
eliminated.

74017.超攻撃型のウルベア魔神兵。\nケタ違いのパワーと火力を持ち\n遠隔式ビーム砲で攻:
The ultra-aggressive
Urbea Aztech, with its
extraordinary power and
firepower, uses a remote
beam cannon to turn its
target into a beehive
from all directions.

74100.闇の領界の竜族を抹殺するため\n管理端末が 変貌した姿。\n銃やハンマー 電撃な:
The Management Terminal
has been transformed to
eliminate the Dragon
Tribe of the Dark Realm.
It carries out its
mission with a variety
of functions, including
guns and hammer blasts.

74176.遊び人の内なる不安に起因して\n古の奉仕ロボの中に生まれた\n労働強制プログラム:
A labor coercion program
born in the old service
robot due to gadabout's
inner insecurities. It
attacked gadabout
through mental
manipulation.

74261.鉱山発掘用に作られた重機が\n戦闘用に改造されたもの。\nブラニック採石場はほと:
A heavy machine designed
for excavating mines but
modified for combat use,
Branick Quarry did most
of his digging with just
this one machine.

74338.魔天より飛来したといわれる\n伝説級の凶悪な魔物。\n長い歴史の中で 幾度となく:
This legendary monster
is said to have flown
from the evil heavens
and terrorized Dolworm
many times throughout
its long history.

74413.魔界の門を開くために\n人々を争わせ 戦禍のタネを\n集めていた正体不明の道化師:
An unidentified clown
who has been collecting
Evil War Seeds by making
people fight to open the
gates of Demon World. He
has countless alter
egos.

74488.激怒したアスバルが\n持ち前の魔力で召喚した\nかつてゼクレスに敵対し\n封印さ:
The evil giant, once
hostile to Zechres and
sealed away, was
summoned by the enraged
Asbal with his own
magical powers.

74553.いち早く 地上に降り立ち\nテンスの花を焼いた 魔物。\nまがまがしい霧を 自在:
The monster that was the
first to land on earth
and burn the Tens
Flower, it has the
frightening ability to
manipulate the dazzling
fog at will.

74627.この世から すべての\nテンスの花を消し去ることを\n使命としている魔導鬼一族。:
A demon whose mission is
to extinguish all Tens
Flowers from this world.
He and Bedora are
cousins.

74701.召喚符によって呼び出される\n獣鬼たちの王のひとり。\n邪輪という武器をあやつり:
One of the kings of
beast demons summoned by
a summoner's charm. He
wields a weapon called
the "evil wheel" to cut
through enemies who
stand in his way.

74777.キュロノスにより近接戦闘に\n重きを置いて強化された\n最強の異形獣。ツインクロ:
The most powerful
Hexabeast, enhanced by
Kyuronos with an
emphasis on close
combat, its twin claws
cut through steel like
paper.

74857.キュロノスにより遠隔攻撃に\n重きを置いて強化された\n異形獣。レーザーシャワー:
Hexabeast, enhanced by
Kyuronos with an
emphasis on remote
attacks, uses a laser
shower to destroy
multiple targets.

74933.古代エテーネ王国の王族にして\n天才的な時渡りの使い手。\nアストルティアの歴史:
A royal of the ancient
Ethene Kingdom and a
prodigious time-walker,
he seems to have
interfered in Astoltia's
history and is up to
something.

75015.漆黒の騎士の姿で現れた\n大いなる闇の根源の末端。\n自らの魔瘴を打ち払うために:
The end of the great
dark root that appears
in the form of a jet-
black knight. It is a
trial that must be
crossed in order to
dispel its own demon
miasma.

75092.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n挑戦者と強い因縁を:
The existence called
"the household of the
war wicked" created by
the thoughts of the evil
god of the war wicked.
The memories of the evil
ones who have a strong
connection with the
challenger are
reproduced.

75172.炎を食らって永遠に生きるとの\n伝説もある五つ首のドラゴン。\n絶え間のない炎を:
Legend has it that the
five-necked dragon lives
forever by feeding on
fire. Those who are
exposed to its incessant
flames are consumed
without leaving any
ashes.

75257.神殿レイダメテスを守護する\n最強の魔人。\nエルジュの父ベルンハルトを\n殺し:
He is the most powerful
demon who protects
Reidametes Temple and is
also the one who killed
Erju's father,
Bernhardt.

75324.大いなる闇の根源のチカラで\nこの世に出現した\n守護者ラズバーンの幻影。\n以:
A phantom of Guardian
Razburn, brought into
this world by the power
of a great dark root. It
is much stronger than
before.

75394.とある冒険者の恐怖の記憶が\n大魔王の魔力で実体化した。\n魂すら傷付ける大鎌は:
The memory of an
adventurer's fear has
been materialized by the
Great Demon King's
magical power. The great
scythe that wounds even
the soul is alive and
well, and has become
even more vicious.

75476.大いなる闇の根源のチカラで\nこの世に よみがえった\n死を統べる冥王ネルゲル。:
Nergel, the Netherlord
of Death, has been
resurrected by the power
of the Great Dark
Source, and is much
stronger than before.

75550.エテーネの村を焼き払い\nレンダーシアを闇に封じた\n生きとし生ける者の敵。\n:
The enemy of all living
who burned down Ethene
Village and sealed
Lendersia in darkness.
The King of the
Underworld, who spreads
death.

75620.大いなる闇のチカラを得て\n冥王ネルゲルが変身した。\n絶大なる魔力 不死身の肉:
Netherlord Nergel
transformed by the power
of the Great Darkness. A
god of the underworld
with immense magical
power, immortal body,
and the ferocity of a
beast.

75697.※体の一部なので不要:
*Not necessary as it is
part of the body

75713.突如現れた正体不明の怪物。\n巨体に似合わぬ機敏さを誇り\nツノから精神エネルギ:
An unidentified monster
that suddenly appears.
It boasts an agility
that does not match its
huge body, and emits a
monstrous ray of light
from its horn that takes
away its mental energy.

75786.指針監督官ベルマが使役する\n強化された新種の異形獣。\n体格が大きく 戦闘能力:
A new, enhanced species
of Hexabeast, used by
Guidance Supervisor
Belma, with a larger
stature and greatly
improved fighting
ability.

75858.異形獣と呼ばれる怪物はすべて\n正しくはヘルゲゴーグである。\nその中でもこいつ:
All the monsters called
Hexabeast are properly
Helgegog. Among them,
this one is the most
enhanced and top-of-the-
line species.

75940.突然 グランゼドーラ上空より\n勇者の橋に 出現した\n謎の魔獣。終焉の繭との関:
A mysterious magical
beast suddenly appeared
in the Bridge of Heroes
from the sky above Gran
Zedora. Its relationship
with the cocoon of
demise and its true
identity are also
shrouded in mystery.

76019.不死の魔王ネロドスの魔力\nその 不死のチカラにより\nよみがえり あらたな姿と:
The Immortal Demon King
Nerodos has been
resurrected with the
power of immortality and
received a new form and
even greater strength.

76093.最強の姿になった冥獣王が\nさらなる闇のチカラで\nこの世に よみがえった。\n:
The Netherfiend, now in
his most powerful form,
has returned to this
world with even more
dark power. He is much
stronger than before.

76164.魔軍十二将をはじめとする\n不死の軍勢は 魔王ネロドスに\n一度 命を奪われ そ:
The Twelve Generals of
the Demon Army and other
immortal forces were
once killed by Demon
King Nerodos, who then
gave them the power of
immortality.

76243.ツメとブーメランで襲ってくる\nスクアーロ海賊団の戦闘員。\nアジトのニセ情報を:
A fighter of the Squalo
Pirate Corps who attacks
with claws and
boomerangs, he is also
adept at manipulating
information, such as
distributing false
information about Horse
Mackerel.

76320.自称 最強の極悪海賊\nスクアーロ海賊団の船長。\n３匹の殺し屋を呼びだして\n:
Self-proclaimed captain
of the most villainous
pirate squad Squalo
Pirate, he summons three
assassins to torment
adventurers.

76389.アンルシアを捕らえようと\n敵意をあらわにしたヒューザ。\nいったい 彼の身に\:
What happened to Hyuza,
the man who turned
hostile in his attempt
to capture Anlucia?

76463.苦しむユノの心の中で\n待ち構える 自称天才占い師。\n意味深な笑みを浮かべ\n:
The self-proclaimed
genius fortune teller
who waits in the heart
of the suffering Yuno,
his true intentions
shrouded in mystery with
a meaningful smile on
his face.

76536.黒衣の剣士がグレン城に放った\n元気いっぱいの魔獣の幼体。\n特徴である額の黄色:
A juvenile of the
energetic magical beast
released by Dark
Swordsman into Glen
Castle. It releases mind
drain from the yellow
jewel on its forehead.

76618.スイの塔のてっぺんに\nスウィートルームを築いていた\nファンシー好きの怪獣。\:
FanSea loving monster
who had built Su Wit
Room at the top of Sui
Tower. He loves Honey
with all his heart.

76689.ポイックリンに化けて悪事を\n働いていた復讐の鬼。\n攻撃力や守備力を盗む能力で:
A vengeful demon that
has been doing evil by
disguising itself as
Poiclin. He uses his
ability to steal
offensive and defensive
powers to weaken his
enemies and strengthen
himself.

76766.商会とは名ばかりの\n非合法組織を運営する\n暗黒街の若きカリスマ。\nウデっぷ:
He is a charismatic
young man of the
underworld who runs an
illegal organization
that is not a trading
company in name only. He
is also a very powerful
man.

76831.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n怪獣プスゴンの幻影。\n本物よりも:
A phantom of Monster
Pusgon that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

76895.マイユさんに 愛と忠誠を捧げ\nいかなる時も抜け駆けしない\nゆかいな同志。そう:
Loyal and devoted to Ms.
Maille. They are the
Mailler Musketeers!

76977.元は アガペイも属した\n戦士くずれ強奪団のリーダー。\n暴力で手下たちを支配し:
He used to be the leader
of a gang of warriors
who used to belong to
Agapei. He ruled his men
with violence, and in
the end, he became a mad
warrior.

77051.戦士なら誰にでもあるという\n黒い欲望が 具現化したもの。\n詩歌の遺跡にて お:
It is the embodiment of
the black desire that
every warrior has, which
emerged from within the
body when it gazed into
its own heart at Poetry
Ruins.

77133.伝説の武闘家として名高い\n超天道士の唯一の弟子で\nその名を継いだ 若き武闘家:
A young martial artist
who is the only disciple
and successor of the
legendary martial artist
Chotendoji.

77207.バトリンピックの決勝進出者。\n借金取り一味の荒事担当で\nとにかくケンカっぱや:
A finalist in the
Battlympics. He is in
charge of roughing up
the debt collectors and
is always ready to
fight. He is a young man
with a hot temper and a
quick temper.

77286.魔物を悪事に利用する\n魔物商人のひとり。\n父からもらった愛用の短剣で\n魔物:
He is one of the monster
traders who use monsters
for their evil purposes.
He uses his favorite
dagger, given to him by
his father, to cut up
monster bait.

77354.魔物を悪事に利用する\n魔物商人のひとり。\n毎日 マメに研いだツメで\n魔物の:
He is one of the monster
traders who use monsters
for their evil purposes.
Every day, he hunts for
monster bait with his
well-sharpened claws.

77420.魔物を悪事に利用する\n魔物商人たちのリーダー。\nキッズを手に入れるため\nフ:
Leader of a group of
monster traders who use
monsters for their evil
purposes, he approached
Fabel and his friends to
get his hands on Fry.

77491.バトリンピックの決勝進出者。\nおのれのウデっぷしに\n絶対の自信を持っている\:
A finalist in the
Battlympics. A brave
female fighter who is
absolutely confident in
her skills.

77564.バトリンピックの決勝進出者。\nジェイコフの元弟子で\nその強すぎる野心のために:
A finalist in the
Battlympics, a former
apprentice of Jakov's
whose overweening
ambition has led him
astray.

77638.かつて ランガーオ村の\n史上最強チャンピオンだった\n英雄ガガベスの ひとり息:
He is the only son of
the hero Gagabes, who
was once the strongest
champion Langao Village
has ever seen. He lost
everything when his
father died.

77714.闇に潜む悪名高き大盗賊。\n隠密行動を信条としているが\nいざとなるとブーメラン:
A notorious chief who
lurks in the darkness,
he believes in stealth,
but when push comes to
shove, he uses his
boomerang to slay his
enemies in spectacular
fashion.

77787.魔勇者をも実験素材とした\nマッドな魔法研究家。\n実験体を思うままに操り\nチ:
He is a mad magic
researcher who uses even
demon Hero as
experimental material.
He takes great pleasure
in manipulating
experimental subjects
and testing their
abilities.

77860.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n天魔クァバルナの幻影。\n本物より:
An illusion of
Kukulkannibal that
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activation.
It is much stronger than
the real thing.

77926.荒神の異名を持つ いにしえの\n踊り子の 守り神。その名に\nたがわぬ 荒々しい:
The guardian god of the
dancers of old,
nicknamed "Aragami". He
lives up to his name,
and his wild dancing is
sure to break down any
challenger.

78004.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの魔王の一角。\n自身の再起を目論んで\n魔軍:
He is one of the ancient
Demon Kings sealed in
Magic Maze. He lends his
strength to the Demon
Army in order to revive
himself.

78074.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バラモス。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Baramos, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

78142.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの三悪魔の一角。\n策略を練ることに長けた\n:
One of the three ancient
demons sealed in Magic
Maze. He is a great
general-type demon who
is skilled at scheming.

78210.古き神話に うたわれる\n帝王の変わり果てた姿。\n理性を失った帝王は\nただ:
The figure of an emperor
who has changed, as told
in an old myth. The
emperor who has lost his
rationality simply goes
to the limit of his
destruction.

78276.バルディスタ軍の若き将校\nヤイルが秘術で変身した姿。\nこの術と不断の努力によ:
Jair, a young officer in
the Valdista army, was
transformed by a secret
technique. Through this
art and his tireless
efforts, he rose to
become a high-ranking
military officer.

78356.命ある者すべてをいけにえとし\n世界を絶望で おおいつくす。\n闇のころもを着て:
He sacrifices all living
creatures and covers the
world in despair. When
he wears the Clothes of
Darkness, he boasts of
his terrifying strength.

78440.無限動力炉の基礎となった\n増殖獣の細胞はチカラとともに\nその邪悪な思念をも\:
The cells of the breeder
beast that formed the
basis of the Infinite
Power Reactor implanted
its evil thoughts as
well as its power into
the replicant C141.

78516.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの三悪魔の一角。\n何者かの妖術により 強化さ:
One of the three ancient
demons sealed in the
Magic Maze. It was
strengthened by
someone's sorcery, and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

78585.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし バラモス。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Baramos, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

78648.血の契約を交わした ふたりが\n大魔王の座をかけて対決する。\nゆずれない思いを:
Two men who have signed
a blood contract will
face off for the title
of Great Demon King. Who
will win in the end?

78729.大いなる闇の根源によって\n魔物と化した かつての英雄。\n帝王の玉座にいた 幻:
A former hero
transformed into a
monster by a great
source of darkness, he
is far more powerful
than the phantom in the
Imperial Throne.

78809.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n世界を脅かす 強大:
The evil god of war has
given birth to a being
called the "household of
the evil god of war".
They are said to
reproduce the form of
the mighty evil that
threatens the world.

78887.はじまりの世界からやって来た\n邪悪なる竜の王の正体。\nアストルティアを征服す:
He is an evil dragon
king from the world of
beginnings, plotting to
conquer Astoltia.

78963.コミカルな動きと\nおなかのＶが特徴のドラゴン。\n幼少期は緑色のボディで\n成:
A dragon with comical
movements and a V on its
belly. Its body is green
in its infancy and
changes to red as it
grows to adulthood.

79031.のんき者のドラゴンが\nついに本気になった。\nコミカルな動きはそのままに\n圧:
The carefree dragon
finally gets serious.
The comical movements
are still the same, but
the power is
overwhelming.

79102.あのＶロンが最強となって\n魔法の迷宮に帰ってきた！\n名前に負けじと最強かつ\:
Vron has returned to
Magic Maze as the most
powerful player in the
world! The most powerful
and most dangerous power
will be shown to you.

79176.ふしぎなおどりを踊ったり\n守備力を下げてきたり\nいやがらせが得意なこぞう。\:
He is a little boy who
is good at dancing Weird
Dance, lowering his
defense, and harassing
others. He seems to have
a very bad character.

79249.氷呪文による攻撃と\n回復呪文を使い分ける\n地獄出身の邪悪な妖精。\n気まぐれ:
An evil fairy from hell
who uses both ice spells
to attack and recovery
spells. She has a
capricious personality.

79314.強力な氷呪文を使う上に\nふしぎなおどりを踊ったり\nザオラルまでも唱える\nマ:
She is a multi-talented
fairy who uses powerful
ice spells, dances Weird
Dance, and even casts
Zing.

79384.闇と死の呪文を使いこなす\nおそるべき暗黒の妖精。\nその冷酷な戦いぶりは\n魔:
A fearsome dark fairy
who is skilled in the
use of darkness and
death spells. Her
ruthless fighting style
is well known in the
monster world.

79457.ふしぎなおどりや\nメダパニダンスなど\nたくみなステップで\n相手をほんろうし:
They fight by using
clever steps such as the
Weird Dance and the
Fuddle Dance to
overpower their
opponents.

79516.偽りの青き樹縛の塔にいた\n正体不明の きりかぶ魔人。\n強力な呪文をあやつり\:
An unidentified Kirikabu
demon in the false,
angry Blue Tree Tower.
He is a powerful spell
wizard and fights with
the teamwork of three
people.

79591.どこかにあるという花の国から\nやって来た 精霊のお姫様。\n相手をバラに変身さ:
She is a princess of
spirits from a flower
kingdom somewhere in the
world. She is a
prankster and a troubled
princess who transforms
her opponents into
roses.

79673.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な あやしいかげ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Shade with
extraordinary strength
and a fierce, murderous
intent in its red,
piercing eyes.

79736.魔物たちの影から\n生まれると言われている。\n暗黒のきりで辺りを包み\n攻撃力:
It is said to be born
from the shadows of
monsters. They wrap the
area with a dark shroud
that lowers their attack
power and magic.

79804.影よりも暗い闇の底から\nあふれ出るという魔物。\nこごえるふぶきやヒャダルコで:
A monster that emerges
from the depths of
darkness, darker than
the shadows, icing
travelers with its
squelching blasts and
crackles.

79875.人々の嘆きと憎しみから\n生まれいづる幽鬼。\n死の呪文ザラキを唱え\n辺りを死:
A ghost born from
people's grief and
hatred. It chants the
spell of death, Zaraki,
and transforms the area
into a world of death.

79942.はるか昔 偉大な魔王の影が\n強い魔力をおびて動きだした。\nザラキーマを唱えて:
Long ago, the shadow of
the great Demon King
moved with powerful
magic, casting Kathwack
and dragging adventurers
to their deaths.

80021.泥をこねて作られた人形が\n魔力を得て動きだしたもの。\nふしぎなおどりを踊って:
A puppet made of kneaded
mud, which started to
move after gaining
magical power; likes to
dance Weird Dance to
lower the MP of the
enemy.

80097.持ち主の人形使いに捨てられ\nあてもなく さまよう人形。\nふしぎなおどりの他に:
A doll that wanders
around aimlessly after
being abandoned by its
owner, the puppet
master, who uses
Kabuff's spells as well
as Weird Dance.

80173.虹色のボディが自慢。\nふしぎなおどりが 得意だが\n強力な爆発呪文も好んで使う:
He boasts a rainbow-
colored body, and while
his specialty is Weird
Dance, he also likes to
use powerful explosive
spells, and is as much
of a "huffer" as he
appears to be.

80245.真っ赤なモヒカンを逆立てた\nファンキーな獣人。\nばくれつけんで威圧しつつ\n:
A fan-key beastie with a
true red mohawk, he
intimidates with his
Multifists and proudly
casts Multiheal.

80318.狂犬のような顔をした\nするどいキバを持つ獣人。\nおたけびを上げて\n周囲を:
A rabid, dog-faced beast
with a Cruel Claw, it
raises its War Cry and
causes the surrounding
area to swoon.

80384.怒りで常に血管が浮きでて\n身体が真っ赤に見える獣人。\n一気にハイテンションと:
The veins of his veins
are always floating in
anger and his body
appears to be true red.
He becomes high-tension
at once and attacks
furiously.

80461.憎しみを自身の糧にする悪魔。\nファヒータの憎悪を利用して\nある目的のために３:
A demon who feeds on
hatred, he uses Fajita's
hatred to gather three
hidden treasures for a
purpose.

80537.羊を数えるように のどかな\n笛の音色で こちらを眠らせる\nとてもやっかいな:
A very troublesome beast
who puts us to sleep
with his tranquil
whistle like counting
sheep. Let's take him
down as soon as
possible.

80611.ひょうきんな見た目に反して\n笛の音色で呪いをかけて\n仲間を集めて襲ってくる\:
Despite his haughty
appearance, he has a
vindictive personality
that gathers companions
and attacks them by
cursing them with the
sound of his flute.

80687.仲間を集めては おたがいを\n応援しあう 仲間思いの魔物。\nその反面 敵対する:
A companionable monster
who gathers companions
to support each other,
he is also aggressive
and out of control when
it comes to his
opponents.

80765.魔界から やってきたという\n凶暴な 異形の獣人。\nその笛の音で 気合を入れて:
A ferocious, deformed
beastman from Demon
World. The sound of its
whistle will get you
fired up and attack like
a nightmare.

80836.魔人エンラージャに仕える\nズル賢い妖魔。\nおうえんや魔力の角笛などを\nくり:
A clever demon who works
for Genie Enraja, it can
be defeated quickly by
using Egg On or the Horn
of Magic.

80906.恐怖の大王の使いとして\n人々に恐れられる悪魔。\nメラゾーマのすさまじい威力は:
A demon feared by the
people as the messenger
of the Great One of
Fear, Kafrizz's
tremendous power is
truly terrifying.

80982.雲の中から 生まれたという\n自由気ままな 人型の魔物。\nかまいたちをあやつっ:
This free-spirited
humanoid monster, born
from the clouds, happily
cuts up people with its
Wind Sickles.

81058.いにしえの時代に 封印された\nランプの中から 抜け出した\n悪しき心の 魔法使:
A mage with an evil
heart who has escaped
from a sealed lamp in
the days of the ancients
and is said to be able
to manipulate the wind
at will.

81134.荒れ狂う嵐の中から生まれた\n災いを呼ぶ魔神。\n容赦なく 攻撃呪文を浴びせ\n:
A demon god that brings
disaster, born out of a
raging storm. He is a
relentless attacker of
spells and loves to see
people suffer.

81206.かつて リンジャの塔に\n封印されていた凶悪な魔人。\n自分の家来を 増やそうと:
A vicious demon who was
once sealed in Linja
Tower. He is a wicked
demon who has been
sealed up in Linja Tower
for a long time.

81280.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n魔人エンラージャの幻影。\n本物よ:
The illusion of Genie
Enraja appeared in this
world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

81347.陰果の罪業の核となる邪念。\n大きな汚れが小さなシミから\n広がるように 巨大な:
Evil is at the core of
Sin of Yin/Yang. Just as
a great stain spreads
from a small stain, so a
great evil is born from
a small sin.

81426.狙った獲物は逃さない\n魔物界の一流ハンター。\nするどいキバと スピードで\n:
A top-notch hunter in
the monster world who
never lets his prey go,
he uses his Cruel Claw
and Speid to make sure
his prey is killed.

81495.全身にハートの柄を散りばめた\n愛らしい見た目に反し\nどう猛さと高い身体能力は:
Despite its adorable
appearance, with heart
patterns scattered all
over its body, its
ferocity and physical
prowess are unmatched by
the Great Sabrecat.

81572.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な パペットマン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Magic
Marionette is a
powerful, powerful woman
with red, piercing eyes
and a deadly intent to
kill.

81635.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な パンプキッズ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
An evil Pumpkid with
extraordinary strength,
his red, piercing eyes
are filled with a fierce
intent to kill.

81698.魔物界きっての暴れん坊。\n時には 敵味方かまわず\n襲いかかることもあり\n魔:
He is the most
rambunctious and violent
boy in the monster
world. He is feared by
monsters because he
sometimes attacks friend
and foe alike.

81768.あざやかな オノさばきで\n獲物の首を狙う 名ハンター。\n戦うことの よろこび:
He is a great hunter who
aims for the head of his
prey with his brilliant
axe skills. He always
has a smile on his face
with the joy of
fighting.

81841.バーサーカーとして生まれたが\n仲間たちほどはっちゃけられず\nオノをこんぼうに:
He was born as a
Berserker, but he is not
as open as the
companions, so he has
switched his axe to
Oaken Club and lives
with his face covered by
a mask.

81924.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の王。\nすべての魔祖の血族を:
Ancient demon king
sealed in Galatea's God
Spear 500 years ago. He
is the absolute monarch
of all the demon
ancestors' bloodlines
and the strongest demon.

82003.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ホークマン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Hawk Man has an
unparalleled strength,
and his red, piercing
eyes are filled with a
fierce intent to kill.

82065.タカのような翼の生えた\n空を飛ぶ怪人。\nマホトーンを得意とし\n風を自在にあ:
A flying monster with
hawk-like wings, he is
said to be a master of
the fizzle and can
manipulate the wind at
will.

82129.ズル賢く 剣術にも秀でた\n魔王軍の突撃兵。\nラリホーやマホトーンを\nあやつ:
A cunning and skilled
swordsman, he is a Demon
King's assault soldier
who can wield a Snooze
or a Fizzle.

82195.空を自在に飛びまわり\n混乱をまき散らす悪魔。\nバギクロスを唱えて\n巨大な竜:
A demon that flies
freely through the sky
and spreads chaos, it
creates a huge tornado
by chanting Kaswoosh.

82257.ガーゴイルたちを従える\n黒き翼の高貴なる悪魔。\nバイキルトを駆使して\n強烈:
A noble black-winged
demon who follows
Gargoyle and his
friends, he uses his
oomphle to deliver
powerful swordplay.

82324.深い深い山奥で修行していた\nテングが人里に舞い降りた。\n自慢の扇をひと振りす:
Tengu, who had been
training deep in the
deep, deep mountains,
landed in a human
village. One swing of
his prized fan and a
whirlwind of death
ensues.

82400.ルファ神殿の最上階に現れた\n創生の祭壇の番人。\n光のチカラを探すモモモたちに:
The guardian of the
Altar of Creation who
appears on the top floor
of Rufa Temple. He
stands in the way of
Sanguin and his friends
who are searching for
the power of light as a
trial.

82475.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の兵器。\nもともと羅刹王バラ:
An ancient demon weapon
sealed in Galatea's God
Spear 500 years ago. It
is said to have been
originally created to
protect Evil Spirit
Varashna.

82554.体色が青くなり凶暴さを増した\n重量級の大トカゲ。\nおたけびで敵をひるませ\n:
A heavyweight, large
lizard with a blue body
that has become more
ferocious, it uses War
Cry to flinch enemies
and deliver a heavy tail
strike.

82628.リザードファッツとは別の\n進化をとげた黄色の巨竜。\nひかりのブレスやリベホイ:
A yellow giant dragon
that has evolved
differently from Frou-
Frou. It can now also
use Breath of Light and
Remoreheal spells.

82707.雪と氷の中でも暮らせるのは\n光ブレスの熱のおかげだとか。\nバイキルトで攻撃力:
He can live in snow and
ice thanks to the heat
of his light breath, and
his Oomphle makes him
more aggressive and
tail-waggingly vicious.

82787.万病に効く神秘の宝石\nアルゴンハートを宿す竜。\nしかし 今は絶滅してしまい\:
A dragon that possesses
the Argon Heart, a
mystical gem that cures
all diseases. However,
it is now extinct and
the gem is lost.

82860.５０００年の時を生きた巨竜が\n魔瘴に蝕まれた姿。\nその耐え難い苦痛に自我を失:
A giant dragon that has
lived for 5,000 years
has been corrupted by
demon miasma. The
unbearable pain of the
dragon's death has
caused it to lose its
ego, and it has turned
into a disaster that has
taken its revenge on the
world.

82937.凶暴な獣人と見せかけて\nじつは自分のテンションを\n自在に操作するような\n計:
He is a calculating man
who appears to be a
ferocious beastman, but
in fact is able to
manipulate his own
tension at will.

83005.返り血によって 全身が\n真っ赤に染まった凶暴な獣。\nテンションを一気に上げて:
A ferocious beast whose
entire body is stained
true red by returning
blood. It raises its
tension all at once and
launches a painful
attack technique.

83078.風をあやつる 牛型の魔獣。\nかちあげや痛恨の一撃で\nこちらを追いつめてから\:
A cow-shaped monster
that manipulates the
wind. It will catch up
to you with its
"Kachiage" and "The
Painful Strike" and
finish you off with its
"Wind Sickles".

83152.ベルムドに対する怨念を\nキルギルに利用され魔物化。\nその怪力を活かして\n豪:
Kirgyl's grudge against
Bermud was harnessed by
Kirgyl to turn him into
a monster. He uses his
monstrous strength to
powerfully strike his
enemies.

83220.元バンドマンの夫を持つ\nバリバリのキャリアウーマン。\n仕事では辣腕を振るい\:
She is a career woman
with a husband who used
to be a band member. She
is a shrewd
businesswoman, and when
it comes to battles, she
is a hard worker.

83296.マデッサンスに飾られた絵だが\n美術館の警備も務める魔物。\nこの絵画の思想が昇:
The painting was
displayed at the
Madessance, but it is
also the security of the
Art Museum, and the idea
of this painting was
sublimated into Wild
Fauvism.

83379.マデッサンスに飾られた絵だが\n美術館の警備も務める魔物。\nこの絵画の思想が昇:
The painting was
displayed at the
Madessance, but the
monster also works as a
security guard at the
Art Museum, and the idea
of this painting was
sublimated to become
Evil Cubism.

83461.魔幻園に飾られる絵だが\n美術館の警備も兼ねている。\nこの絵画の思想が昇華され:
The painting is
displayed in the Magic
Garden, but it also
serves as security for
the Art Museum. The idea
of this painting was
sublimated and became
Dark Realism.

83538.戦うためだけに生まれてきた\n血気さかんなドラゴン。\nオノ攻撃に気を取られると:
A bloodthirsty dragon
born for the sole
purpose of fighting, if
you are distracted by
the axe attack, you will
be killed by the flames
it spews out.

83612.ドラゴン族の誇り高き戦士。\n自らの身体以上に重いオノを\n軽々と持ち上げ 振り:
A proud warrior of the
dragon tribe, he easily
lifts and swings his
axe, which is heavier
than his own body, and
crushes everything in
his path.

83688.燃えるような身体の色をした\nバトルレックスの亜種。\nはげしいほのおを吹きつつ:
A subspecies of
Hacksaurus with a fiery
body color. It sometimes
fires heavy blows while
blowing a fiery blast of
fire.

83764.偽りの世界のガリアル洞に\nどこからか流れついた魔物。\n巨大なオノを振り回し\:
A monster that has
drifted into the false
world of Garial Cave
from somewhere, wielding
a giant axe and knocking
down everything in its
path.

83837.自前のうろこが硬質化して\n独特の輝きを放つようになり\nまるで聖なるよろいを\:
The scales become
hardened and have a
unique shine, making
them look as if they are
wearing a holy robe.

83911.ナドラガ大神殿の地下で\n看守を務めていたドマノが\n竜化した姿。彼のブレスは\:
NadragaGreat Temple's
underground guard,
Domano, was a dragonized
form. His breath was
used for various
tortures.

83984.ナドラガ大神殿の地下で\n看守を務めていたロマニが\n竜化した姿。\n処刑用のオ:
Romani, who was a guard
in the basement of
NadragaGreat Temple, is
a dragonized form. She
boldly handles the axe
for execution.

84049.王子のくせに仲間を集めて\nコミックソングを歌うのが\n好きで 回復呪文も得意と:
He is a prince who likes
to collect companions
and sing comic songs,
and is also good at
recovering spells.

84125.病で死んでいった人々の\n苦しみをチカラに変え\n呪いのうたを歌い上げる\n恨み:
She is a singer who
sings songs of curse and
resentment, transforming
the suffering of those
who have died from
illness into power.

84187.数千匹の こんぶ魔物を\n配下に置く こんぶ界の大物。\n威厳に満ちたバリトンで:
A giant in the kelp
world with thousands of
kelp monsters under his
command. He ignites the
heart of the companion
with his majestic
baritone.

84261.まりょくのうたを歌って\nこうげき魔力を上げてからの\n氷の呪文は かなりの威力:
Ice spells are quite
powerful after raising
attack magic by singing
Mariyoku no uta, and can
also call Caterwaulin'.

84339.奇跡の歌声を宿した\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nたたかいのうたを歌えば\n魔物の:
A demon guarding the
Trial Gate with a
miraculous singing
voice. The soul of the
monster shakes when it
sings the song of the
battle!

84401.ただならぬ怨念を漂わせる\n正体不明のまがまがしき者。\n聞くもおぞましい呪いの:
An unidentified and
mysterious person who
exudes an extraordinary
grudge. It attacks,
chanting a haunting,
haunting song.

84479.ギスマイヤーが死霊の書で\n召喚した タチの悪い死霊。\n聞くのもおぞましい呪い:
A vicious spirit of
death summoned by
Gismeyer in the Book of
Dead. It attacks while
chanting a haunting,
haunting song.

84557.古き時代の戦士のヨロイに\n魂が宿り さまよいだした。\n往年の剣技が染みついて:
The spirit of an old-
time warrior armor has
taken hold of him and he
wanders forth. The
swordsmanship of
yesteryear has seeped
into him, and he
unleashes The Painful
Strike.

84633.地獄で大量生産されている\n邪悪な意思を持つ よろい。\nいかずちを呼び寄せ\n:
A yoroi (armor) with
evil intentions that is
mass-produced in hell.
It attracts ikazuchi and
turns the whole area
black.

84703.返り血で染まった よろいが\nひとりでに動きはじめた。\nキングダムソードをかか:
The blood stained armor
began to move by itself.
It lowers the defenses
of its prey with its
Kingdom Sword.

84779.いつも 親分のカンダタに\nぞんざいに扱われている子分。\nウサを晴らすかのよう:
The henchman is always
treated roughly by his
boss, Robbin' 'Ood. He
unleashes The Painful
Strike as if he is
trying to get rid of
him.

84849.正確無比な 剣技に加え\nスクルトで 防御もバッチリ。\n攻防ともに 秀でた\n:
An elite jet-black knight
that excels in both attack
and defense. Attacks with
a sword and uses Buff.

84914.幻の黄金郷で生まれたという\nプレミアムなスライム。\nもちろん落とすゴールドも:
The premium Slime was
born in a golden land of
illusion, and of course,
the gold it drops is of
the ultra-royal class!

84985.逃げるうちにメタルボディが\nプラチナへと進化した\n完全究極なるメタルの大王。:
The ultimate metal king,
whose metal body has
evolved to platinum as
he runs away. His escape
is also platinum class!

85058.マデュライトと呼ばれる\n未知の鉱物でできたスライム。\n自らの中心に光を集めて:
Slime, made of an
unknown mineral called
Darkonium, gathers light
at its center and emits
a Darkonium beam.

85134.スライム界の頂点を極めた\n唯一絶対なる皇帝。\nザオラルで仲間を生き返らせる\:
The one and only
absolute emperor who has
reached the pinnacle of
the Slime world, a
master with a
compassionate heart who
brings companionship
back to life with Zing.

85204.魔女グレイツェルに奪われた\nザンクローネの心臓が\n熱く煮える鍋に落とされて\:
Zankrone's Heart, stolen
by Witch Gretzel, was
dropped into a boiling
hot pot and turned into
a monster.

85280.悠久の時を経てメタルボディが\nプラチナへと進化した\n完全究極なるメタルの大王:
The ultimate metal king,
whose metal body has
evolved to platinum over
the ages. His escape is
also platinum class!

85354.紫のほこらに突如現れた\n美しく光り輝くスライム。\n謎のエナジーに満ちており\:
The beautifully glowing
Slime suddenly appears
at the Purple Shrine,
full of mysterious
energy and full of
motivation.

85428.魔物と化してクネクネと\n動きまわるようになった石柱。\n手にした たいまつを使:
A stone pillar that has
turned into a monster,
moving and spinning. It
casts a Frizzle spell
with the Torch in its
hand.

85506.意思を持って動きまわる\nあやしげな石柱の魔物。\n長いウデと身体を使った\n足:
A stone pillar monster
that moves with its own
will and spins with a
mysterious appearance,
beware of Leg Sweep,
which uses its long
udder and body.

85576.なまめかしいコシの動きで\n見る者を混乱させてしまう。\nそこにメラゾーマで追い:
The dazzling Koshi
movements confuse the
viewer. Then, a nasty
monster chases after
them with Kafrizz.

85656.東方の香りが ただよう\n神秘的で玄妙な動きで\n敵を死の世界へ いざなう\n恐:
A dance master of fear
who brings his enemies
to the world of death
with his mysterious and
mysterious movements
that have the fragrance
of the East.

85722.長い間放置された燭台が\n魔瘴に触れて魔物と化した。\n放置された恨みから誰彼構:
A long-abandoned
candlestick touched by
demon miasma turned into
a monster. Out of
resentment at being
neglected, he shows his
death dance to anyone
who will listen.

85802.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な さまようよろい。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Restless Armour
is a man of
extraordinary strength,
with red, piercing eyes
and a fierce, murderous
intent.

85866.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な わかめ王子。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil King Kelp is a
man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce intent to kill.

85927.警報で仲間を呼び集め\nミサイルをブッ放し\n巨大な身体で踏みつける\n脅威のメ:
A threatening metal
dragon that summons
companions with alarms,
unleashes missiles, and
stomps down with its
huge body.

85992.金色に輝くボディを持つ\nマシン系モンスターの王者。\nふみつけ攻撃ひとつにも\:
The king of machine-type
monsters with a golden
body. Even its sneak
attack has the air of a
king.

86065.レトロな機械の身体を持つ\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\n体内の溶鉱炉を燃やして\n:
A monster guarding the
gates of TRIAL with a
retro-mechanical body,
it burns a furnace
inside its body and
releases a shakunetsu.

86132.偽りの白き諸刃の塔にいた\n正体不明の 機械竜魔人。\nミサイルとひかりのブレス:
An unidentified
mechanical dragon demon
in the false and angry
White Blade Tower. It
scorched the area with
its missiles and light
breath.

86205.古代アラハギーロの魔の遺産。\n現代では再現不能な技術で\n造られた強力無比なミ:
A legacy of the ancient
Al-Ahagiro demons.
Powerful missiles built
with technology that
cannot be reproduced
today vaporize their
targets without leaving
any trace.

86288.魔界の将来をになうベビー。\nちょっと背伸びしたい年頃で\nまだ使えない 強力な:
The future of Demon
World, this baby is at
an age where he wants to
grow up a little and try
to cast powerful spells
that are not yet
available.

86361.魔界のエリートの家に生まれ\n英才教育を受けた魔族の子供。\n無邪気な笑顔で 楽:
A gifted demon child
born in the home of
EllieT in Demon World.
He is a child of a
gifted demon, born into
the family of Ellieto in
Demon World and happily
bursting with faint
breaths of air with an
innocent smile.

86441.魔王の手下が偵察のために\n地上に放つというスパイ。\nおどりでＭＰを吸い取った:
A spy released on the
ground by the Demon
King's minions for
reconnaissance. They
suck out MP by dancing
and harass you in a
unsophisticated manner.

86518.雪の中から生まれたという\n小さな悪魔。なめてかかると\nイオグランデや死のおど:
This little demon was
born out of the snow,
and if you underestimate
it, you will be buried
in the cold snow by the
Kaboomle or the Dance of
Death.

86597.ビンゴ好きのベビーサタンが\n連戦連勝を重ねた末に変身！\n幸運を呼ぶ福式呼吸で:
Bingo lover Imp
transformed himself
after a series of
consecutive wins! His
specialty is Happi
Breath, which he
releases with blessed
breath that brings good
luck.

86676.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし 暗黒の魔人。\n何者かの妖術により 強:
Ruin, sealed away as an
immortal in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

86746.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な エンタシスマン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺:
The evil Prancing Pillar
has an unparalleled
strength, and its red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

86810.カラフルでポップな見た目だが\nケタ外れの殺傷力を持つ兵器。\n外見にだまされ:
Colorful and Poppu-like
in appearance, but with
extraordinary lethal
power. It plays with
careless enemies
deceived by its
appearance.

86901.身体より大きいサイズの\nしっぽを持つリスの魔物。\n自慢のしっぽを振り回して\:
A squirrel monster with
a tail larger than its
body, it wags its tail
and unleashes The
Painful Strike.

86974.青き毛皮をまとった\nしなやかな小動物の魔獣。\nボミオスで すばやさを下げて\:
A supple little beast
with blue fur, it
attacks cautiously with
its agility lowered by
deceleratle.

87043.カタツムリのように巻かれた\n巨大なシッポを持つ魔獣。\nさそうおどりに釣られる:
A magical beast with a
huge tail coiled like a
snail, it will gobble
you up with The Painful
Strike if caught in a
Sultry Dance!

87117.星色の体毛と夜色の体毛が\nしま模様を描く小さな魔獣。\nメダパニーマを唱えて\:
A small magical beast
with star-colored and
night-colored body hair
striped in stripes, it
wreaks havoc by chanting
Kafuddle.

87187.闇の根源の秘密に通じる\n魔仙卿を追い詰めるために\n放たれた魔瘴魂。無尽の怒り:
Evil Soul is unleashed
to hunt down The Oracle,
who has access to the
secrets of the source of
the darkness, and an
inexhaustible fury
strikes in the form of a
vicious dragon.

87264.周囲を回る相棒と ともに戦う\n太陽の姿をした陽気な魔物。\nすべてを 灰じんに:
He is a jolly sun-like
monster who fights
alongside his orbiting
partner, burning
everything in his path
to ashes.

87345.悪魔のように不気味に笑う\n闇の太陽。自身の周囲を回る\n衛星とのコンビネーショ:
The sun of darkness that
smiles eerily like a
demon. Combined with the
satellites circling
around itself, it
confuses the enemies
around it.

87419.地獄の底で生まれながら\n天体を思わせる奇妙な魔物。\n闇の呪文を駆使し 生ける:
Born in the depths of
hell, this strange,
celestial-like monster
uses its dark spells to
bring every living thing
to death.

87497.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n三の災壇を守護するのは\n黒:
The incarnation of
disaster stands in the
way of the challenger of
Banma Tower. The sun,
clothed in black flame,
protects the three
banmas.

87566.闇の根源のチカラをそそがれ\n支配欲におぼれた傲慢な邪竜。\n闇の魔力で魔剣アス:
An arrogant evil dragon,
infused with the power
of the source of
darkness and drowned in
a lust for domination.
It uses its dark magic
power to create the
illusion of Magic Blade
Astoron and slash its
enemies to pieces.

87649.こちらの動きを遅くしたり\n眠りに誘ってきたり\n人の足を引っ張るのが得意な\n:
He is a dark, dark guy
who is good at slowing
us down, luring us to
sleep, and dragging us
down.

87713.闇のチカラに魅入られし\n血塗られた暗殺者。\n眠らせた相手にさみだれうちで\n:
A bloodied assassin
fascinated by the power
of darkness, he
specializes in putting
his opponents to sleep
with the Rain of Pain.

87783.全身を黄色にそめた\n目立ちたがり屋かと思いきや\nハデな大技と地味なからめ手を:
He may look like a show-
off with his entire body
painted yellow, but he
is a wizard who uses
both big, flashy tricks
and more modest tricks.

87857.闇と死に彩られた\n忌まわしき冥界の仕事人。\n強力な呪文に加えて\n魅了やおた:
A workman of the
underworld, an
abomination colored by
darkness and death. In
addition to powerful
spells, he also uses
charm and war cry.

87924.暗い性格を克服し すっかり\n明るくなった やみしばり。\n今日も 歓喜のおたけ:
Hellbound Horror, which
has overcome its dark
nature and brightened up
completely, is again
raising a War Cry of joy
and dancing with
enchantment until the
morning course.

88004.この世のあらゆる怨霊を統べる\n最凶最悪の怨霊の王。\n踊り子を根絶やしにするた:
The king of the worst
vindictive spirits who
rules over all the
vindictive spirits in
the world, he attacks
with vindictive rage to
eradicate dancer.

88081.武闘魔ガウラドの師匠。\nかつて魔界で凶拳暴鬼の異名を\nとどろかせた武闘家だっ:
Warrior Demon Gaurad's
master. He used to be a
martial artist who was
known as "Demon Fist
Demon" in the Demon
World, but he fell into
disgrace when he was
defeated by Chotendoji.

88161.魔剣士ディゼルが絶望に飲まれ\n自我を失った姿。暴走する\n感情と魔の波動を抑え:
demon swordsmanDiezel is
a figure who has been
consumed by despair and
has lost his ego. Unable
to suppress his outburst
of emotions and demonic
vibrations, he attempts
to destroy everything.

88241.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な ニードルマン。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意:
The evil Needleman has
an unparalleled
strength, and his red,
piercing eyes are filled
with a fierce, murderous
intent.

88304.獲物を求めて さまよい歩く\nトゲトゲを生やした人形。\nその小さい姿に油断した:
A spiky doll that
wanders around in search
of prey. It is said to
comb those who are
caught off guard by its
small size.

88379.バイキルトで攻撃力を高めた後\nアタマのトゲトゲをぶつけて\n大きなダメージを狙:
After increasing its
attack power with an
oomphle, this extremely
dangerous monster aims
to inflict serious
damage by hitting the
spikes on its head.

88456.マホカンタの呪文と\nやいばのぼうぎょで守りを固め\n必殺のアサシンアタックを狙:
The monster is a hard to
underestimate player who
uses Bounce spells and
Pincushion to defend
himself, and aims for
the deadly Assassin's
Attack.

88527.メダパニーマの呪文で\n敵を混乱させて同士討ちを\n狙ってくる。名前どおりの\n:
Kafuddle's spells
confuse the enemy, and
he aims for a friendly
fire. As its name
suggests, Kafuddle has a
dirty streak.

88600.どデカい針を手にした\n試練の門を守りし魔物。\nアサシンアタックで\n冒険者の:
A monster guarding the
gates of the trial with
a huge needle in his
hand, he aims to kill
adventurers with his
Assassin's Attack.

88661.暗い洞くつの奥に住みつき\n通りがかった生き物を狙う。\n大きなエモノでも集団で:
They live deep in dark
caves and attack any
creature that passes by.
They attack even large
creatures in groups and
bring them down with
their spines.

88740.おどろくとトゲが飛び出す\nやっかいな体質のうさぎ。\n不用意に近づくと刺される:
A rabbit with a
troublesome constitution
that surprised and
spines pop out. It will
sting you if you
approach it
unintentionally, but it
does not necessarily
have hostile intentions.

88816.無垢なる愛で迎えられ \nいつのまにか忘れられた。\nさみしさと心細さで魔物と\:
Welcomed with innocent
love, forgotten before
you know it. A stuffed
rabbit that turned into
a monster with sadness
and heartache.

88889.突然変異で巨大化したサソリ。\n巨体をいかした回転アタックと\nしっぽの先の大き:
A scorpion that has
mutated into a giant. It
uses its huge body to
attack with a spinning
Attack and a paralysis
attack with a large
poisonous needle at the
end of its tail.

88972.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n二の災壇を守護するのは\n硬:
The incarnation of
disaster that stands in
the way of the
challenger of Banma
Tower. The two woes are
protected by a poisoned
tail covered with a hard
shell.

89044.鉄の殻でおおわれたサソリ。\nただでさえ硬い身体を\nスクルトでさらに強化する\:
A scorpion covered with
an iron shell. A hard,
single-minded guy who
strengthens his already
hard body even further
with Kabuff.

89115.悠久の時を越え 流砂の底から\nよみがえった伝説の巨大兵器。\n嵐を起こし 両手:
A legendary giant weapon
that has risen from the
depths of quicksand over
the ages. It creates a
storm and smashes
targets into barabas by
slamming its hands
together.

89198.ザハディガル岩峰に棲む\n伝説の巨大サソリ。\nその尾針には竜をも殺す\n強い毒:
A legendary giant
scorpion that lives on
Zahadigal Rock Peak. Its
tail hook is said to
have a strong venom that
can kill even dragons.

89262.圧倒的な剣技をもって\nあらゆるものを断たんとする\n彩虹の粘塊兵団の将。\n防:
A general of the Rainbow
Gooey Corps who seeks to
cut down everything with
his overwhelming
swordsmanship. He stands
in front of the defense
forces.

89333.ナドラガが取り込んだ魔瘴が\nその体内で 魔物化したもの。\n闇の魔法をまき散ら:
A demon miasma taken in
by Nadraga and
transformed into a
monster inside its body.
It attacks to eliminate
foreign substances while
spreading dark magic.

89415.ユノに嫉妬したエゼルの中に\n生まれた心の闇。自分を\n見てほしくて 暴れまわり:
Jealous of Yoon-ho,
Ezell's Dark Mind is
born within him, and he
wants her to see him, so
he goes on a rampage and
binds himself to his
partner.

89490.身体にキノコを生やした\nへんてこなスライム。\nマヌーサを唱えて\n旅人を惑わ:
A strange Slime with
mushrooms on its body,
it chants "Dazzle" to
mislead travelers.

89551.じめじめした所を好む\nネガティブなスライム。\nキノコ爆弾を設置し\n幸せそう:
A ne'er-do-well Slime
with a penchant for damp
places, he sets up a
Mushroom Bomb to explode
happy people.

89618.廃棄された ぬかどこに\n怨念が宿って 動きだした。\nメダパニーマを唱えて\n:
The discarded kafuddle
is now alive with
resentment, and it will
chant Kafuddle and turn
your thoughts into a
kafuddle.

89689.あのメタルスライムのボディに\n謎のキノコが生えてきた！\n胞子をバラまきながら:
Mysterious mushrooms
have grown on the body
of Metal Slime! They are
quickly escaping while
spreading spores.

89762.回復を得意とするげんま。\n可愛らしい姿が 特徴で\nかなりの 美食家らしい。:
A spirit that
specializes in recovery,
she has a lovely figure
and is said to be quite
a gourmet.

89814.サポートを得意とするげんま。\nとても美しい姿を しており\n自身も 美しいもの:
A spirit who specializes
in port, she has a very
beautiful figure and
likes beautiful things
herself.

89874.物理攻撃を得意とするげんま。\n戦いを好み つねに\n強き者を 求めている。:
A spirit that
specializes in physical
attacks, she loves to
fight and is always
looking for the strong.

89925.攻撃呪文を得意とするげんま。\n四本のウデから放たれる呪文は\nとても 強力なも:
A spirit that
specializes in offensive
spells, many of which
are very powerful and
are released from its
four udes.

89987.陽気でハデ好きな性格だが\n戦いでは様々な表情を見せる。\n時には重々しい態度で:
He is jovial and has a
flamboyant personality,
but in battle he shows a
variety of expressions.
He sometimes intimidates
others with his grave
demeanor.

90060.月から落ちてきたと\nウワサされる不思議な魔物。\nズッシードを唱えて\n星のご:
This mysterious monster,
rumored to have fallen
from the moon, chants
"thunk" and manipulates
gravity like a star.

90128.夜空から こぼれ落ちた\n燃える隕石に意思が宿った。\n表情をクルクルと変化させ:
The burning meteorite
that spilled from the
night sky has a will of
its own. The expression
changes and the attack
power and tension are
increased!

90204.夜の闇にうごめく\n正体不明の暗黒の星。\nドルマドンを唱えて\nさらなる深い闇:
An unidentified dark
star, hovering in the
darkness of the night,
invoking Kazammle to
call forth an even
deeper darkness.

90263.偽りの赤き炎業の塔にいた\n正体不明の 惑星魔人。\n寝起きのキゲンはとことん悪:
An unidentified
planetary demon in the
false, angry Red Fire
Tower. He has a very bad
temper when he wakes up
from sleep, and burns up
the area with flames and
explosions.

90341.不思議なツボの中にしまわれた\n呪いや魔瘴の集合体。\n驚異的な吸引力でモノばか:
A collection of curses
and demon miasma hidden
in a mysterious pot. It
sucks in not only things
but even magic power
with its astonishing
suction power.

90415.異界の空から降ってきた\n凍てつく隕石に意思が宿った。\nイオグランデの呪文で\:
The frozen meteorite
that fell from the
otherworldly skies has a
will of its own, and
with Kaboomle's spell it
will dispatch all its
enemies.

90486.邪神に仕える闇の騎士が\n魔界より推参した。\n邪神の加護を発揮して\n回復呪文:
A dark knight in the
service of the evil gods
has been promoted from
Demon World. He is able
to use recovery spells
with the blessings of
the evil god.

90550.邪悪な魔法の扱いに長ける\n外道に堕ちた魔法戦士。\n自らの魔力を暴走させて放つ:
An out-and-out
armamentalist skilled in
the use of evil magic,
he is a threat with his
Kaswoosh, which he
unleashes by unleashing
his own magical power.

90620.呪術を極めた魔族のエリート。\nドルモーアを暴走させ\nザオリクで仲間を復活させ:
EllieT, a demon who has
mastered the art of
conjuration, is a
formidable foe who is on
his guard to revive the
companion with his Kazam
out of control and
Kazing.

90693.死のチカラをあやつる\n高貴なる闇の聖騎士。\n強力な呪文と剣技で\n立ちはだか:
A noble dark holy knight
who wields the power of
death. He uses his
powerful spells and
swordsmanship to destroy
enemies who stand in his
way.

90758.大魔王に忠誠を誓っている\n親衛隊の一員。\n幼い頃から訓練にはげんできた\n魔:
He is a member of the SS
who has sworn allegiance
to the Great Demon King.
He is a member of the
Demon King's army and
has been training since
he was a child.

90828.刻印を刻まれた者を\n供物として 主に捧げようと\n襲いかかってくる 闇の騎士。:
A dark knight who
attacks those who have
been engraved to offer
them as an offering to
the Lord. Brutal as a
bloodthirsty beast.

90902.けがれの谷の女神の祠にて\n光の神装を守護する番人。\nイルーシャの女神の依代た:
He is the protector of
the divine light at the
shrine of the Goddess of
Defiled Valley, where he
fought to test Irusha's
qualifications to be the
goddess's dependent.

90978.呪われた大地の女神の祠にて\n光の神装を守護する番人。\nイルーシャの女神の依代:
He is the protector of
the divine light at the
shrine of the goddess of
the Cursed Land, where
he fought to test
Irusha's qualifications
as the goddess's vassal.

91055.シマを荒らす者は同族でも\n容赦しない 海のギャング。\n巨体を利用したボディプ:
The gangs of the sea
have no mercy on anyone
who trolls the
territory, even if they
are of the same tribe.
They use their huge
bodies to body press and
crush everything in
their path.

91130.水の領界に現れた謎多き魔物は\n妖しげなチカラを秘めていた。\n倒された後は煙の:
The mysterious monster
that appeared in the
Water Realm had a
mysterious power. After
it was defeated, it
turned into smoke and
drifted away.

91215.ニヒルな笑みを浮かべると\n鋭くとがった牙がギラリ。\n巨体から放つボディプレス:
Sizzli has sharp and
pointy fangs when he
smiles his nihilistic
smile. Body presses and
tail swings from his
huge body are also a
threat.

91289.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の幹部。\n羅刹王バラシュナの:
A cadre of ancient
demons sealed in
Galatea's God Spear 500
years ago, he is said to
be the most powerful
under Evil Spirit
Varashna's command.

91371.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の将帥。\n羅刹王バラシュナ配:
Ancient demon general
sealed in Galatea's God
Spear 500 years ago, he
led the monsters under
Evil Spirit Varashna in
a frontline rampage.

91455.敵味方関係なく襲いかかる\n残虐さゆえ ヴァレリアにより\nバルディスタから追放:
He is the younger
brother of the outlaw
brothers, who were
banished from Valdista
by Valeria because of
their cruelty in
attacking friend and foe
alike.

91528.五声のひとつ『歌』の声を\n体現する声霊と呼ばれる存在。\n天唱楽師がゲストとし:
Heaven Poet, a being
called a "voice spirit"
who embodies the voice
of "song," one of the
five voices, was invited
as a guest for a trial
live performance.

91608.背中に樹木を生やした\n太古から生きるドラゴン。\n戦いの最中にキズつくと\n葉:
A dragon that has lived
since prehistoric times
with a tree growing on
its back. When wounded
during battle, it eats
leaves to recover.

91675.背中に生えたハーブを食べて\n生きているエコロジーな竜。\nテンション上げて吹雪:
An ecological dragon
that lives off the herbs
that grow on its back.
He is a tension-lifting,
blizzard-wearing,
unforgiving enemy of
nature!

91755.火山地帯で生まれ育ち\nマグマを食らうという炎竜。\n強烈な炎の呪文とブレス攻撃:
Born and raised in a
volcanic region, this
fire dragon is said to
eat Magma Blast. It is a
true incarnation of
fire, wielding powerful
flame spells and breath
attacks.

91831.雪深い山奥に生息する古代竜。\nかがやく息 マヒャデドスなど\n絶対零度の吹雪攻:
An ancient dragon that
lives deep in the snowy
mountains. It freezes
everything with absolute
zero blizzard attacks
such as Kacrackle, its
sparkling breath.

91906.神獣アマカムシカの従者。\nチーズが大好きで葉の中に\nたくさん隠し持っているが:
Divine Beast
Amazlantelope's squire.
She loves cheese and has
a lot of it hidden in
her leaves, but she
doesn't care about
expiration dates.

91983.輝晶核と呼ばれる物質を\n生成できる悪霊型の魔獣。\n強い怨念に突きうごかされて:
An evil spirit-type
magical beast that can
generate a substance
called Pyroclast. Moved
by a strong grudge, it
escaped from the great
training hall of the
Demon World.

92057.輝晶核と呼ばれる物質を\n生成できる土竜型の魔獣。\n観客の少なさに怒りを覚え\:
An earth-dragon type
magical beast that can
produce a substance
called Pyroclast.
Angered by the small
audience, it fled from
the great training hall
of Demon World.

92130.輝晶核と呼ばれる物質を\n生成できる邪竜型の魔獣。\n強大なパワーを持てあまし\:
An evil dragon-type
magical beast that can
produce a substance
called Pyroclast. It has
escaped from the great
training hall of Demon
World because of its
great power.

92203.ケタ違いの強さを持つ\n邪悪な フォンデュ。\n赤く鋭い眼光には\n激しい殺意が:
The evil Fromage Fray is
a man of extraordinary
strength, with red,
piercing eyes and a
fierce, murderous
intent.

92264.ひょうきんな見た目とは\nうらはらに 爆発呪文を唱え\n自らを回復させる技も持つ:
Despite his friendly
appearance, he is a
sharp and tricky man
with a technique to heal
himself by casting an
explosive spell.

92334.魔法への耐性を下げ 呪文を\nたたきこんでくる 戦術家。\n身体の表面は よく燃:
He is a tactician who
lowers his resistance to
magic and casts spells.
The surface of his body
is said to be slimy with
burning oil.

92411.フォンデュが黒カビの\nダークサイドに堕ちて\n誕生した暗黒の闘士。\n闇のチカ:
Fromage Fray is a dark
fighter born from the
fall of Fromage Fray
into the dark side of
black mold. He is a
master of the power of
darkness.

92476.フォンデュが長生きした結果\nクセのない味に変化した。\n食の研究に余念がない\:
Fromage Fray has lived
long enough to have
changed its taste to a
less peculiar one. He is
a genuine lickspittle
cyst who is devoted to
the study of food.

92547.見た目はとってもキュート\n心はちょっと残忍な魔物。\nイーサの村の人々に\n白:
A cute-looking monster
with a brutal heart, he
is feared by the people
of Ether Village as the
"silver reaper".

92620.闇の領界に現れた謎多き魔物は\n妖しげなチカラを秘めていた。\n倒された後は煙の:
The mysterious monster
that appeared in the
Dark Realm had a
mysterious power. After
it was defeated, it
turned into smoke and
drifted away.

92705.地獄のキノコ三兄弟の末弟。\n見た目に似合わぬ心配りで\n兄弟たちの気分を盛り上:
The youngest brother of
the three Hell Mushroom
Brothers. He is a mood-
maker who lifts the
spirits of the brothers
with his concern that
does not match his
appearance.

92776.剣の霊壇に祭られている\n剣魔の里の守護霊。\n実力のある剣魔一族の者に\n奥義:
The Protection Spirits
of the Sword Demon
Village are worshipped
at the altar of the
spirit of the sword. He
bestows the secret of
Kenma Kagen
(manifestation of the
Sword Demon) to those of
the Sword Demon clan who
are capable of it.

92843.油断して たんすを開いた者を\nアタマからパクッといく。\nさらにダイナミックな:
The one who is careless
and opens the closet
will be snapped right
out of his head. Then,
with another dynamic
move, he delivers The
Painful Strike.

92922.魔力を宿した魔界のたんす。\nザキや死のおどりを使い\n確実に獲物を仕留めてから:
A Demon World chest of
drawers imbued with
magical powers, it uses
whacks and death dances
to ensure that its prey
is killed before it is
consumed with a single
gulp.

92997.滅びた王国の城で使われていた\nたんすに怨念が宿った。\nいやらしい呪文を使いこ:
A chest of drawers used
in the castle of a
ruined kingdom is filled
with a grudge. He uses
his nasty spells to
finish them off with The
Painful Strike.

93076.決して開けてはならないと\n言われる恐怖のたんす。\n呪文で混乱させてから\nゆ:
A chest of horrors said
never to be opened, it
confuses with SPELL and
then slowly swallows its
prey.

93147.ハロウィンの仮装をした\nお祭り好きのたんすミミック。\nハイになっている分\n:
A festive Wardrobe Mimic
dressed up in a
Halloween costume, he
can be out of control
when he's high and out
of control.

93220.七柱の種族神に対抗するため\n異界滅神ジャゴヌバが己の\n暴虐なる闘争心より生み:
An evil god who loves to
destroy and kill,
created by Jagonuba out
of his own tyrannical
fighting spirit to
oppose the Seven Pillars
of the Gods of Races.

93299.ドラキーの突然変異体。\nボミオスを唱えて足止めし\n自慢の豊満ボディを活かした:
A mutant of Dracky, she
chants "Deceleratle" to
stop them in their
tracks, and then uses
her voluptuous body to
press them to a
standstill.

93373.ファラザードを荒らす盗賊集団\nシシカバブ団の団長。\nヤンチャな子分を引き連れ:
He is the leader of
Shish Kebab, a group of
thieves who ravage
Farazard. He wields
weapons with his
mischievous henchmen at
his command.

93452.エルガドーラの呪いによって\n限界を超えたチカラを発揮し\nユシュカを倒すまで戦:
The curse of Elgadora
has changed him into a
vengeful demon who will
continue to fight until
he has overcome Yushka.

93532.おおあばれしては雪崩を\n引きおこすメーワクな魔物。\nたたかいの舞で こうげき:
A monster that creates
avalanches when it goes
on the rampage, its
mewakness increases when
its attack power is
boosted by the dance of
battle.

93611.たたかいの舞で気分を盛り上げ\nヒップインパクトで大暴れする\n魔物界の闘技場チ:
The arena champion of
the monster world, who
rages with hip impact,
enlivened by the dance
of battle. Of course,
his rank is
indiscriminate!

93694.みぞうの大災害である千夜嵐の\n核となる荒ぶる双神の片割れ。\n雷を自在にあやつ:
He is one half of the
raging twin deities that
form the core of the
Thousand Night Storm, a
catastrophe in Mizo. He
enjoys freely
manipulating thunder and
burning people.

93771.ミアラの宝杖の魔力によって\n凶暴な魔人と化したアスバル。\n閃光を放つ額の宝玉:
Asbal, transformed into
a ferocious demon by the
magic of Miara's
treasured staff, has
sealed the flashing
treasure ball on his
forehead, but this does
not stop his fierce
destructive impulse.

93856.虹色に輝く 巨大な羽根は\n鳥魔物界の王者の証。\nメラガイアーや しゃくねつで:
Their huge, rainbow-
colored feathers are the
sign of the king of the
bird-monster world, and
they burn all their
enemies with kafrizzles
and inchworms.

93928.火山の炎より生まれるという\n凶炎の魔鳥。メダパニで敵を\n混乱させ 体内に宿し:
This evil bird of fire,
born from the flames of
a volcano, confuses its
enemies with its fuddle
and then blasts them
mercilessly with the
flames it carries inside
its body.

94006.煉獄の炎よりも紅き魔鳥は\nメダパニで敵をまどわせ\nれんごくかえん しゃくねつ:
The red bird, more red
than the flames of
purgatory, will confuse
the enemy with its
Fuddle and burn every
life with its Rengoku
Kaean Textile.

94084.大いなる闇の根源より生まれた\n魔瘴魂と呼ばれる魔物の１匹。\nマデサゴーラの芸:
One of the monsters
called Evil Soul, born
from the root of the
great darkness, sealed
in a painting because of
the art of Madesagora.

94166.残虐な策略でネクロデアを\n滅ぼしたバルディスタの将軍。\n絶望に沈んだ魔族の目:
A general of Valdista
who destroyed Necrodea
with his cruel plots. He
wields a magical tool
that crystallizes the
eyeballs of demons sunk
in despair.

94246.いにしえの時代から息づく\n竜たちの英雄。黄金色の身体に\n月日をかけて霊光を貯:
A hero of dragons who
has lived since the time
of the ancients. His
golden body stores
spiritual light over the
course of many months
and releases a powerful
light breath.

94328.常闇の竜と呼ばれる存在の\n末裔たる凶悪なドラゴン。\nやみのブレスや 呪文に加:
A vicious dragon
descended from a being
called the dragon of
everlasting darkness. In
addition to its breath
of darkness and spells,
it also has a powerful
attack that makes use of
its huge body.

94406.神話の時代から存在するという\nいにしえの竜の１匹で\n闇のチカラをつかさどる。:
It is one of the ancient
dragons that have
existed since the
Mythical Age, and it
possesses the power of
darkness. It is said
that it is not evil.

94482.協団長トビアスが 修行の末\nはじめて 竜化に成功した姿。\n荒ぶる竜の本能に飲:
Tobias, the leader of
the Kyodan, has
successfully transformed
into a dragon for the
first time after
training. The dragon
instinct was so strong
that it lost control of
itself and attacked.

94559.三つ目が特徴の影の悪魔。\nいかにも悪そうな見た目だが\nベホマラーで仲間をいや:
A shadowy demon with
three eyes, it looks
evil, but it also has a
kind heart that soothes
its companion with
Multiheal.

94632.強烈なバギクロスで\n敵を一気になぎ倒す\n冷酷非情な 悪魔界の\nエリート・オ:
The ruthless and
ruthless evil Demon
World of EllieT of
EllieT, who strikes down
her enemies in one fell
swoop with her powerful
Kaswoosh.

94695.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n三の災壇を守護するのは\n強:
The incarnation of
disaster stands in the
way of the challenger of
Banma Tower. Protection
of the three banmasters
is a demonic god who
wields powerful spells.

94765.気性の荒すぎる 巨大なクマ。\n誰彼かまわずケンカをしかけ\nくらえば致命的な一:
A huge bear with an
excessively rough
temperament. It is an
extremely vicious
opponent that will pick
a fight with anyone and
everyone and deliver a
fatal blow if
confronted.

94846.ふさふさとした白銀の毛皮が\n自慢の巨大なシロクマ。\n野性の本能で氷属性の攻撃:
This huge polar bear
boasts of its fluffy
silvery white fur. Its
wild instincts lead it
to launch ice attacks.

94916.ギスマイヤーが死霊の書で\n召喚した陰険な死霊。生前は\nモリナラ大森林を根城に:
A grim and gruesome
spirit of death summoned
by Gismeyer in the Book
of Dead. Before his
death, he was a soldier-
like bandit who had made
Molinara Forest his
home.

94993.血の気が多すぎる巨大パンダ。\n目があった者を敵とみなし\n強力なツメの一撃で\:
A huge Breadada with too
much blood. It considers
anyone who meets its
eyes as its enemy and
tears everything apart
with a powerful claws
strike.

95067.おなじみ 我らの大盗賊！\nとにかくテンションが高く\n手下を集めては暴れまくる:
He is a high-spirited
guy who gathers his
minions and goes on a
rampage. He is also good
at recovery spells.

95140.夜の闇にまぎれて\n獲物を狙う 悪の処刑人。\nオノを振るうときは異様に\nテン:
An evil executioner who
targets his prey in the
dark of night, he is
said to get unusually
excited when he wields
his axe.

95209.いつも皆に迷惑をかける\n札付きのワル。\nテンション高めに暴れまわり\n痛恨の:
He is a bad boy who is
always causing trouble
for everyone. He is
always getting into
trouble with everyone,
and even unleashes The
Painful Strike in his
high-spirited rampage.
