95273.用心深く獲物を追い 隙あらば\nおそいかかる 死の追跡者。\nテンションを上げ:
He is a deadly tracker,
vigilantly pursuing his
prey and luring them
away at the first sign
of trouble. He is also
surprisingly dexterous,
raising tension and
recovering it.

95352.刻印を刻まれた者を\n供物として 主に捧げようと\n襲いかかってくる血の処刑人。:
A blood executioner who
attacks those who have
been engraved to offer
them as an offering to
the Lord. The blow of
the bloody axe is
powerful.

95429.万魔の塔の挑戦者に\n立ちはだかる 災いの化身。\n五の災壇を守護するのは\n剣:
The incarnation of
disaster stands in the
way of the challenger of
the Banma Tower. The
five woes are protected
by the master of
swordsmanship and
spells, Kiou, who is a
master of swordsmanship
and spells.

95499.全身ほうたいの魔物。\n怨念が込められた攻撃を\nその身に くらうと\n呪いにか:
A monster with a full-
body shape, it is cursed
if it is hit by an
attack that contains a
grudge.

95562.死後の復活を信じていたが\n亡者としてよみがえった。\n生ある者を眠りに誘い\n:
He believed in
resurrection after
death, but he came back
to life as a deceased
person. He lures the
living into sleep and
drags them straight to
death.

95636.邪教徒がおぞましい儀式で\n血を求める魔物と なった。\n同じく魔物と化した仲間:
Evildoers become
bloodthirsty monsters in
a horrific ritual. They
call upon their
companions, who are also
turned into monsters, to
spread the curse.

95709.生前は非道の限りを尽くす\n悪鬼のような野武士だった。\n今もこりずに人を呪って:
In his lifetime, he was
an evil warrior who did
everything inhumane.
Even now, he continues
to curse people and live
treacherously.

95784.発展強化型ヘルゲゴーグ４体の\nすべての能力を取り込んで\n完成した究極の魔法生:
The ultimate magical
creature and vessel of
Kyuronos without a body,
completed by
incorporating all the
abilities of the four
developmentally enhanced
Helgegog bodies.

95867.時獄獣の肉体を滅ぼすことで\n自身の能力に最適化した形態に\n構成しなおすことこ:
Kyuronos' true goal was
to destroy the body of
the beast of time and
reconfigure it into a
form optimized for its
own abilities.

95947.フードの男が黄色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\n巨大な鉄球で大きな破壊と:
A beast demon of the
other world summoned by
Hooded Man with a yellow
spell. With its huge
iron ball, it wields a
curse that causes great
destruction and makes
people smaller.

96023.神秘の鉱石 サルファバル鉱の\nチカラで 自己の肉体や能力を\n強化できる魔獣。:
A magical beast that can
strengthen its own body
and abilities with the
power of the mysterious
ore Sulphubal Ore, even
the Four Sorcerers could
only seal it away.

96104.フードの男が青色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\nするどいツメを振りまわし:
A beast demon of the
other world summoned by
Hooded Man with a blue
spell. It wields sharp
claws and slashes at
everything in its path.

96178.ドミネウス王に化けていた\n人形が処刑失敗時の混乱の中\n正体を現した。額の紋章:
The doll that had been
disguised as King
Domineus revealed its
true identity in the
chaos that ensued when
the execution failed.
The coat of arms on his
forehead is a sign of a
treasure passed down
through the royal
family.

96252.滅びの回避を目的とする\nドミネウス王が 時見の箱に\n集めたチカラをその身に宿:
The King Domineus, whose
goal is to avert
extinction, has
transformed himself by
taking the power he has
gathered in the Timeseer
Box into his body.

96322.追い詰められたドミネウス王が\n時見の箱からチカラを引き出し\n自らを魔物に変化:
King Domineus, cornered,
draws power from the
Timeseer Box and
transforms himself into
a monster, displaying a
unique ability beyond
that of a human being.

96407.フードの男が紫色の呪符により\n召喚した異界の獣鬼。\n巨大な剣を自在に振り回し:
A beast demon from
another world summoned
by Hooded Man with a
purple spellbook. He is
an expert in battle,
wielding a huge sword at
will and manipulating
lightning and wind.

96483.召喚符によって呼び出される\n獣鬼たちの王のひとり。\n変幻自在の超剣技で\n立:
One of the kings of the
beast demons summoned by
a summoner's charm. He
slays his enemies with
his ever-changing super
sword techniques.

96556.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の一角。\n魔族という種の根源:
An ancient demon sealed
in Galatea's God Spear
500 years ago, this
creature is close to the
root of the demon
species and has
overwhelming killing
power.

96637.神の器をつけ狙って\nアストルティア全土に\n災いを振りまいた張本人。\nその正:
He is the one who has
been stalking the
vessels of God and
spreading misfortune
throughout Astoltia. His
true identity is said to
be that of a dragon
tribe.

96704.邪悪なる意志を名乗る\nナダイアが竜化した姿。\nただひとつの信念がひとりの\n:
Nadaia, who calls
herself Evil Will, has
turned into a dragon.
Her single-minded belief
has made one dragon
tribe so strong.

96778.竜将アンテロが竜化の術を使い\n竜の姿へと変身をとげた。\n身震いするような咆哮:
Dragon General Antelo
has transformed into
dragon form using the
art of dragonification.
He stands in front of
Abyss Gate with a
trembling roar.

96861.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nスライム界の大将軍。\n絶大なカリスマを発揮し\n敵さ:
A general of the Slime
world sealed in Magic
Maze. He exerts immense
charisma, making even
his enemies bow down to
him.

96926.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ドン・モグーラ。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Don Mole, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is weakened by
sorcery, but be on your
guard.

96994.神たる者はその意思の在り様が\nそのまま外見に現れるという。\n巨竜も人型も邪竜:
It is said that a god's
will is directly
reflected in his or her
appearance. Giant
dragons, humanoid
dragons, and evil
dragons are all
manifestations of
Nadraga's will.

97080.創世の女神が生みだした\n七柱の種族神の長兄。\n魔瘴を取り込んだことで\n異形:
The eldest brother of
the seven races deities
created by the goddess
of creation. The actual
form of the miasma,
which has turned into a
deformity by taking in
the miasma.

97150.総主教オルストフが\n竜神の一片である正体を現した\nおぞましい姿。\n体内に魔:
Patriarch Orstov is a
horrifying manifestation
of a piece of the Dragon
God. It carries demon
miasma venom in its
body.

97217.ナドラガ神に宿っていた魔瘴が\n邪悪な意思を芽生えさせた。\n大いなる闇の根源の:
The demon miasma that
resided in Nadraga
sprouted an evil intent.
He called himself the
alter ego of the great
dark root, but how true
is he?

97299.神官エステラの竜化した姿。\n暴走状態におちいっており\n美しい姿とは うらはら:
Priestess Estella's
dragonized form. She is
in a runaway state, and
despite her beautiful
appearance, she wields a
terrifying storm.

97375.パドレの囚われし心に巣食う\n幻影。宿主の憎しみと恐怖を\n増幅させて 理性と情:
A phantom that nestles
in Padre's captive mind.
It amplifies the host's
hatred and fear, and
tries to smear and erase
reason and affection.

97454.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし Ｓキラーマシン。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Trauminator, sealed in
the Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery but must be on
his guard.

97522.巨大な手のような形をした\n正体不明の化け物。\nメルサンディ村を襲い\nミシュ:
An unidentified monster
shaped like a giant hand
attacked Melsandy
Village and kidnapped
Mishua.

97591.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n悪夢の右手の幻影。\n本物よりも:
A phantom of the Right
Incubus that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

97654.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n悪夢の左手の幻影。\n本物よりも:
A phantom of Left
Incubus that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real thing.

97717.まがまがしい炎を全身にまとい\n炎の領界を荒らす鳥の魔物。\nアペカの村の住人た:
A bird monster that
wreaks havoc in the Fire
Realm, it is feared by
the residents of Apeka
Village.

97796.召喚術師リンジャーラが配した\n彼の日記を守るための守護者。\n左手へのサポート:
Protectionist to protect
his diary, cast by the
summoner Linjara. He is
said to be the best in
the world in the field
of saport to the left
hand.

97879.召喚術師リンジャーラが配した\n彼の日記を守るための守護者。\n右手のサポートを:
Protector to protect his
diary cast by the
summoner Linjara. The
goal is to receive the
right hand Saport and
left to control the
world.

97961.アンルシアが自らの記憶を\n封じるために生みだした\n悲しき記憶の番人。\n深い:
A sad guardian of
memories created by
Anlucia to seal her own
memories. He appears
from the deep mist.

98028.勇者の影武者として生き\nそして死んだ悲劇の王子。\n大魔王の魔力で復活させられ:
A tragic prince who
lived and died as Hero's
shadow warrior, he was
resurrected by the Great
Demon King's magical
powers and became Hero
of Darkness.

98101.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n挑戦者の記憶から戦:
They are called "war-
devil's dependents"
created by the thoughts
of the evil god of war.
They are said to
reproduce the appearance
of the opponent who is
difficult to fight from
the challenger's
memories.

98183.ペコリア・アルファは\nバイキルトで攻撃力を強化し\nテイルフィニッシュを放つ\:
Pekoria Alpha is a
close-range atucker type
that uses Oomphle to
enhance its attack power
and tail finish.

98253.世界を自分の思うままに\n創り変えようと企み\n創世の女神への挑戦者を\n自称す:
Demon King is an artist
who calls himself a
challenger to the
goddess of creation,
plotting to create the
world as he sees fit.

98317.ペコリア・オメガは\nあやしいひとみで敵を眠らせ\nいなずまを落としてくる\n遠:
Pekoria Omega is a long-
range sapport type that
puts the enemy to sleep
with a dubious pupil and
drops Lightning.

98382.創生の魔力を得て異形の姿へと\n変身をとげたアンルシア姫。\nやみのころもをまと:
Princess Anlucia, who
has been transformed
into a deformed form by
the magical power of
creation, becomes
impervious to all
attacks when cloaked in
the Clothes of Darkness.

98462.ダイム老の孫のテグラムが\n魔勇者アンルシアの魂に\nあやつられ 変身した姿。\:
Tegram, grandson of Old
Man Dyme, was
transformed by the
spirit of Evil Hero
Anlucia. He has
abilities comparable to
those of a Demon Hero.

98537.あでやかな微笑に冷酷さを\nにじませて 襲いかかってくる\n謎多き妖女。空中に浮:
A mysterious and
mysterious demoness who
attacks with a ruthless
ruthlessness in her
gorgeous smile. She
attacks by manipulating
a ball that floats in
the air.

98617.５００年前 ガラテアの神槍で\n封じられた古代魔族の一角。\n羅刹王バラシュナの:
A member of the ancient
demons sealed in
Galatea's God Spear 500
years ago, he was the
chief advisor to the
Evil Spirit Varashna and
wreaked havoc on the
earth.

98698.大いなる魔力により\n魔物になったベルムド王。\n砂漠に響き渡るおたけびは\n魔:
King Bermud, transformed
into a monster by his
great magical power,
makes monsters tremble
as his War Cry echoes
across the desert.

98769.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n破戒王ベルムドの幻影。\n本物より:
A phantom of Sin King
Bermud that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

98835.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n破戒王ベルムドの闇の影。\n本物よ:
The dark shadow of Sin
King Bermud appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activated. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

98902.偽りの禁呪の祭壇に 現れた\n魔人化したリンジャーラ。\n身の危険を 感じると\:
A demonized Linjara who
appears in the false
Forbidden Altar and uses
powerful summoning
techniques when he
senses danger.

98975.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n巨大なモグラの大親分。\nなぜ封じられたかは知らないが:
A large master of the
giant mole enclosed in
Magic Maze. He doesn't
know why he was sealed
up, but he is
surprisingly enjoying
the situation.

99051.ドワーフの神ワギに代わり\n闇の領界を見守ってきた神獣。\nその巨体に 貯めこん:
A divine beast that has
watched over the Dark
Realm in place of Wagi,
the god of Dwarf. It can
manipulate the power of
the earth stored in its
huge body at will.

99128.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nスライム族のダークヒーロー。\n勝利のためなら手段を選:
A Dark Hero of the Slime
Tribe sealed away in
Magic Maze. He is feared
as a ruthless reaper who
will stop at nothing to
achieve victory.

99207.大魔王マデサゴーラの命を受け\n暗躍する魔族の大幹部。\nまがまがしい剣を武器と:
He is a great demon
leader under the command
of the Great Demon King
Madesagora. He wields a
dazzling sword as his
weapon of choice and is
also skilled in the use
of powerful spells.

99283.知理の石版により増殖能力は\n封じられたが ギガマホトラで\n敵からＭＰを奪い:
The Wisdom Tablet blocks
their ability to
multiply, but the
GigaDrain Magic allows
them to steal MP from
their enemies and
unleash an endless
stream of powerful
techniques.

99363.業炎の聖塔の最奥部に現れた\n最後の試練の番人。\nオーガの神ガズバランが\n配:
The last guardian of the
trial that appeared in
the innermost part of
the Fire Tower,
apparently placed there
by Gazbalan, the god of
Ogre.

99428.氷晶の聖塔の最奥部に現れた\n最後の試練の番人。\nプクリポの神ピナヘトが\n配:
The last guardian of the
trial that appeared in
the innermost part of
the Ice Tower,
apparently placed there
by the Pukulipo god
Pinaheto.

99493.冥闇の聖塔の最奥部に現れた\n最後の試練の番人。\nドワーフの神ワギが\n配した:
The guardian of the last
trial that appeared in
the innermost part of
the Dark Tower,
apparently placed there
by Wagi, the god of
Dwarfs.

99555.天水の聖塔の最奥部に現れた\n最後の試練の番人。\nウェディの神マリーヌが\n配:
The last guardian of the
trial that appeared at
the innermost part of
the Water Tower,
apparently placed there
by Marine, the god of
Weddie.

99620.太古の昔 竜族と共に失われた\n神秘の楽器 竜笛でのみ\n操ることができる赤き飛:
A red flying dragon that
can only be controlled
by the Dragon's Flute, a
mysterious instrument
lost with the dragon
tribe in ancient times.

99677.太古の昔 竜族と共に失われた\n神秘の楽器 竜笛でのみ\n操ることができる青き飛:
A blue flying dragon
that can only be
controlled by the
Dragon's Flute, a
mysterious instrument
lost with the dragon
tribe in ancient times.

99734.太古の昔 竜族と共に失われた\n神秘の楽器 竜笛でのみ\n操ることができる黄なる:
A yellow flying dragon
that can only be
controlled by the
mysterious instrument
Dragon's Flute, which
was lost with the dragon
tribe in ancient times.

99793.フードの男に あやつられた\n黒き飛竜。すべてを焼きつくす\nやみのブレスで 敵:
A black flying dragon
controlled by the Hooded
Man. He uses his dark
breath to burn
everything down,
weakening his enemies,
and then summons
companions to finish him
off.

99873.翠嵐の聖塔の最奥部に現れた\n最後の試練の番人。\nエルフの神エルドナが\n配し:
The last guardian of the
trial that appeared in
the innermost part of
the Storm Tower,
apparently placed there
by Eldona, the god of
Elf.

99937.業炎の聖塔の守護者が\n邪悪なる意志によって操られ\n神の器を探す解放者の前に\:
The protector of the
Fire Tower, manipulated
by Evil Will, once again
stands before the
liberator in his search
for the vessel of God.

100010.氷晶の聖塔の守護者が\n邪悪なる意志によって操られ\n神の器を探す解放者の前に\:
The protector of the Ice
Tower, manipulated by
Evil Will, once again
stands before the
liberator in his search
for the vessel of God.

100083.魔元帥ゼルドラド配下の\n四魔将の一角を担う獣人。\nすばやい動きで近づき\nす:
A beastman who is one of
the four generals under
Marshal Zeldrad. He
moves swiftly to
approach and slash with
his swift claws.

100153.召喚符によって呼び出される\n獣鬼たちの王のひとり。\n類まれなパワーとスピード:
One of the kings of
beast demons summoned by
a summoner's charm. He
crushes his enemies with
his unparalleled power
and speed.

100230.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし キラーマジンガ。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Uberkilling Machine,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
weakened by sorcery, but
be on your guard.

100298.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし キラーマジンガ。\n何者かの妖術により:
The Uberkilling Machine,
immortal and sealed in
the Magic Maze, is
enhanced by someone's
sorcery and reappears in
the labyrinth.

100371.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n心を持たぬ殺りくマシン。\n侵入者は皆殺しにするよう\:
A mindless killing
machine sealed in Magic
Maze. It is programmed
by the Demon Army to
kill all intruders.

100447.血肉なき機械の身体で\nすべてを滅殺せんとする\n紫炎の鉄機兵団の将。\n防衛軍:
A general of the Purple
Mech Corps who tries to
destroy everything with
his flesh-and-bloodless
machine body. He stands
in front of the Defense
Forces.

100515.冥闇の聖塔の守護者が\n邪悪なる意志によって操られ\n神の器を探す解放者の前に\:
The protector of the
Dark Tower, manipulated
by Evil Will, once again
stands before the
liberator in his search
for the vessel of God.

100588.天水の聖塔の守護者が\n邪悪なる意志によって操られ\n神の器を探す解放者の前に\:
The protector of the
Water Tower, manipulated
by Evil Will, once again
stands before the
liberator in his search
for the vessel of God.

100661.翠嵐の聖塔の守護者が\n邪悪なる意志によって操られ\n神の器を探す解放者の前に\:
The protector of Storm
Tower, manipulated by
Evil Will, once again
stands before the
liberator in his search
for the vessel of God.

100734.メルサンディ村を恨み\n英雄ザンクローネの身体を\nバラバラにして化け物に変え\:
A witch who has a grudge
against Melsandy Village
and turns the body of
the hero Zankrone into
Barabaara, a monster,
and makes him attack the
village.

100805.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\n魔女グレイツェルの幻影。\n本物よ:
An illusion of Witch
Gretzel that appeared in
this world under the
influence of demon
miasma activation. It is
much stronger than the
real one.

100872.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ゴースネル。\n妖術で弱くなっているが:
Gosnell, sealed in Magic
Maze as an immortal. He
is weakened by sorcery,
but you must not let
your guard down.

100937.水の領界を治める巫女\nフィナが秘めていた真の姿。\nマリーヌ神の眷属たるチカラ:
The true form of Fina,
the priestess who rules
the Water Realm, the
power of the Marine
God's household will
hinder the liberator's
path.

101013.神官長に託された黒色の呪符で\nトビアスが召喚した切り札。\n複数のアタマを使っ:
The trump card summoned
by Tobias with a black
spellbook entrusted to
the chief priest. The
attack using multiple
atoms never stops.

101090.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの邪竜。\n本来の主に命じられるがまま\n魔軍:
Ancient evil dragon
sealed in Magic Maze. It
lends its power to the
demon army as ordered by
its original master.

101160.５つの首を持つ 伝説の魔竜が\n試練の門の守護者となった。\n多頭を活かした か:
The legendary demon
dragon with five heads
has become the protector
of the Trial Gate. It is
a multiheaded dragon
that uses its bite
technique to crush the
enemy's will to fight.

101242.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし キングヒドラ。\n何者かの妖術により:
King Hydra, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

101313.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし キングヒドラ。\n妖術で弱くなっている:
King Hydra, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is weakened by
sorcery, but be on your
guard.

101379.灼熱の炎と極寒の冷気を使う\n一騎当千の魔界の猛者。\n炎の鼻息を荒げながら\n:
A fierce one-hit wonder
of the Demon World who
uses scorching fire and
frigid cold. He destroys
everything in sight with
his fiery snarl.

101453.大魔王に忠誠を誓った\n魔王軍団の親衛隊。\n呪文とブレスを使いこなす\n生まれ:
A born-again Ellieto-
warrior who uses spells
and breaths, he is the
loyal fighter of the
Great Demon King's army.

101523.魔瘴が活性化した影響で\nこの世に出現した\nヘルバトラーの幻影。\n本物よりも:
The illusion of Barbatos
appeared in this world
under the influence of
demon miasma activated.
It is much stronger than
the real one.

101587.爆炎と竜巻を自在に操り\nトドメのしゃくねつの炎で\n戦場を地獄と化す。魔界に\:
He can manipulate
explosive flames and
tornadoes at will,
turning the battlefield
into hell. He is a
powerful man who has
made a name for himself
in the Demon World.

101660.オーガを憎む邪神にすがり\nチカラと引き換えに心を失った\nオルセコ王国の先王の:
This is the end of the
previous king of the
Orseco Kingdom who lost
his mind in exchange for
the power of the evil
god who hates Ogre. It
radiates a light that
transforms people into
beasts.

101739.ゾンガロンが自ら喰らった\n魔獣に身体を乗っ取られた姿。\nゾンガロンの技と魔獣:
The Zongalon is a form
of Zongalon that has
been taken over by a
magical beast that has
fed on itself, and
skillfully uses both
Zongalon's techniques
and the magical beast's
abilities.

101822.巨大なヤリを軽々と振り回し\n海を支配する雄々しき人魚。\n魔法も得意とし 強力:
A majestic mermaid, she
rules the sea, swinging
her huge spear with
ease. She also excels at
magic, using her
powerful spells to turn
her enemies into sea
dregs.

101901.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし グラコス。\n妖術で弱くなっているが\:
Gracos, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery but must be on
his guard.

101964.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\nいにしえの四魔王の一角。\n大いなる存在の命を受けて\:
One of the four ancient
Demon Kings sealed in
Magic Maze. He lends his
power to the Demon Army
under the order of a
great being.

102038.幾多の世界を 滅びに導いた\n破壊と殺りくの神。\n人知を超越した強さは まさに:
A god of destruction and
killing who has led many
worlds to ruin. His
strength that transcends
human knowledge is truly
worthy of the name God
of Destruction.

102111.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n幻界の四諸侯の一角。\n倒すべき 強敵を求めて\n魔軍:
He is one of the four
lords of the illusionary
world sealed in the
Magic Maze. He lends his
strength to the demon
army in search of
powerful enemies to
defeat.

102180.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし グラコス。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Gracos, immortal and
sealed in the Magic
Maze, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

102248.グラコスの玄孫にあたる\n五代目の海魔の王。こんな\n世代差デュオが組めるのも\:
He is the fifth
generation of Gracos'
grandson, the King of
the Sea Demons. It is
only with the longevity
of demons that a duo
with such a generational
difference can be
formed.

102324.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n巨大な建造物の怪物。\n意思を持たず そのチカラのみ\:
A monster of a huge
structure sealed in
Magic Maze. It has no
will, and only its power
is used by the demon
army.

102394.邪悪なる意志によって遣わされ\n巫女フィナに災いを与えた。\nオツムは残念だが意:
She was sent by Evil
Will to bring misfortune
to the priestess Fina.
She is a bit of a loser
in the diaper
department, but she is
surprisingly skilled in
the use of powerful
magic.

102473.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし デュラン。\n何者かの妖術により 強化:
Dhuran, sealed away in
the Magic Maze as an
immortal, is enhanced by
someone's sorcery and
reappears in the
labyrinth.

102541.魔幻宮殿に飾られた絵画だが\n侵入者を排除する役も兼ねる。\n絵に描いた魔物を呼:
It is a painting
displayed in the Demon
Palace, but it also
serves to eliminate
intruders. In addition
to calling up the
monsters depicted in the
paintings, he also likes
to fight to deceive his
opponents.

102623.魔幻宮殿に飾られた絵画だが\n侵入者を排除する役も兼ねる。\n絵に描いた魔物を呼:
It is a painting
displayed in the Demon
Palace, but it also
serves to eliminate
intruders. In addition
to summoning the
monsters depicted in the
paintings, they also
send clams from the
paintings.

102708.魔幻宮殿に飾られた絵画だが\n侵入者を排除する役も兼ねる。\n絵に描いた魔物を呼:
He is a painting that
hangs in the Demon
Palace, but also serves
to keep intruders out.
In addition to summoning
monsters from the
paintings, he also loves
to spray paint on them.

102793.奈落の門から もれ出した\n創生の霊核のチカラで\n最強の姿に変化をとげた\nマ:
The ultimate form of
Madesagora, transformed
into its strongest form
by the power of the
spiritual core of
creation that leaked
from Abyss Gate.

102860.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n伝説の機械戦士。その圧倒的な\n暴力は機械の姿を借りた:
A legendary mechanical
warrior sealed away in
the Magic Maze, this
overwhelmingly violent
creature has been
described as a demi-god
in mechanical form.

102939.炎の領界を徘徊している\n唯一無二の超高性能マシン。\n冷酷なるグランドインパク:
The one and only ultra-
high performance machine
roaming the Fire Realm.
It is a ruthless
gCrackerwhacker that
will round up the swarms
of enemies.

103018.三種の武器をはげしく振り回し\n痛恨の一撃で獲物を仕留める。\n２の名を冠するに:
The three weapons are
wielded in a vicious
manner to kill the prey
with a single, painful
blow. It is a merciless
killing machine worthy
of the name "2".

103100.氷の領界に現れた謎多き魔物は\n妖しげなチカラを秘めていた。\n倒された後は煙の:
The mysterious monster
that appeared in the Ice
Realm had a mysterious
power. After it was
defeated, it turned into
smoke and drifted away.

103185.おそろしい呪文をあやつる\n魔道に通じた秘宝の守護者。\n魔力かくせいをして\n:
He is a treasure
protector who knows the
magic of spells and
plays Channel Anger and
releases Kazammle.

103256.勇猛果敢さを誇る\n戦技に長けた秘宝の守護者。\nはげしいおたけびを上げ\n探求:
A warrior who boasts of
his valor and daring,
and is a skilled
protector of hidden
treasures. He raises a
fierce war cry to repel
the seeker.

103323.知略と絆を武器として\n自在に戦う秘宝の守護者。\nすばやく動きまわり\n襲いか:
A Protectionist of
hidden treasures who
fights freely using his
wits and bonds as
weapons. He moves
quickly and attacks.

103385.知略と絆を武器として\n冷静に戦う秘宝の守護者。\n暗黒のきりを呼びよせ\n探求:
A Protectionist of
hidden treasures who
fights calmly, using his
wits and bonds as
weapons. He calls down
the dark shroud and
steals the power of the
seeker.

103452.鉄壁の堅さを誇る\n守戦が得意な秘宝の守護者。\nにおうだちで立ちはだかり\n仲:
A defensive protector of
treasures with an iron-
clad firmness, he stands
in Forbearance to
protect his companions.

103519.鬼神のごとき強さで\n敵を圧倒する秘宝の守護者。\nジゴデインを唱えて\n地獄の:
A treasure protector who
overpowers his enemies
with the strength of a
demigod, he invokes
Kazapstrophe to summon
the ikazuchi of hell.

103584.古代技術を武器として\n破滅をもたらす秘宝の守護者。\n機械の身体をあやつって\:
A secret treasure
protectionist who uses
ancient technology as a
weapon to bring ruin. He
manipulates the body of
a machine and releases
missiles.

103655.太陽のごとく輝いて\n万物を統べる秘宝の守護者。\n秘められた竜眼が開く時\nす:
He is the protector of
the hidden treasure that
shines like the sun and
rules all things. When
the hidden dragon eye
opens, all blows are
nullified.

103726.長い年月を経て 意思を持った\nいにしえの王の右手。\n王が右利きだったせいか\:
The right hand of an
ancient king who had a
will after many years.
It is stronger than the
left hand because the
king was right-handed.

103801.長い年月を経て 意思を持った\nいにしえの王の左手。\n盗賊を呪ってミイラにする:
The left hand of an
ancient king who has had
a will after so many
years; I can't wait to
curse the THIEF and
mummify it.

103873.長い眠りから 目覚めた\nいにしえの王。\n長く眠りすぎた腹いせに\nあやしいひ:
Ancient king wakes up
from a long sleep. He is
lulled to sleep with a
dubious pupil to spite
his long slumber.

103939.禁忌の術で魂を闇に侵された\n１０００年前の先代勇者。\n闇に落ちようとも勇者ら:
A Hero whose soul was
darkened by a forbidden
technique 1,000 years
ago, he is still able to
use Kazap like a Hero
even though he has
fallen into darkness.

104016.その身に宿した冥界のチカラで\n万物を裁く いにしえの王。\n秘宝を狙う不届き者:
The King of the Ancient
One who judges all
things with the power of
the underworld in his
body. He judges all
things with the power of
the underworld that
resides in his body. He
Pyramidizes and condemns
those who seek the
hidden treasures of the
world.

104092.その身に宿した冥界のチカラで\n万物を呪う いにしえの女王。\n忠誠心あつく主を:
The Queen of the
Ancient, who curses all
things with the power of
the underworld she
carries in her body. The
mummies that protect
their loyal master are
her masterpieces.

104173.秘宝の探究者たちの前に\n立ちはだかる 最強の守護者。\n霊廟を守ることを誇りと:
The most powerful
protectionist who stands
in the way of treasure
seekers, he prides
himself on protecting
the tomb and eliminating
bandits with a variety
of attacks.

104249.ピラミッドに隠されている\n秘宝に宿るという魔物。\nザラキーマを唱え死を振りま:
The monster, said to
reside in a hidden
treasure in the Pyramid,
chants Kathwack and
flees, wielding death
and gloating.

104328.金色に輝くボディを持った\n人形魔物界のスター。\nだが 基本のふしぎなおどりは:
A star of the puppet
monster world with a
golden body. But he
never neglects the basic
Weird Dance.

104402.一族に伝わる究極奥義\n剣魔顕現を使って\n強大な剣魔と化した\n魔元帥ゼルドラ:
She is the daughter of
Marshal Zeldrad, who
became a powerful sword
demon by using the
family's ultimate secret
of sword demon
manifestation.

104461.しめなわとして使われていた\nなわに魂が宿り動きだした。\nやわらかいウデを使っ:
The crocodile used as a
shime nawa (a rope used
for shime nawa) has a
soul of its own. The
abundant techniques
using the soft udes are
not to be
underestimated.

104539.地面に落ちた黒ごまが集まり\n月日を経て小山になった頃\n意思を持って動き出した:
When black sesame that
fell to the ground
gathered and became a
small mountain over the
course of the month, a
fairy with 100% sesame
concentration began to
move with a will.

104613.周囲に独特なニオイを\nまき散らすチーズの化身。\nその匂いは姿は見えずとも\n:
The incarnation of
cheese that spreads a
distinctive smell around
you. The smell is so
strong that even if you
can't see it, you can
tell where it is.

104687.品種改良を続けるうち\n突然変異し白くなったナス。\n目立つのでよく鳥につつかれ:
The eggplant mutated and
turned white as the
breeding process
continued. It was so
conspicuous that it was
often pecked at by
birds, and as the birds
fled, they trained their
minds and bodies.

104764.聖なるチカラを身にまとう\n試練の門を守りし番兵。\nふらちな挑戦者どもを\n無:
The guard that guards
the gates of TRIAL, clad
in holy power. They
mercilessly dispatch the
wobbly challengers.

104829.悪神の火種が過去の心の傷に\nとりつき 暴走した三闘士。\n民を想う気持ちがねじ:
Fiend's Flame has taken
hold of the wounds of
the past and run amok,
turning Triad into a
wrathful god whose
feelings for his people
have been twisted and
turned into a god of
rage.

104907.悪神の火種が過去の心の傷に\nとりつき 暴走したハクオウ。\n悲しみに我を忘れ:
Fiend's Flame has taken
hold of Hakuo's past
wounds, and in his
grief, Hakuo has lost
control of himself and
is trying to destroy the
continent of Eltona.

104987.災厄の王との戦いで落命した\nハクオウがその絶望の記憶から\n生み出した幻影。執:
A phantom created by
Hakuo, who lost his life
in a battle with the
King of Calamity, from
the memory of his
despair. It relentlessly
targets and haunts
Hakuo.

105066.ケラコーナ原生林の空を\n支配する怪鳥。貴金属を好み\n巣に貯めこんでいる。\n:
A monstrous bird that
rules the skies of the
Keracona Wild Forest.
They love precious
metals and store them in
their nests. Of course,
it will not tolerate
intruders.

105139.始源の歌姫リナーシェが\n呪いにより悪神と化した姿。\n召喚して打ち放つのは か:
Linashe, the primordial
diva, has been
transformed into a fiend
by a curse. She summons
her fiance's sword,
which once pierced her
belly, and unleashes it.

105217.悪神の火種を取り込んだ\n審判の天使ヘルヴェル。\n姉と慕ってくる天使さえも\n:
Helvel, an angel of
judgment who has taken
Fiend's Flame into her
heart, denounces as
worthless even the angel
who loves her as a
sister, and kindles the
Cursed Flame.

105290.自ら開けた次元の穴から\n顔をのぞかせる異界の巨竜。\n源世庫に眠る不思議なチカ:
A giant dragon from
another world peeking
out from the dimensional
hole he has opened. It
was attracted by the
mysterious power that
lay dormant in the
Genseikou and manifested
here.

105369.この世ならざる美をもって\nあらゆるものを惑わせる\n芳墨の華烈兵団の将。\n防:
A general of the Ink
Beauty Corps who dazzles
all with her unworldly
beauty. He stands in
front of the defense
forces.

105440.太古の昔 こことは異なる地に\n破滅をもたらした異形の天使。\n源世庫に眠る不思:
Ancient times, a
deformed angel brought
ruin to a land different
from this one. The
mysterious power that
lies dormant in the
Genseikou has awakened
its phantom.

105522.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n恐るべき紫の魔竜。\n主と認めた者への忠誠心が強く\n:
A fearsome purple dragon
sealed in Magic Maze. It
is loyal to those it
recognizes as its
master, and will risk
its life to carry out
its mission.

105595.源世庫の守護者として\n神話の時代より存在する霊鳥。\n今も課された使命を忘れず:
A spirit bird that has
existed since the
Mythical Age as a
Protector of the
Genseikou. Even now, it
eliminates intruders
without forgetting the
mission assigned to it.

105669.源世庫に眠る不思議なチカラが\n保管されていた果実に宿り\n際限なく膨らみ意思が:
The mysterious power
that lay dormant in the
Genseikoryo was lodged
in the stored fruit,
which swelled endlessly,
sprouted a will, and
eventually became a
gigantic phantom beast.

105751.生前は聡明なるアブカートと\n呼ばれていた。ある王に仕え\nイーリィンと並びそろ:
In his lifetime, he was
known as Abcart the
Wise. He served a king
and was a member of both
wings of the king's
family alongside Elyne.

105827.生前は勇敢なるイーリィンと\n呼ばれていた。かつて 多くの\n首級を挙げた槍と主:
In his lifetime, he was
known as Elyne the
Brave. He was once the
spear of many heads, and
his loyalty to his lord
is still fierce even in
death.

105905.悪名高いハルバルド海賊団を\n率いる悪逆非道の海賊船長。\nマドロック船長とは同:
A treacherous pirate
ship captain who leads
the infamous Halbard
Pirates and was once a
crew member of the same
ship as Captain Madlock.

105984.女王ディオーレの命令で\nハルバルド海賊団捕縛を目指す\n魔法戦士だったが海神の:
The armamentalists,
under the orders of
Queen Diore, were aiming
to capture the Halbard
Pirates, but they were
swallowed up by the dark
power of the Sea God
Wealth.

106064.ハルバルド海賊団の団員たち。\nその中でもウデの立つ３人が\nハルバルド船長の護:
The members of the
Halbard Pirates. Among
them, three of the most
skillful are always
working together as
Captain Halbard's
bodyguards.

106144.五声のひとつ『哭』の声を\n体現する声霊と呼ばれる存在。\n天奏士アカカの呼ぶ声:
He is a "voice spirit"
that embodies the voice
of "wailing," one of the
five voices, and appears
at Zagbina Remains in
response to Messenger
Akaka's call.

106221.深淵の咎人たちのひとり。\n人間は つまらない存在であり\n神に愛される価値など:
A member of the
Criminals of Abyss, he
fears that humans are
trivial and unworthy of
being loved by God.

106297.悪神の火種にとりつかれても\n暴走せず 逆にそのチカラを\n使いこなしたアシュレ:
Ashley, who did not go
berserk when possessed
by Fiend's Flame, but
instead mastered its
power and did not
succumb to the blow of
the divine sword.

106376.初代勇者アシュレイが呪炎に\n飲み込まれて悪神と化した姿。\nレオーネに対する強:
The first Hero Ashley
was swallowed by the
Cursed Flame and turned
into a fiend; his strong
sense of guilt toward
Leone was unleashed by
the Cursed Flame's
erosion.

106456.中心核のエネルギーを奪うため\nレオーネにより生み出された。\n悪神の火種を埋め:
Created by Leone to
steal the energy of the
central core, it was
implanted with Fiend's
Flame and possesses a
vast amount of capeshti.

106536.ジア・クト念晶体の先兵として\n現れた女性型の鉱物生命体。\n不遜な態度と奇妙な:
A female mineral life
form that appeared as
the advance guard of Dia
Kut telecrystal. Her
irreverent attitude and
strange language give
her an unusual presence.

106621.闇のキーエンブレム・緑の\n邪悪なチカラに あやつられ\n我を失い 凶暴化してし:
The Monster Pusgon has
lost its mind and gone
berserk due to the evil
power of the Dark Green
Key Emblem.

106690.闇のキーエンブレム・黄の\n邪悪なチカラがボロヌスの穴\n一帯にただようクァバル:
The evil power of the
Dark Yellow Key Emblem
gave form to the
residual thoughts of
Kwaba Luna that were
still lingering in the
Boronus Hole area.

106766.疾風のように現れた\n暴風のような冒険者。\nあこがれのエックスさんに\n追いつ:
A stormy adventurer who
appears like a gale. He
seeks strength to catch
up with X, whom he longs
to meet.

106834.かつての主 大魔王ネロドスの\n不死のチカラにより蘇った\n守護者ラズバーンの真:
The true form of
Guardian Razburn,
revived by the immortal
power of his former
master, the Great Demon
King Nerodos, he plans
to resurrect Netherlord
Nergel.

106915.源世庫に侵入した者を排除する\n警備用の番兵ロボット。\n対象への安全配慮機能は:
A security guard robot
that removes intruders
from the Genzei
warehouse. The safety
consideration function
for the target is
apparently
malfunctioning.

106992.その翼で空を駆けぬけ\n宙より獲物に狙いを定める\n白雲の冥翼兵団の将。\n防衛:
A general of the White
Cloud Underwings Corps,
whose wings soar through
the sky and aim for prey
from the air. He stands
in front of the defense
forces.

107062.五声のひとつ『呻』の声を\n体現する声霊と呼ばれる存在。\n天奏士ガランの呼ぶ声:
A being called a "voice
spirit" that embodies
the voice of "grun," one
of the five voices, he
appeared in the Lake of
Raging Souls in response
to Messenger Galan's
call.

107141.戦禍の邪神の想念が生みだした\n戦禍の眷属と呼ばれる存在。\n挑戦者と強い因縁を:
A being called a
"household of the
ravages of war" created
by the thoughts of the
evil god of war. They
are said to reproduce
the appearance of a
strong person who has a
strong connection with
the challenger.

107220.黄金のスライムを駆る剣士。\nバイキルトと組み合わせた\n剣戟のみならず広範囲に:
A swordsman who wields
the golden Slime, he has
a wide variety of
fighting techniques,
including sword fights
combined with the
Oomphle and the
Lightning, which roars
over a wide area.

107297.変幻自在に動く４本のウデから\nくり出される連続攻撃で\nあっという間に敵を葬り:
A dark workhorse who
quickly buries his
enemies with a series of
attacks from his four
ever-changing udes.

107367.怒りにかられ動くモノすべてに\n襲いかかる凶暴な猛獣。\n鋭いツメでつうこんをく:
A ferocious beast that
attacks everything that
moves in a fit of rage.
With its sharp claws, it
unleashes its deadly
claws to annihilate
everything in its
vicinity.

107449.創世のピラーの暴走を告げる\n炎のごときエネルギーの化身。\nあふれる熱気をほと:
The incarnation of
energy like a flame that
announces the outburst
of the Pillar of
Genesis. It overflows
with heat and attacks
ruthlessly and
ruthlessly.

107532.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n邪神を崇める悪の大司祭。\n強烈な野心の持ち主で\n至:
An evil high priest who
worships an evil god
sealed in Magic Maze. He
has a strong ambition
and desires to become
the supreme being.

107605.銀色に輝く硬質なボディを持つ\n鉱物生命体ジア・クトの眷属。\nジア・ルミナの命:
A servant of Dia Kut, a
mineral life form with a
hard, silvery body, he
has crushed many lives
under the orders of Dia
Lumina.

107688.黒色に輝く硬質なボディを持つ\n鉱物生命体ジア・クトの眷属。\nジア・ルミナの命:
A servant of Dia Kut, a
mineral life form with a
hard, black body, he has
crushed many lives under
the command of Dia
Lumina.

107771.ジア・ルミナのコアを\n飲み込んだことで 完全なる\nジア・クト念晶体として\n:
Leone was reborn as a
complete Dia Kut
telecrystal by
swallowing Dia Lumina
Core.

107842.イゾラの弟子 アズーロが\n竜化した姿。強くなりたいと\n強く願い 竜化の術を会:
Azuro, Izola's disciple,
is a dragonized form.
His talent is
unfathomable, as he has
mastered the art of
dragonification through
his strong desire to
become stronger.

107917.神話の時代から存在するという\nいにしえの竜の１匹で\n風のチカラをつかさどる。:
The true form of
Ignorant Guru Izola, one
of the ancient dragons
that have existed since
the Mythical Age.

107991.天使長ミトラーのチカラを\n取り込みパワーアップした\nストーンマン。聖なる拳で:
Stone Golem, powered up
with the power of
Archangel Mitra, crushes
everything with its holy
fist.

108065.蘇りし冥王ネルゲルの\n呼びかけに応え 冥府の淵より\n帰ってきた大怨霊マアモン:
Grudge Sludge returns
from the depths of Hell
in response to the call
of Risen Netherlord
Nergel, and attacks with
a vengeance.

108143.蘇りし冥王ネルゲルの\n呼びかけに応え 冥府の淵より\n帰ってきた妖魔ジュリアン:
Mystical Juliante
returns from the depths
of Hell in response to
the call of Risen
Netherlord Nergel, and
attacks with a
vengeance.

108222.蘇りし冥王ネルゲルの\n呼びかけに応え 冥府の淵より\n帰ってきた魔軍師イッド。:
Tactician Id returns
from the depths of Hell
in response to Risen
Netherlord Nergel's
call, and attacks with a
vengeance.

108298.蘇りし冥王ネルゲルの\n呼びかけに応え 冥府の淵より\n帰ってきた怪蟲アラグネ。:
Araniad returns from the
depths of Hell in
response to the call of
Risen Netherlord Nergel,
and attacks with a
vengeance.

108374.蘇りし冥王ネルゲルの\n呼びかけに応え 冥府の淵より\n帰ってきた暴君バサグラン:
Tyrant Bogan returns
from the depths of Hell
in response to Risen
Netherlord Nergel's
call, and attacks with a
vengeance.

108453.５つの闇のキーエンブレムの\nチカラによって 再び蘇りし\n冥王ネルゲル。もっと:
The power of the five
key emblems of darkness
has brought back to life
Netherlord Nergel, who
now seeks to devour the
souls of the most
powerful adventurers.

108533.ジア・クトの放つ結晶化の光に\n適応した メーダ。\n元の魔物を はるかに凌駕す:
Adapted to the
crystallizing light
emitted by Dia Kut,
Lunatick attacks with an
ability and ferocity far
beyond that of the
original monster.

108609.ジア・クトの放つ結晶化の光に\n適応した シルバーデビル。\n元の魔物を はるか:
Silvapithecus has
adapted to the
crystallizing light of
Dia Kut and attacks with
an ability and ferocity
far beyond that of the
original monster.

108691.ジア・クトの放つ結晶化の光に\n適応した キラーデーモン。\n元の魔物を はるか:
Demon Steward, adapted
to the crystallizing
light of Dia Kut,
attacks with an ability
and ferocity that far
surpasses that of the
original monster.

108773.五声に新たに加わった六の声\n『無声』を体現する声霊。\n五声の試練を超えた者に:
A voice spirit that
embodies the "silent
voice," the sixth voice
newly added to the five
voices. It is created by
those who have
transcended the trials
of the five voices, and
appears in Nothingness.

108855.ピンクの毛がキュートな\n自称バズを統べる神。\nスウィーティーな絶技の数々\n:
The self-proclaimed god
of buzz with cute pink
hair. She is a god who
rules the buzz with her
cute pink hair and
sweet, exquisite skills.

108923.深淵の咎人たちのひとり。\n人間という種族を愛す一方\n天使こそが高慢で無知蒙昧:
One of the Criminals of
Abyss, he loves the race
of humans, but realizes
that angels are proud
and ignorant beings, and
despairs of everything.

109001.源世庫の保管物質を盗み出した\n罪人を永遠に収監するために\n造られた動く牢獄。:
A moving prison built to
forever incarcerate
sinner who steals stored
materials from the
Genseikan. It is said
that escape is
impossible.

109078.シマシマ模様がイカした\nトガり気味の半魚人。\n触る者みなキズつける\nギザギ:
A half-fish with a cool
striped pattern and a
toggled appearance. He
boasts a jagged dorsal
fin that scratches
everyone who touches it.

109148.旧き世界が侵略者に襲われた時\n侵略者のくり出す超兵器に\n対抗すべく作りだされ:
When the old world was
attacked by invaders,
the Steel Titans were
created to counter their
superweapons.

109230.ジア・クト念晶体の幹部として\n現れた少女型の鉱物生命体。\n炎のように感情をた:
A girl-shaped mineral
life form that appears
as an executive of Dia
Kut telecrystal. Her
emotions flare up like
flames, and she burns
her enemies with her
instincts.

109313.ジア・クト念晶体の幹部として\n現れた少年型の鉱物生命体。\n氷のように心を凍て:
A boy-shaped mineral
life form that appears
as a cadre of Dia Kut
telecrystal. Its heart
freezes like ice, and it
is ruthless in its
cruelty, blaming its
enemies.

109395.創生のチカラが偏って生まれた\nよこしまな精霊。けがれた風を\nあやつって災いを:
A wicked spirit born
from an unbalanced power
of creation. It is a
wicked spirit, born of
an unbalanced power of
creation, that wields a
vicious wind, causes
disasters, and
maliciously takes away
lives.

109478.混沌に息づく竜たちの闘争心に\n反応した創生のチカラが\n海の底に蓄積して生まれ:
An incredibly ferocious
dragon is born when the
power of creation,
reacting to the fighting
spirit of dragons living
in chaos, accumulates at
the bottom of the sea.

109557.ゲノスの手で念晶体の構造を\n作り変えられたジア・ルーベと\nジア・サフィルが結:
Dia Rubay and Dia
Saphir, whose
telecrystal structure
was remade by the hands
of Genos, are combined.
They unleash their
combined fire and ice
technique in a
spectacular manner.

109642.数千年を生きながらえた古木に\n禁忌の呪いを与え生みだされた\n腐緑の樹葬兵団の:
A general of the Tomb
Sweepers of the Green
Rotten Trees, created by
a forbidden curse on an
ancient tree that has
survived for thousands
of years. He stands in
front of the defense
force.

109721.長き脱出行の途上 偶然にも\n源世庫に流星が衝突した。\n星は源世庫の不思議なチ:
During the long escape,
a meteor accidentally
collided with the
Gensekou. The star
absorbed the mysterious
power of the Gensekou
and a dangerous monster
was born.

109802.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n邪教の大司祭の成れの果て。\n進化の秘法を完成させ\n:
The culmination of a
high priest of paganism
sealed in the Magic
Maze. He has perfected
the secret of evolution
and has come close to
the ultimate life.

109872.ジア・クト念晶体が製造した\n創生のチカラを奪取するための\n超兵器。奪取したチ:
A superweapon
manufactured by Dia Kut
telecrystal to capture
the power of creation.
The captured power is
transmitted to Eye of
Evil.

109949.封印が解けた地獄の門から\n生成された おぞましく強大な\n魔物。門そのものがあ:
A horrifyingly powerful
monster created from the
unsealed Gate of Hell;
as long as the gate
itself exists, any
number of them can be
created.

110025.地獄の門から生成された魔獣。\n門の封印が ゆるんでいるため\n常時よりも強力な:
A magical beast created
from the Gate of Hell.
The seal of the gate has
been loosened, and a
monster more powerful
than usual has been
created.

110100.スキルマスターの弟子が呼ぶ\n最強クラスのドラゴン。\nマスタークラスを目指す者:
The most powerful class
of dragons called by
Skill Master's disciples
to see if they are
qualified to become
Master Class.

110179.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ギュメイ将軍。\n妖術で弱くなっている:
Sealed immortal in the
Magic Maze, Goresby-
Purrvis is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

110245.創世の女神により生み出された\n試練をつかさどる聖なる獣。\n荒ぶるチカラを使い:
A sacred beast created
by the Goddess of
Creation to control
trials. It is
responsible for
determining whether or
not a person is capable
of using his or her wild
power.

110328.ジア・クトの放つ結晶化の光に\n適応した セルゲイナス。\n元の魔物を はるかに:
Adapted to the
crystallizing light
emitted by Dia Kut,
Bilhaw attacks with an
ability and ferocity far
beyond that of the
original monster.

110408.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ゲルニック将軍。\n妖術で弱くなってい:
Hootingham-Gore, sealed
away as an immortal in
Magic Maze, is weakened
by sorcery, but be on
your guard.

110476.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし ゴレオン将軍。\n妖術で弱くなっている:
Goreham-Hogg, sealed
away as an immortal in
the Magic Maze, is
weakened by sorcery, but
one must be on one's
guard.

110542.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし Ｓジェネラル。\n妖術で弱くなっている:
S-General sealed in
Magic Maze as an
immortal. Weakened by
sorcery, but you can
never be too careful.

110608.混沌の大地に 生まれた\nブルルンとした水色の巨体と\n無垢な まなざしが\nか:
The huge, light blue
body and innocent gaze
of this monster born in
the land of chaos are
adorable, aren't they?
Monster.

110677.不安定な創生のチカラを\n取り込んだダースドラゴン。\n通常の個体よりも高い知能:
A Dread Dragon that has
taken on the power of
unstable creation, it
possesses higher
intelligence and greater
strength than normal
individuals.

110753.魔法の迷宮に 不死身のまま\n封印されし スライダーク。\n妖術で弱くなっている:
Sly Dark, sealed in the
Magic Maze as an
immortal, is weakened by
sorcery, but one must
not let one's guard
down.

110819.パチパチと弾ける\n特殊なガスをその身に含んだ\n雲のこども。吹きだす息は\nこ:
Cloud children with
their bodies filled with
a special gas that
crackles and pops. Their
breath is chokingly
stimulating.

110887.地獄の門から生成された\n本来アストルティアには\n生息しない魔物。この討伐が\:
One of Gadian's missions
is to defeat the
monsters generated from
the Gate of Hell, which
do not originally
inhabit Astoltia.

110963.深淵の咎人たちのひとり。\n人間も天使も殺りく兵器の\n実験対象でしかなく その:
A member of the
Criminals of Abyss, he
has no hesitation in
taking the lives of
humans and angels, who
are nothing more than
experimental targets for
his deadly weapons.

111174.ジア・クトの放つ結晶化の光に\n適応した ドラゴンライダー。\n元の魔物を はる:
Adapted to the
crystallized light
emitted by Dia Kut,
Dragon Rider attacks
with an ability and
ferocity far beyond that
of the original monster.

111257.爵位を持つ高貴な影魔物。\nその顔立ちは壮麗かつ端正で\nその眼差しは領民への慈:
A noble shadow monster
with a noble title, he
has a magnificent and
handsome face, and his
eyes are full of
compassion for the
people of his domain.

112154.神話の時代にナドラガンドの\n混沌の地が生みだした魔物。\nその凶暴さたるや\n:
A monster born of the
chaotic land of
Nadragand in the
Mythical Age, its
ferocity is earth-
shattering.

112227.黄金の果実をクチにして\n脅威のパワーアップをとげた\nデンデロベー。クチからは:
Dendelobe, the golden
fruit turned into
"MOUTH", has been
enhanced to a
threatening level of
power, and the "MOUTH"
somehow has a slutty
aroma.

112304.黄金の果実をクチにして\n脅威のパワーアップをとげた\nモーモリーナ。サングラス:
Sanguilina, the golden
fruit of Sanguilina, has
been made into a
mouthpiece, and the
strength and brilliance
of its sunglasses have
been greatly improved.

112380.プーラのほら穴に棲む魔物。\n鋭い嗅覚で 希少な\nツヤツヤくるみを見つけては\:
A monster who lives in
Pura Cave, he uses his
keen sense of smell to
find rare Shiny Walnuts
and stockpile them.

112449.大昔 天星郷の浮島が墜落し\nそのエネルギー源だった\n中心核から漏れ出た残滓が:
Long ago, the floating
island of the Firmament
crashed, and the residue
that leaked from the
central core, which was
the source of its
energy, hardened into a
monster.

112524.女性型のジア・クト念晶体。\n鍛錬を繰り返し 来光筒の光を\n浴びれば 偉大なる:
Dia Kut telecrystal of
the female form,
believing that with
repeated training and
exposure to the light of
the coming light tube,
it will evolve into a
great gemstone.

112601.男性型のジア・クト念晶体。\n鍛錬を繰り返し 来光筒の光を\n浴びれば 偉大なる:
Dia Kut telecrystal of
the masculine form,
believing that with
repeated training and
exposure to the light of
the Raikou tube, it will
evolve into a great
gemstone.

112678.魔眼の月の要塞司令官として\n侵入者の排除に尽力した。\nゲノスに次ぐ地位を利用:
As fortress commander of
the Eye of Evil, he was
instrumental in the
elimination of the
invaders. He used his
position as second only
to Genos to gain power
in the Eye of Evil.

112757.魔眼の月の玉座に鎮座する\nジア・クト念晶体の首領。\n万象の王を自称し数多の世:
The leader of Dia Kut
telecrystal sits in the
throne of Eye of Evil.
Calling himself the king
of all phenomena, he has
crystallized and invaded
many worlds.

112835.ジア・レド・ゲノスが\nメルド結晶化した究極の姿。\n魔眼の月の核と融合すること:
Dia Ledo Genos is the
ultimate form of meld
crystallization; it is
converted into meld
crystals by fusing with
the core of Eye of Evil.

112914.これまでの英雄たちとの戦いで\n収集されたデータをもとに\nジア・ネブラによって:
A false, aroused entity
created by Dia Nebula
based on the data
collected from the
battles with the heroes
of the past.

112988.かつて五声に分かれた原初の声\n『天声』を体現する化身。\n六聖陣のひとり 天唱:
An incarnation of the
"divine voice," a
primordial voice that
was once divided into
five voices, he appeared
in Voicehalla in the
body of Heaven Poet, one
of the Six Saints.

113068.その真っ赤な尾羽にふさわしい\n灼熱の業火の使い手。\nこれまで数多の冒険者を\:
He is a wielder of
scorching fire that
befits his true red tail
feathers. He has killed
many adventurers with
his Sizz Gu Lade.

113142.天唱楽師に仕える者のひとり。\n最初に天奏士となった人物で\n彼の秘書的な役割を:
One of the servants of
Heaven Poet. He is the
first divine musician
and acts as his
secretary. She has a
calm personality.

113220.天唱楽師に仕える者のひとり。\n天奏士としては新参だが\nまわりからの人気は高い:
One of the servants of
Heaven Poet, she is a
newcomer as a divine
musician, but she seems
to be very popular among
others. She is quite
ladylike.

113296.天唱楽師に仕える者のひとり。\n若く見えるが 天奏士の中では\nじつは いちばん:
One of the servants of
Heaven Poet. Although he
looks young, he is the
oldest among divine
musician. He has a very
honest personality.

113370.天唱楽師に仕える者のひとり。\n天奏士ピパップに次ぐ新参で\nまだまだ修行中の身:
One of the servants of
Heaven Poet, he is the
second newest member
after Messenger Pipap
and is still in
training. He is a bit
timid.

113443.天唱楽師に仕える者のひとり。\n粗野なふるまいが目立つが\nそこを主に気に入られ:
One of the servants of
Heaven Poet. He has a
rough behavior, but it
is said that the Lord
likes him for it. He is
rumored to be a hard
worker.

113589.アレフガルドという世界に\n君臨した邪悪な竜の王。\nアストルティアにいる竜族と:
An evil dragon king who
reigned over the world
of Alefgard and seems to
have nothing to do with
the dragonkind in
Astoltia.

113740.王家の墓にひそむ謎の存在。\nグランゼドーラ王国の建国にも\n何かしら関係がある:
A mysterious presence
lurking in the Royal
Tomb, it seems to have
something to do with the
founding of the Gran
Zedora Kingdom.

113802.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n重厚な巨体を誇る魔竜。\n見た目に似合わぬ頭脳派で\n:
A massive dragon
enclosed in the Magic
Maze. Unlike its
appearance, it is a
smart and intelligent
dragon that plots for
victory.

113875.魔法の迷宮に封じられた\n魔界のエリート戦士。\n強さこそ絶対の価値と信じ\n強:
Ellie is a warrior from
the Demon World sealed
away in Magic Maze, who
believes that strength
is absolute value and
respects even the
strongest of enemies.

113948.爆撃の精度を上げるため\n知性を与えられた自律式の\n爆弾。その見た目は奇しくも:
An autonomous bomb that
was given intelligence
to improve the accuracy
of its bombardment, it
looked oddly similar to
a bombshell.

120129.ひんやりプルプルの身体は\n暑くなると しんどいようだ。\n真夏にはスライムたち:
The cool body seems to
have a hard time when it
gets hot. In summer,
Slime and his friends
can be found sleeping in
the shade of rocks.

120202.じつは スライムのメスという\nウワサもあるようだが\n学会のえらい人でも\n真:
There are rumors that it
is actually a female
Slime, but even the top
brass of the society do
not seem to know the
true nature.

120271.メタルスライムの間では\n逃げる前に 何発 旅人に\nメラを当てられるかで\n勇:
Among Metal Slime,
bravery is determined by
how many Frizz shots you
can fire at a traveler
before he escapes.

120337.キャラのかぶっている\nライバル モーモンの登場で\n守り続けたナンバー２の座が:
With the arrival of
rival Teeny Sanguini,
who shares the same
character, the number
two position, which he
has been defending, is
in jeopardy, and he is
not happy about it.

120409.タホって どういう意味？\nそう聞いても教えてくれない。\nどうやら ただならぬ:
What does Tahoe mean? I
asked him, but he
wouldn't tell me.
Apparently, there is a
secret hidden in there.

120486.長く つらい修行を終えて\n魔界から戻ってきたのに\n他のドラキーたちからは\n:
After returning from the
Demon World after a long
and painful training, he
was completely forgotten
by the other Drackys.

120558.手下のドラキーたちから\nすごく慕われているが\nじつは 自分にしかベホイミを\:
He is an egoist who is
loved by his Drackys,
but in reality, he only
applies Midheal to
himself.

120632.スキルマスターに潜在能力を\n見いだされ修行の道に。\n敵は その強さに恐れおの:
The Skill Master
discovers his potential
and sets him on the path
of training. His enemies
are so terrified by his
strength that they begin
to tremble
involuntarily.

120709.特徴的な踊りの動きは\n誰にも知られず がんばって\n身につけた 努力のたまもの:
Her distinctive dance
moves are the result of
her hard work and
dedication, unknown to
anyone. Her goal is to
become the Prima of the
Nasubi world!

120784.若い頃からヤンチャで知られ\n一時期は１２股をかけていた。\nそれが年を重ね シ:
He was known as a young
and wild man, and at one
time was a 12-timer. As
he grew older, he became
more serious and grew up
to be a bad-ass.

120866.ブルーベリーを食べると\n目にいいといわれているが\nブルベリーノを食べると\n:
It is said that eating
blueberries is good for
the eyes, but eating
Foebergine apparently
causes teary eyes.

120939.地獄の農場で 催された\nジャンボ野菜コンテストで\n惜しくも 優勝を逃した。\:
We narrowly missed out
on winning the Janbo
vegetable contest held
at Hell's Farm. He hopes
to do it again next
time.

121010.妖精の食卓にあがって\n食べられるのは まぬがれたが\n本人も まさか スライム:
He was able to avoid
being eaten at the fairy
table, but he didn't
expect Slime to beat him
to the punch.

121084.眠るときは 毒の沼地に\nゆっくり身体をひたらせて\n心ゆくまで休むという。\n:
They say that when we
sleep, we let our bodies
slowly sink into the
poisonous swamp and rest
to our heart's content.
When we are tired, our
bubbles diminish.

121156.そのメタルボディは\n形を自由に変えられるため\nメタルスライムのフリをして\n:
Its metal body can
change its shape freely,
so it is sometimes
secretly played with by
pretending to be Metal
Slime.

121229.結局メタルスライムには\nなれなかったが 現状そこそこ\n満足している。特に赤い:
Although he couldn't
become a Metal Slime
after all, he is
satisfied with his
current status.
Especially, I am
confident that my red
left eye is the coolest.

121308.かつて 妖精界に現れたという\n巨大ナスビ モンスターの\nうわさが イワノフ:
Rumors of a giant
eggplant monster that
once appeared in the
fairy world inspired Dr.
Stoneberg to develop
this monster.

121385.コイツが顔を洗うと\n明日は雨が降るというが\n本当は ヒマなので\n毛づくろい:
When he washes his face,
he says it will rain
tomorrow, but the truth
is that he is just
grooming his hair
because he is free.

121449.プリズニャンの毛を刈ると\nシマシマは どうなるのか？\nそれを確かめようとした:
What happens to stripes
when you shear a
Jailcat? It seems that
anyone who tries to find
out will be cursed by
the cat.

121527.もともとネズミよけに\n魔王の城で飼われていた。\nしかし そこはネコのサガ。\:
It was originally kept
in the Demon King's
castle to protect the
mice. However, that is
the saga of cats. They
escaped from the castle
in search of freedom.

121601.リベリオの旦那のピンチに\n幻影と気付かず駆けつけた\nスーパー早とちり・キャッ:
It is a super quick
thinking cat that rushed
to Purrgatroyd's
master's pinch, not
realizing that it was an
illusion!

121668.猫島の７匹のキャッツが\nプリズニャンに いたずらして\n魔法のペンキをぬったら:
The seven Cats of Cat
Island played a trick on
Jailcat, and when he was
smeared with magic
paint, he was spawned!

121744.一戦交えただけで 一週間は\nにおいが取れなくなるという。\nデート前の戦闘は:
It is said that after
just one battle, the
smell will not be
removed for a week. It
is best to avoid
fighting before a date.

121822.いつか 魔界に行って\n大魔王の食卓に並び\nおいしく食べられるのが\nひそかな:
It is his secret dream
to one day go to Demon
World and eat at the
Great Demon King's
table.

121882.オニオーンのことを\nうっかり タマネギと呼ぶと\n生焼けタマネギを食べる\n呪:
It is said that if you
accidentally call Ornery
Onion an onion, you will
be cursed to eat a raw,
burned onion.

121951.ご自慢のエキスで 人を\nおどろかせるのが大好き。\n新しいエキスの開発に\n日:
He loves to surprise
people with his
signature extracts. He
says he is always
working on developing
new extracts.

122021.地獄にある農場で\nくさった死体のスミスさんに\n愛情をこめて育てられた。\n生:
Lovingly raised by Hork
of Walking Corpse on his
farm in Hell. Onions
guaranteed by the
grower.

122092.もっとも古い記憶は\n不思議なメロディを聴いて\n目を覚ました時のこと。\n彼が:
My earliest memory is of
waking up to a strange
melody. It was the
moment he was born.

122160.アグレッシブな性格だが\nさみしい夜は仲間同士\n身を寄せ合って寝ている\n意外:
Although she has an
aggressive personality,
she also has a
surprisingly cute side,
huddling up with other
companions on lonely
nights.

122230.誰かれ かまわず\nツノを向けて突進してくる\n体当たりの攻撃が原因で\n全身が:
The animal's entire body
was purple and swollen
due to a physical attack
in which the animal
lunged at the victim
with its antlers pointed
at anyone who was
around.

122298.ゴールデンコーンの大好物は\nつぶつぶコーンポタージュ。\nナベの底に残ったコー:
24-Carrot Bunicorn's
favorite food is corn
pottage. They use their
antlers to deftly eat
the corn kernels that
remain at the bottom of
the potage.

122379.その肉は極上の味らしいが\nクイーンに挑んだ料理人は\nみな角のえじきとなった。:
The meat is said to be
of exquisite taste, but
all the cooks who tried
to challenge the queen
became the horns of the
beast. The world is a
place where the law of
the jungle is the law of
the jungle.

122450.彼の戦闘データは\n根っこを通じて 地下にある\nイワノフ解析センターへと\n蓄:
His combat data is
apparently stored and
analyzed through his
roots to the Stoneberg
Analysis Center, located
underground.

122521.スライムつむりが\nのたのたと通った後には\n緑色のネバネバが\n線を引いて残っ:
After the Shell Slime
slithers through, a line
of green goo remains.

122583.海の底には マリンスライムが\nのんびり暮らす楽園がある。\n外の世界は どんな:
At the bottom of the
ocean lies Utopia, where
Seaslime lives at ease.
What is the outside
world like? Today, I
dream in Kara.

122658.雪山で遭難した旅人のもとに\n音もなく忍び寄ってくる。\n現地では 白い死神とし:
They creep up to
travelers lost in the
snowy mountains without
making a sound. They are
feared as white reapers
by the locals.

122736.つむりんママの殻に\nトゲが生えていないのは\n子つむりたちをキズつけない\nマ:
Mama Snail Slime's
shells are free of
spines, which is a
mama's kindness in not
damaging her baby
snails.

122803.身体の色が薄いせいで\n闇にまぎれられないことを\n気にしており そこに触れると:
He is concerned that he
cannot hide in the
darkness because of his
light-colored body.

122881.身体が清浄すぎるのが\nじつはコンプレックス。\n自分が臭くないことを恥じ\n流:
The tears that she shed
in shame over her stinky
Kunai shine with the
radiance of purity.

122954.おくびょうな性格の持ち主で\nいつも草木に まぎれている。\n道行く旅人に気づか:
He has a timid
personality and is
always found in the
bushes and trees. He is
always lost in the
bushes and trees. He
sometimes gets trampled
by travelers on the road
without being noticed.

123031.モコモコの かわいい外見だが\nよくよく見ると 目が３つあり\nなでようと近づい:
It has a cute, fuzzy
appearance, but upon
closer inspection, it
has three eyes, which
frighten travelers who
approach it to pet it.

123102.ある女僧侶のスカートの中を\nのぞいていたのが バレた時\nこのケダモン！ との:
When it was discovered
that he had been peeping
inside a certain female
priest's skirt, he was
chastised and given this
name: "Feralbeast!

123182.足の裏に 血マメができるまで\nひたむきにダンス練習を続ける\nど根性アイドルで:
Fans don't yet know that
she is a gutsy idol who
continues to practice
dancing until she has
blood blisters on the
soles of her feet.

123266.ピロリとはピロリアンの言葉で\n『友達』という意味を持つ。\n毒やマヒは彼らの贈:
Pylori is a Pylori word
meaning 'friend'. Poison
and paralysis are their
gifts. They flock to us
with love.

123348.ケダ子と名付けられたが\nじつはオス。本当の名前は\nアストルティアでは音声とし:
He is named Kedako, but
is actually a male. His
real name is not
recognized by Astoltia
as a sound.

123424.いじめられて 貝殻の中に\n閉じこもり過ごしていた。\n殻の中でひたすら自分を鍛:
He was bullied and spent
most of his time shut up
in a shell. He worked
hard in his shell and
grew up strong.

123496.昔は相当なワルだったが\nマブダチの説得でカタギになり\n家族の食いぶちを かせ:
He used to be quite a
bad guy, but his friends
convinced him to become
a businessman and he
started working without
complaining in order to
make ends meet for his
family.

123576.おなじみのプルプル姿に\n油断することなかれ。\n鍛え抜かれた青色筋肉に\n返り:
Don't be caught off
guard by the familiar
pullover figure. The
well-trained blue
muscles will turn the
tables on you.

123646.魔界にはドラキーに変身する\n秘術が伝えられているらしい。\n非常に難度の高い術:
It is said that there is
a secret technique to
transform into Dracky in
Demon World. It is a
very difficult
technique, and if it
fails, the person cannot
return to his or her
original state.

123728.半人前の魔法使いが唱えた\n失敗作のメラが燃えつきる時\nあまりのむなしさに\n:
When the failed Frizz,
championed by the half-
human mage, burned out,
it became a monster in
its futility.

123801.まごまごしている時に\n耳を寄せてみると\n孫は元気かのう……とポツリ。\nお孫:
When I put my ear to the
ground while he was
moping, he popped in to
ask how his grandson was
doing. He seems to be
worried about his
grandchildren.

123868.失敗作のメラゴーストとは違い\n魔界選りすぐりの魔術師たちの\n最上位の闇呪文か:
Unlike the failed
Firespirit, it is an
Ellie-top ghost that
arose from the highest
level of dark spells of
the Demon World's
selected magicians!

123947.ゆらめくフレアの\nとがり具合に こだわりがあり\nフレアのセットが乱れた時は\:
He is particular about
the degree to which his
flares flicker and
flare, and gets into a
bad mood when the flare
set is disturbed.

124013.ブリザードのやつにザラキを\n教えたのは自分だ！ などと\n言っているが ひとだ:
He says he is the one
who taught Frostburn the
zaraki! He is also good
at fooling people.

124094.もとは世の中を恨みながら\n獄死した罪人の怨念。\n生前の記憶はすっかり忘れ\n:
Originally, it is the
grudge of a sinner who
died in prison with a
grudge against the
world. He forgets all
memories of his life and
does evil deeds on
instinct.

124165.呼ばれたサポートパイルは\nそのとき何をしていても急いで\n駆けつけなければなら:
When called, the Support
Pile must rush in no
matter what they are
doing at the time. It
does not matter if they
are eating or not.

124244.眼光が赤く輝くことによって\n顔の真ん中についているのが\n目であることがハッキ:
The red glow of his eyes
made it clear that it
was his eyes that were
attached to the center
of his face. It is
definitely not a dango-
nose.

124324.かつては落とし穴を掘って\n旅人をはめようとしていたが\n仲間同士で穴に落ちまく:
He used to dig pitfalls
and try to set up
travelers, but since
then he has refrained
from doing so, as
companions fall down
holes all over the
place.

124399.旅人を襲う かたわらで\n洞くつを掘る工事現場に\nよく駆りだされている。\n仕:
He is often sent to
construction sites where
he digs caves while
working on the side. A
drink after work is a
special treat.

124468.地下ではたらく もぐらたちの\n仕事っぷりを見守っている\nたよれる 現場の親方:
The master of the site
who watches over the
work of the moles
working underground. No
corners will be cut.

124543.伝説のつるはし使いとして\nもぐら魔族の中で語り継がれる\nトンネル工事の達人。:
The master of tunnel
construction, legendary
for his use of the
pickaxe.

124617.毎晩 寝床に入ると\nなぜドンに従っているのか\n考えてしまって眠れない。\n悩:
Every night when I go to
bed I can't sleep
because I think about
why I'm following Don.
He is a troubled
henchman-monster.

124681.いたずらも強力になっており\n落とし穴の中に毒を仕込んで\n獲物をじわじわ殺すの:
Mischief has become so
powerful that it is
common for them to plant
poison inside Pitfall to
slowly kill their prey.

124754.常に全体重を支える両ウデは\n攻撃に使えば強力無比だが\n使えば地面に落ちること:
Both udes, which always
support the full weight
of the body, are
powerful and unmatched
when used for attacks,
but they are literally a
backstop, as they will
inevitably fall to the
ground if used.

124831.儀礼の評定者は挑む英雄に\nふさわしい強さに変化する。\n次なる英雄の前に現れし:
The Ritual Reviewer is
transformed into a
strength worthy of the
hero who challenges him.
What will he look like
and what skills will he
display when he appears
before the next hero?

124911.プチアーノンの らくがきは\n前衛的なアートと賞賛され\nコレクターたちの間で\:
Khalamari Kids' drawings
are praised and fetch
high prices amongst
avid collectors.

124984.だいおうキッズが\n大人になれる確率は\n３割イカと いわれている。\n海の世界:
It is said that the
chance of a Squid Kid
becoming an adult is
30%. The world of the
sea is a harsh one.

125047.メットの下に タコベビーを\nたくさん隠しているという。\nだから メットにさわ:
It is said that he hides
many octopus babies
under his helmet. So, if
you touch them, they
turn red and furious.

125127.昔は外洋船をも沈める\n超巨大な怪物タコだったが\n深海の水圧で背が縮んだのだと:
Abyssal Octopot
complains that the
octopus used to be a
super-sized monster that
could sink ocean-going
vessels, but the water
pressure of the deep sea
has shrunk its back.

125203.その名前と外見から猛毒を\n持っていると思われがちだが\n実際には無毒である。\:
Its name and appearance
often lead people to
believe that it is
highly poisonous, but in
fact it is non-toxic.
The octopus soldier is
suffering from
reputational damage.

125277.持っているゼルメアの聖紋は\n世界宿屋協会の船を襲い\n奪っていったものだ。\n:
The Zelmea Crest in his
possession was taken in
an attack on a ship
belonging to the World
Innkeepers Association.
The purpose of the
robbery is not known.

125351.海岸でのんびりすることを\n何より愛する平和主義者。\nしかし休息を阻む者には\:
He is a pacifist who
loves nothing more than
relaxing on the beach.
However, he will turn
his fangs mercilessly at
anyone who stands in his
way of rest.

125419.鋭く頑丈な歯を持っており\nサンゴや貝がらを\nバキバキと食べるという。\nとり:
They have sharp and
sturdy teeth, and are
said to eat corals and
shellfish with a crunch.
They are especially fond
of sea urchins.

125486.朝早くから 夜遅くまで\n踊りの修行を積んで\nマジにスターを目指している\nダ:
A rising star in the
dance world who trains
to dance from early in
the morning until late
at night to become a
serious star.

125553.その金色の身体は ダンス界に\nまばゆく輝くスターの証。\n目が合ったら もう遅:
His golden body is the
sign of a dazzling star
in the world of dance.
Once your eyes meet,
it's too late. I won't
let go of your heart.

125630.おばけヒトデをブン投げて\n飛距離を競うスポーツが\n魔界にはあるらしい。\n記:
It seems that there is a
sport in Demon World to
compete in the distance
by throwing Scarfish.
The record holder is
Vicious Gigantes.

125703.テンツク界にはピラミッド型の\nきびしい階級制度が存在し\n究極へ至った１体のテ:
In the slugger world,
there is a strict
pyramid-type hierarchy,
and one slugger who has
reached the ultimate
level reigns at the top.

125786.ひらテンツクには尊敬されるし\n上を見ればキリがないからと\n向上心を失いがちな:
This period is called
the dark period of
Slugger's life, when he
tends to lose his
ambition because he is
respected by other
Sluggers and there is no
end to what he can
achieve.

125871.いつでも声をかければ\n仲間が来てくれるように\n日々あいさつやお歳暮 お中元\:
We are always ready to
welcome you with a
greeting or a birthday
gift.

125943.歌うのが好きでヒマな時は\n身体をゆらして独特の歌とも\n唸り声ともつかぬ音を発:
He likes to sing, and
when he is free, he
shakes his body and
emits a unique sound
that is neither a song
nor a roar. This is
called Jungler's verse.

126023.陽気でキレ者のゴーストは\nわらいぶくろの代わりに\nギャグを考案してやる\nゴ:
The hilarious and snappy
Ghost is apparently a
Ghost writer who invents
and does gags on behalf
of Bag o' Laughs.

126093.ハイソなセンスを持っている\nおしゃれなゴースト。\n都会生まれを鼻にかけており:
A fashionable Ghost with
a sophisticated sense of
style, he is cold to
ghosts from the
countryside because he
has a nose for the city-
born.

126169.ひさしぶりに戻ってきたら\n地獄帰りと おそれられ\n幽霊たちのカリスマとなった:
When he returned after a
long absence, he was
feared to be a returnee
from hell and became a
charismatic figure among
ghosts. He is currently
working on his
autobiography.

126242.じつは目の前のお札が\nジャマで仕方ないのだが\n勝手に取るとヤバいらしいので\:
The amulet in front of
me was bothering me, but
I was told that taking
it away without
permission would be a
bad idea, so I held back
again today, stressing
out.

126318.激しい怨念を抱き\nすべての生者を憎む悪霊。\nとにかく恨みがましい性格で\n関:
He is an evil spirit
that holds a fierce
grudge and hates all
living people. He has a
vindictive personality,
and anyone who gets
involved with him
usually loses money.

126389.子供をさらうことができたら\n盛大にもてなして翌日には\n家に帰してあげるつもり:
If I could kidnap a
child, I would treat him
well and send him home
the next day, but I have
never been able to do
so.

126469.必殺芸「いやんマダンテ！」は\nかつてプクランド流行語大賞で\n見事グランプリに:
The "Hissatsu Gei Iyan
Magic Burst!" is a
classic from his past,
which once won the grand
prize at the Pukuland
Buzzword of the Year
Awards.

126549.同時に ２匹の魔物から\n助けを呼ばれてしまい\nどうしていいか困ることも。\n:
Sometimes it's hard to
know what to do when two
monsters call for help
at the same time. It's
hard to be popular.

126621.たまに 大量のしびれくらげが\n網にかかり 漁師を困らせる。\n中には とてつも:
Sometimes a large number
of Man o' War are caught
in the nets, which
annoys the fishermen.
Some of them are said to
be very large man o'
war.

126701.ふよふよと漂う赤いボディは\nホイミ道を極めた証。\n呼びたくても 人気が高いの:
The red body floating in
the air is the proof of
the mastery of the Heal
way. Even if you want to
call her, you usually
have to wait a month for
an appointment because
she is so popular.

126777.名前を聞き返されるのが\nあまりに めんどうくさくて\nベホイミスライムです と:
I sometimes lie and say
I am Medislime because I
am so annoyed with
people asking my name
back.

126848.ホイミスライムには いばり\n格上のベホイムスライムには\nこびへつらうという\:
He is a sad middle-
manager who is bossy to
Healslime and obsequious
to Sootheslime, a higher
rank.

126921.誰よりはやく仲間をいやす\nその姿に皆あこがれ\n神話の英雄の名前をとって\nホ:
He is called "Healie"
after the mythological
hero, whom everyone
admires for his ability
to heal companions
faster than anyone else.

126991.大きな頭部に見えるものは\nじつは 敵をだます飾り。\n無数の触手のひとつに\n:
What appears to be a
large head is actually a
decoration to fool the
enemy. The brain and
heart are hidden in one
of the countless
tentacles.

127061.自分で言ったサムいギャグに\nいつも大ウケしている。\n周りの視線には気づかない:
He always gets a big
kick out of the samey
gags he says. He has a
thick-skinned nerve,
oblivious to the gazes
of those around him.

127134.わらいぶくろが小金を稼いで\nおどるほうせきに出世した。\nお宝の数々を見せびら:
Bag o' Laughs has made a
small fortune and risen
to Goodybag. He is a
filthy rich man who
shows off and brags
about his many
treasures.

127212.ノースウィーツ ノーライフ。\nお菓子好きの魔女が遺した\nこの言葉を胸に 今日:
No Sweets Norah If. With
these words left behind
by a witch who loved
sweets, Bag o' Sweets
fights on today.

127286.輝く宝石は呪われており\nそれを手にした者たちは\n想像を絶する不幸な最期を\n:
It is said that the
shining jewel is cursed
and that those who
possess it will meet an
unimaginably unhappy
end.

127434.ジャッジと呼ばれているが\n自分勝手な好き嫌いで\n裁きを下す対象を決めるので\:
They are called judges,
but it is hard to call
them fair and impartial
because they decide who
to judge based on their
own selfish likes and
dislikes.

127505.魔物国勢調査の書類を\nドラゴン族として 提出したが\nあっさりスライム族に修正:
I submitted the Monster
census form as a Dragon
Tribe, but it was easily
corrected to a Slime
Tribe, much to my
dismay.

127580.しもやけを防ぐためハァーと\n息を吹きかけて温めていたら\nブレスが出せるように:
If I huff and blow to
prevent chilblains and
warm it up, I can get a
breath. If I huff and
blow, I can get a cold
one.

127663.ドラゴスライムのメタル化か\nメタルドラゴンのスライム化か\n学界で争われたこと:
There was once a dispute
in the academic
community over whether
Drake Slime was
metalized or Metal
Dragon was slimeized,
but the Drake Slime camp
won hands down.

127746.身体に抱きかかえた炎が\n熱くないのかとよく聞かれるが\nじつはものすごく熱い。:
People often ask me if
the flame I hold in my
body is hot Kunai, but
in fact it is extremely
hot. But in fact, it is
extremely hot. He
endures it in order to
hide his true identity.

127823.ナワバリ意識が強すぎて\n同族間の争いが絶えない。\n冒険者よりも同族と戦ってい:
They have too strong a
sense of Navarri, and
there is constant
fighting amongst their
own people. It is said
that he spends more time
fighting with his own
tribe than with
adventurers.

127899.あやつる炎は心に燃やした\n勇気の証。仲間たちとの楽しい\nドングリライフを守る:
The flame that he wields
is a testament to the
courage that burns in
his heart, and he will
continue to fight today
to protect the acorn
life that he and his
companions enjoy.

127975.旅人を眠らせた後は\nみっちり胞子を植えつける。\nその旅人を苗床にして今日も\:
After putting the
traveler to sleep, the
spores are planted.
Using the traveler as a
nursery, the mushrooms
continue to multiply
today.

128049.キノコ狩りに来た冒険者を\n３人で協力して倒した際\n意気投合して義兄弟の契りを:
It all started when the
three of them worked
together to defeat an
adventurer who had come
to pick mushrooms, and
they hit it off and
formed a contract of
righteous brothers.

128125.キノコ魔物のベテランとして\nマッシュスライムら新米には\nなめられまいと意識し:
As the mushroom monster,
Be Terran, he is
conscious of not being
taken advantage of by
Slimeshroom and the
other newcomers, but of
course he is not taken
seriously.

128205.冬が近づくと 自慢の羽毛を\nふわふわに ふくらませてから\nその中に顔をうずめ:
When winter approaches,
they fluff up their
feathers, which are
their pride and joy, and
then bury their faces in
them to ward off the
cold.

128276.魔道士のペットのオウムが\n毎日 呪文を聞きつづけたため\n自分でも 呪文が\n:
The mage's pet parrot
listened to the spells
every day so long that
he could cast them
himself.

128345.自分の羽根で巣を作るため\nピッキーの巣は超カラフル。\n卵を産む季節になると\:
Bludgerigar nests are
extremely colorful
because they build their
nests with their own
feathers. The meadows
are filled with color
during the egg-laying
season.

128418.長い間 天敵がいなかったため\nぬくぬくと暮らしていたが\n強大な魔物の出現によ:
For a long time, they
had no natural enemies,
so they lived
comfortably, but with
the advent of the mighty
monster, they are
becoming frightened.

128496.闇の不死鳥を名乗っていたのは\nドルモーアよりも濃い黒歴史。\nダークオルニスに:
His black history of
calling himself the Dark
Phoenix is thicker than
Kazam's, and he still
harbors a secret rivalry
with Dark Buzzard.

128581.どくどくキノコで出現する\n小さなキノコは一説によると\nマージマタンゴの幼生だ:
The small mushrooms that
appear in the doku-doku
mushrooms are rumored to
be larvae of the
Mushroom Mage, according
to one theory.

128652.魔界サーカスで披露する\nメガザル芸は鉄板ネタらしい。\n尊い自己犠牲が感動の涙:
The Kerplunk trick
performed at the Demon
World Circus is said to
be an ironclad story.
The noble self-sacrifice
is said to bring tears
of joy and endless
applause.

128734.岩に乗るから この名前なのか\n岩のりを主食とする習性から\nこう呼ばれるのか不:
It is unclear whether it
is so named because it
rides on rocks or
because of its habit of
eating rock nori as a
staple food, but rock
nori is full of
nutrients!

128809.その人気に決しておごらず\n庶民的なところも魅力。\nなりたいキノコランキングで:
Its popularity has never
been exaggerated, and
its common people and
closhes charm. He has
reigned at the top of
the "mushrooms you want
to be" ranking for three
consecutive years.

128885.毒針で刺すのは親愛の証。\n同族には毒の耐性があるが\nそれ以外は死んでしまうの:
Stabbing with a
poisonous needle is a
sign of affection. They
wonder why their own
kind are resistant to
the poison, but the rest
die.

128962.たくさんの子バブリンを\nクチの中に入れ 育てている。\nときどき 中で兄弟ゲン:
I am raising a lot of
baby Zeplings in my
mouth. Sometimes, I have
a problem with the
brothers fighting in
there.

129036.リリパットが練習台にと\nおなかのマトを狙って\nよく弓矢を撃ってくる。\nやめ:
Bodkin Archer often
shoots bow arrows at my
tummy mats for practice.
I wish they would stop.

129106.よく ポムポムポムやら\nボムボムボム ボムボムポムと\n名前を間違えられる。\:
Often people mistake my
name for Pom Pom Pom or
Bom Bom Bom Bom Bom Pom.
I wish they would stop.

129178.博打好きの旅人の間では\nコイツが１４匹そろったとき\nとてつもないことが起こる:
Among travelers who like
to gamble, there are
whispers that something
extraordinary will
happen when there are 14
of them in a row.

129249.変わった物を見ると\nそれが人様の物であろうと\n盗む習性を持つため\n魔物から:
The habit of stealing
things when they see
something unusual, even
if it belongs to someone
else, has also been the
subject of complaints
from monsters.

129316.１枚の札で６体呼べてお得だが\nひと山いくらでまとめられた\n本人たちは不満タラ:
The six animals can be
called with a single
card, which is a good
deal, but those who have
been put together for a
single pile are not
happy. They go on a
rampage to vent their
frustration.

129396.かつての陰衆の祖先たちの\n霊魂が融合した姿らしい。\nそのせいか性格は少々\n:
It seems that he is a
fusion of the spirits of
the ancestors of the
former Yinshu. Perhaps
because of this, his
personality is a bit
twisted and resentful.

129470.黄金ボディにあこがれて\n自らを金メッキで塗りかため\n黄金のバブリンをかたる\:
Some Zeplings are said
to be gold-plated and
call themselves "Gold
Zepling" because of
their golden bodies.

129544.ヘブンバルーンに出会うと\n歓迎に死のおどりを踊られて\n天に召されてしまうこと:
The name comes from the
fact that when you meet
Heaven Balloon, you are
welcomed with a dance of
death and taken to
heaven.

129618.夫婦となったおおがらすは\nたがいのがいこつを交換し\n永遠の愛を誓う習性がある:
Stark Raven couples have
a habit of exchanging
Skeletons and pledging
eternal love to each
other. If they lose it,
it becomes precious.

129694.がいこつをコレクションして\n気に入ったものを持ち歩く。\nデスフラッターが集ま:
Collect Skeletons and
carry the ones you like;
when Raven Lunatic
gathers together,
Skeleton bragging will
flourish.

129771.集めた情報の用途は自由自在。\nある時は権力者に売り渡したり\nある時は敵をワナ:
The information he
gathers can be used in
any way he chooses.
Sometimes he sells the
information to the
powerful, and at other
times he uses it to trap
his enemies.

129856.カニ・フォースと呼ばれる\nエリートぐんたいガニによる\n百戦錬磨の最強軍の伝説:
The legend of the
strongest army of a
hundred battles by Ellie
to Crabid, known as the
Crab Force, has been
passed down in the
monster world.

129935.ぐんたいガニというが\nそれほど上下関係はない。\nみんな仲良しなので\n一緒に:
It is called Crabid but
not so hierarchical. We
just like to be together
because we all get along
well.

130003.ヨダレは お腹が空いたとき。\n泡を吹くのは 怒ってるとき。\nカニの感情表現は:
Drooling is when you are
hungry. When they blow
bubbles, it means they
are angry. These are
usually the only two
emotional expressions of
crabs.

130079.青い身体で 海にまぎれ\n何隻もの漁船を沈めたという\nおそるべき海の悪魔。\n:
A fearsome sea demon
with a blue body who has
sunk many fishing boats
under the cover of the
sea. The fishing village
is in big trouble.

130145.かたいだけではダメだと\n努力して ラリホーを覚えたが\nその代わりにスクルトを:
I tried hard to learn
Snooze, but I forgot
Kabuff instead.

130215.強固な装甲で 壁として\nあなたを守ってくれます。\nパワーも なかなかの逸品。:
It protects you as a
wall with its strong
armor. It is also a very
powerful piece of
equipment. Price: 24800
gold

130289.もともと魔界の貴族に\n飼われていたペットだったが\n一念発起して 自立を決意。:
He was originally a pet
kept by a nobleman in
Demon World, but he
decided to take a leap
of faith and set out on
his own. He became a
great mage.

130364.いつ いかなるときでも\n顔を洗って 自慢のヒゲを\n整えるのに余念がない。\n:
He washes his face at
any time and at any
moment, and takes care
to trim his beard, which
he is very proud of. It
is important to keep up
appearances!

130435.イオナズンを失敗して\nひとり落ち込んだときは\n自分の肉球をフニフニして\n明:
When I fail at Kaboom
and feel depressed by
myself, I nourish my
energy for tomorrow by
flicking my own meat
ball.

130502.長年 肩こり 腰痛に\n悩まされていたが その原因は\nネコ背のせいだと気づいた:
I had been suffering
from stiff shoulders and
back pain for many
years, but I realized
that it was caused by my
cat's back. My smartness
went up by 1!

130574.羽が生えて 自由を得たと\nふゆうじゅは思った。\nだが結局は 魔物の命令に従う:
Monolog thought he had
gained wings and
freedom. But in the end,
a life of misery awaited
him, where he had to
follow the orders of the
monster.

130649.アリの巣を見かけると\n根っこで ほじくり返したり\n水を流し込んだりする\n見:
Whenever he sees an
ant's nest, he uses his
roots to dig it up and
pour water into it.

130718.こっそり観察していると\n鳴いてるヒナにエサをあげる\n母子の ほほえましい姿が:
If you observe them
secretly, you can see a
mother and her young
feeding their singing
chicks.

130785.はたして きせいじゅの心は\n人食い草のモノなのか\nふゆうじゅのモノなのか。\:
Whether Tree Sage's
heart belongs to the
cannibals or Monolog
remains a mystery.

130857.ひたすらメラをみがき上げて\nついにメラゾーマに達したが\n長年の夢をかなえてし:
I have been working hard
on Frizz, and finally
reached Kafrizz, but I
have been so bored that
I can't do anything
since I fulfilled my
longtime dream.

130936.強すぎる毒を持つため\n近づくだけでも危険。\nそのため友達がいない\nかわいそ:
It is dangerous just to
get close to it because
of its excessively
strong venom. Poor Slime
has no friends because
of this.

131000.セキバーンとは親交が深く\n運命に翻弄されがちな友人の\n悩み相談によく乗ってい:
He is a close friend of
Crablet and often
counsels his friend who
is often tossed about by
fate. He is
compassionate and
caring.

131079.夢の輝きを心に宿した\nねこまどうの女の子だけが\nミケ猫チェンジできるはずだが:
Only Meowgician girls
with the sparkle of
dreams in their hearts
should be able to change
their Mikecat, but in
rare cases, it is said
that there are also
boys.

131155.趣味のガーデニングの最中に\nつい鼻歌を歌ってしまい\n植物を枯らしてしまうのが:
His current problem is
that he hums while
gardening, which is a
hobby of his, and it
kills his plants.

131220.マッドフィンガーという魔物に\nちょくちょく呼びだされては\n浮き足立って駆けつ:
Muddy Finger, the
monster, is calling me
up every now and then,
and I rush over to his
place.

131300.手からたれるドロドロは\nなんと養分たっぷり。\nそのドロドロは地獄の農場で\n:
The sludge that drips
from their hands is full
of nutrients. The sludge
is used as fertilizer in
the farms of hell.

131373.異形獣のツノからもれ出した\nエネルギーがほら穴の土壌に\n染みこんだために生ま:
It was born because
energy leaked out of the
Hexabeast Horn and
seeped into the soil of
the cave. Is this
another miracle of life?

131449.原罪のやどりぎに\n見つめられた者は\nあまりの眼力に耐えきれず\n自ら罪を告白:
It is said that those
who are stared at by
Sinistletoe cannot stand
the power of his eyes
and confess their sins.

131511.帝国の魔神兵とは明らかに\n異なる技術で造られており\nガテリア皇国の秘密兵器が:
It is said to be a wild
version of the secret
weapons of the Gateria
Empire, built with
technology that is
clearly different from
that of the imperial
demon soldiers.

131588.プラチナ製というわけでなく\nプラチナ級に強いという意味の\n名前だが部品を持ち:
The name does not mean
that it is made of
platinum, but rather
that it is platinum-
grade strong, but there
is no end to the number
of adventurers who take
parts away with them.

131668.闇のキリンジの強さにあやかり\n外見が決められたらしい。\nその開発には先代魔仙:
It is said that its
appearance was decided
based on the strength of
Dark Giraffe. Rumor has
it that the previous
generation of The Oracle
was also involved in its
development.

131747.人間の監視用に作られたが\nついつい戦いを挑んでしまい\n返り討ちに あってしま:
It was designed to
monitor humans, but it
is always the first to
fight back. In fact, it
is a defective product
with many bugs.

131823.白い身体を誇りにしており\nときどき 水に映る自分に\n見とれたりしている\nナ:
A narcissistic bird
machine that is proud of
its white body and
sometimes admires its
reflection in the water.

131892.戦闘中は プログラムに忠実な\n１体のマシンにすぎないが\nひとりでいると 命っ:
In battle, it is merely
a machine that adheres
to its programming, but
alone, it makes me
wonder what life is all
about.

131967.ファイアボールの正体は\n熱暴走したガチャコッコだと\n唱える科学者もいるが\n:
Some scientists believe
that Fire Ball is a
thermally runaway
Clockwork Cuckoo, but
there have been few
sightings, so the true
nature of Fire Ball is
unknown.

132040.球体化するコンパクトボディは\nどんな場所にも侵入可能で\nいざとなれば監視対象:
The compact body of the
ball can penetrate into
any location and even
eliminate the target of
surveillance if the need
arises.

132119.もともと監視用に作られたが\n改造を重ねるうち強くなりすぎ\n今や立派な殺りくマ:
Originally designed for
surveillance, it has
become too strong as it
has been modified and is
now a great killing
machine. Even so,
Accelerate is not
forgotten.

132281.万魔の塔を造ったのは\n２５００年以上前に栄えた\n海運都市ザードを支配していた:
Banma Tower was built by
a powerful Demon King
who ruled over Zard, a
prosperous shipping city
that flourished more
than 2,500 years ago.

132358.邪神信仰の異形の一族。\n成人時に七柱の邪神の中から\n推しの邪神を選ぶ。\n人:
A deformed family that
believes in evil gods.
When they come of age,
they choose their
favorite evil god from
among the seven evil
gods. The most popular
is Emptiness.

132428.修行中はジラフビギナー。\n一人前ならジラフシニア。\nそして 長い長い歳月を経:
Giraffe beginner during
training. If you are a
full-fledged Giraffe,
you are a Giraffe
Senior. And finally,
after a long, long time,
Giraffe Master.

132505.出自が竜なのかキリンなのか\n学界でも意見が分かれており\nもとは錬金術で生み出:
Academics are divided on
whether it is a dragon
or a giraffe, and some
believe that it was
originally a combined
monster created through
alchemy.

132585.オフの日には 戦いのメイクを\n落とし ゆるふわスタイルで\nお忍び散歩が お気:
On her days off, she
likes to take off her
battle make-up and go
for a walk in a loose
and fluffy style. Oh,
I'm not going to battle
today!

132663.かけられた期待へのストレスと\n天才ゆえのごう慢さが\n悪い方に作用して すっか:
The stress of high
expectations and the
arrogance of his genius
had a negative effect on
him, and he grew up to
be a brutal and
exclusive person.

132741.相手の強さに応じて\nツノの硬度を変える。\n強者が挑んだ際のツノは\n武器の素:
The hardness of the horn
is changed according to
the strength of the
opponent. When a strong
person challenges the
antlers, the antlers are
valued as material for
weapons.

132809.監獄帰りの過去を持つ\nなんだか貫禄があるネコ。\n罪状は魔王の玉座で\nツメと:
A cat with a dignified
past who has been in
prison. The charge is
that he clawed the Demon
King's throne.

132873.イナズマのようにシビれる\nサウンドが彼の曲の特徴だが\nかの伝説的ロックバンド:
His songs are
characterized by a sound
as compelling as
Nazuma's, but they are
also suspected to have
been copied from the
legendary Kuban Do.

132950.タップダンスこそ生きる道。\nいつかタップ界の皇帝に\nなりあがる日を夢見て\n:
Tap Dance is the way of
life. Hop, step and tap,
dreaming of one day
becoming the emperor of
the tap world!

133021.芸の道は険しく ときに\nタップペンギーたちも\nタップ道を踏み外す。\nそして:
The path of the art is
hard, and sometimes
Pogoin' Penguin and his
friends lose their way.
And they become Rockin'
Rockhoppers.

133089.金色の体毛は皇帝の証。\n激しいタップの摩擦により\n毛並がいたみ 色が抜け\n:
Golden body hair is a
sign of emperor. The
friction of heavy
tapping causes the fur
to lose its color and
begin to glow gold.

133159.フワフワの羽毛でくり出される\nぱふぱふはまさに天国の心地。\nだが 下手すると:
Puff-puff, made of
fluffy feathers, is
truly heavenly. But be
warned, if you're not
careful, they can really
send you to heaven.

133240.戦いに自信を持つ冒険者を\n魅惑のまなざしで魅了して\nのどぶえをかき切る行為に:
He takes unbounded
pleasure in the act of
cutting off the throats
of adventurers who are
confident in their
fighting skills by
charming them with his
enchanting gaze.

133314.ひたいのハートマークは\n恋がかなうおまじない。\n好きな人にアタックできない\:
The heart mark on the
side of her forehead is
a spell to make love
come true. She has a
naive and innocent side
that can't atack the
person she loves.

133384.神に軽んじられ不当な扱いを\n受けたと逆恨みし 光の神殿を\n急襲するが時すでに:
They raid the Temple of
Light, but it is already
too late, and the gods
have disappeared.

133462.さそりと名前に入っているが\n別に毒は持っていない。\nさそりばち本人は それが:
It has "scorpion" in the
name, but it's not
venomous, and Waspion
himself seems to think
it's a comp rex.

133535.よく 黒い服を着ていると\nハチに狙われるというが\nコイツは 服の色とか関係な:
It is often said that
wearing black clothes
makes you a target for
bees, but these bees
will attack you
regardless of the color
of your clothes.

133606.なかなか獲物になる人間が\n見つからないときは\nしぶしぶ 花のミツを吸って\n:
When they are unable to
find humans to prey on,
they reluctantly suck
the honey from the
flowers to stave off
their hunger.

133678.烈火の渓谷で暮らしていたが\nオーガの神ガズバランに\n試練の番人に大抜擢され\:
He lived in the Valley
of Fire, but was chosen
by the Ogre god Gazbalan
to be the guardian of
the trial, and moved to
the Holy Tower with his
family.

133754.しっぽの針には毒はないが\n刺されると猛烈に痛い。\n痛がる姿が面白いらしく\n:
The needle in the tail
is not poisonous, but
the sting is extremely
painful. They seem to be
amused by the sight of
pain, and will stab
again and again.

133825.身にまとう花粉団子こそが\nウワサの完全栄養食。\n美容と健康を増進するらしく\:
The pollen dumplings
they wear are the
perfect nutritional food
that is rumored to be
good for their health
and beauty. It is said
to improve beauty and
health, and she worries
about being targeted by
adventurers.

133899.ヒスイで できているため\n表面がツルツルしており\nザラザラのビッグモアイから:
Because it is made of
jade, its smooth surface
is looked at with envy
by the rough Mad Moai.
