133977.晴れた日の青い空が大好きで\n天気の変化に敏感。\nサーバルスカイが顔を洗うのは:
Sky Cat loves blue skies
on sunny days and is
sensitive to changes in
the weather; it is said
that when Sky Cat washes
his face, it is a sign
that rain is coming.

134050.その昔 ねこまどうのメスに\n告白したが フラれた。\nそれ以来 魔法使いを恨み:
I confessed my feelings
to a Meowgician female a
long time ago, but was
rejected. Since then, he
hates mage and hates
spell.

134117.どっちつかずの名前のせいで\n猫魔族 コウモリ魔族\nどちらにも入れてもらえない:
A cat-like bat that
can't be included in
either cat-demon or bat-
demon because of its
ambiguous name.

134187.いつも寝ぐせがひどく\n頭の先がとがるのを気にして\n寝るときは かならず\nナ:
He always wears a Knight
cap when he goes to bed
because he is always
worried about the pointy
end of his head.

134256.相棒のプリティフライとは\n長年のくされ縁だが\n内心では自分のほうが\nいいオ:
She and her partner,
Pretty Cat, have a long-
standing relationship,
but secretly she thinks
she is a better woman
than he is.

134324.相棒のセクシーキャットとは\n長年のくされ縁だが\n内心では自分のほうが\nカワ:
He and his partner, Sexy
Cat, have a long-
standing relationship,
but secretly he thinks
he's cuter than her.

134391.ときどき オスたちが集まって\nイケメンコンテストを開く。\nセクシーなアヒルぐ:
Sometimes the males get
together and hold a
handsome contest. The
key to success is a sexy
duck mouth.

134466.横文字が格好いいと思っている\n意識高い系ももんじゃ。\n自ら 種族の名前を変え:
A conscious Platypunk
who thinks that
horizontal letters are
cool, he has changed the
name of his races, but
his voice is still
"moja~".

134545.もともとは単なるももんじゃ。\nあまりにヒドい大暴れの罰に\nこんな姿にさせられ:
Originally a mere
Platypunk, he has been
made to look like this
as a punishment for his
terrible rampage, but he
is not at all amused.

134628.雄ももんじゃたちが開く\nイケメンコンテストに出たら\nダントツ優勝のイケメンだ:
When he enters a contest
held by the male
Platypunks, he is the
clear winner, but he is
unaware of it.

134702.今でこそ ももんじゃ界の\n偉大な重鎮と呼ばれておるが\nこれでも若い頃はブイブ:
He is now called one of
the greatest figures in
the world of Platypunk,
but he was still a very
powerful man in his
younger days.

134775.産卵間近のメスは\nものすごくキゲンが悪く\nよく オスをいじめるらしい。\n虫:
It is said that females
that are about to lay
eggs are extremely ill-
tempered and often bully
males. Men have it tough
in the insect world,
too.

134844.エサの毒草を食べることで\n毒の息を はくようになった。\nいつか美しいチョウに:
By eating poisonous
plants as food, the
butterfly began to
breathe poisonous air.
She dreams of one day
becoming a beautiful
butterfly and flapping
her wings.

134922.あんまり炎をはきすぎると\n翌日 ノドが痛くなる。\nそんなときは 熱い溶岩を\:
If you burn yourself too
much, your throat will
hurt the next day. In
such a case, I heard
that a quick blast of
hot lava can help.

134994.サナギになりそこねた\nどくイモムシがふてくされて\n毒をはきまくった結果\nベ:
Illerpillar that fails
to become a pupa becomes
Venompede as a result of
being depressed and
spewing venom.

135065.集団で獲物に糸をはきかけ\nぐるぐる巻きにして\n巣に持ち帰り ゆっくりと\n溶:
They are said to work in
groups to wrap their
prey around a string,
bring it back to their
nests, and slowly melt
it down before eating
it.

135136.強大で尊大な竜は語った。\nオレは収穫される側じゃない。\nオレが冒険者を収穫す:
The mighty and arrogant
dragon spoke. I am not
the one being harvested.
I was given this name
because I harvest
adventurers.

135216.毒矢を切らさないために\nいつも バブルスライムを\nフトコロに しのばせて\n:
He always carries Bubble
Slime in his pocket to
keep his poisoned arrows
in reserve.

135287.沿道に種をまいているが\n踏みつける旅人が多く\nちょっと ご立腹。\n芽の出な:
We've been planting
seeds along the
roadside, but many
travelers are stepping
on them, which is a
little upsetting. An
ecologist who can't
sprout.

135351.熟練した弓矢の技で\n女子のハートをも射止めるが\n毎度 冷たくあしらっている。:
He is a skilled bow
arrow shooter and has
won the hearts of girls,
but he is always coldly
dismissive of them.
After all, he is a
ruthless and talented
hunter.

135425.左手に持つ 黄金の弓矢は\n以前 弓対決した弓の達人から\nぶんどった戦利品だ。:
The golden bow arrow in
his left hand is a
trophy he got from a bow
master with whom he had
a bow duel. He seems to
have an eye for shiny
things.

135497.射殺すことに快感を覚えた\n地獄のスナイパー。\n魔王の暗殺に成功した\nリリパ:
A sniper from hell who
took pleasure in
shooting and killing,
there was even a Bodkin
Archer who succeeded in
assassinating the Demon
King.

135564.名前の由来は体毛の色でなく\nグリングリンと巻かれた豊かな\n尻尾から。一族の中:
The name comes not from
the color of the body
hair but from the
gringlin and the curly,
abundant tail. It is one
of the boldest and
straight-forward namings
in the family.

135649.大きく進化した その目は\n闇の中でも獲物を逃がさない。\nちなみに メーダとは:
Its large, evolved eyes
keep prey at bay even in
the dark. Lunatick, by
the way, means "eyeball.

135720.親分きどりで メーダたちを\nこきつかっているが\nコイツでも頭が上がらない\n:
He is a boss and he is
always bossing Lunatick
and the others around
him, but it seems that
there is a great
Lunatick that even he
can't get his head above
water.

135793.たくさんの兵隊メーダを従え\n自分の巣を守る女王様。\nメーダロードには 厳しく:
The queen protects her
nest with many Lunatick
soldiers, and she seems
to be very strict with
the Raving Lunatick.

135869.メーダロードとクインの間に\n生まれた 由緒正しい血筋。\n気品ある 涼し気なま:
He is of noble lineage,
born to Raving Lunatick
and Quinn. Many women
are attracted by his
graceful and cool gaze.

135947.他の宇宙生命体の身体に\nひそかに卵を産み付け\nその肉を養分として繁殖する\n:
It has a terrifying
ecology in which it
secretly lays eggs on
the bodies of other
cosmic life forms and
reproduces using their
flesh as a source of
nourishment.

136017.コスモアイの中でも選ばれた\nものだけがマザーに進化する。\n自らの子が発する信:
Only selected Cosmo
Lunaticks evolve into
Mothers. The signals
emitted by their own
children can be received
even from beyond the
universe.

136102.巨大な目玉から発せられる\n目ヂカラがあまりにも強いため\n誰にも目を合わせても:
He is said to be lonely
because his eyes
emanating from his huge
eyeballs are so strong
that no one makes eye
contact with him.

136184.かつて魔祖は７人いた。\n中でも紅一点の魔祖シュナは\n最凶の異形を生みだしたが:
There were once seven
demon ancestors. Among
them, Shuna, the reddest
of them all, created the
most powerful deformity,
but at the cost of his
soul being extinguished.

136260.責任者をわかりやすくするため\n魔祖の血族たちは それぞれに\n外法を施した魔祖:
In order to make it
easier to identify those
responsible, each of the
blood relatives of the
founder was named after
a part of the name of
the founder who had
applied the external
law.

136344.アストルティアを憎む魔物を\n大勢集めて戦わせ 生き残った\n数名を外法を施すに:
He gathered a large
number of monsters who
hated Astoltia to fight,
and selected the few who
survived as excellent
material for applying
the external method.

136422.愛するシュナを失って以後\nメゼの心は急速に闇に侵食され\n妻の忘れ形見を守るの:
After the loss of his
beloved Shuna, Meze's
mind was rapidly eroded
by darkness, and he
became obsessed with
protecting his wife's
memento and finally
turned to the outside
law.

136504.まるで持っている木づちが\n本体かのように呼ばれるので\nオレの存在って なんな:
It's as if the mallet
I'm holding is my main
body, so what is my
existence? I ask myself
every day.

136577.おにこんぼう先輩に あこがれ\nポーズをマネしている。\n強くなったら 先輩の棍:
He is imitating the pose
of a senior Night
Clubber. I promised him
that if he gets
stronger, he will give
me his rod.

136651.一度 トゲつきハンマーを\n導入しようかと 検討したが\nそうしたら オレの名前:
I once considered
installing a spiked
hammer, but then I
thought, what about my
name?

136727.つぶらなおめめが\nチャームポイントと自称するが\n黒いボディに紛れてしまい \:
She calls her dull eyes
her "charm point," but
in reality, they are
obscured by her black
body and are hard to
recognize.

136798.今はこの生活を満喫しているが\nときどきシャバの空気を求めて\n酒場にくり出して:
He is now enjoying this
life to the fullest, but
sometimes he goes out to
the tavern for some
Shabba air and gets
scolded by the Star
Warrior.

136880.中に金属製の芯が入った\n普通のおおきづちのものより\n３倍重い木づちを使ってい:
He uses a wooden hammer
that is three times
heavier than a regular
Hammerhood one with a
metal core inside. It's
also three times more
deadly.

136953.満月の夜になると 血が騒ぎ\n人間を丸かじりにしたくて\nたまらなくなるらしい。:
It seems that on the
night of the full moon,
my blood is rushing and
I can't wait to bite the
human. Tonight, too, the
howling echoes.

137026.海の上なら 羅針盤がなくても\n今 どの辺りにいるのか\nたちどころに分かるとい:
He can tell where he is
on the ocean without a
compass. He has an
amazing sense of
direction.

137103.『真夏のサマーウルフ』\nひと夏のアバンチュールで\n泣かせた女は数知れず……\:
True Summer Wolf" I
can't count the number
of women I've made cry
in Avantur in one
summer, and all men are
wolves.

137178.絶対の忠誠を誓っているが\nヒポポのひびきには いまだに\nちょっと笑っちゃうら:
He swears absolute
loyalty to Hippopo, but
still laughs a little at
Hippopo's crack. So, he
does not use his full
name.

137257.以前は赤狼組に所属していたが\n厳しい団則に耐えかねて\n華のウルフ道を踏み外し:
He used to be a member
of the Red Wolf clan,
but he could not stand
the strict group rules
and stepped off the Path
of the Flower Wolf and
became an outcast wolf.

137334.テングを名乗っているものの\n鼻が低いのがコンプレックス。\n美しく高い鼻を夢見:
Although he calls
himself Teng, Comp Rex
has a short nose, and
secretly uses a nose
clip to dream of a
beautiful, high nose.

137416.晩ご飯が嫌いなメニューだと\nツノまで真っ赤にして\nかんしゃくを起こす\nワガ:
When he doesn't like the
menu for dinner, he
turns red to the horns
and throws a tantrum.

137483.エルフの扱いに比べ\n自分たちの扱いが悪いと\n日々 怒りを覚えている。\n身の:
They are angry that they
are not treated as well
as Elf is treated. He is
a young man with no
sense of humility.

137549.世の中の不条理に怒り狂う。\nその たまった不満を\nかたく握った こぶしに込め:
He is furious at the
absurdity of the world.
He puts his accumulated
frustration into his
tightly clenched fists
and takes it out on
travelers today.

137623.バグレア教会で暮らしていた\nブリック少年は 大先輩である\n四術師ガミルゴのこ:
Brickboy, who lived in
Bagrea Church, says he
respected Four
SorcerersGamilgo, his
senior, more than anyone
else.

137702.他の魔物からは頭をやたらに\nグリグリゴリゴリいじられる。\nそんな意味の名前じ:
The other MONSTER teases
me by grilling my head a
lot. No one listens to
me when I complain that
the name doesn't mean
that.

137785.ウデっぷしだけでなく\nワガママも強レベル。\n要求が通るまでダダをこね抜く\n:
He is not only strong-
willed but also selfish.
In a sense, he is a
strong-willed person who
will do whatever he
wants until he gets what
he wants.

137856.天啓の霊玉を手に入れるため\n神様のフリをして\n天使をだましていた時が\n思い:
He had a lot of fun
pretending to be a god
and deceiving angels in
order to obtain the
spirit ball of
revelation.

137927.甘い香りと見た目から\nよく冒険者に味見されるのが\n悩みのタネだったため\n姿:
He had a problem with
adventurers tasting his
sweet aroma and
appearance, so he
learned a technique to
make himself invisible.

137997.風の強い日は 遠くに飛ばされ\n迷子になったギズモを\n見かけることができるかも:
On a windy day, you
might see Cumaulus blown
far away and lost. The
body of the cloud is
also very hard.

138070.ある程度大きくなると\n身体が ふたつに分裂する。\n元の意思は受け継がれるので:
When they grow to a
certain size, their
bodies split in two. In
a sense, it is an
eternal life because the
original will is
inherited.

138145.雪の多い山奥では\nコイツに襲われた旅人が\n翌朝 氷漬けになって\n発見される:
In deep snowy mountains,
travelers who have been
attacked by this
creature are sometimes
found iced over the next
morning.

138206.ちょっぴりさみしいときに\nため息をつくと 辺りの草花が\nいっせいに枯れてしま:
If you sigh when you are
feeling a little lonely,
all the flowers and
grass around you will
wither away at once, and
you will feel sad.

138283.ギズモ族きっての勉強家。\n特技や呪文を１２個覚えれば\n名前負けしないはずと\:
He is one of the most
studious of the Cumaulus
tribe, and today he
continues his training,
believing that if he can
learn a dozen skills and
spells, he will be able
to live up to his name.

138358.ふわふわの毛はつながっており\nすべてほどくと その全長は\nアストルティアを軽:
The fluffy hairs are
connected, and when all
of them are untied, the
total length is said to
be long enough to easily
circle Astoltia three
times.

138439.見た目に反して心根は優しく\n武骨な手から放たれる\n不器用なベホイミは効果以上:
Despite its appearance,
the clumsy midheal from
its gentle, martial hand
has a reputation for
being more soothing than
it is effective.

138515.マイどくろは マメに洗って\nとても大事にしている。\nマクラにしたり 食器にし:
I wash my dokuro very
often and take very good
care of it. It is very
useful as a pillow or a
dish.

138587.知能の高いどくろあらい。\n呪文の勉強に かまけるうちに\nいつしか どくろは洗:
Haardvark is a highly
intelligent man, who,
while he was busy
studying for his spells,
began to throw away his
skulls without washing
them.

138662.おいしいホタテを食べるほど\nパワーアップするという。\nだから 強いヤツは\n:
They say the more
delicious Scallop you
eat, the more powerful
you become. So the
stronger ones are
considered to be quite
gourmet.

138735.ひとつのどくろを決して離さず\n１００年 洗い続けた時\n身体が聖銀に変わるとい:
There is a mysterious
legend that when a
person washes his body
for 100 years without
ever releasing the
dokuro, his body will
turn into sacred silver.

138810.どくろの美しさを競い合う\nどくろコンテスト優勝を目指し\n毎日がんばってみがい:
Every day, she works
hard to win the Dokuro
Contest, a competition
to see who can make the
most beautiful dokuro.
Last time, she was a
close runner-up.

138893.抹殺対象を追跡するために\n熱 音 振動等のセンサー完備。\n真夜中プリズランの:
Equipped with sensors
for heat, sound,
vibration, etc. to track
the target for
elimination. true If you
are in the Purizlan
tracker at night, you
are sure to be
overwhelmed.

138970.スラマシンＺが完成するまで\nスラマシンＡからＹまで\n計２５体の試作スライムが:
It is said that a total
of 25 prototype Slime
machines from A to Y
were made until
Slimeborg Z was
completed.

139038.仲間を集めては誰が一番\n美しい紅かコンテストで競う。\n優勝目指して人の生き血:
They gather companions
and compete in a contest
to see who has the most
beautiful red. They are
making a lot of efforts
to drink human blood in
order to win the
contest.

139117.一人前になるまでは\n強い魔物に弟子入りして\nその使い魔になるという。\n見た:
Until he becomes a full-
fledged player, he will
apprentice himself to a
strong monster and
become his famililar. He
is a hard worker despite
his appearance.

139186.身体が大きく成長して\nツノと羽が立派に育つと\nだんだん馬ヅラになり\n大悪魔:
As the body grows larger
and the horns and wings
become more magnificent,
it gradually becomes a
horse wig and becomes a
large demon Samigina.

139253.じつは 甘い物に目がなく\n特にソーダが大好物。\nソーダさえあれば ご飯を\n:
In fact, he has a sweet
tooth and is especially
fond of soda. He says he
can eat three bowls of
rice with just a soda.

139321.魔物界では そこそこ有名な\nグレムリン３兄弟の長男。\n自分が得をするために\:
He is the eldest son of
the Gremlin3brothers,
who are quite famous in
the monster world. He is
always trying to get the
best out of himself, and
he is always willing to
follow the strong.

139390.魔物界では そこそこ有名な\nグレムリン３兄弟の次男。\n自分が得をするために\:
He is the second son of
the Gremlin3brothers,
who are well-known in
the monster world. He
always uses the weak to
his own advantage.

139464.魔物界では そこそこ有名な\nグレムリン３兄弟の三男。\n自分が得をするために\:
He is the third son of
the Gremlin3brothers who
are somewhat famous in
the monster world. He
tells all kinds of lies
for his own gain.

139537.強大な呪文使いでありながら\n使い魔としての特技は給仕。\n俊敏な動きで飛び回り:
He is a mighty spell
user, but his skill as a
Famililar is serving. He
is agile and darts
about, never emptying
the master's or the
customer's cups.

139619.かわいい顔をしているので\n相手に なめられないよう\nこわい顔がついた盾を使っ:
They have cute faces, so
they use a shield with a
scary face on it to
avoid being played by
their opponents.

139689.シャイなビッグフェイスは\n人前で話すのが苦手。\nそんなときは腹話術を使って\:
Shy Gum Shield is not
good at public speaking.
In such cases, Gum
Shield uses
ventriloquism to make
his face do the talking.

139764.代々 盾コレクターの家系で\n実戦用 観賞用 保存用と\n目的別に使い分けるため:
The family has been a
shield collector for
generations, and they
have multiple shields of
the same type for
different purposes: for
actual use, for viewing,
for preservation, and
for other purposes.

139838.無造作に見える ちょんまげは\n毎朝１時間もかけて\nセットしているらしい。\n:
The haphazard-looking
cropped hair is said to
take an hour every
morning to set. He is a
surprisingly
sophisticated person.

139907.生きて海を泳いでいた頃は\n珍しい怪魚として狙われた。\nあまたの釣り人たちの指:
When it was alive and
swimming in the sea, it
was targeted as a rare
monster fish. I am proud
to say that I bit the
fingers of many anglers.

139984.魔物としてよみがえる代償に\n地獄に首を捧げ記憶も失った。\n身体に刻んだ戦いの:
In exchange for being
resurrected as a
monster, he sacrificed
his head to hell and
lost his memory. Only
the instinct to fight
that was etched into his
body could prove
himself.

140066.同じヤリ使いとしてオークには\nライバル心を抱いている。\nさみだれ突きの命中率:
As a fellow spear user,
he has a rivalry with
Orc and wants to compete
with him in hit rate of
Multithrust.

140145.かつては みずみずしい\n緑の身体だったが 暑い土地で\n暮らすうちに 赤く焼け:
Once a lush, green body,
it has turned red and
dry as it lives in the
heat of the land.

140220.ヤリを なくしてしまった時は\n頭に生えたヘタを 引き抜くと\n体内から 新たな:
It is said that if a
spear is lost, a new one
will emerge from inside
the body if the head is
pulled off.

140296.研究に協力する 人間たちに\n楽しく戦ってもらえるよう\nやさい三銃士たちは み:
The three musketeers are
all working on their
skills so that the
humans who help them in
their research can enjoy
fighting.

140373.一時はカマボコ幕府に仕えたが\n激動の時代に主家は断絶。\n今は浪人に身をやつし:
He served the Kamaboko
Shogunate for a time,
but his family was cut
off during the turbulent
times. He is now a ronin
and aspires to revive
the shogunate.

140449.セレブとして各種パーティーや\nコンサートに引っ張りだこで\n日々を多忙に過ごし:
As a celebrity, she is
always busy with various
parties and concerts.
Everywhere she goes, she
is the center of
attention.

140532.芯がもったいないので\n眠るときは火を消している。\n魔物の世界でも エコの精神:
The wick is wasted, so I
put out the fire when I
go to sleep. it seems
that the eco spirit is
spreading even in the
world of monster.

140604.じつは 魔物たちの心をいやす\n魔界のアロマキャンドル。\nロウが溶けていくほど:
The aroma of Kyan dollar
from Demon World that
actually soothes the
hearts of monsters. The
more the wax melts, the
more it smells bad.

140682.コイツが歩いた跡には\nロウと 人間の返り血で\nぽたぽたと赤い道が続き\n草１:
It is said that where
the animal has walked, a
red path is strewn with
the blood of wax and
humans, and not a blade
of grass grows.

140751.古代の呪術師が 強大な精霊を\n召喚する儀式に用いた\n無数のキャンドルが 時を:
It is said that
countless kyan dollars
used by ancient
sorcerers in rituals to
summon powerful spirits
were transformed into
this monster over time.

140827.ろうそくの魔物を捕まえては\n蒼い炎はイケてるとそそのかし\n高値で種火を買わせ:
They catch a candle
monster and seduce him
into buying a seed fire
at a high price by
saying that the blue
flame is hot. Is this a
real fire sale?

140904.仲間のおばけキャンドルたちは\n近づきすぎると溶けてしまう。\nそのため常に距離:
Wax Murderers in the
companion melt when they
get too close.
Therefore, they are
always kept at a
distance and ironically,
their hearts are cold.

140987.土をなめるのが大好きで\n立ったまま味見できるよう\n舌が なが～く進化した。\:
He loves to lick dirt,
and his tongue has
evolved to be long
enough to taste it while
standing up, and
Dwachakka dirt is his
favorite.

141060.いつも活発なベロベロだが\n旅の医者に舌を見せると\nかならず血行不良と\n診断:
Frolicker is always
active, but when he
shows his tongue to a
traveling doctor, he is
always diagnosed with
poor circulation.

141128.魔界一 不気味な魔物を目指し\nグールのもとで修行していた。\nこのたび 免許皆:
He trained under Ghoul
to become the spookiest
monster in the Demon
World. Now, he has
received the name of his
master as proof of his
full license.

141208.太古の地層から目覚めたが\n子孫である現代つちわらしが\nたいした進化もしておら:
I was disappointed that
the modern Lickspittle,
which is a descendant of
the ancient stratum from
which it awoke, has not
evolved much.

141285.製造者に芸術的センスが\n足りなかったせいか\n人の姿に似せるのは\nこれで限界:
Perhaps because the
manufacturer lacked
artistic sense, he was
limited in his ability
to make them resemble
human figures.

141349.大食らいのウコバックだが\n意外にも 好き嫌いが激しい。\n揚げ物が大好物で\n:
Lickity Spit is a
gluttonous eater, but
surprisingly, she is
also a picky eater. She
loves fried food and
prefers fried lizards to
anything else.

141422.身体の緑色の部分には\nコケがびっしりと生えていて\n雨にぬれると胞子を飛ばし\:
The green part of its
body is covered with
moss, and when wet with
rain, it sends out
spores that furiously
airpiru the moth girl.

141498.闇の領界で暮らしたかったが\n笑顔で オノを振りまわす\nくびかりぞくに 恐れを:
He wanted to live in the
Dark Realm, but was
intimidated by the
smiling, axe-wielding
Head Hunter, so he moved
his home there.

141573.ナドラガンドの魔物には\nはるか昔にたもとを分かった\n５つの戦闘部族がいたとい:
The Nadragand monsters
are said to have had
five warring tribes that
found their footing long
ago. They are the
descendants of these
tribes.

141651.かつて炎の部族から分かれた\n古い戦闘部族の末裔。\nマヒャデドスをとなえる瞬間:
A descendant of an old
fighting tribe that once
split off from the tribe
of the flame, he wears
an exquisite smile when
he utters the Kacrackle.

141728.不届き者の手で切り倒された\nご神木を 火にくべたとき\n宝石のようにきらめく魔:
When the sacred tree,
which had been cut down
by an infidel, was put
into the fire, a magical
flame sparkled like a
jewel, and a monster was
born.

141806.我が身の炎を活用して\n毎日バーベキューパーティーを\n開くほどのアクティブな性:
He is so akutiive that
he takes advantage of
his own fire to throw a
barbecue party every
day. He is a naturally
cheerful person.

141882.召喚するコウモリのために\n木の実や昆虫などのおやつを\nマントの裏に隠し持って:
He hides treats such as
nuts and insects behind
his cloak for the bats
he summons. When the
treats run out, the edge
runs out.

141964.狙ったエモノは逃さない！\n集めた光り物は１００をこえ\n巣に持ちかえっては\n:
He never misses a
target! The shiny things
he collects are brought
back to the nest in
excess of 100, and he
spends his days just
looking at them.

142037.鳥カゴにしか見えない部分は\n露出した骨格の一部らしい。\n繁殖期のメスは カゴ:
The part that looks like
a bird cage seems to be
part of the exposed
skeleton. During the
breeding season, females
lay eggs inside the cage
to protect their chicks
from foreign enemies.

142278.毎日寝る間をおしんで\n呪文の勉強をしている。\n彼の ひそかな努力を知る者は\:
He spends every waking
hour studying spells. It
is rare for anyone to
know of his secret
efforts.

142348.片想いの あの子を\n自分のショーに誘ったが\n恋人と一緒に見にきてた。\n悲し:
I invited that girl I
have a crush on to my
Sho, but she came to
watch with her LOVER. A
sad clown story.

142415.手品のウデは今ひとつだが\n子供っぽい かわいさを武器に\n若者から老人の魔物ま:
Although his magic
tricks are not as good
as his skills, he has
won the hearts of fans
from the young to the
old monster with his
childlike cuteness.

142491.勉学一筋だった私を ここまで\n振り回すなんて 罪な人……\nなどと思いふけり:
I sometimes dwell on the
thought that it was
sinful of him to have so
much trouble with me, a
man who had devoted
himself to his studies.
It is my first love.

142570.七柱の邪神の中で戦禍の邪神は\n最も戦いを得意としていたが\n悠久の封印の中で策:
Among the seven evil
gods, the evil god of
war was the best at
fighting, but it seems
that he also learned to
play tricks in the
course of his eternal
sealing.

142649.邪神の中でも暴虐と渇欲は\n戦禍の邪神と馬が合った。\n禁忌と怨嗟とはしばしば対:
Among the evil gods,
tyranny and greed
matched the evil gods of
war. Forbidding and
vindictive were often at
odds, and taunts and
nihilism were
incomprehensible.

142729.戦禍の邪神の想念はついに\n偽りのレンダーシアの存在を\n感知し ピラミッドに君:
The thoughts of the evil
god of war finally
sensed the presence of
False Lendersia and
turned the memories of
the reigning kings of
Pyramid into pawns.

142810.カラポッポの名前の由来は\nおなかが空っぽだから説と\n吹き出す炎の音から説があ:
The origin of the name
"Bird Cage" is disputed
in academic circles,
with one theory claiming
that it is named for its
empty stomach and
another for the sound of
the flames it makes when
it blows out.

142887.ビルドアップしたボディに加え\n王者の風格すら備えたのだが\n光り物を集めること:
In addition to his
built-up body, he even
had the appearance of a
champion, but it seems
that he could not stop
collecting shiny
objects.

142966.コイツの起こすボヤ騒ぎが\n地元消防団の悩みのタネ。\n彼らが かかげる標語は\:
The blizzard that this
guy causes is the bane
of the local fire
brigade. Their motto is
"Beware of fire, one
lizard can start a fire.

143041.別れた母が恋しいのか\n目をうるませながら\n夕日を眺めていたりする。\n孤独を:
They miss their mother,
or they look at the
sunset with misty eyes.
They learn loneliness
and grow up.

143110.じつは どのドラゴンの子供か\n判明していない。\nこの姿が成体で本当は\nドラ:
Actually, it is not
known which dragon's
offspring it is. Maybe
this figure is the adult
and it is really a
dragon adult?

143179.兄弟のドラゴンキッズに\nいじめられたりして\nひとり涙をこらえながら\n大空を:
He dreams of the day
when he will be bullied
by his brothers Small
Fry and fly in the sky
while holding back
tears.

143246.大人になんか\nなれなくていいもん！\nそんな生意気な息攻撃が\n二重の意味でと:
I don't need to be an
adult! Such cocky breath
attacks are doubly very
painful.

143307.年を経た ドラグノワールが\n黄金のトサカを戴きしとき\n神にも等しきチカラの竜:
When the aged Dragonoir
is crowned with a golden
crest, it will be feared
as a dragon with the
power of a god.

143385.体内に膨大なエネルギーを\nたくわえるために朝から晩まで\n眠ることもある。寝起:
They sometimes sleep
from morning till night
in order to store a huge
amount of energy in
their bodies. They are
especially bad-tempered
when they wake up from
sleep, so it is best to
stay away from them.

143468.ダースドラゴンは一度に\n１２個ものタマゴを産むが\n成長の早い１匹が他の兄弟を:
Dread Dragons lay as
many as 12 eggs at a
time, but it is said
that one fast-growing
dragon has a habit of
killing all the other
brothers.

143616.魔界のダンスコンテストに向け\n仲間と一緒に 猛特訓中。\n奇妙な動きなら負けな:
She is training hard
with companion for the
Demon World dance
contest. If it's weird
moves, we won't lose!
Woebergine is their
rival.

143694.魔界の売れっ子振り付け師。\nモンスターたちが踊る\nいろんなダンスの振り付けは:
He is a successful
choreographer for Demon
World. Tap Devil is
responsible for the
choreography of the
various dances performed
by the monsters.

143771.こいつの呪いを受けた者は\n死後も グリゴンダンスの\nバックダンサーとして\n:
It is said that those
who have been cursed by
him will be made to
dance as back-up dancers
for Caped Caperer
forever, even after
death.

143841.踊れる歌手になりたいという\nその外見からは想像のつかない\nかわいらしい夢を持:
She has a cute dream of
becoming a singer who
can dance, which is hard
to imagine from her
appearance. She never
misses vocal practice.

143921.たゆまぬ鍛錬を積み重ね\nトップレベルの踊りを\n身につけた 魔物界のスター。\:
A star of the monster
world who has acquired
top-level dancing skills
through tireless
training, he has many
fans among the monster
community.

143994.ちがいのわかる者が見れば\nザコ悪魔の踊りとは完成度の\n差が歴然なのだが いか:
If you know the
difference, you can see
the difference of the
perfection of the dance
between the dance of a
demon and that of a
demon, but there is not
much difference in the
effect.

144073.魅了された者にはこの人形が\n最愛の人に映ると言われる。\n身体に受ける痛みさえ:
It is said that this
doll is seen as the
beloved of those who are
enchanted by it. Even
the pain they feel in
their bodies may be a
sign of love.

144152.強い思いの込められた言葉は\nその望みや恨みを具現化し\n現実に影響をもたらして:
Words with strong
feelings embody the
desires and resentments
and bring them into
reality. In other words,
it is a spell.

144232.しびれだんびらを使えば\n斬ると同時に マヒして\n痛みを感じないのでは？ と\:
Couldn't the
Paralyslicer cause
paralysis and no pain at
the same time as the
slice? Some doctors are
paying attention to
this.

144304.刃こぼれを起こしたときは\nしっかり 自分の身体をとぎ\nピッカピカにみがいてか:
When a blade spills, he
makes sure to sharpen
his own body to a shine
before preparing for the
next bout.

144379.長い間 人を斬らずにいると\nだんだん色がうすくなって\nひとくいサーベルと\n:
After a long period of
time without killing,
its color gradually
fades and it can be
mistaken for an Erazor
Blade.

144449.魔界のダンスホールで剣舞を\n披露していたが 他の客から\n生キズが絶えないと苦:
He performed sword
dances at the Demon
World dancehall, but was
banned after other
patrons complained of
constant raw scratches.

144531.斬れば相手をマヒさせる\n強力な刀のモンスター。\n気位が高く 魔王であっても\:
A powerful sword monster
that paralyzes opponents
when slashed. It has a
high level of nobility,
making it difficult to
master even for the
Demon King.

144601.神話の昔 はるか彼方より\n飛来したという未知の存在が\n女神のチカラを吸収して:
It is said that an
unknown being that flew
from far away in
mythology absorbed the
power of the goddess and
mutated, giving birth to
the Eldritch God.

144680.達したと思われた協調の真髄は\n真の協調の前に敗れ去った。\n神話時代からの悠久:
The true essence of
unity, which
seemed to have been
reached, was defeated
before the true
unity. Thus the
curtain fell on a battle
that had been raging
since the mythical age.

144760.大魔王選出の儀のときは\n求める者が魔族化していたため\nわずかに反応を示しつつ:
At the time of the Great
Demon King's election
ceremony, the seeker was
demonized, and while he
showed a slight
reaction, he was unable
to discern the
difference.

144836.恋のシーズンになると\nオスは大きな羽を広げて\nメスへの愛をアピールする。\n:
During the season of
love, the male spreads
his large wings to
appiru his love for the
female. Beauty is the
deciding factor.

144909.独特の色合いを持つ\n美しい羽は マニアに人気。\nつかまえようと無茶をして\n:
Its beautiful feathers,
with their unique
coloring, are popular
among enthusiasts. Many
people have lost their
lives trying to catch
them.

144979.毒イモムシがサナギとなり\nその かたいカラを破ると\nイーブルフライとなって\:
When the poisonous
caterpillar becomes a
chrysalis and breaks its
garrulous body, it
becomes a butterfly and
flies away beautifully.

145050.呪符の魔物の中では新米。\n当初は桜色担当が不満だったが\n今ではすっかり板につ:
He is a newcomer among
the spell monsters. At
first, he was
dissatisfied with his
cherry blossom coloring,
but now he has become a
member of the team and
has even mastered a
major technique using
cherry blossoms.

145129.炎に群がる性質があり\nたまに近づきすぎて\nヤケドを負うこともある。\nかくも:
They have a tendency to
flock to flames and
sometimes get too close
and get burned. It is
hard to resist instinct,
however.

145199.生死の淵をさ迷う者の周りに\n無数のとこよアゲハが舞う時\n美しい花畑が見えると:
It is said that a
beautiful flower field
can be seen when
countless Agehaflys
dance around a person
who is wandering between
life and death. This is
the reason why they are
called "death fairies.

145279.テンションの上がらないときは\n美しい羽で旅人を惑わせて\nイオナズンでふっとば:
When I'm not in the
mood, the best stress
reliever is to dazzle
the traveler with
beautiful feathers and
blow him away with
Kaboom.

145356.自分は断じてメタボではない。\n恵まれたフィジカルエリートの\nドラキーなのだと:
I am definitely not
metabolic. I am a
blessed physical Ellie's
Dracky, and I am still
snacking today.

145438.しのどれい しりょうのきしも\n骨なのに なんでオレだけ\nそのまんま がいこつ:
Dead Resident Skeleton
Soldier is also a bone,
so why am I the only one
named Skeleton? Come out
the person in charge!

145516.最近 頭のヒビ割れが\n大きくなっている気がして\n毎日 鏡とにらめっこ。\nス:
I stare in the mirror
every day because I feel
like the cracks on my
head have gotten bigger
lately. Is it because of
stress?

145587.しりょうのきしの持つ\nあまりに強い怨念が 影に宿り\n持ち主の身体から離れて\:
The Skeleton Soldier's
strong resentment is
dwelling in the shadows
and causing the Skeleton
Soldier to do evil
deeds, even as it leaves
its owner's body.

145659.極悪非道な行いのせいで\n海の神に嫌われてしまった。\n死んだ後も 海に立ち入れ:
He was hated by the sea
gods for his diabolical
deeds. Even after his
death, he is not allowed
to enter the sea and
roams wildly on land.

145734.上からの命令に背くと\nここには書けないような\n厳しい刑に処せられる。\n兵士:
Disobeying orders from
the top is punishable by
severe penalties that I
can't even write about
here. Discipline is
important for a soldier.

145803.とにかく強欲で 生前は\n無類のギャンブル好きだったが\n命をかけた最後の大勝負:
Greedy in any case, he
was an unparalleled
gambler during his
lifetime, but it seems
he lost the last great
game he ever played with
his life on the line.

145878.不断の努力で強くなったが\nやはり そのまんまな名前を\nつけられてしまった。\:
I have become stronger
through tireless
efforts, but I have been
given the same name as
before. I am prepared to
face a lawsuit.

145951.戦禍の邪神はジュネイラなる\n意外にも優美な名前を持つが\nその響きからじつは女:
The evil god of war has
a surprisingly graceful
name, Junaila, but it is
rumored to be a goddess
from the sound of her
name.

146030.意外なことにキノコが嫌いで\n身体に生えたキノコを\n場所を考えず投げ捨てるため:
Surprisingly, he hates
mushrooms and throws
them away without
thinking about where
they grow on his body,
which makes him disliked
as self-centered.

146103.魔物界では 番犬として有名。\n常に凶暴にしておくため\nお世話係のモンスターは:
In the monster world, it
is famous as a guard
dog. The monster who
takes care of them does
not dare to feed them in
order to keep them in a
ferocious state at all
times.

146178.人間相手には凶暴だが\n飼い主の あくま神官の前では\nお手や おすわりをこなし:
He is a loyal dog who is
ferocious with humans,
but will sit or do a
"handstand" in front of
his owner, Wrecktor, and
wag his tail.

146250.コイツがカゼをひくと\nくしゃみや せきのたびに\n炎をまきちらすので\n誰もお:
When he catches a cold,
he spreads flames every
time he sneezes or
coughs, so no one comes
to visit him.

146319.聖獣としての格を失って\n人々に嫌われるようになったが\nそんなことは気にしない:
He lost his status as a
holy beast and people
started to hate him, but
he doesn't care about
that. It's nothing to
worry about.

146390.個体数が きわめて少ないため\n同族には めったに会えない。\nさみしい気持ちの:
Because their population
is very small, they are
rarely seen by their own
kind. A solitary
Hexenbiest that goes on
the rampage out of a
sense of sadness.

146469.デモンマウンテンに引き続き\nまたもや呪われてしまった。\n純粋な心の持ち主だか:
Following Demon
Mountain, I was cursed
again. It is because he
has a pure heart that he
is susceptible to
witchcraft.

146548.きっと中にはレアものが……。\nミミック・強の危険な魅力に\n人々の目はくらんで:
The dangerous charm of
Vicious Mimic dazzles
people's eyes. Treasure
is good, but be careful
with your life.

146630.あまりに旅人が来ないと\nヒマすぎて うっかり\nベロンと舌を出したまま\n寝て:
If too many travelers
don't show up, I
sometimes fall asleep
with my tongue hanging
out by accident.

146696.欲望 嫉妬 差別 戦争……と\nあらゆる災いが詰まっている。\n最後に残るのは:
Lust, jealousy,
discrimination, war, and
all manner of
misfortunes. What
remains in the end is
really hope or further
despair.

146771.中身を確かめようとする人が\nときどき いるようだが\n箱そのものが魔物であり\:
Sometimes people try to
check the contents of
the box, but the box
itself is the monster
and there is no one
inside!

146839.ヤギっぽくも見えるので\n本当はなんなのか たずねると\nアクマで ウマですから:
It looks like a goat, so
when I ask what it
really is, I am told
that it is an Akuma and
that it is a horse.

146916.昔 世界樹の周りに住む者と\n激しく争ったという。\nときどき使う 世界樹の葉は:
In the past, they fought
fiercely with those who
lived around Yggdrasil.
The Yggdrasil leaves
that are sometimes used
are said to be the
spoils of war from that
time.

146988.魔王のために戦うことを\n誇りに思っている 大悪魔。\n血のように紅い身体は\n:
A great demon who is
proud to fight for the
Demon King, his blood-
red body is a sign of a
pure-blooded demon.

147058.レッドバロンは 何千年と続く\n由緒正しい悪魔の貴族。\n人間の断末魔を音楽にし:
Red Baron is a noble
family of demons that
has been in existence
for thousands of years,
making music to the
demons' demise and
reveling in the wine of
chaos.

147133.誰よりも面白いはずの\n自分の芸が 世間に認められず\n絶望してしまった闇芸人。:
A dark comedian who has
become despairing
because his art, which
was supposed to be
funnier than anyone
else's, has not been
recognized by the world.
They are sometimes
called "sick comedians.

147208.大量のせかいじゅの葉を\n確保しており 魔物たちに\n売りさばいているらしい。\:
They have a large amount
of Yggdrasil Leaf and
are selling it to
monsters. The route of
acquisition is a
business secret.

147278.自分のルックスにふさわしい\n豪華で清潔でお洒落な居場所を\n求めるが条件がきび:
You want a luxurious,
clean, fashionable place
to live that is
appropriate for your
looks, but the
conditions are so strict
that you can't find a
Quaint Area.

147357.相棒は怪物ゴルバ。\nでも 彼の ねちっこい性格が\nほんとは ちょっとウザイ。:
His partner is
Smogbonnet, a monster,
but his jealousy really
annoys me a little. Is
the duo in danger of
being dissolved?

147428.ブルーイーターの血は青い。\nそれゆえ皮膚の薄い頭部は\n血の色が浮かびあがって:
Goobonce's blood is
blue. Therefore, the
thin-skinned head
appears bluish as the
color of the blood rises
to the surface.

147499.とある魔導書に描かれた\n幸運を呼ぶ聖獣の姿を見て\nコイツ オレに似てなくね！:
I saw a lucky holy beast
depicted in a certain
grimoire, and I thought,
"This guy doesn't look
like me! Snotbonce
realized.

147575.数百年に渡って 王の石版を\n一緒に守ってきた相方とは\nもはや夫婦も同然である:
After guarding the
king's tablets together
for hundreds of years,
he and his partner are
now almost husband and
wife. It is unknown
which one plays the role
of husband and wife.

147648.ひとつの星を滅ぼすと\n手足を丸め 隕石に擬態して\n群れで宇宙を渡る。\nそし:
When one star is
destroyed, they curl up
their limbs, mimic
meteorites, and travel
across the universe in
packs. And then they go
on to the next star.

147717.意外にも人望が厚く\n砂漠の悪い奴は大体トモダチ。\nだから どんな状況でもすぐ:
Surprisingly well-liked,
the bad guys in the
desert are usually
tomodachi. So no matter
what the situation,
companions are always at
the ready.

147795.友達からもらった宝物を\n捨てられてしまった絶望が\n具現化した存在。いつも\n:
The embodiment of the
despair of having been
thrown away the treasure
given to him by a
friend. He is always
squeaking and lamenting.

147865.相棒ゴルバのねちっこい性格を\n嫌った過去もあったが 彼の\n慎重さに救われるこ:
I used to dislike my
partner Smogbonnet's
stubbornness, but his
discretion often saved
my life, and now I can
only be thankful for
that.

147946.相棒は怪物ガルバ。\nでも 彼のアタマの悪さに\nほんとは へきえきしている。\:
His partner, Sootbonce,
is a monster, but his
stupidity really pisses
off even backward. Is
the duo in danger of
being dissolved?

148017.レッドイーターの血は青い。\nそれゆえ皮膚の薄い身体は\n血の色が浮かびあがって:
Bloodbonnet blood is
blue. Therefore, the
thin skin of the body
appears bluish as the
color of the blood rises
to the surface.

148088.とある物語に描かれた\n幸運を呼ぶ聖獣の姿を見て\nコイツ オレじゃん！？\nイ:
I saw the image of the
lucky holy beast
depicted in a story, and
I realized it was me!
Bilebonnet realized.

148157.チカラ押しは相方にまかせて\nそのフォローを担っている。\nということは こちら:
He is in charge of the
follow-up, leaving the
pushing to his partner.
This means that she is
likely to play the role
of his wife.

148229.言葉や文字を持たず\n全ての感情を攻撃で表現する。\n胸に秘めた愛を伝えるため\:
They have no words or
letters and express all
their feelings by
attacking. They
sometimes kill their
opponents in order to
convey the love they
have in their hearts.

148303.オアシスの水面に映った姿が\nみにくかったことに腹を立て\nオアシスを憎むように:
Oasis I became angry and
started to hate Oasis
because the reflection
on the surface of the
water was so ugly. It is
a very annoying story.

148384.母親が勝手に大切な宝物を\n捨てたことに対する憎悪が\n具現化した存在。いつも\:
He is the embodiment of
his hatred for his
mother's selfish
abandonment of his
precious treasures. He
is always squeaking and
angry.

148455.相棒ガルバのアタマの悪さに\n呆れた過去もあったが 彼の\n明るさに救われること:
I used to be dismayed by
his partner Sootbonce's
stupidity, but his
cheerfulness often saved
my life, and now I
respect him.

148534.自分が襲った相手の養分を\n吸って成長していく。\nするとじんめんじゅの顔が\n:
It grows by sucking the
nutrients from the
person it has attacked.
Then Treeface's face
will start to resemble
its victims.

148605.人間たちが ウドの大木を\n役立たずの代名詞にしたことに\n腹を立てて魔物と化し:
It is a big udo tree
that has turned into a
monster because it is
angry that humans have
made it a synonym for
uselessness.

148675.もともと ふつうの木だったが\n身体に名前を刻む旅人を\n恨むことで 魔物と化し:
Originally an ordinary
tree, it became a
monster because of the
hatred of travelers who
carved their names on
it. Please take good
care of your trees.

148749.長寿の秘薬になると\n勘違いされ 頭の葉っぱを\nちぎって持っていく不届き者が\:
There is no end to the
number of people who
tear off the leaves from
the head and take them
with them, under the
mistaken impression that
they will be a secret
medicine for longevity.

148820.精霊たちの集合体なので\n気持ちが ひとつにならないと\nこの姿を保てない。\n:
It is an aggregate of
spirits, so it cannot
maintain this form
unless it is united in
spirit. A united
monster.

148887.年を経て紅葉することで\n進化をとげたじんめんじゅ。\nその老かいなフットワーク:
Treeface has evolved
over the years as it has
grown red in color, and
its agile footwork has
earned it a reputation
for its versatility.

148963.適応力の高さのおかげで\n現代まで生き残った翼竜。\n神話の時代の書物にも\nと:
A pterosaur that has
survived to the present
day thanks to its
adaptability, it is
sometimes mentioned in
the books of the
Mythical Age.

149033.長い間 同じ姿勢のまま\n氷の中で眠ってたため\n最初はリューマチ気味で\nうま:
He had been sleeping in
the ice in the same
position for so long
that he initially had
rheumatism and couldn't
fly well.

149102.上からの命令で 冥界から\nこちらの世界に出向してきた。\n月に１回は 妻子の待:
He was transferred from
the underworld to our
world by order from
above. Once a month, he
returns to his home
where his wife and
children are waiting for
him.

149176.太陽から生まれたという\nある部族が残した伝承があり\nいつか 太陽が滅びるとき:
There is a legend left
by a tribe that they
were born from the sun,
and that one day they
will perish together
when the sun perishes.

149251.オイラは 誰もキズつけずに\n盗んでいるのに……。\n暴力で宝物を取り返すなんて:
I stole it without
damaging anyone. It's a
terrible thing to use
violence to get your
treasures back!

149318.古代のオーグリード大陸で\nガメゴンのこうらを背負って\n修行するのが 大流行し:
There is a theory that
the practice of carrying
a wyrtle shell on one's
back in the ancient
Ogreed Continent became
very popular and was
overhunted.

149393.覚えた呪文がマホカンタな辺り\nやはり王様はあなどれない。\n硬いこうらと魔法反:
The king can't be
underestimated when the
spell he learns is
Bounce. He has an
ironclad guard with a
hard kora and a magic
reflection barrier!

149473.数々の偉業をなしとげた\nガメゴン族の英雄的存在で\n中でも紅の死神との７日に渡:
He is a heroic figure of
the Wyrtle tribe who has
accomplished many feats,
among them the legendary
seven-day battle with
the Red Reaper.

149550.ヨンゲ所長のもとを去ったのは\nエサがマズかったかららしい。\n大地の底で 地脈:
It seems that the reason
they left Director Yong
was because the bait was
not good enough. When I
tasted geothermal energy
at the bottom of the
earth, I trembled with
joy.

149635.三闘士の心域で発見された\n宝石から現れたということは\n記憶の産物であるという:
The fact that it
appeared from a gemstone
found in the heartland
of Triad means that it
is a product of memory.
So the real thing is
still out there
somewhere?

149715.トカゲこそ最強！\n世界からドラゴンを駆逐し\nトカゲによる下克上を企む。\nそ:
Lizards are the
strongest! I will
exterminate dragons from
the world and plan to
conquer the world by
lizards. That is my
ambition!

149786.数千年の時を生きる翼竜。\n長い間 この世界の歴史を\n見てきたが言葉を持たない:
A pterosaur that has
lived for thousands of
years. It has seen the
history of this world
for a long time, but has
no language to convey
its knowledge.

149865.じつはあまり高く飛べないのが\n目下の悩みのタネ。愛竜から\n過酷なダイエットメ:
The truth is that he
can't fly very high, and
this is the source of
his current problem. He
is having a hard time
after being given a
harsh diet tomei new by
Ai Ryu.

149945.かなりの暑がりであるため\n鎧の下にタイツ等はつけない。\n直接汗がつくので 相:
He does not wear tights
under his armor because
he is very hot. His
partner, a dragon, is
annoyed by the direct
contact with his sweat.

150024.ものすごくキレイ好き。\n汚れや返り血を落とすため\n獲物をしとめた後は必ず\n:
He likes to keep
extremely clean. They
always go into a river
or lake to wash after
hunting their prey in
order to remove dirt and
blood.

150095.会心のイオラが\nたくさん出ますように……。\nたとえ信仰を失おうと\n神だのみ:
I wish you many Booms in
your meetings. Even if I
lose my faith, I will
not lose my faith in
God.

150159.魔物を強く育てあげる\n鬼教官として知られている。\n呪文を唱える前と後に\nサ:
He is known as a demon
instructor who raises
demons to be strong. Say
"sir" before and after
casting spells, Slime
guys!

150229.自慢のマントを より血の色に\n近づけようと 染め物に励む。\nムラができるので:
He is working hard on
dyeing his cloak, which
he is very proud of, to
make it more like the
color of blood. Kunai
does not often get blood
on his cloak because of
the unevenness of the
color.

150309.高度な呪文を身につけた\nエリート神官だったが\nギャンブルで身を持ち崩し\n破:
Ellie was a priest who
had acquired a high
level of spelling, but
gambling led to her
downfall and she began a
life of ruin.

150379.自慢の法衣は 汚れると自分で\n洗濯している。水が冷たくて\nあかぎれができ こ:
When his vestments get
dirty, he washes them
himself. The water is so
cold that it chafes my
skin, and only then do I
wish I could go back to
Church.

150460.導きの天使の誘いに乗って\n英雄として試練に挑んだが\n天使たちの不遜な態度には:
Guidance Angel invited
him to participate in
the trial as a hero, but
he was indignant at the
irreverent attitude of
the angels from
beginning to end.

150533.きれいな水を汚染させることに\n無上の喜びを感じる迷惑者。\n通常ドロヌーバより:
A nuisance that takes
great pleasure in
polluting clean water.
It is also more water-
rich and sun-tolerant
than the Mudraker, which
is also a bit of a pet
peeve.

150618.オフの日はスライムに分裂して\nカンティスの家で過ごす。\nよく夜ふかしやイタズ:
On his days off, he
spends his time at
Kantis' house after
splitting into Slime. He
often gets into trouble
with the landlord for
being up late at night
and playing pranks.

150701.時々 水辺に集まって\n水面から顔や足を出して\nいっせいに踊っている。\n動き:
Sometimes they gather at
the water's edge,
sticking their faces and
feet out of the water
and dancing in unison.
It seems that if their
movements are out of
alignment, they are not
allowed to do so.

150770.長いツメは殺人鬼の命。\n毎日 お気に入りの\nネイルアーティストの所で\nお手:
Long CLAWS are a killer
life. He never misses a
daily trim at his
favorite nail artieist's
place.

150836.立派なツメと ヒレが誇り。\n青い肌は ウェディに\nちょっと似ているが 本人は:
He is proud of his fine
claws and fins. His blue
skin looks a bit like
Weddie's, but he doesn't
like to be called that.

150907.コハクは植物学者だった。\n世界樹の研究のために\n久遠の森を訪れた彼は\nそこ:
Kohaku was a botanist
who visited the Forest
of Eternity to study
Yggdrasil, where he met
Himea.

150975.毒気のある空気が好物なので\nつらいことがあると\n鋭いツメに しみこませた\n:
They love the poisonous
air, so when they have a
hard time, they lick the
poison from their sharp
claws to cheer
themselves up.

151048.英雄の強さを重視する\nカンティス好みの魔物。\n彼のことは群れのリーダーと\n:
Kantis' favorite monster
who values the strength
of his heroes; he is
recognized as the leader
of his flock and is
absolutely obedient to
him.

151118.ハクオウへの憧れの気持ちが\n裏返しとなって暴走し\nハクオウを執拗に狙う。\n:
His longing for Hakuo
has turned against him,
and he goes berserk,
relentlessly targeting
Hakuo. However, at
heart, he loves his
father.

151192.じつは自らもタマゴ出身で\n祭壇の守人と同じタマゴから\n生まれた。ずっと一緒な:
He was born from the
same egg as Altar
Guardian. He wants to
spend some time alone
since he has been with
Altar Guardian all the
time.

151272.じつは自らもタマゴ出身で\n試練に挑むタマゴを兄弟と感じ\n愛おしく思っている。:
In fact, he himself is
from Tamago, and he
loves Tamago who
challenges Trial as his
brothers. However, he
has no personal feelings
about the trial.

151351.三兄弟と名乗っているものの\nじつは血のつながりはない。\n血よりも濃い絆で結ば:
Although they call
themselves the Three
Brothers, they are not
related by blood. They
are righteous brothers
who share life and
death, bound by a bond
stronger than blood.

151430.生まれた時は シワひとつない\nすべすべ ツルツルの身体だが\n成長するにつれ:
When they are born,
their bodies are smooth
and silky without a
single wrinkle, but as
they grow older, their
skins sag and become
wrinkled.

151509.どう見ても鬼の顔じゃないと\n思ったら 何事にも優柔不断で\nなかなか「決めん道:
It is said that "if you
think you don't have the
face of an ogre, you're
a doushi who is
indecisive about
everything and can't
make up his mind easily.

151581.古代ドワチャッカ大陸から\n地脈エネルギーを奪いつくし\nすべてを灰燼に帰したあ:
It is said that after
robbing the ancient
Dwachakka Continent of
its earthly energies and
burning it all to ashes,
the evil demon laughed
in high spirits.

151660.不死の魔王ネロドスと共に\nグランゼドーラへ帰還した\n勇者は またたく間に\n:
Hero returned to Gran
Zedora with Immortal
Demon King Nerodos and
in no time destroyed his
home castle.

151732.迷える勇者に従って\nグランゼドーラを滅ぼした\n盟友は かつて己が救いし\n数:
The ally who destroyed
Gran Zedora according to
the Lost Hero once went
to many countries that
he had saved.

151804.王子だった獣はオルセコ王国を\n鬼人の国に堕とすと そのまま\nゾンガロンと戦い:
The beast, which was a
prince, corrupted the
Orseco Kingdom into a
land of demons, and then
fought Zongalon and
burned the entire
continent in war.

151887.憎きグルヤンラシュを\n討ち果たすため 怒れる老匠は\n悪夢の新兵器を生み出して:
In order to defeat the
hated Guryan Rush, the
Angry Master created a
new nightmare weapon to
destroy Urbea.

151962.悪夢の新兵器たる魔神は\nウルベア地下帝国の全住民を\n滅ぼし尽くすと機能を停止:
The new weapon of
nightmares, the demonic
god, is said to have
ceased functioning and
entered into a state of
rest after destroying
the entire population of
Urbea Underground City.

152038.時見の箱が命じるままに\n主を討った後 堕ちた剣聖は\n血にぬれた双刀をたずさえ:
After striking his
master as Timeseer Box
had commanded, Slain
Swordsman vanished into
thin air, carrying his
blood-soaked double
swords.

152116.こう見えて割と平和主義者。\nシャンテの歌声にホレ込んで\n子守唄を歌ってもらう:
He was so taken with
Shante's singing that he
gave her Nectar in
exchange for singing
lullabies to her.

152198.ひゃくれつなめを くりだして\n獲物の味を確かめている。\nおいしい旅人に当たる:
They are tasting their
prey by repeating the
Tongue Bashing gesture.
They get excited when
they hit a tasty
traveler.

152274.巣穴に引きこもって\nずっと ダラダラしている\nものぐさなナマケモノ。\n自宅:
A lazy sloth that
lounges in its den all
the time. He is a good
security guard at home.

152339.もともと イエティと\n同じくらい白かったのに\n砂漠で日焼けして\n微妙な色に:
Originally as white as
Powie Yowie, she got a
subtle tan in the
desert.

152403.ひとりさみしく うおーん！と\n泣いていたところを\n賢者ブロッゲンに拾われた。:
I was alone and crying!
Sage Broggen picked her
up when she was crying.
Since then, she has been
attached to him.

152478.日に焼けてボサボサだった毛に\nドワチャカオイルをぬったら\n全身がコンガリ小麦:
When I applied Dwachakka
Oil to my shaggy,
sunburned hair, my whole
body turned a deep red!
Since then, my Mote Mote
life began.

152560.さみだれ突きの練習に\n一心不乱に打ち込んでいる。\n猪突猛進な性格は やはり\:
He devotes himself
single-mindedly to the
practice of Multithrust.
His boarish personality
is a saga of a wild
boar.

152633.手下のオークがケガをすると\n気をつけやがれと 怒鳴りつつ\nベホイミをかけてく:
When Orc gets hurt, he
yells at him to be
careful and gives him a
midheal. He has an
unfaithful character.

152712.オークは 年を取るにつれ\n黄金の毛に生えかわる。\n全身 金色になると お祝い:
Orc grows golden hair as
he gets older. When they
turn golden, they are
given purple clothes to
celebrate.

152785.魔物博士イワノフの論文により\nオークィーンは女王ではなく\n単に大食いのオーク:
A new theory has now
been presented in a
paper by Dr. Stoneberg
of Monster that the Orc
Queen is not a queen,
but simply a gluttonous
Orc.

152868.大半のオークは兵士稼業だが\n戦いばかりの人生に疲れ\n詩人や絵本作家を志す\n:
Most of the Orcs are
soldiers, but there are
a few who are tired of a
life full of battles and
want to become poets or
picture book writers.

152942.魔瘴塚の内部は魔界の地底まで\n伸びる長い管になっていて\n周囲の地盤から魔瘴を:
Inside the miasmound is
a long tube that extends
to the depths of the
Demon World, pumping
demon miasma from the
surrounding ground and
aggravating the Age of
Miasma.

153025.犠牲者を震えあがらせるため\n威厳のある話し方を\n一生懸命練習した。\n油断す:
I practiced hard how to
speak with dignity to
make the victims
tremble. It is said that
when you let your guard
down, your true self
comes out.

153093.失った首を探して夜な夜な\n徘徊するが 左手に持つ盾こそ\nおのれの首であるとい:
Is it an escape from
reality that you wander
around at night looking
for your lost head, but
do not realize that the
shield you hold in your
left hand is your head?

153174.より速く走るために\n翼という重荷を捨てた。\nスピードの魔に魅入られて\n今日:
To run faster, I gave up
the burden of wings.
Today, I am a wind in
the sails of Peid's
magic.

153241.その大きなクチバシで\nとてつもなく巨大な木の幹に\n巣穴を掘って 暮らしている:
The natural enemy of
Treeface, it lives in
its large kuchiba shi,
digging its burrow in
the trunk of an
incredibly huge tree.

153313.何ひとつ真実のない\n真っ赤なウソを つきまくる。\nそれを信じて 破滅した魔物:
They tell the most
outlandish lies that
have no truth in them. I
heard that many monsters
have been ruined by
believing them.

153385.荒野を猛スピードで駆ける。\n魔界では伝書バトならぬ\n伝書おおくちばしを\n通:
In Demon World, he
sometimes uses Beakon,
which is not a message
baton, to communicate
with others.

153458.背負った羽根飾りは\nれんごくちょうの落とし物を\n１枚１枚拾い集めて作った。\:
The feather ornament on
his back was made by
picking up each piece of
Hybird's lost and found.
It is a Blood, Sweat &
Tears Gem.

153531.マヒャデドスを唱えようとして\nマヒャドデスと言ってしまい\n恥ずかしさのあまり:
He was trying to chant
Kacrackle and said
Kacrack desu and was so
embarrassed that he
wanted to go back to the
stone statue.

153608.盾と肉体を徹底的に鍛え\n鉄壁の防御力を手に入れたが\n本当に守りたかった存在の:
He is a sad demon who
has thoroughly trained
his field and body and
received ironclad
defenses, but has
forgotten about the
beings he really wanted
to protect.

153687.使用しているメイク道具は\n特別な調合で作られたもの。\nどんなに汗をかいても崩:
The makeup tools they
use are specially
formulated. They are
said to be ultra-luxury
products that do not
break down no matter how
much they sweat.

153761.生前 数えきれないほどの\n武器を作り上げてきたが\n振るうのは初めてだったため:
He had made countless
weapons during his life,
but this was the first
time he had ever wielded
one.

153833.ある魔王がハゲタカとヘビを\n合成して完成した魔物。\n手元にタカと竜がなかった:
A Demon King created
this monster by
combining a vulture and
a snake, which he says
he used instead of a
hawk and a dragon
because he didn't have
any on hand.

153913.ハゲタカとヘビの合成獣。\n魔王よ なぜ このふたつを\n組み合わせたのか？\n:
A composite of a vulture
and a snake, the Demon
King, why did he combine
the two? The answer is
still in the dark.

153979.この身体で飛びまわるのは\n相当な筋力を必要とする。\n毎日のトレーニングで\n:
It takes a lot of muscle
power to jump spin with
this body. I am proud of
my tummy, which has been
broken by daily
training.

154051.スターキメラにあこがれ\n毛をピンクに染めるキメラが\n続出しているらしい。\n:
A number of Chimaeras
are dyeing their hair
PINK in admiration of
Cosmic Chimaera. Be
careful of imposters!

154119.新月の日は 月に一度だけの\nムーンキメラの貴重な休日。\n常に 羽ばたき続けて:
The new moon day is a
precious holiday for
Lunar Chimaera, which
comes only once a month.
We are always flapping
our wings, so on this
day we stretch them.

154199.たまに 自分が生きてるのか\n死んでるのか考えたりするが\nアタマまで くさって:
Sometimes I wonder if
I'm alive or dead, but I
can't think straight
because I'm so dead in
the head.

154278.コイツらが集まると\n井戸端の主婦も真っ青な\n文字通りの毒舌トークで\n盛り上:
When they get together,
even housewives at the
well end of the street
are said to get into a
lively, tongue-in-cheek
conversation.

154340.旅人を弱らせて\nジワジワと苦しむところを\n眺めるのが趣味らしい。\n性根まで:
They seem to enjoy
weakening travelers and
watching them suffer
slowly. They are a bunch
of vile people down to
their very nature.

154406.生きている人間が ねたましく\n見ると襲わずにいられない。\n恨みこそが 彼らを:
When living humans see
them envyingly, they
cannot help but attack.
Resentment is the root
of energy that drives
them.

154484.生き別れた恋人を探して\n長い間 さまよっていた。\nそのうち自我を忘れ\n冥界:
He wandered around for a
long time, looking for
his departed lover.
Eventually, he forgot
his own self and fell
into the underworld, and
ended up like this.

154550.魔界に出る くさった死体は\n当然 もとは魔族の死体。\nツノはくさっていく過程:
The Walking Corpse in
Demon World is, of
course, originally the
corpse of a demon. It is
said that the antlers
fall off in the process
of being disintegrated.

154624.魔界の大食いチャンピオン。\n４つのハンバーガーを手にし\n大きなクチで一気食い:
He is the champion of
the Demon World and eats
four hamburgers in one
big gulp with his big
mouth. He is a true
beast of a king.

154706.古代の呪術師が 強大な精霊を\n召喚する儀式に用いた 依代が\n儀式の失敗ととも:
Ancient sorcerers used a
yoke to summon a
powerful spirit, and
when the ritual failed,
the yoke disappeared and
returned as a monster.

154788.どろにんぎょうに対し\nライバル心を抱いているが\n想いは一方通行で\nまったく:
He has a rivalry with
Mud Mannequin, but his
feelings are one-way and
he is not taken
seriously at all.

154856.もともとは恋愛成就の願いを\n願掛けする祭具だったのだが\n成就どころか破局を呼:
Originally, it was a
ritual to pray for the
fulfillment of love, but
instead of bringing
fulfillment, it brought
about breakups and was
called a "breakup
charmer" of terror.

154938.キモカワ系人形として\nマニアの間で人気が急上昇。\n本人もまんざらではないが\:
KiMochaWa dolls are
rapidly gaining
popularity among
enthusiasts. He is not
so sure about this, but
he pretends to be
uninterested.

155014.魔王に仕えることが\nサイおとこのステイタス。\nボスに大魔王を持つことは\nサ:
Serving a Demon King is
the status quo of
Rhinothrope. Having a
Great Demon King as a
boss is also a long-held
wish of Rhinothrope.

155085.及ばざれば衰弱の果てに死に\n過ぎたれば暴走の果てに滅ぶ。\n魅力的だが厄介でも:
Too much and they die in
a fit of weakness, too
little and they perish
in a fit of rage.
Charming yet
troublesome, demon
miasma has plagued Demon
World for many years.

155170.自分より身体の大きな魔物に\nバカにされるのが悔しくて\n死ぬほど鍛えて強くなっ:
He trained himself to
death and became
stronger because he was
frustrated at being made
fun of by monsters who
were bigger than he was.
He is a genuine hard
worker.

155249.新調したオノを振り回し\nいずれは魔界を統一すると\nイキがっていたが スライド:
He was excited to unify
the Demon World by
wielding his new axe,
but Slide beat him up
and made him his
apprentice.

155323.じつは 剣と盾は見かけ倒しで\n剣術なんて からっきし。\n小さくても強いスライ:
In fact, he was only a
swordsman and a shield.
I was fascinated by the
small but strong Slide
and became his
apprentice.

155401.普段は木こりとして\n森で オノを振るっている。\n妻のサイおんなは\n家で 夫:
He usually works as a
lumberjack, wielding an
axe in the forest. His
wife, Sai-Onna, is at
home waiting for her
husband's return.

155467.魔物たちのウワサで\nカバ族の戦士が現れたと聞き\nぜひとも一戦交えてみたいと\:
He has heard rumors
among monsters that a
hippo warrior has
appeared and is eager to
engage him in battle.

155534.よく ちょっと強いからって\n天狗になるなと言われますが\nこれ 鼻じゃなくてツ:
People often say that
just because you're a
little strong, don't get
all snobby, but this
isn't a nose, it's a
horn. Please believe me!

155606.サイの戦士が オレたちに\n挑もうとしているらしヒポね。\nヒッポッポ。格の違い:
The rhino warriors are
about to challenge us.
Hippopotamus. Let's show
them the difference in
status, Tamas!

155685.カバ族が誇る騎士として\n一目置かれる存在ゆえに\n短足がコンプレックス。\nシ:
He is the pride of the
Hippopotamus tribe, and
is considered to have
short legs.

155758.かつて １００頭の軍勢を率い\n数万もの サイおとこの大軍を\n退けた 歴史的戦:
There was once a
historic battle in which
a 100-horse army routed
a Rhinothrope army
numbering in the tens of
thousands. This is
called the Hippolay War.

155840.幼いころ リベリオと共に\nマンマーに育てられた。\n自分がネコではないと気づき:
Raised by Momma with
Purrgatroyd as a child.
She left Cat Island when
she realized that she
was not a cat.

155913.サイは投げられた……。\n大きな戦いを始める前\nサイおとこの皇帝は\nそうつぶ:
The rhinoceros was
thrown. So muttered the
emperor of Rhinothrope
before starting the big
fight.

155977.死んで骨になった今でも\n足の鉄球が はずれない。\n呪われし運命に囚われた\n:
Even now that he is dead
and bone, the iron ball
on his leg cannot be
removed. A pathetic
slave of death, trapped
in a cursed fate.

156042.生前に仕えていた王様は\nたいへん うたぐり深い性格で\n兵士に忠誠を誓わせるた:
The king who served him
before his death was of
a very poetical
disposition and placed a
curse of absolute
obedience on his
soldiers to make them
pledge allegiance to
him.

156117.スゴうでの殺し屋が捕まって\n死刑に処せられたものの\n被害者たちの恨みは消えず:
Although the hit man in
Sugou was caught and
sentenced to death, the
victims' resentment
remained and they did
not die in peace.

156193.左手に持つ大きなホネは\n代々 牢獄を束ねる主に\n受け継がれていく\n由緒正し:
The Big Bone in his left
hand is the venerable
horn that has been
passed down from
generation to generation
to the Lord of the
Prison.

156256.地獄の訓練に耐え抜いたのか\nその実力は本物。\n忠誠心が高く 規律も守る。\n:
He has endured hellish
training and his
abilities are real. He
is loyal and
disciplined. There are
not many young men like
him these days.

156328.不死の魔王から じきじきに\n手ほどきを受けたという\nバズズの魔術の実力は\n:
Pazuzu's magical
abilities, which he says
he learned from the
immortal Demon King, are
topped by Pukulas in
Magic Maze.

156401.美しい銀の毛皮は\n吸水性に 優れており\n最高級のバスローブの材料に\n使われ:
The beautiful silver fur
is highly absorbent and
is sometimes used to
make the finest
bathrobes.

156468.千年生きたピンクモーモンが\n心根まで血に染まって\n変化した姿なのだと主張する:
Some phony scholars are
said to claim that Pink
Sanguini, which lived
for a thousand years,
was changed by blood to
its heart's content.

156544.主君の腹心であった彼は\n人間の魂を集める役割だった。\nその無数の魂は 主君か:
He was the master's
lieutenant and was in
charge of collecting
HUMAN souls. These
countless souls were
passed down from the
lord to the Twelve
Generals.

156620.そのツメは触れたものを\nなんでも切り裂いてしまう。\n哀れな犠牲者の断末魔を\:
Its CLAWS will tear
through anything it
touches. It is Pazuzu's
pleasure to listen to
the poor victim's
demise.

156693.自慢のツインクローは\n威力が落ちないよう\n専属のネイルアーティストに\n研が:
The twin claws, his
pride and joy, are
apparently sharpened by
a dedicated nail
artieist to ensure that
they do not lose their
power.

156758.かたい絆で結ばれた\nスライムと騎士は一心同体。\n一方が安らかに眠れば\n相方:
Slime and knight are
bound together by a
strong bond. When one of
them sleeps peacefully,
the other naturally
falls asleep.

156826.相棒のメタルスライムは\nシルバーと呼ばれている。\nもちろん ハイヨー！ と\:
My buddy Metal Slime is
called SILVER. Of
course, he jumps on it
by saying, "Hi, yo! and
jump on.

156897.毎日 かぶとのタテガミに\nクシを入れるのを 欠かさない\n重度の ナルシスト。:
A severe narcissist who
never fails to put a
comb in the beak of his
helmet every day. His
partner, Slime, is
appalled.

156971.かの有名な大悪魔バズズは\nグーシオン族の出身だとか。\n同族から有名悪魔が出た:
The famous great demon
Pazuzu is said to have
come from the Dark
Pazuzu tribe. It seems
that they are proud of
the fact that a famous
demon came from their
tribe.

157051.厳しい修行を共に乗りこえた\n親友同士のスライムとナイト。\n俺たちの武器はこの:
Slime and Knight, two
best friends who have
survived the rigors of
training together,
commented
enthusiastically that
our weapon of choice is
our friendship.

157133.身体を丸めて寝ていると\nたまに 自分のトゲが刺さって\n飛び起きることがある\:
When he sleeps curled up
in a ball, he sometimes
jumps out of bed when
one of his spines sticks
into his body.

157207.眠っているときの寝息で\nうっかり やけつく息をはき\n朝になると しびれた動物:
When sleeping, we may
inadvertently gasp in
our sleep, and in the
morning, we may find a
numb animal lying beside
us.

157281.バザックスのメスが産む卵は\nとてもカラが厚いので\n全身トゲだらけのコイツが\:
The eggs laid by the
female Tyrannoceratops
have a very thick
carapace, so they can be
held and warmed by this
guy with his entire body
covered in spines.

157356.寒いときは 群れで\n身を寄せ合って眠っているが\n近すぎると トゲが刺さって\:
When it's cold, they
huddle together in
groups to sleep, but if
they get too close, they
suffer the dilemma of
not being able to sleep
because of the sting of
their spines.

157428.敵を見ると炎を吹きながら\n突進してくる習性があり\n『炎の暴走特急』と呼ばれ\:
When it sees an enemy,
it rushes forward while
blowing flames, and is
feared and called the
"Runaway Express of
Flames.

157495.種族神 土の神ワギが\n神話の時代に生みだした。\n実体や意識を持たず\n試練の:
God of Races Wagi, god
of the earth, gave birth
to this god in the
Mythical Age. It has no
substance or
consciousness, and
manifests itself only
during trials.

157564.ドロヌーバの天敵は日照り！\n強い日差しによって お肌が\nカサヌーバに なって:
The Mudraker's natural
enemy is sunlight! The
strong sunlight causes
your skin to become
crusty and your identity
to collapse.

157644.スライムって人気者らしい。\nそんなウワサを聞いてから\nいてもたってもいられな:
I heard that Slime is
very popular. I can't
stay still since I heard
such a rumor!

157722.火山の噴火に巻き込まれ\nドロドロに溶けた人の怨霊。\n熱い熱いと もだえながら:
The ghost of a person
who was caught in a
volcanic eruption and
melted into a sludge. It
clings to your legs,
writhing with hot, hot
pain.

157794.真夏のリゾート地に現れては\n波とたわむれる恋人たちの\n足を引っ張るという。\:
true He is said to show
up at summer resorts and
drag down lovers who are
playing with the waves.
He seems to have a
painful past.

157867.２月の 特別なあの日に\nチョコをもらえなかった\n男子たちの怨念により\nこの:
It is said that this
monster was born out of
the resentment of boys
who did not receive
chocolate on that
special day in February.

157937.縁もゆかりも無い相手だが\n魔界で召喚される某巨人に\n親近感を抱いており いつ:
Although he has no
connection to the other,
he feels a kinship with
a certain giant who is
summoned in Demon World,
and he would like to co-
star with him someday.

158012.横たえた罪人の腹の上に\nばくだん岩を置き 少しずつ\nたたきながら追い詰めると:
It is said that in Demon
World, the torture is to
place a Rockbomb on the
belly of the sinner who
is lying down, and then
to hunt him down by
beating him little by
little.

158090.決して自暴自棄になることなく\n爆発の欲求を耐え抜いた\n我慢強い ばくだん岩だ:
They say that only a
patient Rockbomb who
endures the desire to
explode without ever
becoming desperate can
become a Big Bang Rock.

158169.ほがらかに 満面の笑みを\n浮かべているつもりなのに\n目が笑ってないと言われ\:
I am worried that people
say that my eyes are not
smiling even though I am
trying to smile with a
broad smile on my face.

158238.彼の すてばちな生き方こそ\nまさにロックだと あがめられ\n多くのアーティスト:
His no-nonsense way of
life has been praised as
"rock 'n' roll" and has
influenced many
artieists.

158310.若い頃は もっと尖っていたが\nゴロゴロと転がりながら\n旅をするうちに丸くなっ:
When I was younger, I
was sharper, but as I
traveled and rolled
around, I became
rounder. I've grown up
too.

158389.のろいの岩と出会った者は\n一生 その笑顔が脳裏に\n焼きついて離れないという\:
It is said that anyone
who meets Dreadrock is
cursed with a smile that
stays with them for the
rest of their lives.

158461.オーロラの舞う空を見上げ\nのんびり転がっているのが\nなによりの憩いのひと時。:
The best time to relax
is to roll around
looking up at the sky
with aurora dancing in
the air. They call it
"polar light bathing.

158537.大事にとっておいたプリンを\n弟に食べられてしまい\n猛りくるった姉の怒りが\n:
It is said that this
monster was born out of
the anger of a sister
who was enraged when her
brother ate her Purine,
which she had carefully
preserved.

158608.プリンを食べただけなのに\n姉に ひどく怒られてしまい\nやりきれない弟の悲しみ:
This monster is said to
have been born out of
the grief of a younger
brother who was
extremely angry with his
older sister for simply
eating purine.

158683.ギャスモンハートは極小で\n盗むには 相当な技術がいる。\nえらそうなこと言って:
Buntzenberner hearts are
so small that it takes a
lot of skill to steal
them. It is a very small
heart, and it takes a
lot of skill to steal
it.

158759.森にひそみ 道に迷った旅人を\nたき火に化けて おびきよせ\nそのまま 生命を奪:
It is said to lure
travelers who have lost
their way into the
forest by transforming
into Bonfire and taking
their lives, turning
them into companions.

158833.メダパニーマを使うときは\n自分も混乱しそうになるのを\n必死にガマンしている。:
When he uses Kafuddle,
he is desperately trying
to keep himself from
becoming confused as
well. The appearance is
both adorable and
mocking.

158910.ブレスを使う敵は数あれど\n彼ほど良いニオイを\nさせる者はいない。\n入念にケ:
There are many enemies
who use breath, but none
of them smell as good as
he does. He seems to
take very good care of
himself.

158977.呪文を使うのは苦手だったが\n仲間を守りたい一心で\nスクルトの習得に成功した。:
He was not good at using
spells, but he succeeded
in mastering Kabuff with
a single-minded desire
to protect his friends.
He is a nice guy who
cares about the
companion.

159054.あらゆるピンチを\n気合だけで乗り越えてゆく\nその姿はまさに熱血ヒーロー。\n:
The way he overcomes
every pinch with just
his spirit is truly a
hot-blooded hero. Be
hot! is his motto.

159127.ラブリーかつセクシーで\n仲間の援護もバッチリこなす\n非の打ち所のないヒロイン:
Lovely and sexy, she is
an impeccable heroine
who is perfectly capable
of supporting her
companion. She is a bit
of a temperamental
person, but that's not
her fault.

159203.行きつけの毒の沼地には\n友達のバブルスライムがいる。\nときどき 泳いで競争し:
In his favorite poison
swamp, he has a friend,
Bubble Slime. Sometimes
they swim and compete
with each other, and
sometimes they splash
each other with
poisonous water.

159279.かんしゃくを起こすと\n泣きながら 火炎をはきちらし\n手がつけられなくなる\n:
When he throws a
tantrum, this annoying
baby dragon cries,
bursts into flames, and
gets out of hand.

159350.コイツの主食は ズバリ砂。\n砂を食べては フンをするので\n砂漠の緑化に使えな:
Its staple food is sand.
It eats sand and poops,
and scientists are
looking into the
possibility of using it
for greening the desert.

159428.その体温は意外と低く\n闇系の技ばかり得意なのが\nじつは密かなコンプレックス。:
He is a very hot and
passionate man, but his
body temperature is
surprisingly low, and he
is good at only dark-
type techniques!

159505.１０００年の間消えることなく\n燃え盛りつづけたフレイムが\nより強力により純粋:
The Dancing Flame, which
has been burning for
1000 years without
extinguishing, has
evolved into a more
powerful and purer
version of the Origin
Flame.

159585.愛する人を守れなくて\nなげきの果てに逝った剣士は\nたとえ身体が朽ちようとも\:
A swordsman who dies at
the end of his life
because he cannot
protect his loved one is
not allowed to sleep,
even if his body decays.

159659.いなずまが光った瞬間だけ\n浮かびあがる実体は\n目を真っ赤に血走らせ\n断末魔:
The entity that emerges
only when the Lightning
shines shows true red
eyes and a desperate
look on its face.

159727.美しい女性を見つけると\nマントの中に引き入れて\n連れさってゆくという。\nわ:
Whenever he finds a
beautiful woman, he
pulls her into his cloak
and takes her away. He
is a bad Knight.

159797.とある国の王族の者は皆\nこのマントを身につけた。\n布地は 光を受けると\n満:
All the royalty of a
certain country wore
this cloak. The fabric
shines like a star-
filled sky when it
catches the light.

159866.王の証だった黄金のマントは\n妬みを生み 呪術師の手で\nマントに魂が縛られるよ:
The golden cloak that
had been the king's mark
was a source of envy,
and a sorcerer cursed
the cloak to bind his
soul.

159942.志なかばで死んだ 大国の王は\n世界も 我と ともに滅びよと\nダークドレアムに:
The king of the great
kingdoms who died in the
middle of his life
prayed to Nokturnus that
the world might perish
with me, and became the
incarnation of Doomed
Dream.

160018.身体に砂をため込んだ\n大きくて重いモンスター。\n砂をすべて出してしまうと\n:
A large, heavy monster
that holds sand in its
body. When all the sand
is removed, it becomes
about half its original
size.

160091.種族神 水の神マリーヌが\n神話の時代に生みだした。\n封じられた邪神のチカラを:
The God of Races The God
of Water, Marine, gave
birth to this god in the
Mythical Age. It is said
that it also has the
role of restraining the
power of the enclosed
evil gods.

160166.二つ名は 自らつけたもの。\nあまり殺しはしない主義だが\nこの二つ名のおかげで:
He gave himself this
name. He is not much of
a killer, but he is
feared because of this
name, which is
convenient for him.

160242.かつてはレッド イエローと\nソルジャースリーなるチームを\n組んで暴れまわって:
He used to team up with
red yellow and Soldier
Three to run rampant.
After the breakup, he
has been working as a
solo artist.

160323.奈落の門と常世の門のはざまで\nさまよっていた所を拾われた。\n馬面の相方と暴れ:
He was found wandering
between Abyss Gate and
Eternal Gate. He seems
to have a faint memory
of running amok with his
horse-faced partner.

160408.右手に持つふうじんの盾は\n千夜フウジンのお手製。\n自分の顔を盾に刻むという\:
The Tempest Shield in
his right hand is
handmade by 1000 Nights
Fuujin. He has a
narcissistic side,
carving his own face on
the shield.

160481.イレイザーシリーズの暗殺者は\nこのＧｅ５０のほかに\n５ｕＭ１ Ｋｃ８５ ３ｍ:
Three other Assassins in
the Eraser series are
said to have been
reported besides this
Ge50, a 5uM1 Kc85 3mPR.

160561.イカ界の頂点を目指し\n大王の地位まで上りつめたが\n大王以下と呼ばれているよう:
He has risen to the top
of the squid world and
reached the position of
the Great King, but he
feels like he is called
less than the Great King
and is not satisfied
with his position.

160638.青白く発光するボディは\nテンタクルスにとって自慢。\nついつい不要に光っては\:
Squidzilla is proud of
its bluish-white
luminescent body. It is
always glowing
unnecessarily, scaring
marine creatures.

160714.タコは８本。イカなら１０本。\n９本の触手を持つ自分は\nどちらでもない特別な存:
An octopus has eight
tentacles, a squid has
ten. He believes that he
is a special being with
nine tentacles, and that
he is neither.

160793.古代種と呼ばれる怪物の多くは\nすでに封印されるか倒されたが\nメイヴ同様 眠り:
Many of the monsters
called "ancient species"
have already been sealed
or defeated, but like
Meiv, a few Kunai have
been left to sleep and
forgotten.

160878.魔法戦士に あこがれて\n転職させてもらおうと\nダーマ神官を訪ねたが\nなぜか:
He visited Dharma Priest
to ask for a new job,
but for some reason, he
was turned away.

160945.騎兵という割に じつは\n馬には乗ったことがない。\nりゅうほ兵という名前だけは:
I've never actually
ridden a horse, even
though I'm called a
cavalryman. I think the
name "ryuhohei" is the
only thing I don't want
to be called.

161018.ダーマ神官をとっつかまえて\nむりやり 転職させてもらった\n元リザードマンの栄:
The glorious story of a
former Mandrake Major
who grabbed the Dharma
Priest and forced him to
change jobs. If you keep
thinking about it, your
dreams will come true!

161098.神聖視されることに\n反発していた時期もある。\n目のキズやタトゥーは\nグレて:
There was a time when he
rebelled against being
considered sacred. The
scratches and tattoos on
his eyes are said to be
the remnants of his
greedy days.

161166.一見して地味と言うなかれ。\nくすんだ体色がシブいと評判で\nこれでもリザードマ:
At first glance, he is
not as plain as one
might think. He is a
very popular and
handsome man in the
Mandrake Major world.

161246.華麗な魔法戦士になるという\n夢をあきらめきれず\nひたすら修行に打ち込んだ結果:
Unable to give up his
dream of becoming a
brilliant armamentalist,
he devoted himself to
training and became an
invincible swordsman.

161320.魔界に豪華な邸宅を持ち\n狩りとった魂を調理して\nディナーを楽しむなど\n優雅:
He has a luxurious
mansion in Demon World,
where he enjoys an
elegant life, cooking
dinners with the souls
he hunts.

161390.アイスボンバーお手製の\n大盛りかき氷を食べて\nおなかを壊して以来\n冷たいも:
I stopped eating cold
food after I had a
stomach ache from eating
a big bowl of Frost
Bomber's homemade Shaved
Ice.

161458.ホークブリザードの吹雪で\n人は眠るように死ぬという。\nそれを皮肉って ある詩:
Snowbird blizzards are
said to kill people as
they sleep. Ironically,
a poet called it the
Blue Bird of Happiness.

161536.れんごくちょうの羽根を\n大切に持っていると\n好きな人と結ばれるという\n不思:
There is a mysterious
jinx that says that if
you hold a Hybird
feather with care, you
will be united with the
person you love.

161604.魔物商人は ひくいどりのヒナ\n１０匹を密室に閉じ込めた。\n仲間を食べ 生き残:
Monster traders locked
10 Firebird chicks in a
secret room; they ate
the companion and the
three survivors were
marked with the number
13.

161687.凶鳥フレスに出会った者には\n地獄のような不幸が訪れるが\nみごと討ち倒した者に:
Legend has it that those
who encounter the Bad
Bird Fres are doomed to
hellish misery, but
those who successfully
defeat them will be
rewarded with glory.

161764.仲間同士の和を大切にする\n気づかいのできる魔物。\n個性の強い呪符魔物の中で\:
A considerate monster
who cherishes harmony
among companions, his
personality was valuable
among the highly
individualistic
spellbook monsters.

161840.ひくいどりやホークブリザード\nその他多くの鳥モンスターの\n祖先だと言われてい:
It is said to be the
ancestor of Firebird,
Snowbird, and many other
bird monsters, but the
true story is still in
the dark.

161919.聖光教主の心に宿る希望が\n試練のケモノに化身した姿。\n教主には空を飛びたいと:
The hope that resides in
the heart of Light Lord
is incarnated as a TRIAL
animal. Does the Light
Lord have a hope to fly
in the sky?

161996.最近 骨密度が下がっていて\nカルシウムをとるため\n牛乳をたくさん飲んでいる。:
My bone density is down
recently, and I drink a
lot of milk to get my
calcium. Surprisingly,
you are health-
conscious.

162069.新月の真っ暗な夜に\n死神の夜会を開くという。\n血染めのタキシードで着飾り\n:
On the darkest night of
the new moon, they will
hold a reaper's soiree.
They will dress up in
blood-dyed tuxedos and
dance the dance of
death.

162140.彼らの愛馬は 生前\n一日に千里を走ったという。\n死してなお 血を流しながら\:
Their beloved horses
were said to have run a
thousand miles in a
single day during their
lifetime. Even in death,
they still bleed and
gallop like a gust of
wind.

162212.草木も眠るような真夜中に\n訪ねてきて 戸をたたく。\nうっかり扉を開けた者は\:
True, even the grass and
trees are asleep. They
visit you in the middle
of the night and knock
on your door. Those who
carelessly open the door
are said to disappear,
leaving only their
shadows behind.

162284.かつて悪逆の限りを尽くし\n法と権力に逆らった大悪党も\nキュロノスによって調整:
The once treacherous and
treacherous villains who
defied the law and
authority have been
transformed by the
Kyuronos into obedient
frames.

162363.勇者アルヴァンに 倒された後\n不死の魔王ネロドスのチカラで\nよみがえり 不死:
After being defeated by
Hero Alvan, he was
revived by Immortal
Demon King Nerodos and
stood again in the Demon
King Castle.

162445.ヨロイの色が左右で違うのは\n半分だけ埋まった状態で\n長い間 雨ざらしになって:
The color of the armor
is different on the left
and right sides because
only half of the armor
was buried and only half
of it rusted after being
exposed to rain for a
long time.

162520.名高い まほうのよろいは\n自分をモデルにして作られたと\nなぜか思い込んでいる:
For some reason, he
believes that the famous
magical mawashi was
modeled after him. Let's
leave him alone.

162596.魔界の城の渡り廊下には\nサタンメイルが ずらりと\n１０００体以上 並んでおり:
The corridors of Demon
World's castle are lined
with more than 1,000
Armour figures, a
majestic and awe-
inspiring sight.

162670.重厚なヨロイのせいで\n横になると起き上がれない。\nそのため 疲れた時は\n立:
Because of the heavy
armor, he cannot get up
when he lies down.
Therefore, when he is
tired, he sleeps
standing up.

162740.現役時代のスピンドルは\nこの魔物より はるかに強く\nおまけに美形だったらしい:
I heard that Spindle was
much stronger and more
beautiful than this
monster when he was
active. Time is cruel.

162810.ガートラント兵士たちの間にも\n意外と チョコ神ぬいぐるみは\n広まっていたらし:
Choco-God Plushie was
surprisingly popular
among Gartlant Soldiers.

162888.この魔物の元となった追っ手が\nなぜ ロディアとコゼットを\n狙っていたのか……:
The key to why the
original pursuers of
this monster were
targeting Rhodia and
Cosette seems to lie in
their past.

162971.エンゼルだからと言って\n優しいなんてことは一切なく\n平気で超強力な攻撃を\n:
Beware that just because
they are angels, they
are not gentle at all,
and they are not afraid
to attack with super
strength.

163045.戦いを楽しもうとするあまり\n主君に逆らうこともあったが\n主君が それをとがめ:
He was so eager to enjoy
fighting that he
sometimes disobeyed his
lord, but his lord did
not criticize him for
it.

163118.ある神学者は語る。\nネクロバルサは かつて\n禁断の呪文 ジゴデインを\n神か:
A theologian tells us
that Togre once stole
the forbidden spell
Kazapstrophe from God.

163184.私が使命を果たせなかった時\nこの手紙を見てください。\n超天道士様より預かった:
When I fail to fulfill
my mission, please see
this letter. Proof of
MRT entrusted to me by
Mr. Chotendoji to Mr.
Yarn.

163258.お気に入りのムチは特注品。\n色はもともと白かったのだが\nムチ打たれた者たちの:
My favorite whip is
custom-made. The color
was originally white,
but it was dyed red with
the blood of those who
were hit by the whip.

163332.アンルシア姫に仕える近衛兵が\n魔道士キルギルの研究により\n魔物への変身能力を:
A Kingsguard in the
service of Princess
Anlucia, he gained the
ability to transform
into a monster through
the research of Wizard
Kirgyl. His loyalty to
the princess is
unparalleled.

163411.職業病のせいか つい\nオフの日でも道行く人を\n通せんぼしてしまう。\nワーカ:
I'm a bit of a
workaholic, but I'm not
a workaholic. I'm one
step away from being a
workaholic.

163479.夜更かしをしていると\nベレスがやってくるわよと\n母は子に言い聞かせる。\n恐:
Stay up late and Beleth
will come, the mother
tells her child. The
dweller of darkness,
synonymous with fear.

163551.世の女性の王子様像を\nブチ壊したいと思っている。\n最近のブームは 毎日１頭\:
He wants to destroy the
image of the prince of
women in the world. His
latest craze is drinking
a whole white horse
every day.

163621.彼らの自我は薄く\nただ殺りくの本能に従って\n命を刈りつづける。\nまさに血も:
Their egos are thin, and
they simply follow their
instinct to kill and
continue to reap lives.
They are truly demons
without blood or tears.

163685.荷物をなるべくキズつけず\n新鮮なうちに届けたいのだが\nたまに つうこんのいち:
He wants to deliver the
package fresh, but he
sometimes makes a
mistake.

163763.じつは鉄球の扱いが苦手。\n素手で殴ったほうが効率的だが\n鉄球男子としてのプラ:
In fact, he is not good
at handling an iron
ball. It would be more
efficient to hit them
with his bare hands, but
his pride as an iron
ball boy compels him to
continue his daily
routine of swinging.

163843.名の示す通り 主人に仕える\n使い魔だが 主が何者なのかは\n今のところ不明。古:
As the name suggests, it
is a Famililar serving a
master, but who that
master is is currently
unknown. It seems to be
related to an ancient
demon.

163924.まがまがしい４つの凶器を\n手のひらで転がしながら\nいかに獲物を処刑するか\n:
He is constantly
envisioning how to
execute his prey by
rolling the four
dazzling weapons in the
palm of his hand.

163992.はじめての任務は 村ひとつ\n滅ぼしてくることだった。\nそれを果たすと はじめ:
His first mission was to
destroy a village. Once
he had done so, he was
appointed to the Demon
King's inner circle for
the first time.

164066.なにゆえに生まれたか？\nなんのために生きるのか？\nそれは俺の名に聞いてくれ。:
Why were we born? For
what purpose do we live?
Ask my name. I Am Zombie
Gladiator!

164142.世告げの姫シュゼとテルナが\nロディアを結界へ隠したことに\n気付くのが遅れたた:
The mission failed
because Oracle
PrincessShuzet and Terna
realized too late that
Rhodia was hidden in the
warding.

164221.残虐非道な殺りくの数々を見た\nボーンファイターたちに\n戦いの神と崇められてい:
He is revered as the god
of battle by the Zombie
Gladiators who have seen
his brutal and inhumane
killings. The king
continues on the path of
carnage today.

164300.バルディスタの処刑執行人を\n担っていたが ヴァレリア自ら\n手を下しがちで仕事:
He had been Valdista's
executioner, but Valeria
tended to do the
executing herself and
was out of work, so
Bertro decided to
reassign him.

164384.村や町を滅ぼした数で\n魔王から出る俸給が決まる。\n１００個の集落を滅ぼすと\:
The number of villages
and towns destroyed
determines the stipend
from the Demon King. 100
villages destroyed is
said to be worth a
special allowance.

164455.ご自慢のオノを振るい\n木を切りたおすのが趣味。\n今日も意気揚々と\nじんめん:
His hobby is to cut down
trees with his axe.
Today, he heads to
Treeface in high
spirits.

164523.浴びたばかりの新しい血と\n乾いた古い血が混ざり合い\n血染めのヨロイには\n色:
The freshly bathed new
blood mixed with the
dried old blood and the
blood-stained armor
became unevenly colored.

164593.生まれてから一度も\nヨロイを脱いだことはないし\nお風呂に入ったこともない。\:
I have never taken off
my armor since I was
born and I have never
taken a bath. That's why
it smells a little.

164663.何者にも屈さぬ気高さと\n仮面の下の美しき素顔により\n白バラ様と もてはやされ:
Her unyielding nobility
and the beauty beneath
her mask have earned her
the nickname "Lady
Shirobara," and she is
very popular among
monster girls.

164735.ひとりの弟子も取らず\nいかなる魔王にも仕えずに\nひたすら魔術の道を探求せし\:
The result of a solitary
mage who never took an
apprentice, never served
any Demon King, but
devoted himself to the
path of sorcery.

164811.怨念にとり憑かれた者は\n目の前が真っ暗になり\n何も聞こえず身動きもとれず\n:
The person haunted by
the grudge is in total
darkness, unable to hear
anything or move, and
feels nothing but
suffering.

164884.はじまりの なげきとは\n果たして なんであったのか。\n今となっては思いだせず:
What was the beginning
of my grief? I can't
remember now, and only
the pain remains.

164958.悪しき神々を信仰させて\n人類に堕落の道を歩ませんと\n日々 邪教の教えを広める:
Every day he spreads his
evil doctrines in order
to make mankind believe
in evil gods and follow
the path of depravity.
There is no rest for the
evil preachers.

165033.死して後 死霊の王にまで\nのぼりつめた成功者。\n皮肉にも彼は 今まさに\n人:
After his death, the
SUCCESSOR rose to the
rank of King of the
Dead. Ironically, he's
enjoying life right now.

165098.その深い愛情は 娘である\nメギストリス姫に注がれ\n国民には注がれなかった。\:
His deep love was for
his daughter, Princess
Megistris, and not for
his people. The sad,
naked king.

165164.神に絶望し自害した 大司教は\n全ての者に 平等なる死をと\nダークドレアムに:
In despair of God, the
archbishop committed
suicide, prayed to
Nokturnus for an equal
death for all, and
became the incarnation
of Dead Dream.

165238.生前の暴君ぶりを魔物仲間に\n聞かせるのが至上の喜び。\nあの頃は俺もやんちゃし:
It is my supreme
pleasure to tell
monstercompanion how
tyrannical I was when I
was alive. It's annoying
to hear him mumble in
profile, "I was naughty
back then, too.

165320.悪い仲間たちと徒党を組んで\n気に入った遺跡を占拠した。\n何かとツッパリたいお:
He formed a clique with
bad companions and
occupied the ruins he
liked. He is an
adolescent zig-zagging
delinquent monster who
wants to be a part of
something.

165397.じつは家出息子を探している\n頑固一徹のイーギュア父。\nしかし一向に見つからず:
Father Igyu is a
stubborn father who is
actually looking for his
runaway son. However, he
can't find him at all,
so he's doing his best
to find him.

165474.右上の手は おはしを持つ手\n左上の手は お茶碗を持つ手\n右下の手は 腕ずもう:
The upper right hand
holds the chopstick, the
upper left hand holds
the bowl, the lower
right hand is for arm
wrestling, and the lower
left hand is for wiping
the buttocks.

165552.やつざきアニマルなんて\n適当な名前を考えたヤツを\n八つ裂きにしてやりたい！\:
I want to tear to pieces
whoever came up with the
appropriate name
Bullion! Animal insists.

165625.一度は勇者に倒されたものの\n魔軍十二将は復活を遂げる。\n主君から得た無数の魂:
Although once defeated
by Hero, the Twelve
Generals of the Demon
Army were resurrected.
They were immortalized
by the countless souls
they had gained from
their lord.

165704.魔軍では 有能すぎるため\n獅子身中の虫となるのではと\n疑われることもあったが:
He was so effective in
the demon army that he
was sometimes suspected
of becoming a
Treacherous Friend, but
he was always loyal to
his lord.

165778.モルバ団長がつけた この名は\n墓掘り人という意味らしい。\n本人は気に入ってい:
Captain Morva gave him
this name, which means
"tomb digger. He didn't
like it, but he couldn't
say it because he didn't
speak the language.

165861.魔物サッカー界では有名な\nゴールキーパーだという。\nシュートを止めたときに\:
He is a famous
goalkeeper in the
MONSTER soccer world.
When he stops a shot, he
makes his signature smug
face.

165935.コイツの呪いに心を侵され\n闇賢者に堕ちてしまった者は\nどこかにいるのだろうか:
Is there anyone out
there who has had their
hearts invaded by this
guy's curse and fallen
into the Dark Sage? Now
that the Lord is gone,
what are they doing?

166012.デーモンキングのディナーは\n人間の悲鳴を音楽に\n新鮮な肉と血のソースを和え\:
The Demon Overlord's
dinner is a fresh meat
and blood sauce with the
music of human screams,
garnished with
vegetables grown in
Demon World.

166085.サボってる魔物を見つけたら\n魔界３０周の罰を言いつける\n体育会系な軍団長さん:
He is an athletic corps
leader who, when he
finds a monster slacking
off, punishes them with
30 laps of Demon World.
He is strict but takes
good care of them.

166161.近衛兵士たちのリーダー格。\n魔道士キルギルの研究により\n魔物への変身能力を得:
He is the leader of the
Kingsguard, and through
the research of Wizard
Kirgyl, he has gained
the ability to transform
into a monster. He is
apparently quite
ambitious.

166241.名も姿も とある魔界の賢者に\nうりふたつだが 他人の空似。\n魔界における地位:
He is a perfect
duplicate of Sage of a
certain Demon World in
name and appearance, but
he is a complete
stranger to the Demon
World in terms of status
and ability.

166321.かつては魔王の右腕として\n狭間の世界に君臨したが\n今ではデュランと立場逆転。:
Once the right-hand man
of the Demon King, he
reigned supreme in
Between Worlds, but now
he and Dhuran have
reversed their
positions. Now, he and
Dhuran have reversed
their positions, and are
secretly aiming for a
comeback.

166398.勇者アルヴァンと盟友カミルに\n倒された後 不死の魔王の\nチカラで よみがえり:
After being defeated by
Hero Alvan and Ally
Kamil, he was revived by
the power of the
