immortal Demon King and
stood up to face his
enemies.

166477.鎧の中には誰もいないが\nなぜか目が光っている。\n内側にたまったガスが\n燃え:
There is no one inside
the armor, but for some
reason the eyes are
glowing. Some say it is
just the gas that has
accumulated inside that
is burning.

166547.経年劣化によってポロポロと\nかかとの角質が はがれ気味。\nそんなときは ばく:
The horny skin on my
heels is peeling off due
to age-related
deterioration. In such a
case, he scrubs his
heels with Rockbomb.

166624.魔王に寝返る前は\n闇を払い世界の危機を救う\n破魔のだいまじんとして\nあがめ:
Before turning to the
Demon King, he was
praised as the Stone
Guardian, a demon-
breaker who dispelled
darkness and saved the
world from danger.

166686.全身が溶岩でできていて\nつねに高熱を発しているため\nそばに来ると暑苦しいと\:
The problem is that they
are said to be hot and
bothered when they come
near the lava because
their entire body is
made of lava and they
always emit high heat.

166759.聖光教主の心に宿る慈愛が\n試練のケモノに化身した姿。\nやわらかくて大きいのが:
The compassion that
resides in the heart of
the Light Lord is
incarnated in the animal
of TRIAL. Soft and large
is probably charity for
the Light Lord.

166836.このような危険な存在を\n生みだす原因を作ったことも\n闇の領界の竜族たちが犯し:
Causing the creation of
such dangerous beings is
one of the sins
committed by the dragon
tribes of the Dark
Realm.

166910.ギガントドラゴンが\n飛び跳ねたら となりの大陸で\n眠っていた火山が爆発した！:
When Drakulard jumped, a
dormant volcano on a
neighboring continent
exploded! Such a
tremendous rumor.

166985.ドラゴン拳法は ウーの一族に\n代々伝わる 究極の徒手武術。\n奥義は 山を砕き:
Dragon Kempo is the
ultimate hand-to-hand
martial art that has
been passed down in the
Wu family for
generations. It is said
to shatter mountains,
split oceans, and
obliterate stars.

167064.ぽよぽよの おなかに\n金塊をたんまり隠していて\nある塔の上で 同族たちと\n:
I hear that he has a lot
of gold hidden in his
puffy belly, and lives
richly on top of a tower
with his family members.

167135.太古の昔から存在し\n世の平和を乱していた。\n多くの猛者が この竜に挑み\nそ:
It has existed since
time immemorial,
disturbing the peace of
the world. Many fierce
warriors challenged this
dragon and were
scattered.

167201.アンルシア姫に仕える近衛兵が\n魔道士キルギルの研究により\n魔物への変身能力を:
A Kingsguard in the
service of Princess
Anlucia who gained the
ability to transform
into a monster through
the research of Wizard
Kirgyl, and has a strong
rivalry with Gezra.

167283.医者からはダイエットを\nすすめられているのだが\nじひびきの威力を保つため\n:
His doctor recommends
that he go on a diet,
but he risks his life by
bingeing in order to
maintain Hibiki's power.

167354.好物のグランベリーを食べすぎ\nブクブクと太ってしまった。\nせめてスリムに見せ:
I ate too much
Granberry, my favorite
food, and gained a lot
of weight. He paints his
body black to make it
look slimmer at least.

167433.使い古されたタロットには\n魔が宿るという伝説がある。\n占いに込められた人の情:
Legend has it that a
worn-out Tarot is
possessed by evil
spirits. The emotions
that people put into
fortune-telling tend to
turn into evil grudges.

167513.よりレアなタロットパックを\n求める占い師たちの欲望が\n邪念と化して この魔物:
There are rumors that
the desire of fortune
tellers for rarer
TarotPacks has turned
into an evil thought,
giving birth to this
monster.

167589.お金が好きで お金のためなら\n盗みも殺しもしてきた外道だが\n生前はゴールド神:
He loves money and has
stolen and killed for
it, but before his death
he proudly wore the
title of "God of Gold.

167670.彼が守っていた町は\n大昔に滅ぼされたが\n今も変わらず跡地に立ち続け\n誰もい:
The town he was
protecting was destroyed
long ago, but he
continues to stand on
the site and guard the
empty ruins.

167740.古くから土の守り神として\nエルトナ大陸の豊穣の祈りを\n受けてきた。テンオツ貴:
He has long been a
guardian of the soil and
a prayer for fertility
in Eltona Continent, and
likes to take naps by
Nobleman Tenotsu.

167819.古くから水の守り神として\nエルトナ大陸に豊かな潤いを\n与えてきた。テンオツ貴:
He has long been a
guardian of water,
providing abundant
moisture to the Eltona
Continent, and likes to
play with Nobleman
Tenotsu and his cue
ball.

167895.ドルセリンに魔力を混合した\n新種の燃料を採用することで\n燃費の向上に成功した:
The use of a new type of
fuel mixed with
Dolsoline and magic
power has been a success
in improving fuel
economy. This has been a
great help to the family
budget.

167972.国を守りたい想いだけが残り\n決して盾を手放すことはない。\nじつはシールドオー:
The only thing that
remains is the desire to
protect the country and
never let go of the
SHIELD. Some believe
that they are the
ancestors of the
Escudogres.

168055.夜中に女王め…と つぶやき\n歯ぎしりして うなされてた。\n高い支持率を誇る王:
He was mumbling and
gritting his teeth and
groaning in the middle
of the night. It seems
that even the king, who
enjoys a high approval
rating, has something to
worry about?

168133.今までは 表舞台に現れず\nキングスライムを尻にしいて\nスライム界を牛耳ってき:
He has been running the
slime world with King
Slime at his hip, but
now he is ready to make
his debut. Now, he has
made his debut.

168211.からくり仕掛けの体内に\n永久機関を内蔵しているが\n目玉の赤ランプは交換式。\:
A perpetual engine is
built into the body of
the karakuri mechanism,
but the red lamp, the
centerpiece of the
mechanism, is
replaceable. The red
lamp, which is the
centerpiece of the
device, is replaceable.
The light weakens as it
nears the end of its
useful life.

168285.たくさん経験値を得れば\nあこがれのキラーマシンに\nバージョンアップできるかも:
If you gain a lot of
experience, you may be
able to upgrade to the
Killing Machine you've
always wanted to be.
That's why I'm hunting
metal today.

168361.タイプＧの「Ｇ」の意味は\n公表されていないが\nじつは 中に おジーちゃんが\:
The meaning of the "G"
in Type G0 has not been
disclosed, but there are
rumors that Ozzy is
inside.

168435.もとは野良のキラーマシン。\n伐採同盟のドワーフ技師により\n改造をほどこされた:
Originally a stray
Killing Machine, it was
modified by a Dwarf
engineer of the Logging
Alliance. It is infused
with the spirit of
logging.

168511.性能を最大限に引き出すため\nピーキーな調整が行われた。\nそのため 強くなった:
The peaked adjustment
was made to maximize the
performance. As a
result, it is said to
have become stronger but
less sensitive to
impact.

168589.彼を作らせた大魔族は\nその性能に満足して\n自分の名前をこの機械兵士に\n与え:
It is said that the
great demon who had him
made was so pleased with
his performance that he
gave his name to this
mechanical soldier.

168656.高度なプログラムによる\n人工知能を備えており\nタイプＧの偽物と言われると\n:
It is equipped with a
highly programmed
artificial intelligence,
and is said to be quite
scratchy when it is
referred to as a Type G0
false object.

168727.ぷるぷるのボディに抱きつき\n保湿ゼリーを浸透させる\nベホマズンエステが\n魔:
BeHomasun esthetics,
which hugs a plump body
and infuses it with
moisturizing jelly, is
all the rage in the
monster world.

168797.まぼろしの経験値のせいで\n最近 乱獲が続いているとか。\nゆくゆくは絶滅するの:
I hear overfishing has
been going on lately due
to the maboroshi
experience. It is feared
that they will
eventually become
extinct.

168869.人間の子供を拾ってきて\n育てたという記録がある。\nその子供は トラの毛皮を\:
There is a record of a
man who picked up a
human child and raised
it. The child grew up to
be a man wearing tiger
fur.

168942.美しいムラサキ斑点の毛皮は\n貴族たちの富の象徴となる。\nそのため とんでもな:
The beautiful purple-
spotted fur is a symbol
of wealth for the
nobility. Therefore,
they are sold on the
black market at a
ridiculously high price.

169023.あまり知られていないが\n身体の斑点は実力の証。\n今まで倒した人間の数を\nひ:
The spots on his body,
which are not well
known, are a sign of his
ability. It is said that
he secretly keeps a
record of the number of
humans he has defeated.

169094.キラーファングの鋭利な牙は\n年を経るほど大きくなる。\n最も立派な牙の持ち主が:
Killer Fang's sharp
fangs grow larger with
age. The one with the
most magnificent fangs
is said to be the king
of the herd.

169170.ビュブロスの卵は 人の魂に\n植えつけられるという。\nふ化の際は おたけびと共:
Byblos eggs are said to
be implanted in a
person's soul. When they
hatch, they are born by
breaking through the
chest with War Cry.

169246.やたらと凶暴ぶって\n誰彼かまわず かみつくのは\nボーイと呼ばれるのが不満で\:
He is so violent that he
bites anyone and
everyone because he is
not satisfied with being
called "boy.

169321.こう見えて じつは寒がり。\n長い間ひとりぼっちだったので\n心も冷え切っている:
In spite of my
appearance, I actually
like the cold. I have
been alone for a long
time and my heart is
cold. Someone please
warm her up.

169395.平原で獲物を待っていると\n肩に 小鳥が止まったりする。\n戦いばかりの人生だけ:
When I am waiting for my
prey on the plain, a
little bird perches on
my shoulder. My life is
full of battles, but
these moments make me a
little happy.

169472.石の身体は地味だなあと\nいつも ため息ばかり。\nキラキラのゴールドマンが\n:
I always sigh, thinking
that stone bodies are so
plain. I am a little
envious of the
glittering Gold Golem.

169541.お金が足りない旅人に\nよく狙われてしまうので\n自由なストーンマンが\nちょっ:
I'm a little envious of
the free Stone Golem, as
I'm often targeted by
travelers who don't have
enough money.

169607.ご先祖様は 世界の一部を\n牛耳るほどの実力者だった。\nかつての栄光を取り戻す:
My ancestors were so
powerful that they ruled
a part of the world.
Head Squarker is going
today to regain his
former glory.

169682.おそろしいほどの地獄耳で\n魔物界一の神経質だとか。\n魔法使いの詠唱が大キライ:
He is said to be the
most nervous person in
the monster world, with
a horrible ear for hell,
and he hates mage
chanting so much that he
spends his life
interrupting it.

169758.異常に発達した視覚は\n千里先をも見通すという。\nしかし 夜は何も見えない\n:
Their unusually
developed vision is said
to allow them to see a
thousand miles ahead. At
night, however, they are
sad birds of prey that
cannot see anything.

169821.知略に長けた彼は 主君の下で\n参謀役を果たしていた。\nしかし ひとりの人間に:
A man of great wisdom,
he served as a
generalissimo under his
lord. But his plans were
dashed by one HUMAN.

169898.統率力に定評ある魔鳥の頭目が\nついに真の実力を見せる。\n圧倒的なカリスマ性に:
Head Squarker, who is
known for his leadership
skills, finally shows
his true ability. The
overwhelming charisma of
Head Squarker has people
just bowing down to him.

169973.冥界ゴルフの伝説的チャンプで\n規定打数より３打少なく\nカップインさせることを:
I heard that it is
called Gelbatross to cup
in three shots less than
the stipulated number of
shots in the legendary
Champ of the Underworld
Golf.

170049.このシールドオーガは\nあくまで モンスターであり\n実在するオーガ 及び種族と:
This Escudogre is a
monster, a demon, and is
in no way related to the
real Ogres and Races.

170120.地獄のチカラを秘めた\n巨大な盾は王位とともに\n代々 継承されているらしい。\:
It is said that the
giant shield that holds
the power of hell has
been passed down from
generation to generation
along with the throne.
The face of the shield
is that of the first
king.

170192.これまで散々な魔人人生を\n送ってきたが でかい盾を得て\n再起を図ろうと決意し:
I've had a rough life as
a Majin until now, but
I've decided to make a
comeback with a big
shield. Now is the time
to stand up, demon!

170263.守りに長けた戦いぶりが\nパラディンを連想させる。\n謎の武装兵の正体は\nいっ:
The fighting style that
excels in defense is
reminiscent of a
paladin. Who was the
Mystery Soldier?

170334.誰であろうと地獄に招き入れる\nウェルカム精神の持ち主。\n頑固な じごくのもん:
He has a welcoming
spirit that invites
anyone to hell. He
thinks he can't
understand the stubborn
Grim Keeper.

170416.左右の盾には名前があって\n向かって左が憤怒のブラッカス\n右が強欲のオレンゼル:
The left and right
shields have names, and
the one on the left
toward you is called the
rage Bu Rakka Su, and
the one on the right is
called the greed
Orenzel. Both have quite
bad personalities.

170498.ダメな生徒をしかる 先生の姿\n勉強になります！ ……などと\n戦いながらも 感:
I learn a lot from
teachers who discipline
bad students! I'm
impressed by the way he
fights against them. I
like acting after all.

170580.ガニラス握り つむりの漬け\nメーダ軍艦 アーノン巻き。\nあらゆる魔物をネタに:
Handsome Crab Nigiri,
Tsumuri no Zuke Lunatick
Gunkan, Arnomaki. The
king of nigiri-zushi, he
uses every kind of
monster as a story.

170651.魔界のブルドーザーと呼ばれ\nキラースコップの工事現場で\n大活躍を見せている。:
Known as the bulldozer
of Demon World, he has
been very active at the
Mad Mole construction
site. He can eat lunch
for 100 people.

170725.ヘッドであった彼が更生し\nつむじ風の旅団は解散した。\n失業した魔物たちは職を:
He was the head of the
Whirlwind Brigade, but
he was rehabilitated and
the Brigade was
disbanded. Unemployed
monsters are said to be
wandering the fields
today in search of work.

170804.絶大なパワーが最大のウリ。\n敵を全滅させたい あなたに。\n攻城戦にもオススメ:
The greatest advantage
of this product is its
immense power. For those
who want to annihilate
the enemy. Recommended
for sieges. Price:
74,000 gold

170881.深海の暴れ者として\n海の仲間に嫌われているが\n気のいいテンタコルスが\n一緒:
He is hated by the ocean
companion as a deep-sea
rabble-rouser, but he
doesn't care because he
has the good-natured
Abyssal Octopot with
him.

170951.おぞましいほどの真紅の肌は\n返り血で染まったものとも\n怒りによって変色したも:
The horrifyingly true-
red skin is said to have
been stained by the
return blood or
discolored by anger.

171022.走力アップのために\n逃げるメタルスライムを\nいつも追い回している。\n夢は:
He is always chasing
Metal Slime, who runs
away to improve his
running ability. His
dream is to become the
top runner on the
plains.

171091.背に たくさんの魔物を乗せ\n遠くまで運ぶ 乗り物的存在。\nただ速いだけではな:
It is a vehicle that
carries a lot of
monsters on its back and
carries them far. Not
only are they fast, but
they also have a
reputation for being
very comfortable to
ride.

171166.魔界１周レースにおいて\n前人未到の最速記録を持つ\n伝説のランナー。\n肩書き:
Legendary runner with an
unprecedented record of
the fastest time in the
Demon World 1-lap race.
His title is "Hell's
Super Express.

171232.その姿を見た者が いないため\n雪山で災害が起こったときは\nせつげんりゅうが現:
When a disaster occurs
in the snowy mountains,
it is feared that the
Tundragster has
appeared!

171309.平和をもたらした名高き英雄は\n戦いへの渇望を満たしてくれと\nダークドレアムに:
The renowned hero who
brought peace to the
world prayed to
Nokturnus to satisfy his
thirst for battle and
became the incarnation
of Decimating Dream.

171390.骨だけの身体のため\n痛みは感じないのだが\nなにぶん 死んでいるので\n光の呪:
Since the body is only
made of bones, it does
not feel pain, but at
any rate, it is dead, so
the light spells are
very painful to the
bones.

171456.地下深くで眠っていた\nいにしえのドラゴンの化石。\nかつて 自分を倒した人間に:
Ancient dragon fossil
sleeping deep
underground. It has
begun to take revenge on
the humans who once
defeated it.

171530.ウェディの戦士によって\n倒された彼の身体は海に落ち\nやがて 骨だけとなったが:
After his body was
defeated by Weddie's
warrior, he fell into
the sea and was reduced
to bones, but his grudge
remained.

171603.すでにバラモスの意志はなく\n骨人形として動かされている\n悲しき闇のしもべ。\:
The sad servant of
darkness who is already
being moved as a bone
puppet without the will
of Baramos. I will
strike him down and set
him free.

171678.いかつい外見をしているが\n意外にも草食魔物で\n洞くつのコケを食べている。\n:
Although they look
tough, they are
surprisingly herbivorous
monsters and eat moss in
the cave. It deftly
removes moss from caves
with its antlers.

171751.まかいじゅうは 魔界獣なのか\n魔怪獣なのか どっちだろうと\n魔界中のモンスタ:
There is a heated debate
among monsters in Demon
World as to whether
Gnumesis is a Demon
World beast or a demon
monster.

171828.牛っぽいからと コイツの肉を\nクチにした者には たちまち\n石化の呪いが かか:
It is said that anyone
who makes the meat of
this cow-like creature
into mouth will be
instantly cursed with
petrification. Even in
death, this monster is
always on his guard.

171909.はるか昔 この世界は\n太古のぬしが席巻していた。\n今は 環境に適応した者だけ:
Long ago, the world was
dominated by Gnubie.
Now, only those who have
adapted to their
environment barely
survive.

171984.ここは どこだろう？\nなぜ 戦っているのだろう？\nお腹が空いた。水浴びがした:
Where am I? Why are we
fighting? I'm hungry. I
need a bath. Send me
back to the island!

172056.お年頃になると 海を渡って\n別の土地へ移動する習性があり\nなんやかんやした後:
When they reach a
certain age, they have a
habit of moving across
the sea to another land,
and after a while, they
come back to their
hometowns again.

172130.わてかて 息くらいはしますえ。\nあんたらと いっしょや！\nこうして 吸うて:
Even I can breathe. Just
like you! This is how I
inhale and exhale. This
is breathing!

172211.魔界で 待ち合わせの目印に\n使われていた石像。\n約束の時間に来ないと\nコイ:
A stone statue used as a
meeting place in Demon
World. If you don't show
up at the appointed
time, this guy will
crush you.

172276.以前は全身像だったが\n頭の重さで首から折れた。\n首から下の身体の部分は\nそ:
It used to be a full
body statue, but the
weight of the head broke
it from the neck. The
body part from the neck
down was broken and
shattered.

172348.最近 お肌が荒れてるのは\nバッチリメイクのせいかしら？\nでも もうスッピンで:
Is it because of my
perfectly made-up face
that my skin has been
rough lately? But I
can't go out without
makeup anymore!

172425.なげきのさけびを聞くと\nそのあまりの悲痛さに\nやる気も根気もなくなって\n無:
When they hear the cries
of anguish, they are
said to become
apathetic, losing
motivation and
perseverance due to the
sheer grief.

172495.聖光教主の心に宿る勇気が\n試練のケモノに化身した姿。\n教主いわく甲のほうは\:
The courage that resides
in the heart of the
Light Lord is incarnated
in the form of a trial
animal. According to the
Light Lord, the Kou
(armor) is the courage
to attack.

172563.聖光教主の心に宿る勇気が\n試練のケモノに化身した姿。\n教主いわく乙のほうは\:
The courage that resides
in the heart of the
Light Lord is incarnated
in the animal of the
Trial. According to
Light Lord, B is the
courage to endure.

172636.かつて ある偉大な召喚術師に\n召喚され 仕えていたという。\n主をその背に乗せ:
He was once summoned by
a great summoner and
served him. I have fond
memories of traveling
around the world with
the Lord on my back.

172715.もとは魔除けのために\n作られた石像だったのだが\n邪悪な魂を吹き込まれ\n悪の:
Originally a stone
statue made to ward off
evil, it was infused
with an evil spirit and
became a vanguard of
evil.

172785.魔物サッカー界では\n左右のウィングを担当。\n上空から ありえない角度で\n的:
He plays on the left and
right wings of the
Monster Soccer team. He
scores goals from the
sky at impossible
angles.

172852.魔界の とあるお城の居間に\n飾られていた 不気味な像。\n悪趣味な城主のせいで:
A creepy statue that
used to hang in the
living room of a castle
in Demon World. It was
painted purple by the
owner of the castle, who
had bad taste.

172923.空想上の おそろしい魔物が\n人々のウワサとして広まり\nとうとう具現化した。\:
A fearsome imaginary
monster has become the
talk of the town, and
now it has materialized.
Look, there it is, right
behind you!

172997.やたらとリーダーづらするため\n周囲からは煙たがられていたが\n仲間思いの情熱家:
Although he was
considered a bit of a
nuisance by those around
him because of his
tendency to play the
role of leader, everyone
agreed that he was a
passionate person with a
strong sense of
companion.

173076.盟友カミルの名誉を けがし\n禁忌の秘術を 葬り去るという\n企みは おさなき姫:
Ally Kamil's attempts to
discredit and destroy
the forbidden mysteries
were crushed by the
courage of the Lady
Osanaki.

173152.かつて魔界で猛威をふるった\n邪竜の一族の成れの果て。\n死してなおチカラを失わ:
The result of the evil
dragon clan that once
raged in the Demon
World. Even in death,
they continue to take
many lives without
losing their power.

173228.魔王に囚われた哀れな魂は\n死んでも決して支配から\n逃れられない。未来永劫\n:
The poor souls trapped
by the Demon King will
never escape his
control, even in death.
They will continue to
work for the Demon King
forever.

173301.魔物界の掃除屋と恐れられる\n凶悪でどん欲な巨人。\n会心のランドインパクトで\:
A vicious and greedy
giant who is feared as
the cleaner of the
monster world. He
crushes the earth and
his opponents to pieces
with his mind-blowing
Crackerwhack.

173374.黄色の悪魔の異名を持つが\n本人は気に入ってないらしく\n他人に そう呼ばれると:
He is nicknamed "yellow
demon," but he doesn't
like it and gets into a
bad mood as soon as
others call him that.

173447.全身黄色の体色は\n大悪魔としてハクをつけようと\n黄金ボディを目指した結果\n:
Rumor has it that the
yellow body color was
the result of an
unsuccessful attempt to
create a golden body in
an attempt to make a big
demon.

173521.呼吸をするようにウソをつくと\n冥界でも おそれられている。\nその魂は 誰より:
He is feared in the
underworld for lying as
if he breathed. His soul
is more polluted than
anyone else's, and he
has not forgiven anyone.

173603.悪魔軍団の炊き出し番長。\n手にした巨大フォークで\n大量の具材を混ぜ合わせ\n:
He is the head of the
soup kitchen of the
Demon Corps. With a huge
fork in his hand, he
mixes a large amount of
ingredients and serves
dark soup.

173676.ひどい偏食でスイーツばかり\n食べているうちに変色した\nベリアル本人ではないか:
There are rumors that it
may be Belial himself,
who has a terrible picky
eater and became
discolored while eating
only sweets.

173746.魔軍十二将の 品格をけがす\n振る舞いをする者を 許さず\n死をもって つぐなわ:
The Twelve Generals of
the Demon Army are
feared by all because
they will not tolerate
anyone who violates
their dignity and will
punish them with death.

173822.ダイエットブームの昨今\nメタボぞろいのトロル族では\nベリーダンスが熱い！\n:
Belly dancing is hot in
the Troll tribe, which
has a lot of metabolic
syndrome in these days
of diet boom! They are
shaking their hips in
unison.

173893.週末の夜には たき火の周りで\nちゃんこ鍋パーティを開く。\nメインの具材は も:
On weekend nights, we
have chanko-nabe parties
around Bonfire. The main
ingredient is of course
delicious looking
humans.

173967.いにしえのトロル王国は\nオーガとの覇権争いに敗れ\n高度な文明を すべて失い\:
The ancient kingdom of
Troll was defeated in a
struggle for supremacy
with Ogre, lost all of
its advanced
civilization, and fell
to a monster.

174040.主君の居城では 執事として\n活躍していた彼であったが\n紳士的な接客も 勇者に:
He was a steward in his
lord's castle, but it
seems that even his
gentlemanly manners
didn't work on Hero.

174112.意外にも繊細な舌を持つ\n自称モンスター界のソムリエ。\nオレさまの血は ワイン:
A self-proclaimed
sommelier of the monster
world with a
surprisingly sensitive
palate. He is a self-
proclaimed sommelier of
the monster world, with
a surprisingly sensitive
palate! is his favorite
saying.

174189.アクセサリー集めが趣味で\nそのコレクションは粒ぞろい。\n某合成屋も 密かに\:
He enjoys collecting
Accessory, and his
collection is very fine.
A certain synthesizer
may or may not be after
him.

174263.敗戦後 主君の右腕だった彼は\n忠義を貫き その意志を継ぐ。\nしかし その前に:
After the defeat, he was
his lord's right hand
man and remained loyal
to him, carrying on his
will. However, the sage
group Crown of Wisdom
stood in his way.

174343.凶悪な見た目とは裏腹に\n自然を愛するロハスな巨人。\nじんめんじゅの保護活動も:
Despite his vicious
appearance, he is a
LOHAS giant who loves
nature, and is also
working steadily to
protect Treeface.

174419.一度 愛用の棍棒を\n鉄製のものに変えてみたが\n冬場は冷たくて往生した。\nや:
Once I changed my
favorite rod rod to a
steel one, but it was
too cold in winter.
Wooden ones are the
best!

174488.魔軍十二将の中で まっ先に\n主君を狙う敵に挑んだ彼だが\n返り討ちにあう。彼の:
Among the twelve
generals of the Demon
Army, he was the first
to challenge the enemy
who was after his lord,
but he was beaten back.
His master was also
defeated by Hero.

174569.サテラにとって星のない夜は\n恐怖の象徴であった。\nその恐怖が具現化した巨人は:
For Satella, the
starless night was a
symbol of fear. The
Titan, the embodiment of
her fears, smothers all
hope with darkness.

174646.チカラこそがすべてであり\n弱者は生き物とすら扱わない。\nバズズとベリアルのこ:
Power is everything, and
the weak are not even
treated as living
creatures. He recognizes
Pazuzu and Belial as the
strong ones.

174722.はるかな昔 神話の時代に\n翼を持つ人々により\n剣の守護者として封じられたと\:
It is said that he was
sealed as a sword
protector by the winged
people in the Mythical
Age long ago.

174791.時空の渦に のまれた\nナスビナーラが覚醒し\nセルゲイナスへと進化する。\nそ:
Woebergine, caught in
the vortex of space-
time, awakens and
evolves into Bilhaw.
There is a new theory
that the Woebergine
awakened and evolved
into Bilhaw.

174858.この世の終末に 地の底から\nアスタロトが大挙して現れ\n世界を無に帰すという\:
There is a terrifying
legend that at the end
of the world, Harmachis
will appear from the
depths of the earth in
great numbers and bring
the world to nothing.

174931.風かおる５月生まれの彼。\n美しい深緑のボディが\n何より自慢でヒマさえあれば\:
He was born in May, when
the wind blows. He is
proud of his beautiful
dark-green body, and he
spends all of his free
time polishing himself.

175004.聖光教主の心に宿る英知が\n試練のケモノに化身した姿。\nこの姿になるあたり 教:
The wisdom that resides
in the Light Lord's
heart has transformed
into a trial animal. The
wisdom of the Light Lord
must be quite
extraordinary to take on
this form.

175083.自慢の白さを保つため\n身体の手入れは かかさない。\nだが 両翼の裏がみがきに:
He takes good care of
his body to maintain the
whiteness he is proud
of. However, the backs
of his wings are hard to
clean, and they are a
little darker than
usual.

175160.毎年 魔界でおこなわれる\nチカラ自慢コンテストで\n上位に入る実力者だが\nど:
He is one of the top
winners in the annual
Demon World power
contest, but there was
one strong opponent he
could not beat.

175232.ひとつ目で あるがゆえに\n遠近感の把握が苦手。\nそのため心眼で敵をとらえる\:
Because of his single
eye, he is not good at
grasping perspective.
Therefore, he is said to
be trained to catch the
enemy with his mind's
eye.

175304.棍棒には強いこだわりがあり\nなじみのセレクトショップで\n一流の棍シェルジュが:
He is very particular
about rod rods, and only
uses the best products
selected by a first-
class rod manager at a
select store he is
familiar with.

175384.ある儀式をすることで\n呼びだすことができるが\nそのときの彼は すこぶる\nき:
He can be summoned by
performing certain
rituals, but at that
time he is in a very bad
mood. Be careful.

175454.肉体を極限まで鍛えあげ\nかつてのスリムだった身体は\nいまや こんな大きくなっ:
He has trained his body
to the utmost limit, and
his once slim body is
now this big. The wings
on his back can no
longer fly.

175532.叡智の冠は 不死身の十二将と\n長きに渡って戦いつづけたが\n将たちを退けるには:
The Crown of Wisdom
fought long and hard
against the twelve
immortal generals, but
realized that the only
way to defeat them was
to seal them up for
good.

175612.愛用するハンマーの重さは\nほんのメガトン級だが\n彼が振るうと その破壊力は\:
His beloved hammer
weighs a mere megaton,
but when he wields it,
its destructive power is
said to reach the
gigaton level.

175685.とある魔界の名匠が鍛えた\nそのハンマーはギガトン級を\n超える衝撃を受けてなお:
The hammer, forged by a
master craftsman in the
Demon World, is said to
be able to withstand
impacts in excess of the
gigaton class without
bending at all.

175762.叡知の冠は 不死身の十二将と\n長きに渡って戦いつづけたが\n将たちを退けるには:
The Crown of Wisdom had
fought the twelve
immortal generals for so
long that he realized
the only way to defeat
them was to seal them
away forever.

175842.おむつ卒業の時期が来ても\n大人になんか なりたくない！\nと言って おむつを脱:
When it comes time to
grow out of diapers,
Treeface's baby doesn't
want to take them off,
saying, "I want to be an
adult!

175919.誰が 一番大きくなるか\nみんなで競争しているが\nそこは どんぐりの背比べ。\:
Everyone is competing to
see who will be the
biggest, but they are
only as tall as the next
person. There is not
much difference.

175987.いやし系のケセランパセラン。\nその生態には謎が多く\n一説には 世界樹に咲く\:
Tufty Tot, a healing
species whose ecology is
a mystery; one theory is
that it is the fluff of
a flower that blooms in
Yggdrasil.

176060.名前から モコモコじゅうに\nゆかりある者かと思いきや\nじつは ケダモンの毛玉:
He was born from a
furball of Feralbeast,
although his name
suggests that he is
related to Rotten
Cotton. He has a black-
hearted personality.

176135.おにこぞうの ゆとり根性を\n見かねた両親は心を鬼にして\n我が子をギガンテス先:
Unable to bear the sight
of Pickayune's easy-
going nature, his
parents took it upon
themselves to enroll
their child as an
apprentice with Mr.
Gigantes.

176212.クリスマスにユキフルの長靴を\n家に置いておくと 翌朝必ず\nプレゼントが入って:
The rumor among the kids
is that if you leave a
pair of Snowball boots
at home for Christmas,
the next morning you
will always find a
present in them.

176293.ある魔軍十二将の 入れ知恵で\n勇者と盟友が 留守と知り\nグランゼドーラ王国を:
It is said that a
certain 12 generals of
the Demon Army, with the
help of a certain
general, attacked the
Gran Zedora Kingdom when
they found out that Hero
and Ally were not at
home.

176359.雨をあやつることができる\nワイルドで頼りになる長兄。\nプールにスライダーを建:
He is the wild and
dependable eldest
brother who can master
the rain. He is also an
entertainer who builds
slides in the pool.

176439.炎をあやつることができる\nのんびりマイペースな次男。\nバーベキューに用意した:
My second son is a laid-
back, fast-paced guy who
can wield a flame. He
only prepares meat for
the barbecue and
resolutely does not eat
vegetables.

176519.氷をあやつることができる\nおっとり甘えん坊な三男。\n大きな身体に似合わず\n:
He is a calm and
pampered third son who
can manipulate ice. He
is good at triple Axel,
which does not suit his
big body.

176592.相手を眠らせるのが得意な\nゆめにゅうどうだが\n昨今 なにかと心配事が多く\n:
Napir is good at putting
others to sleep, but
these days he worries a
lot and suffers from
insomnia.

176659.人の夢に入り込んでは\nその夢の内容で 夢占いをして\n結果を押しつけてくる\n:
He is a nosy guy who
enters people's dreams
and uses the content of
their dreams to tell
their dream fortunes and
force the results on
them.

176725.派手な色の寝間着とまくらが\nたいそう お気に入りの様子。\nこんな趣味の悪いも:
He seems to love his
loudly-colored nightgown
and pillow. Where on
earth did he get such
bad taste?

176802.血染めの真っ赤なまくらに\n頭をあずけて 寝てしまうと\n血の海で溺れる夢から\:
It is said that if you
fall asleep with your
head on a blood-red
pillow, you will never
wake up from the dream
of drowning in a sea of
blood.

176876.下位の夢魔ナイトメーアの\n血染めのまくらが血を吸いすぎ\nすっかり黒ずんでしま:
When the blood-dyed
pillow of the lower
level dreamer Nightmare
has absorbed so much
blood that it has become
completely black,
Bedmare is born.

176959.冥府から よみがえったが\n思考能力は ほぼ持たず\n生前の執念のみで\n黄金の:
Although he was
resurrected from the
Hell, he had almost no
ability to think, and
was searching for the
golden bracelet only
with the persistence of
his life.

177024.生前は民衆を守ることに\n命を懸けたパラディンだったが\n裏切りによる非業の死を:
In his life, he was a
paladin who devoted his
life to protecting the
people, but he died an
ignominious death due to
treachery and became a
soldier of the darkness.

177104.見かけによらず美しいものを\n愛する心の持ち主である。\n地上世界の星空に魅せら:
He has a heart that
loves beautiful things
regardless of their
appearance. He is
fascinated by the starry
skies of the earthly
world and plans to make
them his own.

177181.魔物たちに つい最近まで\nペットとして飼われていたが\n戦力になると見込まれ\:
Until recently, he was
kept as a pet by
monsters, but he is now
fighting as a member of
monster because he is
expected to be an asset.

177256.帽子に身体をのっとられた\nあわれなイノシシ…と思いきや\n魔法使い気分に ひた:
The poor boar, whose
body has been taken over
by the hat, seems to be
in a mage mood, so he is
not satisfied.

177335.いつも かぶっている帽子は\nはじめて錬金で作ったもの。\nテカテカした色合いが:
The hat I always wear is
the first one I made
with alchemy. I like the
shiny color of the hat
very much.

177407.旅しないブタは ただのブタ。\nそう言って 群れを離れた。\n旅のお供である ソ:
A pig that doesn't
travel is just a pig.
And with that, he left
the herd. The sombrero,
his traveling companion,
is a sign of freedom
received.

177487.あのブラバニクイーンに\nライバル意識を持っていて\nＢＢＨと呼んでほしいらしい:
They have a rivalry with
Dark Hares and want us
to call them BBH, but it
hasn't caught on yet.

177563.５本の足それぞれに\n下駄を履くのは大変なので\n脱ぐときは いつもきっちり\n:
It's not easy to put on
clogs for each of my
five feet, so I always
make sure they are
exactly aligned when I
take them off.

177633.まだらに紅葉してしまった\nやりきれなさを胸に秘める。\n私 生まれ変わったら\:
I feel disappointed that
the leaves have turned
into a mottled pattern.
When I am reborn, I will
be dyed beautifully this
time.

177707.氷上を あざやかに舞って\nトリプルアクセルを決める\n下駄スケートの名手。\n:
A clog skater who
dazzlingly dances on the
ice to score a triple
Axel. She is nicknamed
the "Silver Plate Fairy.

177780.美容 健康によく効くという\nウワサが広まって\nモテモテだった時期もある。\n:
There was a time when it
was Mote Mote because
rumors spread that it
was good for beauty and
health. Those days were
good.

177852.マスカラぱっちり 朱の口紅。\nゲタの鼻緒は さくら色。\n乙女チックに胸トキメ:
MaBuff is a bright
vermilion lipstick. The
nose of the geta is
cherry color. It makes
your heart throb with
maidenly charm. But it
is an elephant.

177925.身体中に着けたトゲつきの盾は\n攻撃的でありながら\n身を守りたいという心の表れ:
The spiked shields worn
all over the body are a
sign of an aggressive
yet defensive mind. What
happened before his
death?

178082.元はあざやかな緑色だったが\n倒した相手の返り血で\n身体がどんどん赤く染まり\:
It is said that the
original color of the
leaves was a brilliant
green, but the blood of
defeated opponents
turned their bodies
redder and redder, and
the leaves turned redder
and redder.

178153.一番下は苦労人の長男。\n真ん中は道楽者の次男。\n一番上は世渡り上手の三男。\:
The youngest is the
eldest son, a hard
worker; the middle son
is the second son, an
easy-going man; and the
eldest is the third son,
a worldly man. The
eldest is the third son,
a worldly man, and even
in the monster world,
the youngest is strong.

178226.相棒とケンカ別れした\nスライムナイトの下が\n今度は上になってみたいと\nタワ:
Slime Knight's bottom,
who had broken up a
fight with his partner,
now wanted to be the top
and offered to make a
tower.

178293.黄金の ぷるぷるボディは\n社交界でも あこがれの存在。\nコイツらをペットにす:
Their golden, plump
bodies are coveted even
in social circles. The
status of the ladies is
to have them as their
pets.

178370.魔物アイドル戦国時代の\n頂点を極め 人気絶頂のうちに\n普通のスライムに戻りま:
I will return to normal
Slime while at the peak
of my popularity after
reaching the pinnacle of
the monster idol warring
age! and retire.

178446.魔物たちの祝い事があると\n呼んでもないのに現れて\n勝手に仕切りはじめる。\n:
Whenever there is a
celebration for
monsters, it appears
without being called and
begins to preside over
the event on its own. He
is a yokai with a
reputation for being
annoying.

178517.軽妙で すばしっこい動きは\n毎日欠かさず やっている\n青竹踏み健康法のたまも:
His light and nimble
movements are the result
of his daily exercise
regimen of stepping on
green bamboo. However,
his complexion is still
bad.

178591.ウソつきは えんまのつかいに\n舌を抜かれて持ってかれる…\nなどというウワサも:
There are rumors that
liars will have their
tongues pulled out and
taken away by the Envoy
of Yama, but I am not
such a lukewarm guy.

178671.その身なりと奇抜な言動で\n業界の異端児として知られるが\nなぜか 女子からはモ:
He is a playboy who is
known as a maverick in
the industry for his
appearance and eccentric
behavior, but for some
reason, girls find him
an irritant to Mote
Mote.

178752.歴史ある あなうめ一族の\n当主の座を引き継ぎ\n責任感に燃えるカタブツ。\n兄:
He is a catabout with a
burning sense of
responsibility after
taking over the reigns
of the historic Ana-Ume
family, and the unity of
the brothers is somewhat
strong.

178822.兄がカタブツな分 オレが\nテキトーな性格でバランスを\n取っていると うそぶく:
The younger brother lies
that he is the one who
balances his brother's
stubbornness with his
own character. Of
course, he is saying
that he is a Texan.

178899.天然かつ小悪魔な末っ子。\nふたりの兄のことは\nそれなりに尊敬しているが\n言:
The youngest is a
natural and small demon.
He respects his two
older brothers to a
certain extent, but does
not listen to them very
much.

178972.魔法の迷宮の ふくびき券は\nすべて彼が発行しているとか。\n旅のコンシェルジュ:
It is rumored that he is
the one who issues all
of Magic Maze's Lottery
Tickets, and there are
rumors of his cozy
relationship with Travel
Concierge.

179048.もともとは 劇の人形として\n人間に使われていたが\nしばられた人生が イヤで\:
Originally used as a
puppet in a play, it
became a monster to bind
humans because it didn't
like the life it was
bound to.

179120.かたく結ばれてるのは\nロープだけじゃない！\n絆の戦士 ワイヤーマン！\nとい:
It's not just the rope
that's tied tight! The
"Wire Man" appears with
the line, "The bonded
warrior wire man!

179189.高名な職人が編んだ\nくみひもに魂が宿った。\nこう見えて もともとは\nセレブ:
The soul of the braid
woven by a renowned
craftsman. Although it
looks like this, it was
originally a luxury item
for celebrities.

179253.「大魔王に達する７つの習慣」\n「ヴァルザード戦記」\n「目指せネロドスボディ」:
He loves to read books
such as "7 Habits to
Reach Great Demon King",
"Valzard War Diary", and
"Aim for Nerodos Body".

179327.静寂を愛するモンスター。\n話しかけられると相手を\n呪文で黙らせてしまうため\:
A monster who loves
silence. When spoken to,
it silences the other
party with a spell, so
it hasn't spoken in
years.

179398.彼にとって戦いとは戯れ。\n相手をたたいて ふみつけて\nつぶして ぺしゃんこに:
For him, fighting is a
game. He plays with his
opponents, beating them,
fisting them, crushing
them, flattening them,
and playing with them
until they stop moving.

179476.用心棒に守られていることから\nかなりのＶＩＰだと思われる。\n高貴な生まれとも:
He is protected by a
bouncer and is
considered to be a VIP.
He is also rumored to be
of noble birth, and his
monster is not what it
seems.

179562.竹林は自分の故郷であり\n魂の帰る場所っスから……。\nたけやりへいは竹林に\n:
Bambooligan is in the
bamboo grove because the
bamboo grove is my home
and the place where my
soul returns.

179635.苦労の末に足軽隊長になった\n努力家の たけやりへい。\nじつは 今の地位に飽き:
Bambooligan, a
hardworking foot soldier
who became a foot
soldier captain after a
long and arduous
journey, is apparently
not satisfied with his
current position and is
ambitious enough to try
to overthrow it.

179713.いくさ場こそ 漢の舞台。\nだからこそ目立つ格好で\n強烈に自己主張したい。\n:
The Ikusa-jo is the
stage for KAN. That's
why I want to stand out
and assert myself. Just
see how I live!

179782.竹林全土を支配する将軍だが\n地位を狙う者が後を絶たず\n反乱の鎮圧に いそがし:
He is a general who
rules the entire bamboo
grove, but he is busy
putting down rebellions
as there is no end to
the number of people who
want to take his
position. The day when
he can sleep peacefully
is far away.

179858.強き者が すべてを支配する\n戦国乱世が幕を開けた。\nみな竹林統一を目指し\n:
The turbulent age of the
Warring States period
has begun, in which the
strong rule over all.
Everyone is plotting to
unify the bamboo
forests.

179928.魅惑のほほえみを浮かべる\n自称スライム界の大魔王。\n魔王たる貫録を身につける:
The self-proclaimed
"Great Demon King" of
the Slime world, with a
charming smirk on his
face, he acquired this
huge body by eating a
huge amount of food in
order to become the
Demon King.

180008.愛らしくも毒気のある外見で\n魔界のギャルに大人気だが\n毒でギャルが倒れるとい:
With its adorable yet
poisonous appearance, it
is very popular among
the gals of Demon World,
but it is said that
there have been many
accidents in which gals
have fallen ill due to
its poison.

180085.お菓子好きの魔女の作品。\n砂糖と塩を間違えて\nホイップされてしまったので\n:
This is the work of a
witch who loves sweets.
She is a little
frustrated because she
was whipped with the
wrong amount of sugar
and salt.

180155.ドングリまなこと\nおちょぼグチの トボけた顔で\n他の魔物が おどろくような\:
With his acorn-shaped
eyes and goofy face, he
has the kind of tongue
that other monsters
would be surprised to
see.

180226.甘いはずのプリンが\nなぜか 激辛に仕上がった。\nお菓子好きの魔女は\n料理が:
Purine, which was
supposed to be sweet,
somehow turned out to be
very hot. It seems that
the witch who loved
sweets was not a good
cook.

180292.じっくり煮込んだジャム爆弾は\n激甘スウィートな自信作！\n投げるとバクハツする:
Jam Bomb is a slow-
cooked, super-sweet, and
confident product! It's
a bakuhatsu when you
throw it, but it's also
delicious when you eat
it.

180371.バーティバターのヒミツ♪\nこだわり製法で抽出した\n魔物由来の成分はお肌に塗る:
The secret of Berti
Butter Monster-derived
ingredients extracted by
a special manufacturing
process have a great
beauty effect when
applied to the skin.

180445.見るからに こわい外見だが\nマスクの下は わりと童顔。\nそのつぶらな瞳で じ:
Although scary to look
at, under the mask, she
has a rather childlike
face. She is said to
stare back at you with
her dull eyes.

180519.ここだけの話 チャッピーとは\n数々の修羅場を くぐり抜けた\nウサギの中のウサ:
Between you and me,
Chappie is a title given
to the rabbit among
rabbits that has passed
through many carnage
grounds.

180591.暗闇の中で 四方から襲いくる\nアイアンクックを倒すという\n闇の修行をこなして:
In the darkness, he has
been trained in the dark
to defeat Robo-Robin,
which attacks from all
directions. Caught in a
self-destructive
explosion, he became
blackened.

180671.見た目は凶悪なウサギだが\n陰で 恵まれない子供のために\nプレゼントをしている:
He may look like a
vicious rabbit, but
behind his back, he is a
kind-hearted masked man
who gives gifts to
underprivileged
children.

180746.ホントは英雄ザンクローネの\n右耳が化け物になった姿だよ！\n魔女様の魔法でキュ:
It's really the hero
Zankrone's right ear
turned into a monster!
The witch's magic has
made it cute and big!

180822.ホントは英雄ザンクローネの\n左耳が化け物になった姿だよ！\n水車に しびれくら:
In fact, Zankrone's left
ear is a monstrosity! I
live for the job of
putting Man o' War on
the waterwheel.

180901.なにを隠そう 生きてる時は\nかわいいドラキーだった！\n骨になってしまうと\n:
I'm not trying to hide
the fact that when he
was alive, he was a cute
little Dracky! When he
was bone, you can see
what he became.

180971.その あやしい目つきと\nピンクの身体から察するに\nお色気担当と思われるが\n:
The suspicious look in
her eyes and her pink
body suggest that she is
in charge of sex appeal,
but it's a story that is
not personal.

181040.カッコよく メラミを唱え\n人間を追い払う姿は\nコウモリのアンデッドの中で\n:
He is said to be the
most handsome of all the
bat undead as he coolly
chants Frizzle and
drives away the humans.

181112.以前は 赤 青 黄 桃 と\n白のコイツで五人組だったが\nリーダーのレッドが引:
There used to be a five-
member group with red,
blue, yellow, peach, and
white, but the group had
no choice but to disband
when the leader, red,
retired.

181184.リーダーとしての資質に悩み\n骨休めしたこともあった。\nしかし 燃える熱血魂が:
He once rested on his
bones, troubled by his
leadership qualities.
But his burning, fiery
spirit brought him back
to this life!

181256.砂漠で行われるマラソン大会で\n毎年 優勝している。\n他の出場者はみんな 暑さ:
He wins a marathon in
the desert every year.
All the other
contestants retire from
the race because of the
heat.

181330.かつて 人間の手によって\n生みだされた暗殺用の魔物が\nオリを抜けだし 野生化:
A monster for
assassination, once
created by human hands,
escaped from its cage
and became a wild
animal. Now they are
free to live in the
wild.

181409.ランドンクイナの主食は\n毒草なのだが 見分けがつかず\nどくけしそうを食べて\:
The Apeckalypse's staple
food is poisonous herbs,
but it is sometimes
difficult to tell the
difference and will eat
Antidotal Herb, which
can cause a stomachache.

181481.緑の羽毛は 目に優しい。\n野鳥観察のプロたちは\nフォレスドンの羽毛を見て\n:
Green feathers are easy
on the eyes. Bird
watching professionals
say that the feathers of
the Forest Peckerel are
a great way to rest
their tired eyes.

181551.角度 スピード 破壊力……\nいつか究極のドロップキックを\n放つため 今日も技:
Angle Su Peid He seems
to be studying his
techniques today in
order to unleash the
ultimate dropkick
someday with destructive
power.

181624.死んで 骨だけになっても\nまだ魔王にコキ使われる魔物。\n魔王に仕える魔物には:
Even when they are dead
and reduced to bones,
monsters are still used
by the Demon King, and
monsters in the service
of the Demon King do not
retire.

181697.オンセンズというコンビ名で\nオンと一緒に プクレット村の\n演芸グランプリに出:
He dreams of
participating in the
Goofball Grand Prix in
Pukulet village with Ong
under the name of
Onsens. He is in charge
of the seemingly cool
Pratfall.

181777.オンセンズというコンビ名で\nセンと一緒に プクレット村の\n演芸グランプリに出:
He dreams of competing
in the Goofball Grand
Prix in Pukulet village
with Sen under the name
of Onsens. He is in
charge of Sobering Slap,
which is a hot and noisy
game.

181860.１０００年前の 破邪舟師に\nおびきだされ 叡智の冠たちに\n倒された後 不死の:
After being lured by the
Ship Shaper and defeated
by the Crown of Wisdom
1000 years ago, it was
resurrected by the
immortal Demon King.

181938.弟妹たちに逆らわれた時に\nナドラガの中に芽生えた\n強い拒絶の心が生みだした。:
It was borne out of the
strong rejection that
sprouted in Nadraga when
his younger siblings
defied him. Is it a kind
of defensive instinct?

182015.手に持つ２本の巨大なツノは\n遠方の谷に棲む竜のもの。\nそれを手に入れてくるこ:
The two huge horns in
their hands belong to a
dragon that lives in a
distant valley. It is a
rite of passage for the
family to go and get
them.

182091.人目につかない洞くつで\n夜な夜な儀式を行うらしい。\n邪悪な心を持つ精霊を\n:
It is said that they
perform rituals at night
in a secluded CAVE. They
summon spirits with evil
hearts.

182164.悪の科学者たちによって\n魔の改造をほどこされた魔物。\n科学者たちに復讐を誓い:
Monster, who has been
altered by evil
scientists, wanders in
the wilderness today,
vowing revenge against
the scientists.

182237.魔軍の戦いでは常に彼が現れ\n仲間を応援しまくった。\nそれほどにテンションを\:
In the battles of the
demon army, he always
appeared and cheered for
the companion. He was so
good at raising the
tension.

182312.ラーディス王は からくりの\n豊富な知識を持っていた。\n波紋の音叉も ラディス:
King Ladis had a wealth
of knowledge about magic
tricks. The tuning fork
and Ladisau are both his
own creations.

182384.楽天的 かつ情熱的な性格で\n仲間からの信頼も厚い。\nだが マラカスの中に骨を:
He is optimistic,
passionate, and trusted
by his companions.
However, he also has a
brutal side that enjoys
the sound of bones in
maracas.

182463.戦闘中に マドハンドを\nちょくちょく呼びだしている。\n向こうはその気だが じ:
He often calls out Muddy
Hand in battle. He wants
to do so, but in
reality, he is just
using Muddy Hand as a
passive assistant.

182540.おそろしき氷の女王の手。\n氷の世界に旅人を閉じ込め\nコレクションにして\n楽:
The hands of the Ice
Queen. She seems to
enjoy trapping travelers
in her icy world and
making them into
collections.

182607.おどるほうせきを捕まえては\n袋の中の宝石を かすめとる\n手クセの悪い魔女の手:
The hands of a bad witch
who catches a goodybag
and grabs the gems in
its bag. She's desperate
for her retirement.

182683.妖しく光る指輪が 泥の腕を\n器用に操っている。\n全身を作ろうとしたが\n魔力:
A mysterious glowing
ring dexterously
manipulates a mud arm.
He tried to make a whole
body, but he gave up
because he didn't have
enough magic power.

182749.魔界をさすらうトンブレロ。\n何より自由を愛しているが\n故郷のあの娘を思いだす:
Ham Shamwitch wanders
through Demon World,
loving freedom above all
else, but wearing a
sombrero over his eyes
when he thinks of that
girl back home.

182826.ワタシはキレイなお人形。\nワタシと一緒に遊びましょう？\n遊んでくれないなら…:
I am a beautiful doll. I
am a beautiful doll. If
you don't play with me,
I'll play with you.

182905.巨大な腹にガスをためこみ\n牙をかみ合わせた火花で\n火炎球をはき出すドラゴン。:
A dragon that stores gas
in its huge belly and
spits out a flaming ball
of fire with the sparks
from its interlocking
fangs. It is called the
powder keg of Demon
World.

182978.魔界の環境に適応しきれず\nヒトとしての姿が崩れて\nおぞましき不定形の怪物と\:
The sad existence of a
human being who could
not adapt to the
environment of Demon
World and whose human
form has collapsed,
becoming a horrifying,
undefined monster.

183049.キャノン砲を開発した博士は\nその後の魔界兵器産業に\n多大なる影響を与えたとさ:
The development of the
cannon is said to have
had a significant impact
on the Demon World
weapons industry, for
which he received some
kind of award.

183125.修行の末 きたえられた眼力は\n夜の 真っ暗な地面に続く\nアリの行列も見逃さな:
The eyesight he has
developed through his
training enables him to
see even a procession of
ants on the ground in
the dark at night. He
boasts of his ultra-high
night vision ability.

183203.派手な色づかいの容姿と\n誇り高き その振る舞いから\n虹色の皇帝と呼ばれ\n恐:
They are called
"rainbow-colored
emperor" and are feared
because of their gaudy
colorful appearance and
proud behavior.

183270.砂浜や砂漠などでも\nまぎれやすい 保護色なのだが\n身体がガチャガチャ鳴る音で:
Although their
protective coloration
makes them easy to spot
on sandy beaches and in
deserts, they are
eventually spotted by
the clattering sound of
their bodies.

183345.白黒の塗装は集団での戦闘で\n幻惑効果を発揮するのだが\n塗り替えが手作業で大変:
The black-and-white
paint job is effective
in group combat, but it
has not been mass-
produced because of the
manual labor involved in
repainting it.

183424.魔界兵器の第一人者が\n開発した 通称シザー２号機。\n改良されたキャノン砲で\:
Developed by Demon World
weapons guru, commonly
known as Scissor #2. He
received the Minister of
Killing Award for his
improved cannon cannon.

183499.自分はサルかドラゴンか？\nそんなことはどうでもいい。\n彼の興味は今夜のディナ:
Am I a monkey or a
dragon? It doesn't
matter. All he cares
about is what he will
have for dinner tonight.

183660.彼が奏でた地獄の音楽とは\n耳にした者が ３日以内に\n必ず命を落とすという\n:
The infernal music he
played was said to be so
terrifying that anyone
who heard it would
surely die within three
days.

183730.不遇な人生の反動で\n死後はデスメタルに転向。\n新曲『ドルマゲドン』を片手に\:
As a reaction to his
unfortunate life, he
turned to death metal
after his death. His
goal is to make a major
debut with his new song
"Zamgeddon" in hand!

183804.トロル軍団を鼓舞するために\n勇壮な『トロル行進曲』を\n一晩で作曲したらしい。:
It is said that he
composed the heroic
"Troll March" in one
night to inspire the
Troll Army. He has a
natural sense of music.

183878.魔王様のスケジュールや\n体調管理をする やり手執事。\n最近はアルバイトで\n:
He is a good butler who
takes care of the Demon
King's skeeJules and
physical condition.
Recently, he also works
as a part-time waiter at
a cafe.

183950.その 悪のカリスマにより\n多くの配下を抱えているが\n使えない部下ばかりなのが:
His evil charisma has
given him a large number
of subordinates, but he
is troubled by the fact
that they are all
useless.

184014.持っている盾にも意思があり\nよく身体とケンカする。\nくちゲンカでは盾の圧勝だ:
The shield has a will of
its own and often fights
with the body. In a
verbal fight, the shield
wins hands down, but is
eventually silenced by
the iron ball.

184091.いつも 泉に顔を映して\n笑顔の練習をしている。\n魔物界のアイドルを目指し\n:
She is always practicing
her smile by projecting
her face on the fountain
and looking for the
cutest angle to become
an idol of the monster
world.

184163.みずたまドラゴンが\n耳飾りを３回鳴らしたら\n雨が降るんだよと\nおばあちゃん:
Polka Dot Dragon said
that if the Dragon rings
his earpiece three
times, it will rain,
Grandma said.

184227.ファンキードラゴの耳飾りが\nまばたきしていたという\n怪しいウワサがあるらしい:
I heard a suspicious
rumor that Hiptile's
earpiece was blinking.
Are those really
earrings?

184304.サンダーフロッグが\n陽気に水浴びしていると\n感電した魚が浮いてくる。\nおか:
Electrocuted fish float
by as Zaptile merrily
bathes. Thanks to this,
there is no need to
worry about bait.

184374.魔物サッカー界では\n名キャプテンとして名を馳せる。\nいなずまシュートで活躍し:
He is a famous captain
in the monster soccer
world, and was once
awarded the MVP of the
Demon King Cup for his
work with Lightning
Shooter.

184451.鎌がよく似合う魔物を選ぶ\nベスト鎌ニスト投票で\n冥王ネルゲルに僅差で敗れ\n:
He narrowly lost to
Netherlord Nergel in the
Best Scythe Nist poll to
choose a monster who
looks good in a scythe,
and he sees Netherlord
Nergel as a one-sided
rival.

184525.さらなる高みを目指し\n過酷な魔界を走りこんだ結果\n異常なまでに心肺がきたえら:
As a result of running
through the grueling
Demon World to reach a
higher level, his heart
and lungs were unusually
strong, and his breath
began to glow white.

184602.実際は フンを転がさず\n巨大な岩を後ろ足で運んで\n器用に要塞のような巣を作る:
In fact, they don't roll
the poo, but dexterously
build fortress-like
nests by hauling huge
boulders around on their
hind legs. The title of
vader is a sign of
mastery.

184677.行列を作りながら\n仲間同士で歩いているとき\nしっぽ爆弾を踏んでしまって\n大:
When walking in a
procession with other
companions, a
catastrophe can occur if
a Tail Bomb is stepped
on.

184747.クールなアイスボンバーは\n自分で 氷を削って食べるほど\nかき氷が大好物らしい:
Frost Bomber is a cool
guy who loves shaved ice
so much that he shaves
it himself.

184825.どこにいても目立ってしまう\nあざやかボディの彼は\n甲虫界の おしゃれキング。:
He is the fashionable
king of the beetle
world. He used to be a
model.

184900.どういうわけか やたらと\n旅人に ぬすむ をやられる。\nそんなに たいした物:
For some reason, I keep
getting hit with Half-
Inch by travelers. I
don't have that much
stuff.

184973.草食系のくせに気性が荒く\n気に入らないことがあると\n砂塵をまき散らして暴走す:
He is a herbivore, but
he has a rough
temperament and when he
doesn't like something,
he is an unruly
rambunctious horse that
sprays dust and runs
amok.

185049.煉獄の山の周りをめぐって\n炎を散らし悠然と飛ぶ。\nその姿は まさに\n煉獄の:
They fly leisurely
around the mountain of
purgatory, scattering
flames. The sight of
them is truly a merry-
go-round of purgatory.

185115.勝手にレジェンド扱いされて\nじつは ちょっと困っている。\n神秘的なイメージを:
I'm actually a little
embarrassed that he
treats me like a legend
without my permission.
In order to protect his
mystical image, he runs
in the sky, away from
the eyes of the public.

185197.数百年の時を生きている彼は\n野を駆ける馬たちの中で\n生きる伝説として語り継が:
He has lived for
hundreds of years and is
a living legend among
horses running in the
fields.

185274.かつて世界を支配しようと\nたくらむ 魔の軍団がいた。\nその中で彼は遊撃部隊を:
There was once an army
of demons who wanted to
rule the world. He is
said to have led a
ranger squadron in the
battlefield.

185352.ひづめに青き炎を宿し\n闇を駆けめぐる黒竜丸。\n静寂の中 響くその足音は\n死:
With blue flames in its
hooves, Equinox runs
through the darkness,
its footsteps echoing in
the silence, said to be
the call of death.

185422.じつは料理が趣味の\n家庭的なイケメン象。\n普通の３倍のスピードで\n絶品料理:
He is a handsome, family
oriented elephant who
actually enjoys cooking.
He cooks up exquisite
dishes with three times
the normal peid.

185486.仲間の象たちの牙を狙う\nハンターへの怒りが\n積もり積もって怨念と化し\n聖獣:
The anger toward the
hunters who were after
the tusks of the
companion elephants
accumulated and turned
into a grudge,
transforming the sacred
beast into a magical
beast.

185553.６本のウデに握る武器は\nそれぞれスキルを極めている。\n今後はブーメランやムチ:
Each of the weapons he
holds in his six udes
has mastered his skills.
In the future, they
intend to expand their
business to boomerang
and whip.

185630.人の心を見透かすのが得意で\n大人たちの悲しみを利用し \nセレドを偽りの世界で:
He is an expert at
seeing into the hearts
of people, and his plan
to use the sadness of
adults to invade Celed's
false world was his
brainchild.

185711.勇者と盟友だけを 脅威とし\n叡智の冠を あなどったため\n敗北を喫したが 不死:
The threat of Hero and
Ally, and
underestimating the
Crown of Wisdom, led to
his defeat, but he was
revived by the power of
the immortal Demon King.

185790.古き伝承によると大地の竜は\nオス竜とメス竜の２匹がおり\nそれぞれに悲劇的な運:
According to an old
legend, there were two
earth dragons, a male
dragon and a female
dragon, each of which
met a tragic end.

185866.誇り高き竜で ありながら\n人に従う飛竜を憎み 戦ったが\n敗北し 不死の魔王の:
He was a proud dragon,
but he hated the flying
dragons that followed
mankind and fought
against them, but was
defeated.

185942.じつは 魔軍十二将の一角の\n双子の息子だったのだが\nスキルマスターの導きによ:
He was actually the twin
son of one of the twelve
generals of the Demon
Army, but was
reincarnated as a trial
monster under the
guidance of the Skill
Master.

186018.キングリザードの雄姿に\nトカゲたちは夢を重ねる。\nトカゲの トカゲによる\n:
Lizards dream about the
heroic figure of Liege
Lizard. A world for
lizards, by lizards!

186087.片目を見開くだけで攻撃を\n無効化する能力を持っていた\n初代竜帝。その瞳の輝き:
The first dragon emperor
had the ability to
nullify attacks simply
by looking into one eye.
The dragon's eye is said
to be a jewel that
reproduced the
brilliance of that eye.

186166.大地の竜には複数の\n矛盾する伝承が残っており\n何が真実かはいまだ不明。\n今:
The dragon of the earth
is said to have multiple
contradictions and it is
still unclear what the
true nature of these
contradictions are.
Further clarification is
awaited.

186234.主君の後釜を狙っていた彼だが\n叡智の冠の造り出した迷宮に\n他の将もろとも封じ:
He wanted to take his
lord's place, but he and
the other generals were
sealed in the labyrinth
created by the Crown of
Wisdom. He will never
forget that humiliation.

186317.ゴールデンキングリザードは\n本来 人には なつかないが\nファーベルの澄んだ瞳:
The Golden Liege Lizard
is not naturally a tamer
of humans, but when he
saw Fabel's clear eyes,
he regained the bond
that had been severed.

186395.尻尾の先のフサフサした毛は\nじつに なめらかな手ざわり。\n書家の間では筆の材:
The fluffy hair at the
end of the tail is very
smooth to the touch. It
is traded at a very high
price among
calligraphers as a
material for pen.

186477.左手に持つ竜玉の妖しい輝きは\n彼らの強さのバロメーター。\n修行を重ねるほどに:
The bewitching glow of
the dragon ball in their
left hand is the
barometer of their
strength. It is said
that the more they
train, the brighter and
brighter they shine.

186562.ベリアルの翼とバズズの胴体\nそして キングレオの頭を\n組み合わせた究極の生命:
The ultimate life form
combining the wings of
Belial, the body of
Pazuzu and the head of
Marquis de Leon. But it
is no match for the
original.

186639.さる魔物商人から\nブランドンが買い取った。\n毎日与えられるエサは\n最高級し:
Brandon bought it from a
monster merchant. The
best quality meat was
fed to him every day.

186707.じごくのヌエの鳴く夜は\n決して外に出てはいけない。\n息をひそめて震えて眠れ。:
Never go out at night
when Hell Nue cries.
Breathe tight and sleep
with a shiver. From the
folklore of a village

186781.魔軍では荒くれ者を集めた\nはみ出し部隊を率いて\n敵味方ともに恐れられたが\n:
In the demon army, he
led an outcast unit of
roughnecks and was
feared by both friend
and foe alike, but that
was a thousand years
ago.

186854.あらゆる生物の長所をそなえる\nといわれる ハヌマーンだが\nつたない言葉使いと:
The Nemean is said to
possess the strengths of
all living creatures,
but it could not
overcome the weakness of
its poor language
skills.

186935.いつか自分にも素敵な出会いが\nあるかもしれない……。\nそう思い手にした聖銀の:
I might have a wonderful
encounter someday. I
still have no one to
whom I can give the
Sacred Silver Ore that I
thought I had in my
hand.

187013.黒い模様は 育つにつれて\n少しずつ なくなっていき\nピンクの毛に生えかわると:
The black pattern will
gradually fade as they
grow up, and when they
grow pink hairs, they
are considered full-
fledged.

187082.生えかわったピンクの毛は\n血を吸うと あざやかになる。\nこの 美しいピンク色:
The regrown PINK hairs
become brilliant as they
feed on blood. This
beautiful pink color is
called Teeny
Sanguinipink.

187154.昔から マポレーナは\n幸せを運ぶといわれているが\n実際に会った人は たいてい:
It has long been said
that Genie Sanguini
bring happiness, but
most of the people who
have actually met them
have had bad luck.

187226.年に１回 魔界で開催される\nモーモン品評会で\n見事 最優秀賞を受賞した\n輝:
He has had a brilliant
career, winning the
Grand Prize at the
annual Teeny Sanguini
competition at Demon
World.

187295.うつくしい青の毛並みは\n幻の青いバラにも例えられる。\nちょこんと載ったティア:
The beautiful blue fur
can be compared to a
fantastic blue rose. A
little bit of Tiahara on
his head is a sign that
he is at the top of his
game.

187372.赤ちゃんモーモンの頃に\nヤシの実をチューチューしたら\nこんな身体になっちゃっ:
I chewed Coconut when I
was a baby Teeny
Sanguini and I ended up
with this body. Well, he
has grown up so well,
hasn't he?

187450.自分の似顔絵を描いた\n変質者注意！ の立て札を\nあちこちに立てるのが好き。\:
Attention perverts who
drew their own
portraits! I like to put
up a SIGN here and there
with my likeness. He is
a freak beyond human
understanding.

187522.地獄の庭園の手入れを頼まれ\n見事な才能を発揮した。\n庭師として 第二の人生を:
I was asked to take care
of the GARDEN from hell,
and I showed great
talent. He is now
considering whether he
should lead a second
life as a gardener.

187594.犯罪史に その名を刻んだ\nおそろしい大量殺人鬼。\n彼の大道芸を目にした者は\:
A horrific mass murderer
whose name is etched in
the annals of crime. No
one who has witnessed
his street performances
ever returns alive.

187666.旅芸人に 憎しみを抱く割に\n道化の格好をしているのは\n皆を笑わせていた あの:
The reason why I dress
up as a clown in spite
of my hatred for
minstrels is because I
can't forget the time
when I was making
everyone laugh.

187741.あざやかな体色を利用し\nサンゴに擬態してエモノを\n襲う優秀なハンター。長時間:
An excellent hunter that
uses its vivid body
color to mimic corals
and attack animals. They
are patient and do not
move for long periods of
time.

187815.天地雷鳴士の陰衆は\n夜に呪術や暗殺をおこなうため\n人々は恐れをもって彼らを\:
Because the druid yinshu
practiced witchcraft and
assassination at night,
people fearfully called
them nue, the night-
sounding monsters.

187890.小精霊の一種でエルトナでは\nつくも神と呼ばれることも。\n身体中にススをまとっ:
A kind of small spirit,
sometimes called
Tsukumojin in Eltona.
They are covered with
soot and their hands
turn black when touched.

187972.栄華を極めたザードの魔王も\nやがては死に 国も滅んだが\n万魔の塔は崩れること:
The Demon King of Zard,
who had reached the
height of his glory,
eventually died and his
country was destroyed,
but Banma Tower remains
unbroken and still
boasts of its majestic
appearance.

188053.地上にいる馬という生物と\n一度駆けくらべしたいと\n願っているが悲しいかな\n:
I wish I could have a
run-through with a horse
on the ground, but alas,
the world in which I
live is too far away.

188126.自在に姿を変えられるが\n馬の姿がいちばん速く走れる。\n銅鏡から出ることはでき:
He can change his
appearance at will, but
he can run the fastest
in the form of a horse.
Although he cannot leave
the bronze mirror, he is
always running every
day.

188208.名の知れた剣豪だったが\n争いに疲れピエロに転職。\nたまに昔の血がうずいて\n:
He was a well-known
swordsman, but tired of
fighting, he changed his
occupation to a clown.
He sometimes feels a
twinge of old blood and
a sudden urge to slay.

188281.理想郷モーモン王国に背を向け\n荒野で生きていくことを選んだ\nハードボイルドな:
Hard-boiled Teeny
Sanguini has turned his
back on the ideal Teeny
Sanguini kingdom and has
chosen to live in the
wilderness.

188366.グランゼドーラ軍の 大半を\n滅ぼしたが 勇者アルヴァンの\n剣に敗れた。不死の:
He destroyed most of
Gran Zedora's army, but
was defeated by Hero
Alvan's sword. He was
revived by the power of
the immortal Demon King.

188445.出番のない時は光の河の奥で\n猫のように丸まって寝ており\n呼ばれても 一向に起:
When not in action, he
sleeps curled up like a
cat in the back of River
of Light and never wakes
up even when called. He
seems to be a very lazy
guy.

188526.身体に描かれた紋様は\nザード遺跡の壁にも見られる。\nかつて砂漠を支配した大ダ:
The patterns on the body
can be seen on the walls
of Zard Ruins. They are
intended to appease the
vengeful spirit of the
giant octopus that once
ruled the desert.

188603.人間の弱みを徹底的に研究し\n甘言を巧みに使いわけ\n王の信頼を勝ちとった。\n:
He thoroughly studied
the weaknesses of humans
and skillfully used
sweet talk to win the
trust of the king. He is
a master strategist who
boasts of his high level
of intelligence.

188677.以前は 油断して敗れたが\n魔界の軍師と呼ばれた男。\n今度は 人数をそろえ\n:
He was previously
defeated because he was
caught off guard, but he
is now known as the
military leader of the
Demon World. This time,
he has the numbers and
is confident of absolute
victory.

188748.四魔将ナンバーワンの\n頭脳派を自認しているが\n他の三将からは まったく\nそ:
Although he considers
himself the most
intelligent of the four
generals, the other
three generals do not
think so at all.

188814.前王イーヴと姉エルガドーラの\n婚礼の日 一対の人形のように\n美しいふたりを目:
On the wedding day of
the former king Yves and
his sister Elgadora,
when he saw them both as
beautiful as a pair of
dolls, he decided to
take revenge.

188893.プクリポの神ピナヘトを\n倒すために生み出されたが\nお互い真っ向勝負は性に合わ:
They were created to
defeat Pinaheto, the god
of Pukulipo, but they
were not interested in a
head-to-head battle and
ended up fooling each
other.

188972.生前の悔恨を刺激し悪意を\n増幅させる黒い炎が燃え盛り\n理性の歯止めすら効かず:
The black flame that had
fueled his prenatal
regrets and amplified
his malice flared up,
and Lada Gart succumbed
to it without even the
checks and balances of
reason.

189049.世界樹を守るのがオリの使命。\n力の試練を手伝っていたのは\n平和な世の中が続い:
Ori's mission is to
protect Yggdrasil, and
the reason he was
helping Trial of
Strength was because he
was bored with the
peaceful world.

189125.暗黒大樹の番人たちには\n名前も性別もなく\nただひとり 長がいる以外\nお互い:
The Dark Tree Guardians
have no names, no
gender, and are
indifferent to each
other except for one
person, the chief.

189192.初代王者が夢幻の森に植えた\n一本の若木に魂が宿り\nやがて守護精となったという:
It is said that the
first champion planted a
young tree in the Dream
Forest, and that the
spirit of the tree
eventually became the
spirit of Protection.

189249.密林の守人とは双子の兄弟。\n森を荒らす密猟者たちに\n怒りを抑えられなかった兄:
Jungle Guardian is a
pair of twin brothers,
the elder of whom,
unable to control his
anger at the poachers
who ravage the forest,
becomes an avenger who
hunts travelers.

189326.密林の狩人とは双子の兄弟。\n森を荒らす密猟者たちに\n心を痛めた弟は\n樹々を:
Jungle Hunter is the
twin brother of the twin
brothers, and his
brother, who was deeply
moved by the poachers
who were destroying the
forests, became a
protector of the trees.

189394.何度倒されても復活する\n不滅がウリの魔王だったが\n魔法の迷宮では皆同様なので:
The Demon King was known
for its
indestructibility, which
means that no matter how
many times it is
defeated, it always
resurrects, but in Magic
Maze, everyone is the
same, so the loss of
identity is a problem.

189471.オーレンの操る双剣は\n大ぶりの物を牙王丸\n小さい方を竜斬刀という。\n知る人:
Oren wields twin swords,
the larger of which is
called the Fang King and
the smaller of which is
called the Dragon Sword.
The smaller one is
called the Dragon Sword.

189538.オーレンの操る 双剣は\n大ぶりの物を 牙王丸\n小さい方を 竜斬刀という\n知:
Oren wields a pair of
swords, the larger of
which is the Fang King,
and the smaller of which
is the Dragon Sword, a
well-known and well-
known sword.

189605.悲しき運命に導かれ\nともに戦う妖剣士と水竜。\nオーレンは忘我の中で\n不思議:
Oren is led to a sad
fate and fights together
with a demon swordsman
and a water dragon, and
in his oblivion he
remembers a strange
exaltation.

189673.封魔の主である虚無の邪神は\n忘却と失意を司る神だという。\n神話の時代 アスト:
The evil god of
emptiness, the master of
the seals, is said to be
the god of forgetfulness
and disappointment, one
of the evil entities
that attacked the
Mythical Age Astoltia.

189755.初の装備換装型が登場！\nこちらは物理攻撃特化型。\n単体運用よりもタイプの異な:
The first equipment
changeable type is now
available! This one is
specialized in physical
attack. It is
recommended to use two
of different types at
the same time rather
than single type!

189832.初の装備換装型が登場！\nこちらは魔法攻撃特化型。\n単体運用よりもタイプの異な:
The first equipment
changeable type appears!
This one is specialized
in magic attack. It is
recommended to use two
of different types at
the same time rather
than single type!

189909.陰衆の頭領ヨイの身体を\nのっとろうとしていたが\nアサヒに入ってしまったため\:
They were trying to take
over the body of Yoi,
the chieftain of the
Yinshu, but it took a
long time to adjust
because he had entered
Asahi.

189985.永遠の命を持つと\nウワサされる ギルギッシュ。\nグロリスの木との関係を\n知:
Few people know the
connection between
Gilgish and Gloris Tree,
which is rumored to have
eternal life.

190054.たとえ幻影であっても\nオーレンとともに戦えることに\n水竜ギルギッシュは\n満:
Gilgish is happy to be
able to fight alongside
Oren, even if only as an
illusion.

190122.リュウグウノツカイという魚を\n自分の臣下だと思っているが\n実際にはなんの関係:
He thinks the fish
Oarfish is his subject,
but in reality he has
nothing to do with it.
In fact, he is a sad
naked king.

190205.誰も知らないほど昔から\n雄峰ランドンに住まう竜。\nその存在はいつの時代も\n:
A dragon has lived on
Landon Peak for so long
that no one has ever
known it. Its existence
has always been with the
mysterious trees.

190276.ついに登場！ これが本命！\n最強の代名詞たるドラゴンを\nモチーフとした新モデ:
Finally, it appeared!
This is the real deal!
This is a new model
based on the motif of a
dragon, a synonym for
the strongest. This
strength is truly
unexpected!

190358.人間の神グランゼニスに対抗し\n生みだされたこと以外は\n忘却の彼方に消え去った:
Except for the fact that
it was created in
opposition to the human
god Gran Zenith,
everything is shrouded
in mystery, as if it has
vanished into oblivion.

190438.悪鬼ゾンガロンに操られた時\n魔物のように暴れてしまったが\n誰からも責められな:
When I was manipulated
by Demon Zongalon, I
went berserk like a
monster, but no one
blamed me. I am deeply
grateful for that.

190522.万年雪の番人ガモフの\n祖先にあたる者が\n悠久の時を経るうちに\n魔獣と化した:
The ancestor of the
Permasnow GuardGamow
became a magical beast
in the course of time.

190578.キングの守りを固めずに\nつい攻めてしまうため\nクオードのチェスは弱い。\n姉:
Quard chess is weak
because he does not
defend his king and ends
up attacking. His win
rate against his sister
is less than 30%.

190651.戦場を自由に跳ね回り\n奇襲を仕掛けるナイトのコマは\nメレアーデのお気に入り。:
Knight Piece is
Mereade's favorite,
bouncing freely around
the battlefield and
taking players by
surprise. He often makes
checkmate.

190728.着実に前進し 最後に化ける\n大器晩成のポーンのコマは\nクオードのお気に入り。:
Pawn Piece is Quard's
favorite. It's charming
that he takes too good
care of it.

190803.かつて雷食い鳥と呼ばれる\n巨大な肉食恐竜を食らい\n雷をあやつるチカラを\n手:
There is an anecdote
that the power to
manipulate lightning was
once received by
devouring a giant
carnivorous dinosaur
called the lightning-
eating bird.

190876.大いなる闇は 満足げに笑う。\nおそろしきものに成り果てた\nその者を家族だと言:
The great darkness
laughs with
satisfaction. You are
the one who has become
something terrible, and
you are the one who
calls that person
family.

190957.魔界で著名な美食家だったが\n魔界にはない絶望の味に\n魅せられ アストルティア:
A well-known gastronome
in Demon World, he moved
to Astoltia because of
his fascination with the
taste of despair that is
not found in Demon
World.

191027.ジュリアンテご自慢の\n豊かな髪は 意外に重い。\n彼女の悩みは 体重が\n実姉:
Juliante is proud of her
abundant hair, which is
surprisingly heavy, and
her problem is that she
weighs the same as her
own sister.

191092.まだ見ぬ踊りを追求し続けた\n好奇心の強い女性が\n知らぬ間に 道を踏み外した。:
A curious woman, in
constant pursuit of an
undiscovered dance, has
unwittingly gone astray.
There is a fine line
between purity and
madness.

191162.幻影とはいえ 姉妹タッグが\n実現したが じつは この姉妹\n仲が悪い。マリーン:
The sister-sister tag-
team has come true,
albeit illusory, but the
truth is that the
sisters don't get along
very well, and they're
not happy because Malynn
is quick to take
advantage of them.

191242.テンオツキジンは陰の気と\n陽の気を兼ね備えた存在。\nそのため外見は女性に見え:
Tenotsu Kijin is a
combination of yin and
yang qi. Therefore,
although she appears to
be female on the
outside, she is also
male.

191321.ヤファギルが封じられた地は\nその怨念によって汚染され\n禁忌として畏れられる\:
The land where Yaphagil
was sealed was
contaminated by his
grudge and became a
cursed land, forbidden
and feared.

191392.結界や封印など敵の行動を\n妨害する能力に特化した邪神。\n三体分身の術はとって:
He is an evil god who
specializes in the
ability to interfere
with the actions of his
enemies, such as warding
and sealing. He has a
special technique for
altering three bodies,
which he can't help but
brag about.

191474.エルフの神エルドナを\n倒すために生み出されたが\nエルドナとルティアナの共闘に:
It was created to defeat
Eldona, the god of Elf,
but was sealed off by
the joint struggle
between Eldona and
Lutiana.

191550.彼女の技 いただきボールには\n捕らえた者の動きを封じ\nマリーンを 絶世の美女:
It is said that her
technique, the Itadaki
Ball, has the effect of
blocking the movements
of those it captures,
making Malynn look like
a beautiful woman.

191624.彼女の技 いただきボールには\n捕らえた者の 動きを封じ\nマリーンを 絶世の美:
It is said that her
technique, the Itadaki
Ball, has the effect of
blocking the movement of
those it captures,
making Malynn look like
a beautiful woman.

191698.かつては ジュリアンテ以上の\n美人だったマリーン。しかし\n失恋の痛手が 彼女:
Malynn used to be more
beautiful than Juliante,
but the pain of a broken
heart has made her fat
and even changed her
personality.

191778.妹のブレンダを気にかける\nやさしい お姉ちゃん。\n魔王軍ナンバーワンの\n豊:
She is a kind big sister
who cares about her
younger sister Brenda
and has the biggest
breasts in the Demon
King's army.

191845.姉のベリンダが大好きな\nあまえんぼうの妹。\nモンセロ温泉の効能で\n肌は絹の:
She is a pampered little
sister who loves her
older sister Belinda.
Her skin is silky smooth
due to the effects of
the Montserrat warm
fountain.

191910.プクリポの子供を喰らい\n魔力を増やす性質を持つ。\n喰えば喰うほど 強くなり\:
It feeds on Pukulipo's
children to increase its
magical power. The more
they eat, the stronger
they become, and in the
end, they become great
demons.

191982.ガズバランとは オーガという\n種族を作った神の名前。\nその剣は すべてを斬り:
Gazbalan is the name of
the god who created the
races called Ogre. His
sword cuts through all,
and his fangs bite down
on all.

192059.以前 プクリポに出し抜かれ\n上司にみっちり怒られた。\n給料も半分になった。\:
Pukulipo used to outbid
me and my boss was very
angry with me. His
salary was cut in half.
That frustration made
him stronger!

192132.ふがいない部下を見かねて\n魔界から参上した悪魔の取締役。\nプクリポどもめ と:
Pukulipo, the director
of Demon World who came
from Demon World because
he couldn't stand to see
his subordinates fail!
Pukulipo, just look at
the horror of
management!

192212.闇の領界の民を 苦しめるため\n月を破壊したことで 逆に\n楽園への道が開かれた:
The destruction of the
moon to torment the
people of the Dark Realm
has conversely opened
the way to Utopia. Is
this coincidence or not?

192288.見た目に似合わず地図を見て\nその場所を想像するのが好き。\n暗黒球から出られな:
Despite his appearance,
he likes to look at maps
and imagine places, and
is not bothered by the
fact that he cannot
leave Dark Orb.

192368.若い頃から有能と評判で\n出世街道を歩いてきたが\nその結果 暗黒球勤めに。\n:
Since he was young, he
had a reputation for
competence and had
worked his way up the
ladder, but as a result,
he ended up working for
Dark Orb. He suspects
that it was a leftward
shift.

192441.我こそ全ベリアルの始祖である\nとの誇りを胸に生きているが\n暗黒球暮らしで同族:
He lives with the pride
that he is the founder
of Belial, but living in
Dark Orb, he is unable
to see his own people
and his pride is not
satisfied.

192526.獲物を見れば 容赦なく襲い\nただ本能のままに動く。\n彼らは眠ることなく\n闇:
When they see their
prey, they pounce
without mercy, moving
only on instinct. They
roam around in search of
darkness, never
sleeping.

192597.元々は気性の荒い魔物だったが\nエパト王に敗れ 以後は\n彼に 仕えるようになっ:
Originally a rough-
tempered monster, she
was defeated by King
Epath, and since then
she has served him. He
is loyal and
surprisingly clever.

192673.オリジナルの魔勇者と同様に\nマデサゴーラに認められる\n存在でありたいと願った:
He wished to be
recognized by Madesagora
as well as the original
demon Hero, but he was
never able to achieve
it.

192752.オリジナルの大魔王と比べると\n自分の作品への愛着が薄く\n完璧主義ばかりが極ま:
Compared to the original
Great Demon King, he is
less attached to his
work, and his
perfectionism is so
extreme that he tends to
destroy it.

192831.くれないザクロは単に好物で\nおやつに携帯しているらしい。\nトボけた顔をしてい:
Deep Red Pomegranate is
simply his favorite and
he carries it as a
snack. He may look like
a simpleton, but he is
actually quite a
gourmet.

192911.元々は魔物の山賊だったが\nそのウデをイッドに見込まれ\n魔物兵士に転身。\n以:
Originally a monster
bandit, he was
recognized by Id for his
skills and became a
monster soldier. Since
then, he has been Id's
right-hand man.

192981.ヒプノスと共に悪行を尽くし\nそのウデをイッドに見込まれ\n魔物兵士に転身。\n:
He and Hypnos did all
kinds of evil deeds
together, and Id
recognized his skill and
transformed him into a
monster soldier. He
became Id's left-hand
man.

193053.以前 イッドから授かった\nチカラには満足してなかった。\n魔瘴パワーを 手に入:
I wasn't satisfied with
the power Id gave me
before, I received demon
miasma power. Now I and
Tanat have no blind
spot!

193130.以前 ヒプノスと誓いあった\n最強コンビになろうという夢。\n魔瘴パワーを 手に:
The two have received
the power of demon
miasma, and now their
legendary power has
begun.

193210.その美貌からファンも多く\n何度も交際を申し込んでは\n返り討ちになっている者多:
Because of her good
looks, she has many
fans, many of whom have
repeatedly asked her for
a relationship and have
been turned down. Could
she have a son-in-law?

193290.かつて大いなる闇の根源から\nはがれおちた皮ふの欠片に\n命が宿り グウィネーロ:
A piece of skin that
once peeled away from
the source of the great
darkness came to life
and came to be called
Gwinero.

193363.はるか昔 竜の王と呼ばれる\n偉大な主に仕えていたという。\n幽閉された敵国の姫:
Long ago, he served a
great lord called the
Dragon King. I have fond
memories of being
entrusted with the
guardianship of an
imprisoned enemy
princess.

193444.ご神体の間の守護のほかに\n何かの花を消し去る使命を\n帯びていたような気もする:
I have a feeling that it
had a mission to
extinguish some flowers
in addition to the
protection of the Hall
of Worship, but I must
be imagining things.

193519.わきあがる人間への憎悪に\n戸惑いつつも この感情こそが\n記憶を取り戻すカギだ:
Although he is
bewildered by the hatred
for humans that wells up
in him, he believes that
this feeling is the key
to regaining his memory,
and his hatred flares
up.

193597.絶大なる魔力の源は\nクチにくわえた魔法の杖だが\nそのために自慢の牙を\n戦い:
The source of his
immense magical power is
the magic wand he
carries in his mouth,
but because of this, he
is unable to use his
fangs, which are his
pride and joy, in
battle.

193667.ダーリアと結婚した後は\n来光の浜に新居を建てて\n妻と子供と暮らしながら\n白:
After marrying Dahlia,
he dreamed of building a
new house on the beach
in Raikou, living with
his wife and children,
and raising a white dog.

193738.暴君バサグランデの戦いにより\nチカラを失った王者のマントに\n悠久の年月をかけ:
After the battle of
Tyrant Bogan, Champion's
Cloak lost its power,
and over the years he
gave it back to it.

193817.ヒトによく似た その姿は\nかつて 月世界襲撃を阻んだ\n野蛮人をモデルに 設計:
Its human-like
appearance is the most
powerful battle form,
modeled after the
savages who once
prevented the moon from
attacking.

193890.物理も呪文もお手のモノ！\nあらゆる戦況に対応できる\n高い汎用性を実現！\nマ:
Physics and SPELL are
both at your fingertips!
High versatility for all
warfare situations!
Madness & Oar rounds.

193963.ＶＰマシーンでは魔物として\n描かれたが 災厄の王が地上へ\n降らせた 赤色流星:
Some historians claim
that it represents the
red meteor shower that
the King of Calamity
brought down to earth,
although it was depicted
as a monster in the VP
machine.

194044.セルゲイナス ブルサベージを\n参考に重武装・高火力を極めた\n至高の作品が つ:
Finally, a supreme work
of art that is heavily
armed and highly
powerful with reference
to the Bilhaw
Tormentaur! Bangolence &
wildness.

194127.魔仙卿の魔力の限り復活する。\n大魔王選出が終わると暇なので\nスッテンテンの姿:
He will be resurrected
as long as The Oracle's
magic power is
available, and after the
election of the Great
Demon King, he will
return to his Suttenten
form and appear in the
foothills of the village
in his spare time.

194209.破壊衝動が盛り上がらない時は\nどこぞに自分のまがい物が\n出現したという話を思:
When the destructive
impulse does not rise,
he recalls the story of
the appearance of his
imitation somewhere and
increases the power of
his anger.

194291.キャット剣法師範のウデ前だが\n性格が災いし 弟子は来ない。\nねこまどうに剣を:
He is a master of kenpo
(swordsmanship), but his
personality is so bad
that no apprentices come
to him, and he once
forced Meowgician to
teach him by holding a
sword in his hand.

194372.いつもは孤高のキャットだが\n今回は子分のミャルジも一緒！\nミャルジといる時の:
Usually, Cat is a
solitary cat, but this
time she is accompanied
by her henchman, Myarji!

194454.猫の悪霊だが大の風呂好き。\n彼の造った欲望の大浴場は\n元の住人が公衆浴場とし:
He is an evil spirit of
a cat, but he loves to
bathe. The Bath of
Desire, which he built,
was opened as a public
bathhouse by the
original inhabitants and
became very popular.

194532.魔瘴によって失われた命を\n取り込み 己のチカラに変えて\n巨大化する邪悪な魂。:
An evil soul that takes
the life lost by demon
miasma, transforms it
into its own power, and
grows to a gigantic
size. It has no
hesitation in
strengthening itself.

194605.いかつい顔をしているが\nアゴの下をなでられると思わず\nノドを鳴らしてしまうこ:
He has a stern face, but
it is a top secret of a
certain empire that he
can't help but throb
when someone strokes the
underside of his chin.

194685.普段は岩に化けて動かない。\n彼が動きだすのは\n王家の者が来た時と\n背中がカ:
Usually, he is
transformed into a rock
and does not move. He
only starts to move when
the royal family comes
and when his back is
cold.

194752.濁流に飲み込まれるかのような\n過酷な人生を送るうちに\n自他ともに認める\n陰:
He became a self-
admittedly grim
character as he led a
harsh life that seemed
to be swallowed by the
muddy waters.

194825.石版を背負ったカニに見えるが\nじつは捨てられた石版に宿った\n怨念が魔物の身体:
It looks like a crab
with a table on its
back, but in fact, it is
said that the grudge
that resides in the
discarded tablets gives
birth to the monster's
body and attacks it.

194905.生物の死体に愛着を抱き\n標本収集を趣味にしていた。\n死の直前 収集した品々の:
He was attached to the
corpses of living
creatures and enjoyed
collecting specimens.
Shortly before his
death, he wept over the
fate of the specimens he
had collected.

194976.死霊兵ガテリアンに宿る魂は\nウルベア地下帝国との戦争で\n命を散らしたガテリア:
The souls that reside in
Spirit Soldier Gaterian
are those of the
soldiers of the Gateria
Empire who lost their
lives in the war against
Urbea Underground City.

195053.獣人となる前は意外にも童顔で\nかわいい系と言われていた。\nもちろん性格の悪さ:
Before becoming a
beastman, he was said to
be a cute type with a
surprisingly childlike
face. Of course, he was
still a general with a
strong gap in his
personality.

195138.生みだされた幻影は\n強さこそ申し分ないが\n元となった彫像から離れると\nたち:
The illusion created is
strong enough to be
powerful, but as soon as
it leaves the original
statue, it disappears.

195205.彼は歯向かう者だけでなく\nただ 楽しみのためだけに\n女子供すらも爪牙にかけ\:
He was called a tyrant,
not only for those who
resisted him, but also
for the women and
children he clawed just
for the fun of it.

195280.かつての戦いは激戦だった。\nブロッゲンのメラが あと５秒\n遅かったら ビュブ:
The battle was fierce
once, and if Broggen's
Frizz had been five
seconds slower, Byblo's
sharp fangs would have
pierced his chest.

195361.巨猫族のキャット・バルバドと\nウェディの戦士 リューデに\n世界支配の野望を阻:
After his ambitions for
world domination were
thwarted by Cat Barbaad
of the Giant Cat Tribe
and Weddie warrior Ryde,
he was sealed in the
waters of eternity.

195442.すぐれた魔法学の知識と\n最強のチカラを求める欲望が\nまさに紅衣の悪夢と呼ぶべ:
The outstanding
knowledge of magic and
the desire to seek the
most powerful power have
created a horrifying
magical beast that
should truly be called
the nightmare of the red
robe.

195521.戦ウために造ラレた ワタシは\n強くナルために カラダを\n改造サレ続ケタ。ああ:
I was made to fight, and
my body was continuously
remodeled to make me
stronger. Ah, now it's
finally getting easier.

195596.じつは 銀翼竜の美しさに\n引き寄せられて湖へ来た。\nしつこく銀翼竜を攻撃する:
In fact, I was drawn to
the lake by the beauty
of silver pterosaurs.
The reason why they
persistently attack
silver pterosaurs is
because of their longing
for them.

195675.悩み苦しみ 思い惑う存在を\n不完全で下等だとさげすむ。\nそれこそが 人らしさ:
They look down on the
suffering, troubled, and
bewildered as imperfect
and lowly. They cannot
recognize that this is
what makes us human.

195752.人食いの妖魔アラグネは\n相手を食べることで\nその姿と記憶を取り込み\n化ける:
The cannibalistic demon
Aragne is said to be
able to take on the form
and memories of its
victims by eating them
and transforming them.

195819.人食い蟲界では かなりの\n食通として知られている。\nじつは キュウスケの捕食:
He is known as a
gourmand in the world of
man-eating bugs. It is
said that he was
actually planning to
prey on Kyusuke.

195891.冷酷非道な魔物で 仲間でも\n平気で裏切るが その性根を\nゼルドラドに気に入ら:
He is a ruthless monster
who betrays even his
companions without
hesitation, but Zeldrad
has taken a liking to
him and made him one of
the Four Fiendish
Generals.

195965.八脚駆動による高い機動性が\nあらゆる戦場を踏破する。\nアグレッシブに攻めたい:
The high mobility of the
octapod drive will
traverse any
battlefield. We
confidently recommend it
to those who want to
attack aggressively!

196045.愛用の鉄球は肌身はなさず\n携帯しており 寝るときも\n枕がわりに使っている。\:
He carries his favorite
iron ball with him at
all times and uses it as
a pillow when he sleeps.
It is said that he is a
surprisingly good
sleeper.

196117.狭い空洞の中で成長し\nそこから出られなくなった\nましょううおも いるという。:
Some Salamangler grew up
in a small cavity and
never got out. What was
he thinking there?

196192.筋肉がないのに上背があるので\nいつも腰痛に悩まされている。\n足がよくプルプル:
He has always suffered
from back pain because
of his upper back, even
though he has no
muscles. My legs often
pull up because I have
to endure the pain.

196277.兄と たもとを分かったのち\n三悪魔結成の誓いを結ぶ。\n魔界史ではその誓約のこ:
After becoming friends
with his brother, he
makes an oath to form
the three demons, which
in the history of the
Demon World is called
the Oath of Harawata.

196352.かつて世界最強の剣士を\n配下に従えていたという。\nその剣士がヒマそうだったの:
He used to have the
world's strongest
swordsman under his
command. The swordsman
seemed to be bored, so I
taught him about
Lightning Storm.

196431.魔力に頼らず 戦えるように\n頑強な肉体にきたえあげたが\nそのせいで翼だけでは:
He has built up a strong
body so that he can
fight without relying on
magic power, but because
of this, he cannot fly
with his wings alone,
and flies with the aid
of magic power.

196512.所属する集団ごとにキャラを\n使い分けているとのウワサ。\n四諸侯での位置づけは:
It is rumored that he
uses different
characters for each
group he belongs to. The
four princes are said to
be mischievous younger
characters.

196589.かつて アグラニの名士だった\nマアモンという男の怨念が\n代表して しゃべって:
The name came about
because he speaks on
behalf of the grudge of
a man named Maamon, who
was once an Agrani
celebrity.

196667.自分の魂を宿すに ふさわしい\n身体の持ち主を探していたが\nついに見つけた持ち:
He was looking for the
owner of the body in
which his soul was to
reside, but he did not
expect to be turned back
by the owner he finally
found.

196745.賢者エイドスによる魔瘴研究の\n過程において生みだされた。\nゆえに意思というも:
It was created in the
process of demon miasma
research by Sage Eidos.
Therefore, it has no
will, but only obeys
orders from Eidos.

196827.ドワチャッカ大陸を開拓した\n三闘士の思念は今ひとつとなり\n王者の座を目指す者:
Having pioneered the
Dwachakka Continent,
Triad's thoughts are now
single and it has long
awaited the arrival of
those who seek the Seat
of the Sovereign.

196906.冒険者に狩られやすい\nゲノミーがこのサイズまで\n成長するのは非常に珍しく\n:
It is very rare for
Crankiid, which are
easily hunted by
adventurers, to grow to
this size, with a
probability of one in
several tens of
thousands.

196979.待望の水陸両用型が登場！\n海や河川に面した拠点の\n攻略に欠かせない逸品です。:
The long-awaited
amphibious type is now
available! This is an
indispensable product
for capturing bases
facing the sea or
rivers. Ride this big
wave!

197056.戦闘兵器でありながら じつは\n棺の役割も果たしている。\n大昔のドワーフたちは:
While being a combat
weapon, it actually
serves as a coffin. Long
ago, Dwarfs believed in
resurrection after
death.

197129.古代のドワーフの王国には\n英雄と呼ばれた三闘士がいた。\nその戦闘の技術が組み:
In the ancient kingdom
of Dwarf, there was a
Triad called Hero. The
three Demon Soldiers
were created by
incorporating their
combat skills.

197208.一見 どれも同じに見えるが\n各機体の足の裏に それぞれ\n０６や ０７から始ま:
At first glance, they
all look the same, but
on the sole of each
plane is engraved an
identification number
beginning with 06 or 07.

197281.帝国技術庁が極秘裏に開発した\n地脈エネルギーで動く魔神兵。\n試作型なので番号:
A demonic soldier
secretly developed by
the Empire Tech Agency
that runs on geo-energy.
Since it is a prototype,
it is nicknamed "Zayed"
instead of "numbered.

197363.造物主の命令に従って 楽園を\n何千年も守り続けてきた機械。\n自分自身の意志は:
A machine that has
protected Utopia for
thousands of years,
following the orders of
the Creator. It has no
will of its own, but
purely tries to fulfill
its orders.

197446.デスワークの戦闘形態は\n本来は古代の奉仕ロボが\n主人の身を守るために\n備え:
The battle form of death
work was originally
equipped by ancient
service robots to defend
themselves against
masters.

197514.バルディスタ要塞では意外にも\n戦闘や開墾の負担を減らすため\n機械化にチカラを:
Fortress Valdista is
surprisingly focusing on
mechanization to reduce
the burden of combat and
land reclamation, and
they seem to be devoted
to technological
research.

197599.ドルワームの民は 度重なる\nクァバルナの襲撃に耐えながら\n天魔黙示録という:
The people of Dolworm,
while enduring repeated
attacks by Kwaba Luna,
have compiled their
ecology into a book
called Heavenly Demon
Apocalypse.

197679.数人集まれば 遊びが始まる。\n最近のお気に入りの遊びは\nメラゾーマドッジボー:
Once a few of us get
together, the play
begins. My favorite game
these days is Kafrizz
dodgeball. The first one
to get obliterated
loses.

197758.ゼクレス王家の始祖に封印され\n以来使い魔として扱われる。\n王族の中でも 強大:
Sealed by the founder of
the Zechres royal
family, it has been
treated as a famililar
ever since. Among the
royal family, only those
with powerful magical
powers can use it.

197838.輪っかを使わせたら 魔界一！\n腰のキレが抜群の時は 同時に\n１０００本の輪を:
When it comes to using
rings, he is the best in
Demon World! When my
hips were in great
shape, I could spin a
thousand rings at the
same time, but now I'm
battling a hernia.

197919.いとこの魔導鬼ベドラーとは\nどちらがテンスの花を滅ぼすか\n競争しており 一歩:
He and his cousin,
Sorcerer Bedora, were
competing to see who
would destroy Tens
Flower, and he was
inwardly worried because
he was one step ahead of
Bedora.

197995.かつて ある偉大な召喚術師に\n召喚され 仕えていたという。\nいずれ寝首をかく:
It is said that he was
once summoned by a great
summoner and served him.
