It is said that he used
to lie and tsunts at his
master, saying that he
would eventually turn
his head in his sleep.

198078.ロムドゴーグへの対抗心からか\n凶暴さを見せつけるような\n戦いをする。２体を競:
He fights in such a way
as to show off his
ferocity from his
rivalry with Romdogog.
Kyuronos' aim of pitting
the two against each
other was a success.

198160.アルムゴーグの対抗心を\n刺激するために生みだされた。\n相棒の感情を逆なでする:
He was created to
stimulate the rivalry of
Almugorg. He takes
unmitigated pleasure in
tugging at his partner's
emotions.

198239.類まれな才能を持ちながら\n以前は時見や時渡りに対し\n懐疑的だった。そんな所も:
Despite his exceptional
talent, he used to be
skeptical about Tokimi
and Tokiwari. This is
one of the reasons why
his older brother is not
fond of him.

198315.大いなる闇が問いかける。\n生まれた時代を 真の姿を\n殺した敵を 魂の在りかを:
The great darkness asks
the question. The age of
birth, the true form,
the enemy killed, and
the whereabouts of the
soul. The true meaning
is immeasurable.

198389.戦禍の邪神はガズバラン神に\n封印されたためオーガを憎み\nオーガに災いをなす計:
The evil god of war
hated Ogre because he
had been sealed by the
god Gazbalan, and he had
plotted many times in
the past to bring
misfortune to Ogre.

198468.悪友であるディエゴの手伝いを\nするかどうかで５つのアタマの\n意見が割れたが３:
Five atats were divided
on whether or not to
help their bad friend
Diego, but it was
decided by a 3 to 2
margin that they would
do so.

198554.邪神の宮殿に突き立つ封剣は\nもともと戦禍の邪神のもの。\n相手の武器の魔力を利:
The sealing sword that
stands in the Evil God
Palace originally
belonged to the evil god
of war. Gazbalan used
the magical power of the
opponent's weapon to
seal it.

198634.仕えるべき主 冥王の到来を\n待ち望んでいたが\nその誕生を見ることなく\n志半:
He had longed for the
coming of the Lord
Netherlord, whom he was
to serve, but he was
defeated in mid-stride
without seeing his
birth.

198700.冥王の降臨を見届けるまで\n死ねぬという守護者の意志が\nラズバーンの魂を永遠に:
The Protector's will not
to die until he has
witnessed the descent of
the Netherlord binds
Razburn's soul to
Reidametes for eternity.

198777.自分の命を奪った者への恐れは\n盟友と言えどぬぐい去りがたく\nその恐怖の記憶は:
The fear of those who
have taken one's own
life is unquenchable,
even if it is only a
fear, and the memory of
that fear distorts the
real image and makes the
false image seem much
more powerful.

198862.死を与うるべき虫ケラふぜいに\n敗れた屈辱と怒りを禁じえず\n冥王は絶望の鎌をか:
Unable to contain his
humiliation and anger at
having been defeated by
a bunch of insects that
should have given him
death, the Netherlord
holds up a scythe of
despair and smiles an
icy smile.

198941.彼の振るう絶望の鎌に\n斬りつけられた者は\nその魂にまで キズを負い\nチカラ:
It is said that those
who are cut by the
scythe of despair
wielded by him will have
their souls scarred and
their power drained.

199008.ネルゲルにチカラを与えた\n闇の根源とは なんなのか？\nその答えに近づくことは:
What is the source of
the darkness that gave
Nergel his power? It is
said that to approach
the answer means death.

199084.辺境警備隊のラゴウ隊長により\n異形獣と命名されたが\n本当の名前は別にあるらし:
Named Hexabeast by
Captain Lago of the
Frontier Patrol, it is
said that its real name
is something else. What
is its true identity?

199161.特定の主人の命令を聞くよう\n調整されていたがシャンテの\n歌声はその設定を打ち:
The music was tuned to
listen to the commands
of a specific master,
but Shante's voice
seemed to have a special
power to counteract that
setting.

199240.ヘルゲゴーグの名付け親は\nヨンゲ所長だが 彼からすれば\n異形獣などという呼ば:
Helgegog's godfather was
Director Yong, who would
have been very unhappy
to be called Hexabeast.

199319.叡智の冠が チカラ尽きたとき\n四重の封空は 破られ\n魔獣ネロスゴーグは ふた:
When the Crown of Wisdom
is exhausted, the
Quadruple Seal will be
broken and the Demon
Beast Nerosugog will
reappear from the void.

199392.不死のチカラで再生するたび\nただ強くなるだけでなく\n思考や性格も魔王ネロドス:
It seems that each time
he regenerated with the
power of immortality, he
not only became
stronger, but also his
thoughts and personality
became closer to those
of the Demon King
Nerodos.

199466.冥王さえも よみがえらせる\n大いなる闇の根源。\nそのチカラは日増しに強くなり:
The source of the great
darkness that brings
even the Netherlord back
to life. Its power grows
stronger day by day and
soon covers the world.

199542.勇者を倒したあかつきには\nおのれの 不死のチカラを与え\n下僕としてよみがえら:
He planned to give Hero
the power of immortality
and resurrect him as his
servant after defeating
him.

199618.例え どんな聖人君子でも\n彼らにからまれると\n思わずイラッとするという\n忍:
This is a duo that tests
the patience of even the
most saintly person, who
is unintentionally
annoyed by their antics.

199688.無類の女好きなのに いつも\n寄ってくるのはヤローばかり。\n平手打ちで幕を閉じ:
He loves women like no
one else, but the only
ones who come close to
him are always yahoos.
He vows to avenge his
100th love affair, which
ended with a slap on the
wrist.

199766.オレは ここで何をしている？\nなぜ あいつに剣を向けた？\n鈴の音がアタマにひ:
What am I doing here?
Why did you point your
sword at him? The sound
of a bell echoes in my
head.

199843.１２の雑誌で占いコーナーの\n連載を持つ。ペンネームは\nいくつかあり マルグリ:
She has a series of
fortune-telling sections
in 12 magazines. She has
several pseudonyms,
Margaret being the name
she uses for her Tarot
horoscopes.

199922.大きな眼はエリート魔獣の証。\n生まれたてながら その強さは\n上級ヘルゲゴーグ:
Its large eyes are the
mark of an Ellieto
Hexenbiest. Although it
is a newborn, its
strength exceeds that of
a high level Helgegog.
It is a juvenile with
great potential.

200006.棲みかを捨て 役目を捨て\n熱い想いだけを胸に抱き\nヤツは去っていった。\n怪:
He left his home,
abandoned his role, and
left with only his
passion in his heart.
Where is Monster Pusgon
going?

200077.ピンチョを誘いだした先で\n仕込みによってプロポーズを\nさせる流れに追い込んだ:
She lured Pincho to a
place where she forced
him to propose to her by
means of a setup. She is
a daring, no-means
maiden.

200156.今回 おナワとなったが\nすぐに釈放される算段が\nととのっているとの本人談。\:
He is now in jail, but
he says he is ready to
be released soon. It
seems that the roots of
evil run deep.

200228.スイートなものを追い求め\n甘い恋の よろこびを知り\nすこしだけ大人になった\:
Monster Pusgon, who has
grown up a little bit by
pursuing sweet things
and learning the joys of
sweet love, is now
awakening!

200301.不動のトップ２マイラーである\n知のギオーダ 勇のガガンマ。\nふたりに認められ:
Only those who are
recognized by these two
can become The Three
Simpateers!

200382.レギオンは 最強と謳われた。\nだが 見方を変えれば\n自分の欲望すら抑制できぬ:
Legion was said to be
the strongest of them
all. But from a
different perspective,
he is a weak man who
cannot even control his
own desires.

200456.仮面の下の 自分の顔は\n邪悪に みにくく歪んでいる。\n倫理的に問題があったた:
Under the mask, my face
is wickedly distorted
and unappealing. It was
hidden by self-imposed
restrictions because of
ethical issues.

200525.彼が素手での闘いを好むのは\n確実に 闘う相手の気の流れを\n感じるためであり:
He prefers to fight with
his bare hands because
he can certainly feel
the flow of his
opponent's chi, not
because he is incapable
of using weapons.

200605.昔 ヤンチャしていた頃に\nゴードンに拾われた。\nそれ以来 恩返しするため\n:
Gordon picked her up
when she was a
mischievous youngster.
Since then, he has been
trying his best to repay
the favor.

200673.親友のトレダに誘われ\n嫌々コンビを組まされた。\n本当は父と同じ\n探検家にな:
My best friend Tred
invited me to join him
and we were reluctantly
paired up. I really
wanted to be an explorer
like my father.

200735.元々は 芸人志望だったが\nいつまでたっても芽が出ず\n人生に焦って魔物商人に。:
Originally, he wanted to
be a comedian, but he
never got anywhere, so
he got impatient and
became a monster
merchant. Of course, his
partner is Charman.

200810.キッズを変貌させた粉。\n魔物と まもの使いの絆を\n断ち切る粉……。その方面で:
The powder that
transformed Fry, the
powder that severed the
bond between monster and
monster master. He is a
well-known authority in
the field of powder.

200885.自称バトマス界のアイドル。\n強くてキュートな この魅力で\n次号の「週刊コロシ:
She is a self-proclaimed
idol of the battlemaster
world. With her strong
and cute charm, the next
issue of "Coliseum
Weekly" will of course
feature me on the cover!

200964.ジェイコフの元を去って以来\n独自に修行を積んでいた。\n三刀流にも挑戦してみた:
Since leaving Jakov, he
has been training on his
own. He tried his hand
at santo-ryu, but was
unable to master it and
gave it up.

201038.復讐を誓いながらも\n正々堂々の勝負をつらぬいた。\n父の名に恥じぬ戦いをする。:
He swore vengeance, but
he was determined to
fight fair and square.
He fights to live up to
his father's name. That
is his pride.

201111.読み上げた詩は全１３章中の\n序章に過ぎないという。\n最終章の恥ずかしさは\n:
The poem he read out was
only the first chapter
of a total of 13
chapters. It is rumored
that the final chapter
is so embarrassing that
it will make you flinch
and die.

201182.実験をくり返し ひたすらに\n強い魔物を生み出すことだけを\n目的として生きてい:
He lives for the sole
purpose of creating a
strong monster through
repeated experiments. He
does not choose any
means to achieve this.

201260.アストルティア全土が震えた\n天魔クァバルナのデュオ攻撃。\n想像を超えた この:
Kukulkannibal's duo
attack that made the
whole of Astoltia
tremble. This sense of
despair beyond
imagination. It was
truly the ultimate
nightmare.

201335.おネエ系の男神かと思いきや\nれっきとした女神らしい。\n間違えると荒ブリィ殺し:
She seems to be a
goddess, although I
thought she was a male
goddess. Be careful,
because if you make a
mistake, you will be
killed by Arablee.

201412.かつてはバラモス城を拠点に\n世界征服を企んでいたという。\nその老け顔を笑った:
It is said that he once
used Baramos Castle as a
base from which he
plotted to conquer the
world. Anyone who
laughed at his old face
would have his guts
eaten out.

201492.何度倒しても復活する敵への\n対抗策としてハラワタを喰らう\n戦略を研究会で提唱:
The study group has
proposed a strategy of
eating the guts as a
countermeasure against
enemies who resurrect no
matter how many times
they are defeated, but
this strategy has yet to
be proven.

201577.同じハラワタを分かち合い\n仲良く育った兄弟とも\n今では袂を分かち 各々が\n:
The brothers, who shared
the same harrowing
experiences and grew up
together, have now
parted company and are
running down their own
paths of faith.

201649.理性を失う前は 帝王として\nアストルティアを守っていたが\n闇の根源が 偉大な:
Before losing his mind,
he defended Astoltia,
but darkness warped him.

201728.太古から変化の秘術を伝える\nある氏族の出身だったヤイル。\n氏族はすでに滅びた:
Jair was from a family
that had passed on the
ancient art of
transformation since
time immemorial; the
family had already died
out, but the art had
barely been passed on.

201810.絶望をすすり憎しみを喰らい\n悲しみの涙でノドをうるおす。\nそのたびに彼の闇の:
He slurps despair, eats
hate, and weeps tears of
sorrow. With each
passing moment, the
power of his darkness
grows stronger.

201887.培養液の中でまどろんでいた\n複製体Ｃ１４１が初めて見た\n光景は 創造主パルミ:
The first thing the
replicant C141,
slumbering in the
culture medium, saw was
its creator, Palmio,
rejoicing in his
newfound discovery.

201966.兄とは不仲なのかと思いきや\nバカにされると ハラワタが\n煮えくり返るほど怒り:
He is a man who is very
fond of his brother. He
is a guy who loves his
brother for some reason.

202045.バシルーラの使い手として\nかつては勇名をはせていたが\nある魔女の一族に魔力を:
Once a renowned Bazoom
user, a family of witches
took his magic away and
sealed his special spells.

202122.隊商の傭兵から剣技を教わり\n縁の深い亡国で戦術をみがいた\nユシュカ独自の戦闘:
Yushka's unique fighting
style is the embodiment
of his ideology, which
he learned from a
mercenary trader who
taught him swordsmanship
and refined his tactics
in an exiled country
with which he has close
ties.

202204.自分が 何者なのかすら\nもはや わかっておらず\nただ 本能のままに破壊する\:
He no longer even knows
what he is, but has
become a monster that
destroys at will.

202271.戦禍の邪神は戦争の振りまく\n災いを象徴する悪神であり\n大いなる闇の根源にもっ:
The evil god of war is a
fiend who symbolizes the
scourge of war and is
said to be one of the
beings closest to the
source of the great
darkness.

202347.意外に勉強家の一面があり\nアストルティアのことも\nかなり綿密に調べていた。\:
Surprisingly, he has a
studious side and has
been researching
Astoltia quite
meticulously. It's not
easy being a dark lord.

202420.自分が シンボルとなっている\nＶジャンプが 大好きで\n読んでいるところを\n:
I love VJanp, which is
my symbol, and I hate
more than anything to be
interrupted when I am
reading it.

202491.伝説の絵師 トリヤーマが\nその姿を模し シンボルとした\n書物 Ｖジャンプは\:
The book VJanp, whose
image was copied and
made into a symbol by
the legendary painter
Triarma, is immensely
popular among
adventurers!

202562.たとえ勝負に負けたとしても\nＶロンとＶジャンプは最強だ。\n楽しかったぜと言わ:
Even if you lose the
game, Vron and VJanp are
the best. The V-sign
that sticks out to the
heavens as if to say, "I
had a good time!

202642.じつは切り株をアタマに\nかぶっているのではなく\n切り株から身体が生えて\n今:
In fact, it is said that
it is not wearing a
stump on its head, but
that its body grew out
of the stump and became
what it is today.

202710.アタマの切り株は\n寝るときは外してマクラに。\n長いカミの毛にくるまって\n野:
The head stump is
removed and used as a
pillow when sleeping.
Wrapped in long kami
hair, he sleeps
perfectly peacefully
even in the field.

202778.１００年を経たヒイラギに\n邪悪な霊魂が宿り生まれた。\n元がヒイラギなだけに\:
A 100-year-old Hiiragi
was born with an evil
spirit in it. She has a
very prickly personality
because of her origin as
a Hiiragi.

202851.一見かわいらしい見た目で\nターゲットを油断させて\n強力な呪文でトドメを刺す\:
He is a very skilled
assassin whose seemingly
cute appearance catches
his target off guard,
and then he delivers a
powerful spell to finish
him off.

202924.恥ずかしくて人前でダンスが\nおどれなかったパンプキッズ。\nある日 カボチャで:
One day, Pumpkid, who
had been too embarrassed
to dance in public,
found himself able to
act funny by hiding his
face in a pumpkin.

203008.固い友情で結ばれた彼らだが\n食い意地だけは歯止めが効かず\n１００年に一度は\:
They are bound together
by a strong friendship,
but their greed is the
only thing that keeps
them apart, and once
every 100 years they get
into a big fight over a
snack.

203084.バラに変身させるのは\n手に持ったステッキの魔力。\n世界を花でいっぱいにするた:
It is the magic of the
stick in her hand that
transforms her into a
rose. She has taken the
treasure from her
hometown to fill the
world with flowers.

203163.闇夜にまぎれ 音もなく\n仕事をこなす魔界の殺し屋。\n過去に数多くの要人を\n:
A Demon World assassin
who works quietly in the
dark of night. He is a
professional among
professionals who has
buried many important
people in the past.

203233.本当の自分は いったい\n何者なのか……。いろんな\n影の形をマネしているうちに:
Who on earth am I
really? As I imitate
various shadow forms, I
am losing sight of
myself.

203305.明るい性格に生まれ変わろうと\n太陽の下に出てみたら\n身体が消滅しそうになった:
When I went out into the
sun to try to be reborn
with a brighter
personality, my body
almost disappeared. I
became more dark-rooted.

203382.うすっぺらな身体がイヤで\nトレーニングで筋肉をつけて\nブ厚くなろうとしたが\:
He had a history of
trying to gain muscle
mass by training because
he did not want to have
a flimsy body, but he
gave up after three
days.

203456.魔王の強すぎる魔力によって\n他の影系魔物たちとは違う\nあざやかな真紅の姿とな:
Thanks to the Demon
King's too-strong
magical power, he became
a vivid true red,
different from other
shadowy monsters. This
is thanks to the Demon
King!

203533.身体を作っている泥には\n保湿成分が ふくまれており\nおハダのカサカサを気にす:
The mud that makes up
the body contains
moisturizing
ingredients, and it
seems to be a popular
choice for monsters who
are concerned about
their flaky skin.

203609.かつては 多彩な芸を見せて\n子供たちを楽しませていた。\nその頃をなつかしんで:
In the past, they
entertained children
with a wide variety of
arts. They show off
their dances,
reminiscing about those
days.

203684.長く生きた どろにんぎょうの\n泥が固まり 風雨にみがかれ\nこの輝きが得られる:
It is said that the mud
from the long-lived Mud
Mannequin hardens and
the wind and rain remove
it from the earth,
giving it this shine.
According to one theory,
it takes a hundred
years.

203764.自慢のモヒカンを失うと\n方向感覚が失われ\nモヒカントは死んでしまう。\nモヒ:
Losing his prized Mohawk
would cause him to lose
his sense of direction
and Mohawker would die.
The Mohawk is heavier
than life.

203832.相方のレッドオーガと組んで\n魔界の演芸大会の頂点を\n目指す野心的な魔物。\n:
He is an ambitious
monster who is aiming
for the top of Demon
World's performance
competition with his
partner, Red Horn.

203905.フンガーと鳴くのでそのまんま\n名付けられた。感情によって\n音の高低を使い分け:
It is named so because
it sounds like "Red
Fang". There are a
variety of Red Fangs, as
they use different pitch
levels depending on
their emotions.

203987.クァバルナの血肉を与えられ\n作りだされた忠実なしもべ。\nクァバルナを親のよう:
A faithful servant who
was given the flesh and
blood of Quaba Luna and
created. He loves Quaba
Luna like a parent and
devotes himself to her
resurrection.

204069.伝説のモンスターバンド\n「ライトニング・デス」の\nメンバー募集に応募したが\:
He applied for
membership in the
legendary monster band
Lightning Death, but was
not asked to be in
charge of the flute.

204145.笛が吹けて コサックが踊れ\n以前はアイドルだったことも。\n全盛期は とうに過:
He can play the flute,
dance the Cossacks, and
was once an idol. His
prime may be long gone,
but his dance moves are
still sharp.

204223.もともとは ただの羊飼い。\n仕事中の事故で\nどとうのひつじにひき殺され\n怨:
Originally, he was just
a shepherd. He was
killed by a sheep during
a work accident and
became a monster because
of his grudge.

204295.かつて 魔界の貴族に仕える\nお抱え楽士だったが\nソロ活動に あこがれて\n地:
Once a musician in the
service of a nobleman in
Demon World, he came to
earth to pursue his solo
career.

204365.昔は スリムな体型だったが\n何年も封印されている間に\nムッチムチに太ってしま:
I used to be slim, but
I've gained a muthy whip
over the years I've been
sealed away. By the way,
it has nothing to do
with the name.

204444.予言者プクトラダムスによれば\n終末の日に角笛を吹き鳴らし\n皆に世界の終焉を告:
According to the prophet
Puktoradamus, he will
blow his horn on
doomsday and announce
the end of the world to
everyone. He doesn't
know that.

204528.いつも雲に乗って移動するため\n運動不足になりがちで\n最近 メタボを気にしてい:
I'm always on the move
in the clouds, so I
don't get enough
exercise, and lately
I've been concerned
about my metabolic
syndrome, so I'm aiming
to get rid of it with
battle!

204607.自分を封じていたランプを\nなぜか大切に保管している。\n今では自分の一部のよう:
For some reason, he
keeps the lamp that used
to seal him up very
carefully. He now feels
like it is a part of
him.

204680.じつはブドゥというのは\n本名ではなく 一種の芸名。\nプライバシー保護のため\:
Budou is not his real
name, but a stage name.
To protect his privacy,
he has not revealed his
real name.

204755.はるか昔 リンジャの塔に住む\n召喚士に 呼び出されて\nセレド周辺を荒らしたら:
It is said that a long
time ago, a summoner in
Linja Tower summoned him
to ravage the area
around Celed, but the
details are unknown.

204833.かつて魔人のチカラで栄えた\n古代文明があったという。\nエンラージャもその時代:
It is said that there
was once an ancient
civilization that
thrived on the power of
demons, and Enraja was
summoned and used during
that time.

204909.代々陰衆では汚れ仕事を\n請けた際 罪の意識を薄める\n術を使っていたが その罪:
For generations, the
Yinshu used a technique
to diminish the guilt of
doing dirty work, but it
did not erase the guilt
as well.

204987.多くの冒険者が なぜか\nキラーパンサーを見かけると\n勝手な名前で呼んでくるの:
For some reason, many
adventurers call the
Great Sabrecat by his
own name when they see
him, which puzzles me
every time.

205060.しあわせな恋をした分だけ\nハートの柄が増えていくと\n言われているが なぜか\:
It is said that the more
happy love he has, the
more hearts he has, but
for some reason he is
still single.

205133.ふしぎなおどりの不思議さも\nパワーアップしているらしいが\nどのへんが変わった:
The mystery of Weird
Dance is said to have
been enhanced, but even
the most discerning
connoisseurs cannot tell
what changes have been
made.

205218.キッズと名乗ってはいるが\nこの道ウン十年のベテラン。\n踊りのキレも愛らしさも:
Although he calls
himself "Fry," he has
been a performer for
decades, and his dance
moves are as sharp and
charming as any young
dancer's. He has a great
sense of humor, and he
is a very good dancer!

205292.モンスター反復横跳びの\n世界記録を持っており\nその 本気のステップは\n残像:
He holds the world
record for the monster
lateral jump, and his
serious steps are said
to be so fast that you
can see afterimages.

205361.一人前として 認められるため\n新月の晩 ひとりきりで獲物を\n仕留めに旅立つ。:
To be recognized as a
full-fledged member of
the clan, he sets out
alone on the night of
the new moon to hunt his
prey. If he fails, he
will be banished from
the clan.

205438.覆面で顔を隠すことで\n彼の中の何かが解放された。\n今では仲間に負けず劣らず\:
Hiding his face behind a
mask has freed something
inside him. Now he is as
free and unrestrained as
his companion.

205514.スコルパイドより硬く\nジェルザークより狡猾で\nガルドドンよりチカラ強く\nデ:
It is reputed to be
harder than Scor Pied,
more cunning than Gel
Zark, more powerful than
Gardo Don and more
brutal than Delmeze.

205587.手にした剣は倒した敵から\n奪ったもの。もっとも多くの\n剣を集めたホークマンが:
The sword in his hand
was taken from a
defeated enemy. The Hawk
Man who collects the
most swords is
recognized as the leader
of his clan.

205665.決して自分の主張を曲げない\nガンコ者の悪魔。 \n意見を通すためなら暴力も\n:
Demon is a stubborn
person who never bends
his point of view. He is
a typical hawkish person
who is willing to use
violence in order to get
his point of view
across.

205737.ガーゴイルの声は\nとんでもないガラガラ声。\n本人も気にしているらしく\n時々:
Gargoyle's voice has a
ridiculous rattle. He
seems to be concerned
about it and sometimes
gargles with rainwater.

205807.汚れたガーゴイルなのでは？\nという説があるが\nソードフライヤー本人は\nかた:
Some have suggested that
Goregoyle is a dirty
Gargoyle, but Goregoyle
himself denies this.
Goregoyle himself is
adamant in his denial.

205875.高貴なる悪魔と名乗っているが\nじつは長生きしたホークマン。\n富と名声を手に入:
He calls himself a noble
demon, but in fact he is
a long-lived Hawk Man
who has received wealth
and fame and is now even
more selfish.

205955.いろいろと理由はつけているが\n結局のところ修行が嫌になって\n山を下りたようだ:
He has many reasons, but
in the end he got tired
of training and left the
mountain. He is very
proud of his sorcery and
is quite tengu.

206040.ルティアナの依り代である\nイルーシャが神殿を訪れた時は\n出現しないルールにな:
The rule is that when
Irusha, Lutiana's
dependent, visits the
temple, she does not
appear, so she was not
slacking off.

206122.一見して弱点に見える頭頂部は\nじつは最強の硬度を誇る。\n冷静に戦況をコントロ:
The top of the head,
which at first glance
appears to be a weak
point, is in fact the
strongest and hardest.
It is a vicious and
matchless artificial
brain that calmly
controls the war
situation.

206204.ファッツと呼ばれているが\nまだまだポッチャリ気味で\n通ると思っている。\n無:
Call me Fats, but I
still think I can pass
as Potchari-ish. Of
course, that is an
illusion.

206273.全身が黄色く染まっているのは\nじつは太りすぎによる\n健康状態への危険信号だと:
Some believe that the
yellowish coloring of
the entire body is
actually a danger signal
for health conditions
caused by overweight.

206349.アンゴラモーアという魔物が\nいると知って以来 ひそかに\n対抗心を燃やしている:
Ever since he found out
that there is a monster
named Angola Faun, he
has been secretly trying
to compete with her.
Will they be rivals
someday?

206425.昔は アルゴリザードという\n忠実な子分たちがいたが\n住める場所が減るにつれて:
It used to have a
faithful henchman named
Argo Lizard, but he
seems to have
disappeared as the
number of places where
he could live dwindled.

206500.完全に自我を失う直前\n彼が最後に思いうかべたのは\n遠く なつかしき家族と\n:
Just before he
completely lost his
self-consciousness, his
last thought was of his
distant, nostalgic
family and his beloved
partner.

206569.バッファロンの生きがいは\n一気にハイテンションから\nかちあげを決めること。\:
Buffalogre's zest for
life is to do a kachi-
age from high tension
all at once. He says he
can sleep well on the
day he does it.

206645.相方のブルファングと組んで\n魔界の演芸大会の頂点を\n目指す野心的な魔物。\n:
This ambitious monster
is aiming for the top of
Demon World's
performance competition
with his partner, Blue
Fang, and is known for
his sharp Sobering Slap.

206719.赤と青の色合いのせいで\n格下のレッドオーガと\nペアに見られることが多く \n:
Often seen paired with
the lower-ranked Red
Horn due to its red and
blue hues, it is
secretly scratchy.

206789.魔物を盾にしてアラハギーロを\n守ろうとした兵士長。\n非情なようだが 彼なりの:
A soldier captain who
tried to protect Al-
Ahagiro by making the
monster a shield. It may
seem heartless, but it
was a decision made out
of patriotism in his own
way.

206862.チケット争奪戦を制するため\nつちかった情報網と人脈\nライブ遠征でつけた体力が:
The information network
and personal connections
she developed in order
to win the battle for
tickets, and the
physical strength she
gained from traveling to
live shows, are the
foundation of her
current business.

206938.魔界では軽視されがちだった\n死という概念に 美を見出し\n魔界芸術史で一時代を:
The Demon World found
beauty in the concept of
death, which had tended
to be neglected in the
Demon World, and created
an era in the history of
Demon World art. The
center of the movement
is Madesagora.

207019.古来より 魔界で主流派だった\nヘルデモニスムの発展理念。\n前期と後期で表現技:
The developmental
philosophy of
Herdemonism, which has
been the mainstream in
the Demon World since
ancient times. The
techniques of expression
differ between the early
and late periods, and
the representative of
the late period is
Madesagora.

207101.万物の混沌を表す暗黒の美を\n探求せんとした芸術上の理念。\n提唱した 著名な芸:
An artistic philosophy
that seeks to explore
the beauty of darkness,
which represents the
chaos of all things. The
most famous artist who
advocated this idea was
Madesagora.

207176.子供の頃に オノを与えられ\n振り回す修行を続けてきた。\n最初は 持ち上げられ:
He was given an axe as a
child and has continued
to practice swinging it.
At first, he couldn't
lift it and kept
dragging it.

207254.魔物界の傭兵リザードマンが\nメタル狩りの手伝いばかりを\n依頼され 無心でこな:
Mandrake Major, a
mercenary of the monster
world, was asked to
assist in metal hunting,
and as he did so
mindlessly, his level
improved.

207335.いかにもオノのあつかいが\n上手そうな名前をしているが\n実際はむやみに振り回す:
He has a name that makes
it sound like he is good
at handling axe, but in
reality he is just a
name-dropping dragon who
wields it unnecessarily.

207409.トマホーガーはひとつのオノを\n先祖代々 使い続けてきた。\nそのオノを失うこと:
Halberdsaurus have been
using a single axe for
generations. They never
lose their axe and never
let go of it, even when
they sleep.

207491.竜の聖騎士の異名を持ち\n讃えられるパラディノスは\n見た目だけでなく戦い方も\:
Praised as the holy
knight of dragons,
Paladinsaurus is not
only noble in
appearance, but also in
fighting style.

207560.アペカの村からエジャルナへ\n出稼ぎに行く道で魔物に襲われ\n仲間にも見捨てられ:
On his way from Apeka
Village to Ejarna to
work, he was attacked by
monsters and abandoned
by the companion, but
Antelo saved him.

207640.かつては井戸掘りという\n炎の領界で最も危険な仕事に\n就いていたがナダイアに\:
He used to be a well
digger, the most
dangerous job in the
Fire Realm, but Nadaia
saved him and made him
her direct subordinate.

207714.本当は 王子と付けるのが\n流行っていると知り 便乗した\nただのワカメの若者。:
In truth, he was just a
young wakame (seaweed)
who jumped on the
bandwagon when he found
out it was fashionable
to call himself a
prince. Now that the
boom is over, he regrets
it.

207791.ドライフラワーに悪霊が宿り\n魔物と化したらしい。\nドライな身体にウェットな性:
It seems that an evil
spirit inhabited a dried
flower and turned it
into a monster. She has
a dry body and a wet
personality full of
unexpectedness.

207864.海草士官学校を首席卒業。\n多くの戦いで手柄を重ね\nライバルとの出世競争に勝ち:
He graduated at the top
of his class from Kaiso
Military Academy. He won
many battles and won the
competition for
promotion with his
rivals, and was finally
promoted to the rank of
general.

207940.長く生きた こんぶ大将から\nあふれだしたエキスが\nとろとろと全身をおおったと:
It is said that he is
born when his whole body
is covered with the
extract that has
overflowed from the
long-lived Caterwaulin'.

208012.海風の洞くつで耳を澄ませば\n時折 胸を打つボサ・ノヴァが\n聴こえてくる……そ:
Legend has it that if
you listen carefully at
Seabreeze Cave, you will
occasionally hear the
sound of a heartbreaking
bossa nova.

208089.いけにえに捧げられた者の\n怨念だとか自分を裏切った男を\n探しているとか その:
There are many theories
as to his true identity,
such as that he holds a
grudge against those who
were sacrificed, or that
he is searching for the
man who betrayed him,
but none of them are
proven.

208170.自身を貴人と思い込んでいるが\n生前は野盗のカシラ。強奪した\n金品に囲まれて暮:
He thinks of himself as
a nobleman, but before
his death, he was a wild
thief named Kashira. He
was swallowed up by the
swoon as he lived among
the gold he had looted.

208255.ヨロイに宿る魔物としては\nデビルアーマーの大先輩。\nでも後輩のモダンな装いに:
As a monster in armour,
he is Harmour's senior.
However, he is a little
bit longing for the
modern attire of his
juniors.

208328.じごくのよろいを装備した者は\n心と身体を乗っ取られ\n魔王の下僕として\n永遠:
It is said that those
equipped with Infernal
Armor will have their
minds and bodies taken
over and continue to
move forever as servants
of the Demon King.

208398.しにがみのきしとは\n赤いヨロイ同士 競い合う仲。\nヨロイの大きさでは負けるが:
He and Knight Abhorrent
compete with each other
in red armors, losing in
armor size but winning
in redness!

208468.自分はハダカ同然なのに\n子分には黄金のよろいを着せる\nカンダタは 気前がいい:
Robbin' 'Ood, who puts
golden armor on his
henchmen even though
he's practically naked,
is he generous, vain, or
just a hobby?

208546.いかずちを 落とす修行を\n長きにわたり続けた結果\nヨロイがコゲてしまった。\:
After a long period of
practice of dropping
ikazuchis, the armor has
become blackened. This
blackness is the proof
of my effort.

208619.戦禍の邪神の想念によって\n神の試練の番人が宿す\n神気の嵐は 万象を打ち滅ぼす:
The storm of the divine
spirit that the guardian
of the divine trial
inhabits has turned into
a hellstorm that
destroys all phenomena
through the thoughts of
the evil god of war.

208685.戦禍の邪神の想念によって\n神の試練の番人が宿す\n清浄なる水は 死穢にまみれた:
The clean water in which
the guardian of the
divine trial dwells has
been transformed into
the water of corpses
covered in the filth of
death by the thoughts of
the evil god of the war.

208751.戦禍の邪神の想念によって\n神の試練の番人が宿す\n静謐なる闇は 呪いを振りまく:
The tranquil darkness
that the guardian of the
divine trial inhabits
has been transformed
into a cursed darkness
sprinkled with curses by
the thoughts of the evil
god of war.

208817.戦禍の邪神の想念によって\n神の試練の番人が宿す\n浄化の炎は 全てを焼き尽くす:
The purifying flame that
the guardian of the
divine trial holds has
turned into an evil
flame that consumes
everything through the
thoughts of the evil god
of war.

208883.戦禍の邪神の想念によって\n神の試練の番人が宿す\n至純の氷は 時も凍てつかせる:
The pure ice that the
guardian of the divine
trial holds has been
transformed by the
thoughts of the evil god
of war into a magical
ice that freezes time.

208949.この魔物を倒した者は\n一生お金に困らなくなるという\n言い伝えのせいで 冒険者:
The legend says that
whoever defeats this
monster will never have
to worry about money for
the rest of his or her
life, and so the
adventurers keep
targeting him or her.

209026.ボディに含まれるプラチナ量は\nそれほど大したことはない。\nとはいえ経験値は莫:
The amount of platinum
in the body is not that
great. However, the
experience value is
enormous, so it is still
a target.

209109.未知の鉱物マデュライトには\n人を魔物に変える作用がある。\nとぼけた顔をしてい:
The unknown mineral
Darkonium has the
ability to turn people
into monsters. It is a
frightening slime with a
silly face.

209188.腹黒なクイーンスライムの\n尻にしかれたキングスライムが\nある種の悟りを開いた:
They say King Slimes who
stick to the bottoms of
evil Queen Slimes become
enlightened as emperors.

209267.英雄ザンクローネの心臓は\n毛が生えているどころか\nカオがついてて 暴れまわる:
Hero Zankrone's Heart is
not only hairy but also
has a face and a rampant
spin. As expected,
heroes are not ordinary!

209342.育みの大地で暮らしていた彼。\nちょっと海水浴でもしようと\nスレア海岸に出かけ:
He was living in
Nurturing Land. When he
went to Surea Coast for
a bit of swimming, he
fell in love with
Energy.

209424.かつては神殿を支える柱の\n一本だったが あまりの重さに\n耐えかねて神殿を抜け:
It used to be one of the
pillars supporting the
temple, but it could not
bear the weight of the
temple, so it broke out
of the temple and
succeeded in gaining
freedom.

209502.邪教の神殿を支える柱が\n魂を宿らせ 動きだした。\n邪神の教えを広めるため\n:
The pillar that supports
the temple of paganism
has taken on a soul and
begun to move. He
embarks on his own
missionary work to
spread the teachings of
the evil god.

209572.もともとは大魔王の居城の\n柱となるべく作られたが\n気を抜くとクネクネしてしま:
It was originally
intended to be a pillar
for the Great Demon
King's castle, but it
became too wobbly to
support the ceiling.

209651.もとはただのエンタシスマン。\n若い頃 東方の国へ渡り\nその地の踊りに魅せられ:
Originally a mere
Prancing Pillar, he
traveled to the East as
a young man and became
fascinated by the local
dances, becoming a
master after training in
them.

209728.百物語を語るのが大好きで\nロウソク代わりに自分の灯火を\n吹き消すが２本しかな:
He loves to tell a
hundred stories and blow
out his own lights
instead of candles, but
since he only has two,
he can only hold 50 of
them.

209810.「打倒！ 魔王」を誓うも\n志半ばで倒れた騎士のよろい。\n執念だけで動いてはい:
Overthrowing the Demon
King! The armor of a
knight who vowed to be
the "Demon King" but
fell in mid-ambition. A
pathetic omission that
has forgotten its
purpose, though
motivated only by
persistence.

209889.類まれな強さと美声を持つ\n魔のシンガーソングライター。\n新曲「かめかめルンバ:
A magical singer-
songwriter with
exceptional strength and
a beautiful voice. Her
new song "Kamekame
rumba" is a bestseller
in the monster world!

209965.戦禍の邪神の封印からもれだす\n邪気は封印の守護者である\n魔封剣姫の身体をむし:
It is said that the evil
air that leaks out from
the seal of the evil god
of war will shorten the
life of the Seal Maiden,
the Seal Guardian, as it
devours her body.

210042.魔界のからくり技師集団が\nその技術の粋を集めて作った\n最終兵器。メタルを冠す:
The ultimate weapon
created by a group of
Demon World's karakuri
engineers using the best
of their technology.
Although it bears the
name of "metal," it does
not have a high
experience value.

210122.その出自は謎に包まれているが\n異世界に君臨する魔王によって\n作られたと まこ:
Its origin is shrouded
in mystery, but it is
rumored to have been
created by the Demon
King, who reigns over
another world.

210198.考古学者が調べたところ\nゼドラゴンの作られた年代と\n先代の勇者像の作られた年:
Archaeologists have
found that the date of
the Zedragon's creation
exactly matches the date
of the earlier Hero
statue.

210275.魔人なのか竜なのか機械なのか\n魔人の中でも謎多き存在。\n自分が何者かわからな:
Whether he is a demon, a
dragon, or a machine, he
is a mysterious being
among demons. Today, he
spins wildly out of
frustration at not
knowing what he is.

210352.古代王国を守護する\n最終兵器として作り出されたが\n今はピラミッドの地下を\n:
It was created as the
ultimate weapon to
protect the ancient
kingdom, but now there
is only one roaming the
underground of Pyramid.

210426.生まれて間もない頃から\nメラを唱えてはヤケドして\nピーピーと泣きじゃくり\n:
From the time he was
just born, he would
chant Frizz and get
burned and peeve and
cry, much to his mom's
annoyance.

210499.子供ながらにフォークを\n器用に使って食事する辺り\n育ちのよさを感じさせる。\:
The fact that he uses a
fork to eat with such
dexterity shows the
goodness of his
upbringing. However, he
cannot use a chopstick
at all.

210574.スパイとして派遣されたが\nよく任務を忘れ 遊んでしまい\n監視員の あくま神官:
He was dispatched as a
spy, but often forgets
his duties and plays
around, getting his ass
beat by Wrecktor, the
game warden.

210647.じつは身体の白い部分は\nかき氷で できている。\n甘いミルクの味がするらしいが:
In fact, the white part
of his body is made of
Shaved Ice. It is said
that it tastes like
sweet Mirik, but no one
has ever eaten it except
for the person himself.

210723.突けば突くほどツキを呼ぶ\n左手のフォークは縁起物。\nビンゴに勝てるとウワサが:
The more you poke the
fork in your left hand,
the more luck you will
get. Many adventurers
want to be poked with
it, as it is rumored to
win bingo!

210802.何かひとつキッカケがあれば\n岳都ガタラのガラクタ城からは\n自分の同類が生まれ:
I am secretly hoping
that if there is any one
Yakka ke, my own kind
will be born from Junk
Castle in Mount Gatara.

210881.修行して踊りのキレは増したが\n振りがマンネリなのが不満。\n新たな踊りを編み出:
Although her dancing has
improved with training,
she is dissatisfied with
the mannerisms of her
choreography. She is
practicing every day to
create a new dance.

210960.その製造者は誰も知らない。\n一説では 天を突く程の巨人が\n赤ん坊を あやすた:
No one knows who made
it. One theory is that
it was a toy made by a
giant who could pierce
the heavens to soothe
his baby.

211047.本来しっぽは小さいのだが\n日々のお手入れによって\n毛に空気を含ませて\nフワ:
The tails are small in
nature, but it is said
that daily care makes
their fur airy and
fluffy.

211117.かつて 大海原を渡り\nウェナ諸島の猫島に乗り込んで\nある巨猫族のヒゲを引き抜:
He has a saga of how he
once crossed the ocean
to Cat Island in the
Wena Islands, pulled out
the whiskers of a
certain giant cat tribe,
and returned alive.

211195.びっくりすると しっぽの中に\n身を隠してしまう姿が\nカタツムリに似ているので:
The name Maimai was
given to the snail
because of the way it
hides itself in its tail
when it gets scared.

211271.数年に一度 大群となって\n河を渡り大移動するという。\n黄色い群れが夜の河を泳:
Once every few years,
they migrate across the
river in large flocks.
The yellow swarms
swimming in the river at
night look like a small
galaxy.

211350.なぜ魔瘴が生まれたのか？\nなぜ魔瘴が意思を持ったのか？\nその答えは 闇の根源:
Why was demon miasma
created? Why did demon
miasma have a will? The
answer lies in the
depths of the Demon
World, where the root of
darkness lurks.

211429.なげきムーンとはお互いを\nはげしく意識する間柄だが\n生活時間が合わず いまだ:
Mourning Moon and I are
very much aware of each
other, but we have never
met due to our living
time conflicts.

211502.なげきムーンに対抗心を燃やし\n夜空に浮いてアピールするも\n闇夜に紛れすぎて:
He had a rivalry with
Mourning Moon and
floated aPiru in the
night sky, but he was so
lost in the darkness
that no one noticed him.

211583.衛星のように従う子分の\n身体の色は忠誠心が高ければ\n青へと近づく。子分の忠誠:
The body color of the
henchmen who follow like
satellites approaches
blue if their loyalty is
high. Every day I sigh
at the lack of loyalty
of the henchmen.

211660.万魔の塔に無数の魔物が\n封印され 塔は完成した。\nそこは挑戦者の生へのあがき:
Countless monsters were
sealed in Banma Tower,
and the tower was
completed. It was a
facility for the
enjoyment of the
challenger's struggle
for life.

211736.大魔王になったら火を吹く竜に\n変身してヒゲも立派に伸びる！\nそう力説する赤毛:
When he becomes the
Great Demon King, he
will transform into a
fire-breathing dragon
and his beard will grow
into a magnificent
beard! I heard that
there was a childhood
friend of mine who was
taken aback by the red-
headed boy who insisted
that he would turn into
a fire-breathing dragon
and grow a great beard.

211818.しばりプレイが大好きという\n奇特なモンスター。\nあえて自分自身をしばって\n:
He is a peculiar monster
who loves to play
shibari-play. He dares
to live by shibari-
playing himself.

211891.なぜか高い所から\n飛び降りるのが大好きで\n休日には遠出して\nバンジージャン:
For some reason, he
loves to jump from high
places and enjoys going
away on holidays to do
bungee-jumps.

211953.伝説のモンスターバンド\n「ライトニング・デス」の\nボーカルを務める歌い手。\:
Singer and vocalist of
the legendary monster
band Lightning Death. Be
impressed by my voice!

212024.かつては冥王に仕えていたが\n死生観のちがいから離反。\n今はフリーランスの番人:
He used to be a servant
of the Netherlord, but
he left because of a
difference in his view
of life and death. He
now spends his days as a
freelance guardian.

212104.気になるあの子に好かれるため\n見た目をイメチェンしてみたら\n性格まで明るくな:
I changed my appearance
to make that girl I'm
interested in like me,
and even my personality
became brighter. The
power of love is
amazing!

212188.最初は ただの怨霊だったが\n踊り子に封印される度に\n怨念をつのらせ 代を経て:
At first, he was just a
simple grudge spirit,
but each time he was
sealed in the dancer,
his grudge grew, and
over the generations, he
eventually became the
king of grudge spirits.

212260.彼がガウラドを救ったのは\n気まぐれなどではない。\nゴロツキをにらむ幼い目に宿:
It was not on a whim
that he saved Gaurad. He
saved Gaurad not on a
whim, but because he
sensed the strong light
of rebellion in the
young boy's eyes as he
glared at the thugs.

212339.父さんと母さんは俺が死ねば\n俺を許してくれるだろうか？\n頭の中が黒く塗りつぶ:
Will my father and
mother forgive me if I
die? My mind is blacked
out and I can't think
about anything else.

212419.昔はかわいいお人形だったが\n持ち主に捨てられてグレた。\n周囲をいっさい信用せ:
She used to be a cute
doll, but was abandoned
by her owner. She
doesn't trust anyone
around her and scratches
everyone who touches
her.

212495.最初はトゲがなかったが\n生き残るために自分の身体に\nサボテンのトゲを植えつけ:
At first he had no
spines, but in order to
survive, he has planted
cactus spines on his own
body and uses them for
attack and defense.

212571.手までトゲトゲなので\nパッと見は不便そうだが\nじつは おハシのように\n使え:
At first glance, it
looks inconvenient
because even the hands
are spiky, but in fact,
it can be used like a
pick, making it
surprisingly convenient.

212637.持つと不幸になるとウワサされ\nきらわれた人形が だったら\n本当に不幸をバラま:
If that is the case,
then I will really
spread misfortune
around! Then I'll really
spread misfortune!

212718.海水浴に行くたびに\n見た目と色合いからウニと\nまちがわれてしまうのが\n悩み:
He says that every time
he goes swimming, he is
mistaken for a sea
urchin because of its
appearance and color.

212783.針一本が巨大なため\n刺さると１０００倍痛い。\n針千本が刺さると\n１００万倍:
Each needle is so huge
that when it sticks, it
hurts 1,000 times more.
A thousand needles
stinging hurts a million
times more.

212841.おそろしい名前がついているが\n人間を食べるわけではない。\nアタマのトゲを突き:
Despite the horrifying
name, they do not eat
humans. They stick their
spines on their heads
and suck their bodily
fluids.

212923.目が合うだけで逃げ出すほど\n気が小さい恥ずかしがり屋。\nすぐ物陰に隠れてしま:
He is so small-minded
and shy that he runs
away when his eyes meet
mine. She hides in the
shadows so easily that
it's not easy to
encounter her.

213005.とある骨董屋の店主いわく\n稀代のぬいぐるみ職人が\n魔界のプリンセスのために\:
According to the owner
of an antique shop, a
rare stuffed animal
craftsman sewed each and
every stitch for
PurineSeth of Demon
World.

213079.自慢のしっぽは じつは重くて\n構えるだけでそこそこ大変。\n気を抜いて自分のア:
The tail, of which I am
very proud, is actually
very heavy, and just
holding it in position
is quite a challenge. I
almost got my tail stuck
in my head when I got
careless.

213158.ザードの魔王はその富と権力で\nありとあらゆる快楽をむさぼり\nやがて飽きて退屈:
The Demon King of Zard
was bored with his
wealth and power, and he
was soon bored with all
the pleasures he was
indulging in. Then he
came up with the idea of
building a tower.

213243.自慢のアイアンボディだが\nメンテナンスにはひと苦労。\n表面がくもってくると砂:
A Ian's body is his
pride and joy, but
maintenance is a
challenge. When the
surface becomes dull, he
jumps into a sandstorm
to make it shine.

213322.人工知能は搭載されていないが\n胸部にある地脈の結晶に\nパドレが魔獣を取りつか:
Although it is not
equipped with artificial
intelligence, Padre has
a Geode Crystal on its
chest, which he uses to
possess and manipulate
magical beasts at will.

213399.バルディスタ軍ではその猛毒を\n武器として利用している。\n過去にはある将校が私:
The Valdista military
uses its deadly poison
as a weapon. In the
past, an officer even
stole it for his own
personal use.

213481.スライムタイプの究極形が\n満を持してのリリース決定！\nあざやかなカラーリング:
The ultimate Slime type
is now ready for
release! The vivid
coloring will make you
feel excited on the
battlefield!

213555.意思があるのかどうかも\nわからない正体不明の存在。\nその生態を探れば魔瘴の本:
An unidentified being
whose true identity we
do not even know if it
has a will or not. If we
explore its ecology, we
may be able to reveal
the true nature of demon
miasma.

213634.毎日ピカピカにみがいてるのに\nガラス玉だなんて ひどーい！\nそんな不満が 姿:
It's terrible to see a
glass ball when I polish
it to a shine every day!
Such dissatisfaction
formed a figure. A
girl's heart is fragile.

213718.しめっぽい所で暮らしてたら\n身体にキノコが生えてきた。\nちょっとビックリした:
I was living in a damp
place and mushrooms
started growing on my
body. It was a bit of a
surprise, but I no
longer had to worry
about food.

213797.じめじめバブルにも かつて\nイケイケだった時代があった。\nすっかり しなびて:
Dank Bubble Slime had
its heyday. He is all
but shriveled up, but
back then he was known
as the King.

213880.昔は おばあさんに作られた\n立派な ぬかどこだった。\n腐ってしまった今も\n:
It used to be a fine wet
cloth place made by my
grandmother. Even now
that it has rotted away,
I think of my
grandmother.

213952.ボディに生えたキノコは\nアストルティア三大珍味と\nうたわれるが 珍しいだけで:
Mushrooms growing on the
body are said to be one
of Astoltia's three
greatest delicacies, but
it is said that they are
only rare and do not
taste very good.

214025.見た目こそキラキラしていて\nゴージャスそのものだが\nクラブに通いすぎたせいで:
They look sparkling and
gorgeous themselves, but
they don't have much
money because they have
been going to too many
clubs.

214101.たったひとりで夜空を\nさまよいつづける月の\n地上に落ちた涙のしずくが\nなげ:
It is said that the
Mourning Moon is a
teardrop that fell to
the ground as the moon
wandered alone in the
night sky.

214171.強さも 生きている場所も\nまったく異なっているのに\nなぜかタコメットには\n:
For some reason, they
feel attached to
Octopot, even though
they are very different
in strength and where
they live.

214241.冒険者たちには恐れられる\nダークプラネットだが\nなぜか 一部の勝負師たちには:
The Dark Planet is
feared by adventurers,
but for some reason, it
is praised as a good
luck charm by some
gamblers.

214315.身にまとった黒雲は\n５０００年間眠り続けても\n快適な夢見を約束する\nふんわ:
The black clouds worn by
the wearer are fluffy
and soft, custom-made to
ensure comfortable
dreaming even after
5,000 years of sleep.

214383.うたい文句によると\nザ・ホールは吸引力の落ちない\nただひとつの魔物であるとか:
According to the claim,
The Hole is the only
monster that does not
lose suction. However,
it is not clear what
they are comparing it
to.

214460.デスマーキュリーを見た者は\n遠からず死ぬというウワサだが\nそもそも こんな凶:
It is rumored that those
who have seen Mortcury
will die in the near
future, but in the first
place, you will most
likely die if you
encounter such a vicious
monster.

214541.生まじめな性格がたたって\nプリーストなのかナイトなのか\n自分のアイデンティテ:
Rumor has it that he is
struggling with his
identity as a Priest or
Knight due to his
serious nature.

214618.魔法戦士と言っても\nヴェリナードの魔法戦士団とは\n一切関係がないと 王国は\:
The kingdom has issued
an official statement
saying that
armamentalist has
nothing to do with the
Armamentalist Corps in
Verinard.

214691.何事にも縁起をかつぐ性格で\n朝 クツをはく足の順番やら\nお風呂で どこから洗:
He is a man of good
luck, and is bound by
countless rules about
the order in which he
puts on his shoes in the
morning, and where he
washes in the bathtub.

214772.重要な物事を決める時\nやたらと多数決にしたがる\n困ったクセがある。そのため\:
When it comes to making
important decisions, he
has a tendency to want
to make the majority
decision. As a result,
he often makes poor
choices.

214846.大魔王の親衛隊でありながら\n仮面の男の指揮下に入っている\n今の立場に不満を感:
He is dissatisfied with
his current position as
a member of the Great
Demon King's SS but
under the command of
Masked Man, but he
suppresses his emotions
with an iron will.

214931.多くのエモノを手にかけるたび\nひるがえるマントが自然に\n赤く染まったと豪語し:
He claims that his
fluttering cloak
naturally turns red
whenever he takes on a
large number of
monsters, but he has
surprisingly little
experience in actual
combat.

215011.種族神 花の神ピナヘトが\n神話の時代に生みだした。\n作られて以来 稼働するの:
Pinaheto, the god of
flowers, gave birth to
the Mythical Age. This
was the first time it
had operated since its
creation.

215083.種族神 風の神エルドナが\n神話の時代に生みだした。\n守護者の姿は種族神たちの:
God of Races Eldona, the
god of wind, gave birth
to the Mythical Age, and
the appearance of the
protectors seems to
reflect the preferences
of the gods of races.

215159.セキバーンという魔物に一時\nライバル心を抱いていたが\n今では同じバーン同士\:
He had a rivalry with
Crablet, a monster, for
a while, but now they
have become good
friends.

215232.元はただのワニバーンだが\n奇妙なチカラで凶暴化した。\nそれはナドラガンドでは:
Originally just a
Heligator, it became
ferocious with strange
powers. It was a change
not often seen in
Nadragand.

215309.その名前に恥じないように\n牙の手入れには余念がない。\n色と形には自信があるが:
He takes great care of
his tusks to live up to
his name. He is
confident in the color
and shape of his fangs,
but is somewhat
dissatisfied with the
size of his fangs.

215384.ガートラント王ラダ・ガートを\n単身襲撃したが返り討ちにあい\nそのまま神槍で封:
He attacked the Gartlant
king Lada Gart by
himself, but was beaten
back and sealed with a
divine spear. It seems
that he was a little too
confident.

215466.あらゆる戦場に対応するため\n過度なそうびを決してしない。\n最強の肉体だけが常:
He never uses excessive
equipment to cope with
any battlefield. His
theory is that only the
strongest body will
always win.

215548.他人は見境なく手にかけるが\n兄弟仲は非常に良好。\n兄の誕生日には強奪した金で:
Although he has no
regard for others, the
brothers get along very
well with each other.
They hold a big party
for their brother's
birthday every year with
the money they have
stolen from him.

215624.彼の歌声はどんなに遠く\nはなれていても必ず届く。\nたとえ耳をふさいでいても\:
No matter how far away
you are, his voice will
always reach you. Even
if you cover your ears,
you can hear him sing
directly into your head.

215698.はるか昔 背中のうろこの間に\n鳥が落とした木の実が芽吹き\nやがて 立派な樹に:
A long time ago, a bird
dropped a nut between
the scales on its back,
and the nut sprouted and
eventually grew into a
magnificent tree. It is
truly a mystery of
nature!

215778.背中のハーブは 美容に有効。\n毎日欠かさず 食べていれば\nアンチエイジング効:
Back herbs are effective
for beauty. If eaten
without fail every day,
it has anti-aging
effects, and is targeted
by women all over the
world.

215857.背中の木が燃えてしまうので\n自分は火炎攻撃をするくせに\nされるのはガマンなら:
The tree on his back
burns down, and he is so
selfish that he can't
stand to be attacked by
fire, even though he
does it himself.

215937.雪山でスキーを楽しもうと\n小高い丘に登ったら\nスノーエルダーの背中の上\nだ:
There was an incident
when I climbed a small
hill to enjoy skiing in
snowy mountain and found
myself on the back of
Snow Elder.

216008.背中の樹木の葉が赤いのは\n紅葉しているのではなく\n熱き血潮が流れているからよ:
The leaves on the trees
on your back are red,
not because of the
autumn leaves, but
because of your hot
blood. Do you get it,
you little cripple?

216083.魔界に太古の昔から存在する\n古代輝晶獣に霊の因子を与えて\n生みだされた。ガブ:
It was created by giving
spirit factors to an
ancient Pyrobeast that
has existed in the Demon
World since time
immemorial. According to
Gabra, they appear to be
friendly.

216168.魔界に太古の昔から存在する\n古代輝晶獣に獣の因子を与えて\n生みだされた。ガブ:
It was created by giving
beast factors to an
ancient Pyrobeast that
has existed in the Demon
World since time
immemorial. According to
Gabra, he is good at
jazz music.

216251.魔界に太古の昔から存在する\n古代輝晶獣に竜の因子を与えて\n生みだされた。ガブ:
It was created by giving
beast factors to an
ancient Pyrobeast that
has existed in the Demon
World since time
immemorial. According to
Gabra, he has just
learned to do the hand.

216334.天下に悪名高きチーズ怪盗。\n家庭料理からフルコースまで\n数多くのチーズを\n:
The infamous cheese
thief. He is a
brilliantly stolen
cheese thief who has
stolen numerous cheeses
from home-cooked meals
to full-course meals.

216405.スライムっぽくもあり\nゴーストっぽくもある\n正体不明のニューフェイス。\nぼ:
A new face with an
unknown identity that is
both Slime-like and
Ghost-like, with a
secret under the hat.

216478.メラ系の呪文も 覚えているが\nうっかり 身体に引火すると\n大変なので 絶対に:
I also remember Frizz-
type spells, but I've
made up my mind never to
use them because of the
risk of accidentally
igniting my body.

216551.なぜ 黒カビのダークサイドに\n堕ちたのか……そこには\n聞くも涙 語るも涙の\:
How did he fall into the
dark side of black mold?
There is a story of
Hakko that is hard to
hear but hard to tell.

216625.自身の美味しさには自信があり\n特にオリーブオイルをからめた\nバジルとトマトと:
He is confident of his
own deliciousness,
especially with basil
and tomatoes drizzled
with Olive oil.

216699.けがれない真っ白な身体に\n新雪のように清らかな心。\n死神なんて異名は似合わな:
With a pure white body
and a heart as pure as
fresh snow, the name
"reaper" doesn't suit
him! Only he thinks so.

216776.元はただのケミカルゼリーだが\n奇妙なチカラで凶暴化した。\nそれはアストルティ:
Originally just a
Fromage Fey, it became
ferocious with a strange
power. It was a familiar
transformation in
Astoltia.

216855.キノコ三兄弟の異名は\n太古の昔に存在したという\n巨人の三兄弟にあやかって\n:
The nickname "Three
Mushroom Brothers" was
given by the eldest
brother in honor of the
three giant brothers who
existed in prehistoric
times.

216923.奥義を授けるとき以外は\n眠っているため 剣魔の里が\nすでに滅んでいることを\:
He does not yet know
that the village of the
Sword Demon has already
been destroyed because
he is asleep except when
he is giving the inner
secrets.

216990.宝箱に化けるつもりが\n何を間違えたか たんすに\n変身してしまったミミック。\:
Mimic was supposed to
turn into a treasure
chest, but somehow she
ended up transforming
into a wardrobe.

217065.もともと 人食いたんすという\nあんまりな名前だったが\nパンドラボックスに対抗:
Originally named
"Cannibal Tanks," it was
renamed to something
cool in response to
Pandora's Box.

217141.ただの たんすミミックとは\n一緒にしてほしくないと言う\nエリート意識の権化だ:
Kunai is the embodiment
of Ellie's
consciousness, but his
ability is certainly not
to be underestimated.

217218.かくれんぼでクローゼットに\n隠れた子供が姿を消した。\n後日 クローゼットの中:
A child who hid in a
kRoseyit during a hide-
and-seek game
disappeared. Later, the
bones of the child were
found inside the ku
Roseyit.

217296.一応トリックオアトリートと\n聞くけれど どちらを選んでも\n相手を丸かじりする:
I hear it's trick or
treat, but whichever one
you choose, you'll be
forced to choose between
two hellish options that
are willing to bite the
other person whole.

217375.本来は竜族の神ナドラガを\n倒すために生み出されたが\n当のナドラガが闇落ちした:
Originally created to
defeat Nadraga, the god
of the dragon tribe, it
has changed its role to
protect the ancestor god
since Nadraga fell into
darkness.

217454.ぽっこりお腹に寄りかかると\n身体にジャストフィットして\n起き上がりたくなくな:
It fits just right on
your body when you lean
on your flabby belly and
you don't want to get
up. Dracky makes people
feel like they're
ruined.

217531.戦禍の邪神にとって\n大いなる闇の根源という存在は\n親であり 主君であり\n崇:
For the evil god of war,
the source of great
darkness is a parent, a
lord, a god to be
worshipped.

217603.独特のしゃべり方をからかわれ\n怒って暴れるうち嫌われ者に。\n故郷を追われ盗賊:
He was teased for his
peculiar way of speaking
and became a hated
person as he raged in
anger. He was forced to
leave his hometown and
became a thief, but he
still carries a deep
scar on his heart.

217689.本当は ずっと夢に見ていた。\n誰かに 必要とされることを。\nただ 言ってほし:
The truth is, I've been
dreaming about it for a
long time. To be needed
by someone. I just
wanted you to say that
I'm glad you're here.

217768.手にした武器は自慢の業物だが\nそれ以上に自慢したいのが\n大きくて形のよいオシ:
The weapon in his hand
is his pride and joy,
but what he is even more
proud of is his large,
shapely penis. But I'm
embarrassed to show it
off.

217847.ヒップインパクトの強化のため\n体重の増加に余念がない。\n食って寝て鍛えてのサ:
He has been working hard
to increase his weight
to strengthen his hip
impact. He repeats the
cycle of eating,
sleeping, and working
out three times a day.

217927.千夜フウジンに隠している\nナイショの趣味がある。\nそれはおヘソを集めることで:
1000 Nights Fuujin has a
secret hobby. He
collects bellybuttons,
especially children's
bellybuttons.

218004.太古の昔 当時のゼクレス王が\n禁呪に手を染め魔人と化した。\nミアラ妃は命を代:
In ancient times, King
Zechres of that time
became a demon by
indulging in a forbidden
spell. Queen Miara made
a staff and sealed her
husband in a jewel at
the cost of her life.

218088.その虹色の羽毛の美しさは\n高温の炎であぶることで\nいっそう輝きを増すという。:
The beauty of their
rainbow-colored feathers
is said to shine even
brighter when they are
roasted over a hot
flame. He is a user of
the match-pump beauty
technique.

218165.にじくじゃくに対しては\nあこがれとジェラシーと\nちょっぴりの友情……とにかく:
He has mixed feelings
toward Prism Peacock:
longing, jealousy, and a
little bit of
friendship.

218239.ヒナの時は 愛らしい姿だが\n育つとムキムキのマッチョに\nなってしまうため 飼:
The chicks are adorable
when they are young, but
they grow up to be
muscular and macho, so
they are often abandoned
because they can't be
kept.

218320.共に封じられた魔物たちを食べ\n成長し 半身が出られた。\n封印を解こうと覇印を:
It grew up by eating the
monsters sealed together
and half of its body
came out. He ate the
high seal to break the
seal, but it did not
seem to help him.

218401.虐げられて醜くゆがんだ少女は\n魔術で理想の姿に変じた後\n美しいものをけがすこ:
A girl who had been
abused, disfigured and
warped, was transformed
by magic into an ideal
form, and then drowned
in the pleasure of
taking revenge by
defiling something
beautiful.

218481.ドラゴンキッズに聞いた\n将来なりたい竜ランキングで\n２５年連続ナンバーワン！:
He has been number one
on Small Fry's list of
dragons he wants to be
in the future for 25
consecutive years! His
great male figure is
admired by everyone.

218558.始祖たる常闇の竜は\n炎の領界で眠りについたため\n別の土地で暮らしてきた彼らは:
The ancestral dragon of
everlasting darkness has
fallen asleep in the
Fire Realm, and those
who have lived in other
lands are unaware of its
existence.

218634.いにしえの竜たちはいずれも\nチカラをほとんど失った状態で\nこの世界の深淵に眠:
The dragons of the past
are all asleep in the
depths of this world,
having lost most of
their power, and they
awaken from time to time
to bring chaos.

218717.一度 成功しかけたときに\nアタマだけ竜化してしまい\n元に戻るまで 生きた心地:
Once, when he almost
succeeded, only his head
turned into a dragon,
and he did not feel like
living until it was
restored.

218786.魔界でもかなり高位の悪魔だが\nなぜか知名度は低い。\n影が薄いことを気にして\:
He is one of the
highest-ranking demons
in the Demon World, but
for some reason he is
not well known. He dares
to call himself "Shadow"
because he is not well
known.

218862.エリート街道を歩むがゆえに\n魔界ではモテモテらしいが\n交際経験は意外と少なく:
He is a Mote Mote in the
Demon World, but he has
had surprisingly few
relationships, and in
fact, he is very naive.

218938.ザードの魔王は完成した塔に\nウデに覚えのある奴隷や罪人を\n送り込み 生き残っ:
The Demon King of Zard
is said to have sent
slaves and sinners who
were skilled in the art
of war to the completed
tower, and rewarded
those who survived with
freedom.

219019.戦禍の邪神はガズバラン神に\n封印されたが 邪神の多くは\n女神ルティアナによっ:
The evil gods of war
were sealed by the god
Gazbalan, and many of
the evil gods are
apparently sealed by the
Goddess Lutiana.

219092.幼少期のかわいい子ぐま時代に\nいじめられたトラウマから\nやられる前に やる性:
He was bullied in his
childhood when he was a
cute little bear, and
the trauma made him do
things before they are
done to him. Now, he has
become a violent person.

219173.その名前と真っ白な体毛から\n年寄りぐまと勘違いされ\n妙に親切にされた経験があ:
He is very much afraid
of the old man because
he was mistaken for an
old man because of his
name and true white body
hair and was treated
strangely kindly by him.

219249.戦禍の邪神にとっても\n竜族の神は同格の存在だった。\nただ邪神の宮殿に現れるの:
Even for the Evil God of
War, the God of the
Dragon Tribe was of
equal status. However,
appearing in the Evil
God Palace is like a
shadow of memory.

219328.飲む 遊ぶ 奪うという\n享楽的な日々を過ごした挙句の\n突然死。武士道ならぬ不:
After a life of
drinking, playing, and
robbing, he dies
suddenly. He started on
the path of immortality,
not the way of the
Samurai, but it ended in
disappointment.

219405.とある あらくれ者が\n真のあらくれを決めるために\n戦いを挑むもコテンパンにさ:
A certain hail monger
challenged to a battle
to determine the true
hail monger, but he was
beaten to a pulp and it
was all black and white.

219481.言わずと知れた大盗賊だが\n己の野望にまっすぐで\n言動に邪気がないので\nどこ:
He is a charismatic
figure of evil who is
known to be a great
chief, but is
straightforward in his
ambitions and is not
evil in his words or
actions, making him
somehow unbearable to
hate.

219552.処刑人と言っても罪人を\n罰しているわけではなく\n気に入らない相手を自分勝手な:
Even though he is an
executioner, he is not
punishing SINNER, but
just a villain who
attacks those he doesn't
like for his own selfish
reasons.

219626.外では強気にふるまっているが\n家に帰ると鬼ヨメにいびられ\n子供にはジャマにさ:
He acts tough on the
outside, but when he
goes home, he is snubbed
by his ogre wife, his
children are a nuisance,
and he feels small in
comparison.

219705.なぜ 獲物を 追い回すのか。\nその理由は じまんの\nマッスルポーズを 見せる:
Why do they chase their
prey around? The reason
may be to show the
muscle pose of Jiman.

219777.目の前のエモノに夢中になり\n背中が ガラ空きになるので\n常にペアで行動するよ:
The chieftain has
ordered them to work in
pairs at all times, as
they become so absorbed
in the things in front
of them that their backs
become empty.

219856.ザードの魔王は己の死を前に\n万魔の塔にある特殊な仕掛けを\n施したとウワサされ:
It is rumored that
Zard's Demon King had a
special device installed
in Banma Tower before
his own death. It is
said to be a life-
threatening secret.

219939.悠久の封印の中 戦禍の邪神は\n助力を求める者にチカラを\n貸し与えつつ 憎悪を:
Under the eternal seal,
the evil god of war has
been lending his power
to those who seek his
help, while instilling
hatred in them and
making them his running
dogs.

220016.女性も ミイラ男と名乗るのを\n強制されるのは おかしい！\nミイラ界ではミイラ:
It is strange that women
are also forced to call
themselves Mummy Boy! In
the mummy world, there
is a movement by mummy
women to change their
names.

220094.マミーのまとう包帯は\n古代王国期に作られたもの。\n通気性 伸縮性ともにバツグ:
The bandages worn by
Mummy were made in the
ancient kingdom period.
It is a product of
forgotten technology
with excellent
breathability and
elasticity.

220169.よお マミー。可愛い名だな。\n名前をからかってきた連中に\n鉄拳をお見舞いし:
Hey, Mummy, that's a
pretty name. I gave a
good beating to those
who teased me about my
name, and before long, I
was stained with their
blood.

220247.武士道とは死ぬことと\n見つけたりと言うが こいつは\n不死道とは死なぬことと\:
They say that bushido
means finding the way to
die, but this guy is
swearing that he has
found the way to
immortality is not to
die.

220322.暗黒大樹 けがれの谷など\nアストルティア各地にある\n呪われた土地は いずれも:
Cursed lands throughout
Astoltia, such as the
Dark Tree Defiled
Valley, are all said to
be related to evil gods.

220396.４体のヘルゲゴーグの孵化に\n必要となる莫大なエネルギーは\n竜神の心臓により賄:
The enormous energy
required to hatch the
four Helgegog was
financed by the Dragon
God Heart. Together with
the demon miasma that
resides there.

220478.時元神に進化したキュロノスは\n肉体の制約に縛られることなく\n時渡りのチカラを:
Kyuronos, having evolved
into a Tokigenjin, is no
longer bound by the
limitations of his
physical body, but has
become a being equal to
a god who can freely use
the power of time
travel.

220563.豪快な性格のチカラ持ち。\n意外と面倒見がよくて\n新米の呪符魔物からは\n頼れ:
He is a powerful person
with a dynamic
personality. He is
surprisingly caring and
is looked up to as a
dependable senior by the
newbie spellbook
monster.

220633.本来 闇の領界にのみ発生する\nサルファバル鉱を肉体に宿す\nこの魔獣は 闇の領:
It is assumed that this
magical beast, whose
body contains Sulphubal
Ore, which originally
occurs only in the Dark
Realm, appeared here
from the Dark Realm.

220713.戦禍の邪神の発する\n悪しき想念が増大するにつれ\n眷属もまた多様な姿で\n顕現:
As the evil thoughts
emitted by the evil gods
of war increased, their
dependents also began to
manifest in a variety of
forms.

220784.戦禍の眷属の見た目は挑戦者の\n怒りや憎しみ 悲しみや恐れの\n記憶に深く結びつ:
The appearance of the
war-torn spies is deeply
tied to the challenger's
memories of anger,
hatred, sorrow, and
fear, and they change
their appearance from
moment to moment.

220866.恐ろしげな外見に似合わない\nいたずら好きのお調子者。\nその性格から よく面倒:
He is a mischievous and
good-natured person who
does not match his
frightening appearance.
He is a troublemaker who
often causes trouble
because of his
personality.

220945.本体は かなり大柄だが\n使用者の体格に合わせて\n自在にサイズを変更できる\n:
The main body is quite
large, but it is
equipped with a Horse
Mackerel cast function
that can be freely
resized to fit the
user's physique.

221017.時獄とは時と時の狭間にある\nこの世界から切り離された\n不思議な空間のことらし:
It is said that the time
prison is a mysterious
space between time and
time, cut off from this
world. What is there?

221097.なぜ時渡りのチカラによって\n人が怪物化するのか？ そこに\nこの謎の能力の正体:
Why does the power of
time travel turn people
into monsters? There may
be a clue there to
unravel the true nature
of this mysterious
ability.

221179.すこぶるプライドが高くて\n他の呪符魔物にも なじまず\n常に孤高をつらぬいてい:
He was very proud and
did not fit in with the
other spellbook
monsters, always
maintaining his
isolation. He was never
lonely!

221257.かつて ある偉大な召喚術師に\n召喚され 仕えていたという。\n彼の剣は主に捧げ:
He was once summoned by
and served a great
summoner. His sword was
dedicated to the Lord,
and he avenged all of
the Lord's enemies.

221340.長く鋭いツメが自慢のようで\n思う存分ツメを振るった後は\nやすりをかけて 油を:
They are proud of their
long, sharp claws, and
after swinging them to
their heart's content,
they must be well cared
for by sanding and
oiling them.

221421.７枚の呪符と我が身を頼りに\nアストルティアの六種族から\n神の器たる者を 集め:
He gathered the vessels
of the gods from the six
races of Astoltia,
relying on the seven
spellbooks and his own
body. He is a tough
dragon warrior, both
physically and mentally.

221503.弟アンテロを異世界へ\n送ることは苦渋の決断だった。\n帰らなかった弟を思うたび:
Sending his brother
Antelo to another world
was an agonizing
decision. Every time he
thought of his brother
who did not return, his
regret and determination
grew stronger.

221580.想像を絶する苦しみに耐え\n途方もない修練を積み上げた\n竜族だけが竜に変ずると:
It is said that only
those dragons who have
endured unimaginable
suffering and gone
through tremendous
training can turn into
dragons. This is the
reason for his immense
confidence.

221660.自慢の双剣でスライムの\nヒゲの形を整えるのが日課。\n失敗すると ヒゲが伸びる:
His daily routine is to
shape Slime's mustache
with his signature twin
swords. If he fails, he
can't even go out until
his beard grows back.

221736.プチドンと呼ばれることに\n違和感を禁じえないでいる。\nわしゃあ 少な目に盛ら:
I can't help but feel
uncomfortable about
being called petit dong.
I think it is a bowl of
rice served with a small
portion.

221803.母なるルティアナの消失が\n竜神の……そして竜族の悲劇の\n始まりだった。創世の:
The disappearance of
Mother Lutiana was the
beginning of the tragedy
of the dragon goddess
and the dragon tribe.
Why did the goddess of
creation disappear?

221885.かつて空の神と呼ばれた彼が\n今 虚空の神を名乗るのは\n母とも兄弟とも道をたが:
He was once called the
god of the sky, but the
fact that he now calls
himself the god of the
void may be a
manifestation of his
lonely heart that has
strayed from the path of
both his mother and his
brothers.

221964.ナドラガ神の復活をとげるため\n気の遠くなるような長い年月\n竜の民にまじり生き:
He has been living among
the dragon people for a
long time, and has been
working for the revival
of Nadraga for a long
time. Many call him
their parent.

222046.ナドラガは六種族神と戦うため\n魔瘴のチカラを取り込んだが\nそこには大いなる闇:
Nadraga took in the
power of demon miasma to
fight the six races
deities, but there was a
trap set by the source
of the great darkness.

222128.はじめて竜化したときは\nもっとゴツい姿だったのだが\n血のにじむような修行を重:
When he first
transformed into a
dragon, he had a much
more stout appearance,
but through bloody
training, he has
succeeded in shaping up.

222205.本物の時見の箱は\nエテーネルキューブと同様\n時渡りを制御するチカラで\nパド:
The real Timeseer Box,
like the Ethenel Cube,
helped Padre cross time
with its power to
control time travel.

222276.じつは妖術で弱ったのではなく\nメンテナンスハッチに隠された\n強さ調整ツマミを:
There are rumors that he
was not weakened by
sorcery, but simply set
the strength adjustment
knob hidden in the
maintenance hatch to its
weakest setting.

222356.メルサンディ村は他にも\n巨大な顔や巨大な足の化け物の\n襲撃にあっているらしい:
Melsandy Village seems
to be under attack by
other monsters with
giant faces and giant
feet. What is the
purpose of these
monsters?

222435.握った物を小さくできるが\nザンクローネを小さくしたのは\n自分じゃないです！:
I can make my grip
smaller, but I didn't
make Zankrone smaller!
and falsely accused.

222505.右手よりも握力が弱いことが\nちょっぴりコンプレックス。\n夜中に こっそり\n:
Rex, who has a slightly
weaker grip than his
right hand, secretly
uses a hand gripper in
the middle of the night.

222577.全身にまとった紫の炎を\n自在にあやつることができる。\n炎を凝縮させて爆弾とし:
He is able to freely
manipulate the purple
flames that cover his
entire body. He can
condense the flames and
disperse them as bombs
in no time at all.

222654.自分たちほどの守護者が\nなにゆえ日記帳ごときを\n守らねばならないのかと\n密:
They are secretly
frustrated that a
Protectionist such as
themselves should have
to keep a diary.

222724.自分たちほどの守護者が\n守っている日記帳には\n何が書かれているのかと\n密か:
They are secretly
interested in what is
written in the diary
kept by Protections as
good as themselves.

222792.絶望の中に落ちてゆく\nアンルシアが思い描いたのは\n皮肉にも 心に重くのしかか:
As Anlucia fell into
despair, she envisioned,
ironically, the colossus
of Hero weighing heavily
on her mind.

222865.勇者でないものの 彼に流れる\nグランゼドーラ王家の血が\n勇者のレプリカを作る:
Although not a Hero, the
blood of the Gran Zedora
royal family that flows
through him provided the
perfect material for the
creation of a Hero
replica.

222943.戦禍の邪神は４本のウデを持ち\nそれぞれのウデは戦がもたらす\n死と破壊 憎悪と:
The evil god of war has
four udes, each of which
presides over one of the
four plagues of war:
death, destruction,
hatred, and madness.

223022.管理コンピューター・ペコリア\nその機能は多岐にわたり\n侵入者排除や反乱鎮圧の:
Pekoria, the management
computer, has a wide
range of functions and
is equipped with combat
capabilities for
eliminating intruders
and suppressing
rebellions.

223102.偽りの世界にあった創生の渦は\nマデサゴーラが偶然手に入れた\n霊核のカケラが変:
The Creatorium that
existed in the false
world was an accidental
transformation of a
fragment of the
spiritual nucleus
received by Madesagora.
The world was created
from it.

223188.戦禍の邪神は魔族の王よりも\n大いなる闇の根源に近い存在。\nその魔力は比較にな:
The evil god of war is
closer to the source of
great darkness than the
king of demons. His
magical power is said to
be immense beyond
compare.

223271.管理コンピューター・ペコリア\n全個体はひとつの意識を共有し\n宇宙船アルウェー:
The management computer,
Pekoria, shares a single
consciousness and
handles everything from
navigation to daily
operations of the
Spacecraft Alweyn.

223357.たとえ生まれが偽りの身でも\n最後に生き残った者こそが\n真の存在であるべきだ。:
The last survivor, even
if born false, must be
the true one. I am the
true Hero!

223431.ダイム老を安心させるべく\nアンルシア姫の近衛兵になると\n決めたテグラム。その:
Tegram decides to become
Princess Anlucia's
Kingsguard to reassure
Old Man Dyme, only to be
betrayed by the princess
herself.

223513.戦禍の邪神のほかにも\n闇の根源に近いもの……\n邪神と呼ばれる存在は複数いて\:
In addition to the evil
god of war, there are
several other beings
that are close to the
root of the darkness and
are called evil gods,
and they are said to be
sleeping somewhere.

223587.謎の幻灯機に宿り 幻影を\n見せていた。王立アルケミアに\nくわしい者はレイミリ:
It dwells in a
mysterious magic lantern
and shows illusions.
Those familiar with
Royal Alchemia may
recognize the name
Raymilia.

223669.自身の体色である赤こそが\n至高の色だと妄信しており\nその美意識のおもむくまま:
He was convinced that
red, the color of his
own body, was the
supreme color, and he
repeatedly committed
bloodshed as his sense
of beauty dictated.

223743.まもの使いベルムドは\nかつて従えていた魔物たちの\n外見を混ぜ合わせ 彼自身の:
The monster master
Bermud mixes the
appearance of the
monsters he used to
follow and chooses his
own monster form.

223818.ベルムドの魔物化の能力は\n魔元帥ゼルドラドの命により\n魔道士キルギルの手によ:
Bermud's ability to
monsterize was granted
by Wizard Kirgyl at the
behest of Marshal
Zeldrad.

223894.ベルムドの心に宿った\n人間への憎悪が寄り集まって\n生まれた悲しき存在。\n狂:
A sad being born from
the hatred for humans
that resides in Bermud's
heart. He is rabid and
without a shred of
reason.

223965.子供の頃から 神童と呼ばれ\n才能に 自信を持っていた。\nその自信に キズをつ:
Ever since he was a
child, he had been
called a prodigy and had
confidence in his
talent. It was his most
important friend who
damaged his confidence.

224041.かつて さる王国の宝物である\n貴重なハープを盗みだし\n欲望のままかき鳴らした:
He once stole a precious
harp, a treasure of the
Saru Kingdom, and played
it to his heart's
content.

224119.時の果ての世界で ただひとり\nキミが夢見た未来を 歌えば\n奇跡だって 信じら:
In the world at the end
of time, if you sing the
song about the future
that only you dreamed
of, you can believe in
miracles.

224199.生き別れの妹がいるとの\nウワサがあるが真偽は不明。\nすれちがいだけが人生だ！:
There are rumors that
she has a sister who is
no longer alive, but
True or False is
unknown. Life is just a
series of crossings," he
says smugly! he lies
smugly.

224273.大魔王との出会いは 魔界にて\nその作品を目にした時だった。\n大魔王が語る創世:
He first met the Great
Demon King when he saw
his work at Demon World,
and was deeply moved by
the Great Demon King's
words about the Great
Desire of Creation.

224354.戦禍の眷属たちにより今も\n封印は むしばまれている。\n戦禍の邪神が復活する日:
The seal is still being
undermined by the war-
devourer's household
members. The day when
the evil god of war
revives may be so
distant Kunai.

224432.地底に眠る魔瘴エネルギーを\n吸収し 無限に増殖させて\n終焉の繭へと捧げること:
The mission of this
magical beast is to
absorb the demon
miasmaenergy lying in
the depths of the earth,
multiply it endlessly,
and dedicate it to the
cocoon of the end.

224508.領界の生みだす炎のチカラが\n体内にうずまいている。\n試練に挑む者が現れたとき:
The power of fire
produced by the realm is
stored in the body. When
someone challenges the
trial, he releases it
all at once.

224584.領界の生みだす氷のチカラを\n体内にためこんでいる。\n試練に挑む者が現れたとき:
The power of ice
produced by the realm is
stored in the body. When
someone challenges the
trial, he releases it
all at once.

224660.領界の生みだす闇のチカラを\n体内にためこんでいる。\n試練に挑む者が現れたとき:
The power of dark
produced by the realm is
stored in the body. When
someone challenges the
trial, he releases it
all at once.

224736.領界の生みだす水のチカラを\n体内にためこんでいる。\n試練に挑む者が現れたとき:
The power of water
produced by the realm is
stored in the body. When
someone challenges the
trial, he releases it
all at once.

224812.気性を荒く 見せているが\n本当は 竜笛の音を聴きたくて\nたまらないのを隠して:
He has a rough
temperament, but he
hides the fact that he
is dying to hear the
sound of Dragon's Flute.
Despite appearances, she
is a cautious person.

224892.竜笛の音を 久しぶりに聴いて\n思わず 寄ってきたら\n戦いに駆り出されてしまっ:
I hadn't heard Dragon's
Flute in a while, and
when I dropped by, I was
sent into battle. He is
an easy-going, easy-
going character.

224969.３匹の飛竜の中では一番若く\n初めて竜笛の音を聴いたが\n案外 悪くないと思って:
He is the youngest of
the three flying
dragons, and when he
first heard the sound of
Dragon's Flute, he
thought it was
surprisingly bad Kunai.
He has a calm and
balanced personality.

225049.漆黒の姿とは うらはらの\nおだやかな性格だったが\nフードの男の術に あやつら:
Despite his jet-black
appearance, he had a
gentle disposition, but
he was so manipulated by
the Hooded Man's arts
that he forgot
everything else about
fighting.

225125.領界の生みだす嵐のチカラを\n体内にためこんでいる。\n試練に挑む者が現れたとき:
The power of storm
produced by the realm is
stored in the body. When
someone challenges the
trial, he releases it
all at once.

225201.炎の神ガズバランの加護を失い\n邪念に囚われ 暴走した\n守護者を 解き放ったの:
It was the Liberator who
unleashed the Protection
who had lost the
blessing of Gazbalan,
the god of fire, and had
run amok, trapped by
evil thoughts.

225276.花の神ピナヘトの加護を失い\n邪念に囚われ 暴走した\n守護者を 解き放ったのは:
It was the liberator who
unleashed the
protectionist who had
lost the blessing of
Pinaheto, the god of
flowers, and was trapped
by evil thoughts.

225350.じつは 悪鬼ゾンガロンの\nいとこの孫に当たるが\nゾンガロンもガルレイ自身も\:
He is actually the
grandson of a cousin of
Demon Zongalon, but
neither Zongalon nor
Gullray himself know of
any such connection.

225423.かつて ある偉大な召喚術師に\n召喚され 仕えていたという。\n乱暴者だが主に対:
He was once summoned by
a great summoner and
served him. He is a
violent man, but he is
surprisingly loyal to
his master.

225501.不死身の存在と言われているが\nそもそもこいつは機械戦士。\nじつは量産型で 毎:
It is said to be an
immortal being, but in
fact it is a machine
warrior, and there are
rumors that it is
actually a mass-produced
model, with a new
machine fighting each
battle.

225585.一見すると ちがいはないが\n通常のキラーマジンガと比べ\n最大出力 耐久性 加:
At first glance, there
is no difference, but
the maximum power
output, durability,
acceleration
performance, and fuel
consumption are all
higher than those of a
normal Uberkilling
Machine.

225663.人類せん滅のため魔界科学の\n超技術を詰め込み設計された。\n暴走を許せば世界を:
It was designed with the
super technology of
Demon World science in
order to exterminate the
human race. It is said
to be capable of
destroying the world
three times if allowed
to run amok.

225744.感情なき冷徹さをもって\n敵を駆逐する機動兵器。\nその究極の形が今ここに！\n:
A mobile weapon that
destroys the enemy with
emotionless coldness.
The ultimate form is now
here! Destroy &
Heartless.

225815.土の神ワギの加護を失い\n邪念に囚われ 暴走した\n守護者を 解き放ったのは\n:
It was the liberator who
unleashed the
protectionist who lost
the blessing of Wagi,
the god of the earth,
and ran amok, trapped by
evil thoughts.

225886.水の神マリーヌの加護を失い\n邪念に囚われ 暴走した\n守護者を 解き放ったのは:
It was the one called
liberator who unleashed
the protectionist who
lost the blessing of
Marine, the god of
water, and ran amok with
evil thoughts.

225960.風の神エルドナの加護を失い\n邪念に囚われ 暴走した\n守護者を 解き放ったのは:
It was the liberator who
unleashed the
protectionist who had
lost the blessing of
Eldona, the god of the
winds, and was trapped
by evil thoughts and ran
amok.

226034.昔はザンクローネのため\nよくパンを焼いていたらしい。\nだけど作るパンすべてが:
He used to bake bread
for Zankrone. But
somehow everything he
made turned out to be
very spicy.

226110.童話作家パンパニーニの考えた\n最強の魔女の魂が顕現した。\nボツネタとして封印:
The soul of the most
powerful witch of the
fairy tale writer Bread
Panini's idea is
manifested. The madness
sealed as a rejected
story leads everything
to a bad end.

226195.元は直立姿勢が常態だったが\n主の命令を聞き逃さないように\nその都度アタマを下:
Originally, he used to
stand in an upright
posture, but when he
lowered his head each
time so as not to miss
the Lord's commands, he
became accustomed to
being on all fours.

226278.普段はやさしい海の守護者だが\nカシャルが怒りし時 その身は\nあまたの群れとな:
He is usually a gentle
protector of the sea,
but legend has it that
when Kashal is angered,
his body will swarm and
destroy his enemies.

226357.ナダイアが彼に与えた命令は\n解放の間にいる すべての者を\n抹殺せよ！というも:
Nadaia gave him an order
to eliminate everyone in
the Restoratory!
Unfortunately, he was
unable to fulfill it.

226441.かつて偉大な勇者を\n葬ったという逸話を持つ。\n魔王のペットだったという\nお:
This horrifying multi-
headed evil dragon was
once the pet of the
Demon King, and is said
to have once buried a
great hero.

226509.その昔は とある東方の国で\nいけにえを食らっていた。\n今はその罰で 千年の苦:
Once upon a time, he was
sacrificed in a certain
eastern country. Now, as
punishment, they are
condemned to a thousand
years of hard labor.

226583.歌えば ひとり合唱団と呼ばれ\n５頭の息の合ったハーモニーで\n魔界に一大アカペ:
When they sing, they are
called a one-man choir,
and the harmony of the
five of them has even
created a huge a
cappella boom in Demon
World.

226665.各アタマはそれぞれ自己主張が\nはげしく 議論が過熱すること\nしばしばだが 結:
Each group is assertive
and often heated in
debate, but in the end,
the majority decides.

226748.紅蓮の肌は岩をも溶かす温度。\n溶かした岩に肩まで浸かり\n戦いの疲れをいやす:
Red lotus skin has a
temperature that melts
even rocks. Every night,
we look forward to the
Demon World-style
bedrock bath where we
can soak in the molten
rock up to our shoulders
and relieve the fatigue
of battle.

226826.魔王軍の親衛隊として\n要人のボディガードを\nまかされることが多いが\nだいた:
As an SS member of the
Demon King's army, he is
often entrusted with
bodyguarding important
people, but the
important people are
usually stronger than he
is.

226894.立ちはだかる敵を焼き尽くす\n地獄の闘士として 戦う一方で\n主君の世話を焼き尽:
He fights as a hell
fighter who burns down
the enemies that stand
in his way, but also
serves as a hell steward
who takes care of his
lord.

226973.カイザーと呼ばれているが\n国も家臣も持った例はない。\n立派なヒゲのせいでつい:
They call him Kaiser,
but he has never had a
country or a vassal. I
can't say now that it's
a nickname I got because
of my magnificent
mustache!

227052.ゾンガロンの圧倒的な意思に\n支配されている状態だが\n先王ゾルトグリンの魂は今:
The soul of Former King
Zoltgrin continues to
resist Zongalon, even
though he is still under
Zongalon's overwhelming
will.

227131.伝えられた戦の舞によって\n悪鬼ゾンガロンに宿る\nゾルトグリンの心が目覚め\n:
The dance of war that
was passed down awakened
the spirit of Zoltgrin
that resides in Demon
Zongalon and sealed off
the technique that made
man a beast.

227206.休日は深海の底で水圧に\n耐えながら素振りをしている。\nそのストイックな姿勢は:
On his days off, he
spends his time at the
bottom of the deep sea,
swinging his arms under
water pressure. His
stoic attitude is
respected by all Water-
type monsters.

227283.海底の玉座を温めるばかりで\n意外とヒマを持てあましてる。\n最近は重いヤリを振:
He has a surprising
amount of free time on
his hands as he is
always warming up the
throne at the bottom of
the sea. Recently, he
has been wielding a
heavy spear, and is busy
with muscle training.

227363.海底の玉座を温めるばかりで\n意外とヒマを持てあましてる。\n最近は副業にヤリの:
He is just warming up
the throne at the bottom
of the ocean and has a
surprising amount of
free time on his hands.
He has been writing
spear recipes on the
side these days.

227443.ひとつの悪夢を 打ち破っても\n滅びを求める呼び声 ある限り\nダークドレアムは:
Even if one nightmare is
vanquished, as long as
there is a call for its
destruction, Nokturnus
will be resurrected and
will exist forever.

227523.自分が強者と認めた者としか\n戦わないのがポリシー。\nだが なかなか そんな奴:
His policy is to fight
only those whom he
recognizes as strong.
However, such a person
is hard to come by, so
he is itching for one
all year round.

227598.戦禍の邪神は神代の昔に\nアストルティアに襲来した。\nこれと戦ったのがオーガの:
The evil god of war
attacked Astoltia in
ancient times. It is
said that it was the
Ogre god Gazbalan who
fought against it.

227675.玄孫グラコス５世のことは\n一応頼りにしつつも\n若いモンには負けないと\nつい:
While relying on his
grandson, Gracos V, he
is determined not to be
outdone by the younger
generation.

227743.ご先祖グラコスのことは\n一応尊敬しているが\n戦えば自分の方が上だと\n自負す:
He has a certain respect
for his ancestor Gracos,
but he is a proud man
who takes pride that he
is better than him when
he fights.

227813.とある邪神を崇める者たちが\n暮らしていた都市の建物に\n邪教の信者たちの魂が宿:
It seems that the souls
of the followers of an
evil god began to move
in the buildings of a
city where the
worshippers of a certain
evil god lived.

227886.深海にすむ魔物たちの間でも\nゴロツキとして名高い。\n自慢のリーゼントヒレは\:
He is well-known among
deep-sea monsters as a
rogue. He is proud of
his Lyse fins, which he
has dyed the color of
sea urchins, his
favorite food.

227962.戦うに値すると認める強者は\nただでさえ少ないのに\n不可抗力で強くなってしまい:
Even though there are
only a few strong people
who admit they are worth
fighting for, they
become stronger by force
majeure, resulting in
even more frustration.

228038.絵画は心のたかぶりさえも\n表現することができるのだ。\nその荒々しさは まさに:
Paintings are capable of
expressing even the most
heated of hearts. The
wildness of the
paintings is truly a
beast.

228111.絵画は平面上に再現された\n立体構造物であると言える。\n物体は しょせんは円筒:
A painting is a three-
dimensional structure
reproduced on a plane.
The object is a round
tube, a cone, and a
ball.

228192.空想や夢想は現実ではないが\n現実を超える可能性を秘める。\nこれらが世界を浸食:
Fancy and dreaming are
not reality, but they
hold the potential to
transcend reality. When
they erode the world, a
new reality is born.

228271.創生の霊核を手に入れたら\n大魔王はアストルティア全土を\n偽りの世界で塗りつぶ:
The Great Demon King,
having received the
spiritual nucleus of
creation, was going to
fill the whole of
Astoltia with a false
world and become the god
of creation.

228350.はるか遠き伝説の時代\n海底宝物庫の番人として\n幾多の挑戦者を返り討ちにし\n:
In a far-off legendary
era, as the guardian of
the undersea treasury,
he had defeated numerous
challengers,
traumatizing them.

228423.メギドロイドの後継機として\n造られたが予想を超えた性能に\n製作者が恐れを抱い:
It was built as a
successor to the
Mechidroid, but was
never mass-produced due
to the fear of its
creators over its
unexpected performance.

228503.伝説の機械戦士に似すぎではと\nクレームが出たこともあるが\n開発者いわく パク:
The developer claims
that it is a homage, not
a copycat, although
there have been
complaints that it is
too similar to the
legendary machine
"Warrior.

228587.極光の魔鉱石に 魔瘴が\n宿ることで生まれた魔物。\nかつて極光都市アヴィーロは:
Aurora Orealis is a
monster born from the
demon miasma that
resides in Aurora
Orealis.

228662.歴史上はじめてミイラになった\nファラオだと言われている。\n技術が不完全で ち:
He is said to be the
first mummified pharaoh
in history. It is a
secret that his
technology is imperfect
and a little bit rotten.

228740.生前はファラオでありながら\n最高の象使いであった。\n戦の時は相棒の象にまたが:
In his lifetime, he was
the best elephant
messenger in spite of
being a pharaoh. In
times of war, he would
ride on his elephant and
taunt the enemy army.

228816.古代王朝末期 幼き兄弟が\nファラオとして君臨していた。\nふたりは大人に負けぬ:
At the end of the
ancient dynasty, young
brothers reigned as
pharaohs. They are said
to have ruled the
country as wisely and
honorably as the adults.

228895.古代王朝末期 幼き兄弟が\nファラオとして君臨していた。\nふたりは その短い生:
At the end of the
Ancient Dynasty, the
young brothers reigned
as pharaohs. They never
fell out during their
short lives.

228972.生前は建築技術の研究に\n心血を注いだファラオだった。\nピラミッドを作る技術は:
During his lifetime, he
was a pharaoh who
devoted himself to the
study of building
techniques, and the art
of building Pyramid made
great strides during his
time.

229049.ファラオの中では最も厳格で\n学問を重んじたという。\n学校を作り 自ら子供たち:
He was the most rigorous
of the pharaohs and
respected learning. He
established schools and
taught his own children.

229122.身体の弱いファラオで\n機械の身体を欲したという。\n他国から取り寄せたカラクリ:
He was a frail pharaoh
and wanted a mechanical
body. The karakuri
imported from other
countries were from the
Gateria empire.

229196.古代王朝の礎を築いた\n建国の祖であるファラオ。\n彼の息子はファラオの中の\n:
Pharaoh was the founding
father who laid the
foundation of the
ancient dynasties. His
son was called the
pharaoh among pharaohs.

229269.霊廟の奥でヒマな時は\nよく左手とジャンケンして\n時間をつぶす。その勝敗は\n:
When I am not busy at
the back of TOMB, I
often pass the time by
playing Jan-ken with my
left hand. The left hand
is slightly in the lead.

229343.右手とのジャンケンにも飽きて\nゆびずもうをやろうとしたが\nよく考えたら左右の:
I got tired of playing
Jan-ken with my right
hand and tried to play
Yubizumo, but after
thinking about it, I
realized that I couldn't
play with my left and
right hands.

229422.ふたつの手はそれぞれに\n自律した意思を持っているが\n墓泥棒を倒すという目的で:
The two hands, each with
autonomous will, act in
unison with the goal of
defeating the TOMB
thief.

229498.アンルシアが読んでいた絵本は\n彼をモデルにしているが\n盟友に関しては書き換え:
The picture book Anlucia
was reading is modeled
after him, but the ally
has been rewritten and
has a happy ending.

229578.猛将として名高いニビス王だが\nじつは かなりの恐妻家。\n双竜打ちの おしおき:
King Nibis is a famously
ferocious general, but
he is in fact a married
man, and he is
desperately trying to
win the war for fear of
being spanked by the
Twin Dragon Lash.

229659.ミイラ作りの始祖として名高く\n彼女の作った幾千ものミイラは\n夫ニビス率いる軍:
He is famous as the
founder of mummy making,
and the thousands of
mummies he created
threatened neighboring
countries as the
mainstay of the army led
by his husband Nibis.

229744.古代王朝が最も栄えた時代に\n君臨した 偉大なるファラオ。\nそれゆえに孤独で:
A great pharaoh who
reigned during the most
prosperous era of the
ancient dynasties.
Therefore, he was lonely
and had no trusted
friends in his life.

229825.かつて 秘宝の守護者は\n黄金の秘宝を守るために\n宝箱に呪いをかけた。今も\n:
In the past, the
treasure protector
placed a curse on the
treasure chest to
protect the golden
treasure. Even now, the
curse still poisons the
thief.

229898.誰もが あこがれる\n金色ボディのかがやきは\nかつて 魔界の演芸大会で\n金賞:
The golden glow of the
body that everyone longs
for is the proof that it
once won a gold prize at
the Demon World
performance contest.

229960.彼女は父の仇に挑戦した。\nそれは恨みからではなく\n自分自身を試すため。そして:
HER challenged her
