father's revenge. It was
not out of resentment,
but to test herself. And
to settle everything.

230036.人に害を成すとされる場所を\n封印するために身体を張ったが\n心ない者に引きちぎ:
He put his body on the
line to seal a place
that was supposed to be
harmful to people, but
was torn apart by the
heartless. His heart
trembles with anger.

230118.要はごまの塊なので\n歩くとパラパラと落ち\nコイツの歩く後には香ばしい\nセサ:
In short, it is a lump
of sesame, and when you
walk on it, it flutters
down and makes a
fragrant sesame road
after you walk on it.

230189.名前負けしていると言われ\n悔しい思いをすることが多い。\nいつか名前通りの凶悪:
He is often frustrated
by being told that he is
not as good as his name.
He is training every day
to one day become a
vicious boss as his name
implies.

230274.オシャレな名が並のナスとは\nひと味違うと自負しているが\nそれもナスの別名であ:
He is proud that his
fashionable name is
different from other
eggplants, but he
doesn't seem to know
that it is also another
name for eggplant.

230348.どんなちっぽけな悪事も\n見逃さない眼力の持ち主。\n他人の家のタンスを漁った罪:
He has an eye that will
not overlook even the
smallest misdeed. He can
even spot the crime of
going through someone
else's wardrobe!

230425.カルサドラ火山の三闘士像は\n設計者が もっと大きく！\n強そうに！ と暴走した:
Calsadora Volcano's
Triad statue was
designed by the designer
to be bigger! It is said
that the designers went
out of their way to make
it bigger and stronger!
The design of the Triad
at Calsadora Volcano is
the result of the
designer's "Make it
bigger and stronger!

230503.理性を失ったことで世界一と\nうたわれた剣技はさらに\n鋭さを増し 対峙するだけ:
His swordsmanship, which
was said to be the best
in the world due to his
loss of reason, has
become even sharper, and
he radiates a spine-
chilling fighting spirit
just by confronting him.

230576.悪神となったハクオウの\nチカラで 本物の災厄の王より\nさらに邪悪で強大な存在:
With the power of Hakuo,
who became a fiend, he
and Magatsukaze were
revived as an even more
evil and powerful entity
than the real King of
Calamity.

230654.お宝を期待して 頑丈な鉄箱を\n奪ったが開けられなかった。\n中身が歴史書だと知:
I took the Sturdy Iron
Box expecting to find a
treasure, but was unable
to open it. He must have
been disappointed when
he found out that it
contained a history
book.

230732.政略結婚の相手は聡明で\n情熱的な男だった。彼を信じ\n愛そうとした女は絶望の底:
The political marriage
was to a brilliant and
passionate man. The
woman who believed in
him and tried to love
him ended her life in
the depths of despair.

230811.英雄ではないヘルヴェルは\n呪炎を取り込んでも悪神と\nなる素質を持たないため\:
Helvel, who is not a
hero, does not have the
qualities to become a
fiend even after taking
in the cursed flame, and
thus has become a
deformed monster.

230884.次元の穴の向こうに隠れた\n巨竜の全長は天星郷全体を\n３周しても余るほどだとい:
The total length of the
giant dragon hidden
behind the dimensional
hole is said to be more
than three times the
length of the entire
Heaven, but no one has
confirmed this in
person.

230964.無骨な連中にはもう飽きた！\nならば彼女はいかがですか？\n戦場に華を咲かせまし:
I'm tired of the rugged
guys! Then how about
HER? Let's make the
battlefield bloom. Of
course, it's strong and
well-known!

231044.源世庫パニガルムは古き世界の\n様々な記憶さえも保存しており\nエルギオスの起こ:
Origin Vault Panigalm
even preserves various
memories of the old
world, and the events
that occurred at Elgios
are particularly rich in
memory.

231129.見かけによらず寂しがり屋で\nすぐに仲間を呼びがち。\n実力は申し分ないのだが\:
He is a lonely person
and tends to call for
companionship easily. He
is a very confident
person, but he is not
confident in himself.

231205.神話以前……とこしえの時代\nアルマナは天の国に住まう\n一羽の野鳥でしかなかっ:
In pre-mythic and pre-
historic times, almanacs
were nothing more than a
single wild bird living
in the land of heaven.
The passage of time
changes everything.

231285.ドラキーっぽくも見えるのは\n元の果実にかみついた\n太古のドラキーの情報因子が:
It also looks Dracky-
like because the
information factor of
the ancient Dracky that
bit into the original
fruit has been recalled.

231361.誰より聡明で野心家の王は\nそれゆえ孤独だった。皮肉にも\nかの女王は王を理解で:
The king, the most
intelligent and
ambitious of all, was
therefore lonely.
Ironically, the queen
thought he was the only
one who could understand
her.

231440.数百年前の隣国からの侵略が\n二国の対立の始まりだった。\nイーリィンの祖先も幾:
The conflict between the
two countries began
hundreds of years ago
with an invasion from a
neighboring country, and
several of Elyne's
ancestors also lost
their lives to the
blades of their enemies.

231520.かつてはオノを愛用していたが\nマドロックがブーメランを\n使うのを見てワシにも:
I used to be a fan of
axe, but when I saw
Madlock using boomerang,
I switched to boomerang
because I could do it
too.

231602.海神の秘宝には海の邪神の\nチカラの一部が宿っていた。\nそれは怨嗟の邪神と呼ば:
Sea God Wealth contained
a part of the power of
the evil god of the sea.
It seems to be identical
to the being called the
evil god of
vindictiveness.

231679.それぞれエモノが異なるのは\nハルバルド船長の命令。\nあらゆる敵に対応できるよ:
Each emono is different
from the other, as
ordered by Captain
Halbard. It is his
principle not to fix the
battle strategy to cope
with all kinds of
enemies.

231759.悲しみや苦しみをくり返し\nもはやナミダすら枯れ果てた。\nそのヒトミは何も映す:
Even the namida has
withered away after
repeated sadness and
suffering. Hitomi is
staring at nothingness
without reflecting
anything.

231839.厭悪とは憎み嫌うこと。\n人間の命を奪うのが生きがいで\nその赤い爪は 大嫌いな:
He lives to take human
lives, and his red
fingernails are stained
with the blood of the
humans he hates so much.

231917.初代勇者として生まれ育ち\n大魔王ゴダを打倒するが\n同時に弟や師を失ったことが:
Born and raised as the
first Hero, he overthrew
the Demon King Goda, but
at the same time, the
loss of his brother and
mentor has cast a deep
shadow over his mind.

231993.ゼドラ王国の国王となったが\n反乱の火種を見過ごして\n国家分裂の危機を招くなど:
He became king of the
kingdom of Zedra, but he
lacked the qualities of
a king, as he overlooked
the spark of rebellion
and brought the nation
to the brink of
division.

232070.吸収したエネルギーを蓄積し\n大爆発を起こす能力を持つ。\nその威力は神の秘宝さ:
It has the ability to
accumulate absorbed
energy and cause a large
explosion. Its power is
such that it can destroy
even the hidden
treasures of the gods.

232146.大半のジア・クト念晶体が\n後天的に鉱物化するのに対し\n生粋のジア・クトのこと:
While most Dia Kut
telecrystals are
acquired mineralized,
genuine Dia Kut is
referred to as the great
gemstone.

232222.今もスイゼン湿原のどこかで\nすっかり 無口になった\nマイ・スウィートハートと:
He is still enjoying a
date with My Suit Heart,
who has gone completely
mute somewhere in Suizen
Marsh.

232298.もしもエルジュたちより先に\nクァバルナを発見した者が\nいたなら その相手に乗:
If anyone had discovered
Quava Luna before Erju
and his colleagues, he
would have taken on that
opponent and
materialized.

232377.集めた 闇のキーエンブレムは\nあこがれのエックスさんに\n会えたら プレゼント:
The key emblem of
darkness I collected was
going to be a present
for X when I met the man
I longed to meet.

232445.アストルティア侵略のためには\n勇者との戦いを避けねばと悟り\nラズバーンは５０:
Realizing that he had to
avoid a battle with Hero
in order to invade
Astoltia, Razburn spent
500 years planning the
birth of Netherlord
Nergel.

232530.じつは源世庫に収められた荷を\n運ぶためのクレーンなのだが\n侵入者を排除する番:
The Kulanes were
originally designed to
carry cargo stored in
the Gensei warehouse,
but later added the
function of a sentry to
eliminate intruders.

232612.大地にへばりついた戦いは\nもはや過去のものとなる……。\nこれからは空戦の時代:
Battles clinging to the
earth are now a thing of
the past. The time has
come for air battles!
Let's dominate the
three-dimensional
battlefield!

232692.己をかえりみることなく\nひたすらに肉体をきたえつづけ\n耐えがたき苦しみに耐え:
Without thinking of
himself, he continued to
work on his body and
endure unbearable
suffering. What awaits
us after that?

232772.堅苦しい性格の暴虐の邪神と\n奔放な性格の戦禍の邪神は\n一度殴り合いの大ゲンカ:
The evil god of tyranny,
with his stolid nature,
and the evil god of war,
with his unrestrained
nature, have become good
friends since they had a
big fistfight once and
drew to a standstill.

232854.様々な呪いによって苦痛と\n恨みを振りまく怨嗟の邪神は\n戦いを好む戦禍の邪神に:
The evil god of
vindictiveness, who
spreads pain and
resentment through
various curses, was an
existence that the evil
god of war, who loves to
fight, did not like.

232933.禁忌の邪神の得意とする戦法は\n豪胆な戦禍の邪神からすると\n臆病者の戦い方にし:
The battle strategy that
the evil god of taboo
was good at seemed like
a coward's way of
fighting to the bold
evil god of the ravages
of war, and he was
disdainful of it in his
heart.

233010.嘲弄の邪神はとらえどころなく\n下手に絡むとロクな目に\nあわないので 戦禍の邪:
The evil god of taunts
is elusive, and if you
get involved with him
badly, you will end up
in trouble.

233089.魔界とアストルティアをつなぐ\nルクスガルン大空洞は\n戦禍の邪神が攻め入った際:
The Luxgarn Caverns,
which connect Demon
World and Astoltia, were
reportedly opened when
the evil god of war
invaded.

233165.一番好きな色はもちろん金。\nしかし黄金の剣や防具の維持\n黄金スライムの人件費:
His favorite color is of
course gold. However, he
is always short of money
to maintain his golden
sword and armor, and to
pay for Slime's labor.

233244.非番の時は武器を包丁に\n持ち替え料理人をしている。\n食材を切っている方が性に:
When he is off duty, he
switches his weapon to a
knife and becomes a
cook. He says that
chopping food is more to
his liking.

233320.自分に向けられる感情を匂いで\n感じ取る能力を持っており\nじつは恐れや敵意に反:
They have the ability to
sense emotions directed
at them by smell, and in
fact, they only attack
in response to fear or
hostility.

233402.過去の暴走で天使ヘファニスが\n命を落とすことになったのは\nこいつと相打ちにな:
The angel Hephanis had
to lose his life because
of a past outburst when
he was pitted against
this guy. It was an
unexpected adversary.

233485.虚無の邪神の独特の価値観は\n戦禍の邪神には理解不能で\nまともな意思疎通も難し:
The unique values of the
evil god of emptiness
were incomprehensible to
the evil god of the
ravages of war, making
proper communication
difficult, and in any
case, he was a difficult
opponent.

233562.寡黙な渇欲の邪神のことを\n戦禍の邪神は気に入っていた。\n向こうがどう思ってい:
The evil god of war
liked the taciturn evil
god of greed. I don't
know what the other side
thought of him, and I
don't care.

233641.密かに大魔王ゾーマを崇拝し\n手を前に突き出すポーズは\n何を隠そうゾーマリスペ:
The pose in which he
thrusts his hands
forward is a secret
respect for Zoma, whom
he secretly worships. I
also arrange it in my
own way by spreading
them out a little.

233723.忠犬のように ジア・ルミナに\nついて回り 命令にしたがうが\n当のジア・ルミナ:
He follows Dia Lumina
around like a loyal dog,
obeying orders, but to
Dia Lumina he is nothing
more than a watchdog.

233801.ジア・ロダとは共に行動して\nいるようだが ジア・クトに\nつがいという意識があ:
It is unclear whether
Dia Kut is aware that
they are mating,
although they seem to be
working together with
Dia Loda.

233871.人類にもジア・クトにも絶望し\n自身のチカラだけで すべてを\n無に帰するために:
In despair of mankind
and Dia Kut, Leone was
born to bring everything
to nothing with his own
power alone, an
incarnation of the
destructive impulse of
Leone.

233952.師イゾラを尊敬しイゾラ推しの\n第一人者を自負している。\n得意の手料理で 師に:
She respects her mentor
Izola and is proud to be
a leading proponent of
Izola. She is more than
happy to make her mentor
happy with her
specialty, homemade
cooking.

234033.古き伝承によると 風の竜は\nいにしえの竜の中で もっとも\n聡明なるものと言わ:
According to an ancient
legend, the Wind Dragon
is said to be the most
intelligent of all the
dragons of antiquity,
and it had a counterpart
in the Thunder Dragon.

234113.戦禍の邪神の想念はかつて\n過ごしていた魔界の地にも\nおよび その地を支配する:
The evil god's thoughts
have reached the land of
Demon World, where he
used to spend his time,
and the memories of the
kings who ruled the land
have been transformed
into his servants.

234189.戦禍の邪神にとって魔界は\nあまりに狭く 好き放題に\n暴れられる広大な大地を求:
The Demon World is too
small for the evil god
of war, and he has
expeditioned to Astoltia
in search of a vast land
where he can rampage as
much as he pleases.

234267.目立ちたいという彼の夢を\n天使のチカラでかなえたからか\n変身した姿は やたら:
Perhaps it was because
he had used the power of
an angel to fulfill his
dream of standing out,
but his transformed
appearance was
extraordinarily
glamorous and gorgeous.

234345.みごと現世に蘇りし暁には\n大陸中のドワーフを滅ぼし\nドワチャッカの金銀財宝を:
When he was successfully
resurrected, he intended
to destroy all Dwarfs on
the continent and take
Dwachakka's gold,
silver, and treasure for
himself.

234421.みごと現世に蘇りし暁には\nオーガの王たちをあやつり\n全種族へ宣戦布告させ 世:
When he was successfully
resurrected, he was
going to command the
kings of Ogre to declare
war on all the races and
engulf the world in
flames of war.

234497.みごと現世に蘇りし暁には\nメギストリス王家の血を絶やし\n魔瘴でプクランド大陸:
When he was successfully
resurrected, he was
going to cut off the
blood of the Megistris
royal family and cover
the Pukuland Continent
with demon miasma.

234573.みごと現世に蘇りし暁には\nエルフの聖地を破壊し\nエルトナ大陸全土を死と絶望で:
When he was successfully
resurrected, he intended
to destroy the Elf
sanctuary and fill the
entire Eltona Continent
with death and despair.

234647.みごと現世に蘇りし暁には\n封印の巫女とその血脈を\n皮切りにウェナ諸島全土を\:
When he was successfully
resurrected, he intended
to destroy the entire
Wena Islands, starting
with the sealing
priestess and her
bloodline.

234721.アストルティアで倒された\n悪しき魔物や悪人の魂は\n復讐のため 皆すすんで\n:
The souls of the evil
monsters and villains
defeated in Astoltia
were all willing to feed
the King of Hell in
order to take revenge.

234794.鉱物生命体となり自慢の目玉は\nさらに眼力と輝きを増した。\nその視線にさらされ:
As a mineral life form,
his proud eyeballs have
become even more
powerful and shiny. It
is reputed that just
being exposed to its
gaze is enough to make
one go numb and tingle.

234876.シルバーデビルから\nゴールドデビルになったと\nよろこんだが 与えられたのは\:
I was delighted to be
named Gold Devil by
Silvapithecus, but the
name I was given was Dia
Kut.

234951.一般キラーデーモン時代の\n上司だったベルフェゴルに\nお礼参りをしてきたらしい:
He has been paying his
respects to Belfggor,
who was his boss during
his General Demon
Steward days, and he is
grateful to Dia Kut.

235030.声に出して伝えられない。\nそういうこともあるだろう。\nしかし想いはいつか通じ:
I can't tell them out
loud. There will be
times when you can't say
it out loud. But your
feelings will be
understood someday. We
must not give up.

235106.ポップでバズな写真を撮って\nまちかど掲示板にアップし\nおひねりを稼ぐことで\:
He seems to make his
living by taking buzz-
worthy pictures on Poppu
and uploading them to
the Town Bulletin Board
to earn some extra
money.

235176.絶念とは諦めること。\n禍々しき双角の橙色の輝きは\n美しかった姿の名残か。\n:
Despair means giving up.
Is the orange glow of
the twin horns of
misfortune a remnant of
a once-beautiful figure?
Or is it the height of
the former aspirations?

235249.本来の目的はとうに見失い\n気に入った者を手当たり次第\n捕らえてきては氷漬けに:
They have lost sight of
their original purpose,
and will take whoever
they want, put them on
ice, and keep loving
them until they get
tired of them.

235329.なんでシマシマなのかって？\nシマシマ カッコイイだろ！\n文句あんのかコラ！\:
Why stripes, you ask?
Stripy, Stripy, Kakkoii,
right? You got a problem
with that? Get out of
the front, you bitch!

235401.エネルギー効率に問題があり\n源世庫に収容されていたが\nこの不思議な空間に満ち:
It had been housed in
the Genzei storehouse
due to problems with
energy efficiency, but
it seems to have been
set in motion by the
power that fills this
mysterious space.

235478.戦禍の邪神はチカラを望む者に\n魔の祝福を与えるのを好んだ。\n中でも悪鬼ゾンガ:
The evil gods of war
preferred to bestow
their demonic blessings
on those who desired
chikara. Among them,
Demon Zongalon was
excellent and had
abilities similar to
those of the evil gods.

235564.悪鬼ゾンガロンが封印された\n十数年後 ひとりのオーガが\n戦禍の邪神のもとを訪:
More than a decade after
Demon Zongalon was
sealed, an Ogre visited
the evil god of war. His
name is Gullray.

235642.始まりの大魔王は戦禍の邪神の\n存在に気付いたが その覚醒は\n彼の目的に合致し:
The Great Demon King of
the Beginning was aware
of the existence of the
evil god of war, but did
not dare to contact him
because its awakening
did not match his
purpose.

235800.大魔王ヴァルザードの侵略で\n高まった戦禍の邪神の想念を\n察知して 当時の魔封:
Sensing the evil
thoughts of the evil god
of war heightened by the
invasion of Great Demon
KingValzard, the Seal
Maiden of that time was
appointed as the
guardian of the seal.

235879.今現在 戦禍の眷族が続々と\n出現しているのは当然ながら\n大魔王マデサゴーラが:
The current appearance
of the war-ravaged
families is, of course,
a consequence of the
appearance of the Great
Demon King Madesagora on
the ground.

235954.かつて始まりの大魔王が\n初めて地上に現れたとき\n邪神の封印に綻びが生じ\n戦:
When the Great Demon
King of the past first
appeared on earth, the
seal of the evil god was
broken and the
consciousness of the
evil god of war was
awakened.

236106.じつは大魔王ヴァルザードは\n邪神の宮殿へ来ていたという。\n当時の魔封剣姫と対:
In fact, Great Demon
KingValzard had come to
the Evil God Palace. It
is not known what
happened when he met
Seal Maiden at that
time.

236260.不死の魔王ネロドスは\n暴虐の邪神を信奉しており\n戦禍の邪神を復活させることに:
Immortal Demon King
Nerodos was apparently a
devotee of the evil god
of tyranny and had no
interest in reviving the
evil god of war.

236333.アストルティアを侵略するため\n魔界から大魔王が現れるとき\n戦禍の邪神もその影:
When the Great Demon
King appears from the
Demon World to invade
Astoltia, the evil god
of war is said to be
affected by his
influence, increasing
the degree of his
awakening.

236633.ゲノスの念晶体を削りとって\nサフィルと同時に創られた。\n同じ原石であるルミナ:
It was created at the
same time as Saphir by
carving out the
telecrystal of Genos. It
is said that it was made
from a more beautiful
piece than Lumina, which
is the same gemstone.

236715.ジア・クトの奇妙な言葉遣いは\n思考法の違いによるらしい。\nサフィルは理性を失:
Dia Kut's strange
language seems to be due
to a difference in the
way they think; Saphir
only reverts to his
original language when
he loses his
rationality.

236800.ヤマカミヌ王国に吹き荒れた\n暴風マガツカゼも人の絶望が\n創生のチカラに作用し:
The storm magatsukaze
that swept through the
Yamakaminu King country
was also embodied by the
power of human despair
acting on the power of
creation.

236876.あとほんの少し創生のチカラを\nたくわえたら大津波を起こして\n大地ごとドラゴン:
If he had just a little
more power of creation,
he would create a huge
tsunami that would
destroy the entire land
and even eat Nadraga.

236961.ふたりは王の愛であり叡智だと\nゲノスに刻み付けられてきたが\n互いを大切に思う:
They have been inscribed
by the genos as the love
and wisdom of kings, but
their love for each
other is the only thing
that no one has ever
controlled.

237044.踏んでも踏んでも立ちあがる。\n抜いても抜いても生えてくる。\n植物の持つタフな:
It will stand up whether
you step on it or not.
It grows back even if
you pull it out. The
tough vitality of the
plant ensures the long-
term maintenance of the
front line!

237127.プルタヌスが吸収したチカラの\n源泉はその漆黒の体色に似ず\nとこしえのゆりかご:
The source of the power
that Plutanus absorbed
was the memory of the
moon rising in the sky
of the Eternal Cradle,
not unlike its jet-black
body color.

237207.いかに強くとも自我を失っては\n意味がないと考えた大司祭は\n魂を外部に保存して:
The high priest thought
that no matter how
strong he was, it would
be meaningless if he
lost his ego, so he
preserved his soul
externally and used a
secret method to re-
possess his evolved
body.

237292.ジア・クト念晶体原石の１体が\n念晶巨人をあやつっていた。\n操縦席は腹部を構成:
One of the Dia Kut
telecrystal gemstones
was maneuvering the
Telecrystal Titan. The
cockpit is located deep
within the nucleus that
makes up the abdomen.

237371.魔神族ストレザーテは無限の\n魔力により姿を自在に変えた。\n本来の姿は雲をつく:
The Strezate, a race of
demons, could change
their form at will
through the power of
their infinite magic. In
its original form, it
was so huge that its
head resembled the Gate
of Hell.

237456.魔神族ストレザーテの魔力から\n生み出された。残忍かつ狡猾な\n気質もストレザー:
He was created from the
magical power of the
demon tribe Strezate.
His brutal and cunning
temperament reflects the
character of the
Strezate himself.

237535.名前にある『マスター』は\nスキルマスターが与えたが\n彼自身が変身した姿ではな:
The "Master" in his name
was given to him by
Skill Master, but rumors
persist that it may be
his own transformed
form.

237612.かつて人間だった頃は\n名刀の収集家でもあった。\nただし愛用の刀は無銘のもの。:
When he was once a
human, he was also a
collector of famous
swords. However, his
favorite sword is an
unmarked one. He is said
to be a master
swordsman, and he does
not choose a sword.

237689.力量が基準に達していなければ\n鬼神のごとく戦い続ける。\n逆に力量があると認め:
If his strength is not
up to the standard, he
will continue to fight
like a demigod. On the
other hand, if he is
found to be capable, he
will immediately put
down his sword.

237766.ナスビナーラから進化したとの\n風説を否定したいがため 己は\n生粋のジア・クト:
He wants to disprove the
rumor that he evolved
from Woebergine, so he
is intent on setting his
mindset that he is a
genuine Dia Kut.

237850.部下にも同僚にも主君にさえも\n手厳しい性格をしているが\n唯一ペットのフクロウ:
He is harsh to his
subordinates,
colleagues, and even his
lord, but he has an
unparalleled love for
his pet dog, Hu Crow.

237930.粗野で凶暴なイメージの彼だが\n意外にも生前は恐妻家だった。\n無骨な大男が小柄:
He has a crude and
ferocious image, but
surprisingly he was a
fearless wife-beater
before his death. It is
said that the big,
rugged man could not
resist his petite wife
at all.

238012.戦で手柄を上げ昇進を重ねた\n歴戦のスライムナイトだけが\nジェネラルの地位に就:
Only a Slime Knight with
a long history of
success in battle and
promotion could attain
the rank of General. Ai
Slime also rose through
the ranks together.

238094.皆さん おなじみのアイツらも\n元は この１匹から始まった。\n彼こそが アスト:
The one you all know and
love started out as one
of our own. He was the
first Slime in Astoltia.

238176.ある天使に敗れ 長い間\n封印されていたため\n天使を憎み どうやって\n皆殺し:
He was defeated by an
angel and sealed away
for a long time, so he
hated angels and was
trying to figure out how
to kill them all.

238244.よく似た姿の青色のアイツとは\n一切関係ないと主張しているが\n本人が着替えてい:
He claims that he has
nothing to do with the
blue guy who looks a lot
like him, but we can't
rule out the possibility
that he's just changing
his own clothes.

238323.よく仲間を呼んでは\nみんなで身体をひねって\n踊っている。身体に含むガスが\n:
They often invite
companions and everyone
twists and turns their
bodies and dances
together. They enjoy the
crackling and popping of
the gas contained in
their bodies.

238397.門から生み出される魔物は\nその時によって姿が異なるため\nこれらの魔物たちを総:
The monsters produced
from the gate are called
"Dweller from the Gate"
because their appearance
varies from time to
time.

238479.凶禍とはわざわいのこと。\n知的好奇心の前には肉体など\n無用と 禁忌の果実で自:
Wickedness means
misfortune. He
transformed himself into
a yellow deformity with
the forbidden fruit,
thinking that his body
was useless before his
intellectual curiosity.

238698.愛竜から過酷なダイエットを\n迫られていたが念晶体となり\n体重の変化がなくなっ:
He was forced to go on a
strict diet by Ai Ryu,
but since he became a
telecrystal and his
weight has not changed,
he is now free from
dieting.

238780.じつは貴族の中では下級。\n優秀さから王の覚えがめでたく\n上級貴族から嫉妬され:
In fact, he is a low-
ranking member of the
nobility. He is
remembered by the king
for his excellence, and
the higher nobles are
jealous of him, and he
seems to have fallen
into a state of
exhaustion.

239704.５つのアタマのうちの１つは\nじつは おとなしい性格で\n暴れたくないと思ってい:
One of the five atavisms
is actually a docile
character who doesn't
want to lash out, but
can't quite bring
himself to say it.

239782.ねぇ モーモリーナ……\n神気を宿して輝くぼくの姿を\n見ておくれよ。まるで\n:
Hey Sanguilina, look at
me shining with divine
energy. It's like a star
shining in the sky,
isn't it?

239855.アンタに詰まっているのは\n神気じゃなくて脂肪！\nメタボが原因で病気になれば\:
What is stuck in YOU is
not godliness, but fat!
If you get sick because
of your metabolic
syndrome, you can go to
heaven and become a
star!

239931.ツヤツヤくるみの食べ過ぎで\n肥大化してしまったため\nそろそろダイエットしよう:
I am thinking of going
on a diet soon because I
have become bloated from
eating too much Shiny
Walnut.

239999.今は廃棄物と呼ばれているが\nいつの日か超新星のごとく\n輝く日が来ると信じ こ:
Although he is called a
waste now, he believed
that one day he would
shine like a supernova,
and he accumulated
energies.

240077.偉大なる原石か否かは\n誕生時に決定されるので\n鍛錬で進化できるというのは\n:
It is a falsehood of Dia
Nebula that it can
evolve through forging
because whether or not
it is a great gemstone
is determined at birth.

240150.偉大なる原石に進化するのは\nデマカセだが 来光筒の光を\n浴びることで日々の錬:
It is a demarcation to
evolve into a great
gemstone, but the damage
caused by daily refining
is fully recovered by
the light of Raikou
Tube.

240229.念晶巨人を破壊されたことを\n内心恨んでおり 英雄たちに\n復讐すべく 魔眼の月:
Deeply resentful of the
destruction of the
Telecrystal Titan, he
has set up insidious
traps inside the Eye of
Evil to exact revenge on
its heroes.

240309.ジア・クト念晶体という種族の\n存続を至上の命題としており\nそのためにはあらゆ:
He is a man of steel who
is willing to sacrifice
anything for the sake of
the survival of Dia Kut
telecrystal, which is
his supreme mission.

240392.かつてはジア・クト念晶体も\n他種族から創生のチカラを\n奪うことなく自ら生みだ:
The fate of races
suddenly took a turn.

240472.ラダ・ガートの圧倒的戦力を\n再現した赤の鉱石戦士。\nジア・ネブラは強そうな敵:
A red ore WARRIOR that
replicates Lada Gart's
overwhelming force, Dia
Nebula enjoyed emulating
a strong-looking
adversary.

240551.ハクオウの卓越した剣技を\n再現した紫の鉱石戦士。\nその斬撃の鋭さは本物に\n:
A purple ore warrior who
reproduced Hakuo's
exceptional
swordsmanship, the
sharpness of his slashes
was no less than that of
the real thing.

240625.アシュレイの勇者パワーを\n再現した緑の鉱石戦士。\nどうやらジア・ネブラは剣士:
A green ore WARRIOR that
replicates Ashley's Hero
power; apparently Dia
Nebula had a preference
for swordsmen.

240701.レオーネの盟友パワーを\n再現した黄の鉱石戦士。\nジア化した姿でなく人の姿を\:
A yellow ore WARRIOR
that recreates Leone's
ally power; is it malice
or pity that it imitates
a human figure instead
of a diaretic form?

240777.ユーライザの天使の輝きを\n再現した白の鉱石戦士。\n天使の翼を再現するのには\:
A white ore warrior who
reproduced the angelic
radiance of Yuliza; Dia
Nebula also apparently
struggled to reproduce
the angel wings.

240853.天声は 女神ルティアナの声。\n呼 言 歌 哭 呻の声となり\n五つの種族に加護:
The divine voice is the
voice of Goddess
Lutiana. It is the voice
of the call, the song,
the wail, and the moan,
and has given blessings
to the five races,
influencing their way of
life.

240928.ある種の家畜と似た体色のため\n頭上の突起物はトサカと\n勘違いされがち。よく見:
Because of its body
coloration similar to
that of certain domestic
animals, the
protuberance on its head
is often mistaken for a
crest. If you look
closely, you will see
that it is an antler, so
do not make the mistake.

241008.天奏士の役割のひとつは\n寝食を忘れて演奏にふける\n天唱楽師をいさめたり\n何:
One of the roles of the
divine musician is to
take care of Heaven
Poet, who forgets to eat
or sleep and indulges in
playing.

241081.天奏士の役割のひとつは\n慰問と称して天唱楽師が開く\n演奏会に参加し 歌と踊り:
One of the roles of the
divine musician is to
participate in the
Heaven Poet's concerts
as a consolation gift,
enlivening the occasion
with song and dance.

241157.天奏士の役割のひとつは\n五つの大陸の『声』のチカラが\n集まる場所で チカラの:
One of the roles of the
divine musician is to
monitor the state of the
"voices" of the five
continents where they
gather.

241232.天奏士の役割のひとつは\n『声』をつかさどる声霊と\n密に連絡を取りあい\n良好:
One of the roles of the
divine musician is to
maintain close contact
and a good relationship
with the voice spirits
who are in charge of
"voice.

241303.天奏士の役割のひとつは\n必要とあらば それぞれが\n得意とする武器を手にして\:
One of the roles of the
divine musician is to go
into battle, if
necessary, with the
weapons of his or her
specialty in hand.

241444.紫でなく水色なのは心機一転\n新たな舞台で戦う気合の表れ。\n決して暗い所で目立:
The fact that they are
light blue instead of
purple is a sign of
their enthusiasm to
fight on a new stage
with a fresh start. It
is not that he was
concerned about not
standing out in a dark
place.

241603.正体は勇者アジールの亡霊。\nゼドラ王国崩壊後の混迷の時代\nグランゼドーラ初代:
The ghost of Hero Azir,
he led the people to
peace with the first
king of Gran Zedora
during the chaotic
period after the
collapse of the Zedra
Kingdom.

241682.本来のアストルティア史には\n存在しない異形を眷属として\n再現することは 戦禍:
It seems that even the
evil god of war had
considerable difficulty
in recreating as a
household an atypical
form that did not exist
in the original Astoltia
history.

241761.悪鬼ゾンガロンはもともと\n戦禍の邪神が生みだしたため\nその能力を継ぐ この異:
Demon Zongalon was
originally created by
the evil god of war, so
it was relatively easy
to create this variant
that inherited its
abilities.

241840.無限に増殖する能力を持つ\nこの異形を再現することは\nその難度以上に戦禍の邪神:
The difficulty of
recreating this
deformity, with its
ability to multiply
infinitely, was more
than its difficulty, it
was against the
aesthetics of the evil
god of war.

241917.同じギガデーモン族でも\n嵐の領界辺りに生息する\n有象無象とは格が違うと主張。:
He claims that even
among the Pruslas, they
are different from the
noobs that inhabit the
Storm Realm area. They
seem to be very proud.

241993.大魔王マデサゴーラに\n仕える従弟がいるらしいが\nすっかり音信不通で\n近況は:
He is said to have a
cousin who serves Great
Demon King Madesagora,
but we have lost touch
with him and do not know
what he is up to.

242060.自爆により敵を道連れにすれば\n偉大なる原石として\n新生できると信じており\n:
He follows orders
without hesitation,
believing that he can be
born anew as a great
gemstone by taking his
enemies with him through
self-destruction.
